landmarks.name: LM_AlarmClock

en.title: VERY ANGRY CLOCK
en.description: Most human clocks seem fairly docile. However, this subspecies has a nasty temper. The clock here expresses outrage by hammering its bell-shaped horns repeatedly until it is soothed using a patting motion. It is most furious around 7am.

en-GB.title: VERY ANGRY CLOCK
en-GB.description: Most human clocks seem fairly docile. However, this subspecies has a nasty temper. The clock here expresses outrage by hammering its bell-shaped horns repeatedly until it is soothed using a patting motion. It is most furious around 7am.

fr.title: HORLOGE FURAX
fr.description: La plupart des horloges humaines paraissent plutôt dociles. Cependant, cette sous-espèce a très mauvais caractère. L'horloge exprime ici son mécontentement en martelant ses cornes en forme de cloche à plusieurs reprises jusqu'à ce qu'elle soit apaisée par une petite tape. Sa colère est maximale vers 7 h du matin.

de.title: SEHR WÜTENDE UHR
de.description: Die meisten menschlichen Uhren scheinen ziemlich zahm zu sein. Diese Subspezies hat allerdings ein übles Temperament. Diese Uhr drückt ihre Wut aus, indem sie ihre Glockenförmigen Hörner mit einem Hammer bearbeitet, bis sie durch ein Tätscheln beschwichtigt wird. Um 7 Uhr morgens ist sie am wütendsten.

es.title: RELOJ MUY ENFADADO
es.description: La mayoría de relojes humanos parecen bastante dóciles. Sin embargo, esta subespecie tiene un desagradable temperamento. Este reloj expresa su rabia martilleando sus cuernos con forma de campanas repetidamente hasta que lo calman con un movimiento de la palma de la mano. Se pone furioso en torno a las 7 de la mañana.

it.title: OROLOGIO MOLTO ARRABBIATO
it.description: La maggior parte degli orologi umani sembra piuttosto docile. Ciononostante, questa sottospecie ha un brutto caratterino. Questo qui esprime la sua ira sbattendo ripetutamente le corna a forma di campana finché non si calma. È furioso in particolar modo intorno alle 7 di mattina.

ja.title: 激怒している時計
ja.description: ほとんどの人間の時計は従順なようですが、この亜種はひどく怒りっぽい性格をしています。この時計は、撫でるような動作をするまではそのベル型の角を繰り返し打ち続け、その怒りを表現するのです。この時計が一番怒りっぽい時間は、朝の7時頃です。

ko.title: 매우 화가 난 시계
ko.description: 대부분의 인간 시계들은 매우 온순합니다. 하지만 이 시계는 제법 성질이 있습니다. 이 시계는 머리를 쓰다듬어줄 때까지 종 모양의 뿔을 쾅쾅 부딪히며 화를 냅니다. 특히 오전 7시에 가장 분노 지수가 높습니다.

zh-Hans.title: 暴怒钟
zh-Hans.description: 大多数人类时钟似乎相当温顺。然而，这个小钟脾气很坏。这个钟通过不断敲击钟形喇叭来表达愤怒，除非用轻拍动作来安抚。它在早上 7 点左右最愤怒。

zh-Hant.title: 暴怒的時鐘
zh-Hant.description: 多數人類的時鐘看起來都相當溫馴。然而，這個亞種有著暴躁的脾氣。這裡的時鐘會連續錘打它的鈴狀觸角來表達憤怒，要以輕拍的手勢安撫它才會消氣。它在上午七點左右最為狂暴。

ru.title: ОЧЕНЬ ЗЛЫЕ ЧАСЫ
ru.description: Большинство человеческих часов выглядят достаточно послушными. Однако у этого подвида очень тяжелый характер. Возмущаясь, они раз за разом ударяют своими колоколообразными рогами до тех пор, пока их не успокоить похлопывающим движением. Наиболее разъяренными они становятся около 7 утра.

pt-BR.title: RELÓGIO PISTOLA
pt-BR.description: A maioria dos relógios humanos são dóceis, mas esta subespécie tem um péssimo temperamento. Este relógio expressa o ultraje batendo em seus tambores em forma de sino repetidamente até que ele seja acalmado com um carinho na cabeça. Ele fica mais nervoso por volta das 7h.

nl.title: ERG BOZE KLOK
nl.description: De meeste mensenklokken zijn gehoorzaam. Deze soort klok heeft echter een slecht humeur. De klok laat zijn woede zien door voortdurend op de bel te hameren, totdat een mens deze zachtjes aait. Deze klok is het meest boos rond 7.00 uur 's ochtends.

ar.title: ﺳﺎﻋﺔ ﻏﺎﺿﺒﺔ ﻟﻠﻐﺎﻳﺔ
ar.description: ﻋﻠﯽ اﻟﺮﻏﻢ ﻣﻦ أن ﻣﻌﻈﻢ ﺳﺎﻋﺎت اﻟﺒﺸﺮ ﺳﻬﻠﺔ ﻧﺴﺒﻴﺎ ﻓﻲ اﻟﺘﻌﺎﻣﻞ ﻣﻌﻬﺎ، ﻓﺈن ﻫﺬه اﻟﺴﻼﻟﺔ اﻟﻔﺮﻋﻴﺔ ﺳﺮﻳﻌﺔ اﻟﻐﻀﺐ. ﺗﻌﺒﺮ ﻫﺬه اﻟﺴﺎﻋﺔ ﻋﻦ ﺳﺨﻄﻬﺎ ﺑﺈﻃﻼق ﻋﻮﻳﻠﻬﺎ ﻣﻦ ﺧﻼل دق ﻗﺮوﻧﻬﺎ اﻟﻤﺼﻤﻤﺔ ﻋﻠﯽ ﺷﻜﻞ ﻛﺮات ﺑﺸﻜﻞ ﻣﺴﺘﻤﺮ إﻟﯽ أن ﻳﺮﺑﺖ ﻋﻠﻴﻬﺎ ﺑﺤﺮﻛﺔ ﺣﺎﻧﻴﺔ ﻓﺘﻬﺪأ. وﺗﻜﻮن ﻓﻲ أوج ﻏﻀﺒﻬﺎ ﻋﻨﺪ اﻟﺴﺎﻋﺔ 7 ﺻﺒﺎﺣﺎ .

tk.title: AŞIRI SİNİRLİ SAAT
tk.description: Pek çok insan saati epey uysal görünüyor. Ancak bu alt türün öfkeli bir mizacı var. Bu saat, çan şeklindeki boynuzlarını birbirine vurarak öfkesini gösteriyor, hafif bir vurma hareketiyle sakinleştirilmesi gerekiyor. En öfkeli olduğu saatler ise sabah 7 civarı.

fr-CA.title: HORLOGE FURIEUSE
fr-CA.description: La plupart des horloges humaines paraissent plutôt dociles. Cependant, cette sous-espèce a très mauvais caractère. L'horloge exprime ici sa colère en martelant à répétition ses cornes en forme de cloche jusqu'à ce qu'elle soit apaisée par une petite tape. Sa colère est maximale vers 7 h du matin.

en-AU.title: VERY ANGRY CLOCK
en-AU.description: Most human clocks seem fairly docile. However, this subspecies has a nasty temper. The clock here expresses outrage by hammering its bell-shaped horns repeatedly until it is soothed using a patting motion. It is most furious around 7am.

landmarks.title: VERY ANGRY CLOCK
landmarks.description: Most human clocks seem fairly docile. However, this subspecies has a nasty temper. The clock here expresses outrage by hammering its bell-shaped horns repeatedly until it is soothed using a patting motion. It is most furious around 7am.

landmarks.name: LM_AloePlant

en.title: SUCCULENT LAMP
en.description: With desktop real estate dwindling, home furniture designers looked for new ways to combine common tabletop objects. This potted lamp is the result of cross-breeding an aloe with a lightbulb. The plant requires minimal watering and, when it flowers, the bloom emits a useful nocturnal glow.

en-GB.title: SUCCULENT LAMP
en-GB.description: With desktop real estate dwindling, home furniture designers looked for new ways to combine common tabletop objects. This potted lamp is the result of cross-breeding an aloe with a lightbulb. The plant requires minimal watering and, when it flowers, the bloom emits a useful nocturnal glow.

fr.title: LAMPE SUCCULENTE
fr.description: Avec la réduction du mobilier de bureau, les concepteurs de meubles ont cherché de nouvelles façons de combiner des objets de table courants. Cette lampe en pot est le résultat du croisement entre un aloès et une ampoule. La plante doit être arrosée un minimum et, lorsqu'elle éclot, sa fleur émet une lueur nocturne des plus appréciables.

de.title: LAMPENSUKKULENTE
de.description: Als der Platz auf den Schreibtischen knapp wurde, suchten Möbeldesigner nach neuen Arten, gewöhnliche Objekte zu kombinieren. Diese Topflampe ist das Ergebnis der Kreuzung einer Aloe und einer Glühbirne. Die Pflanze benötigt nur minimale Bewässerung und die Blüte gibt nachts ein nützliches Leuchten ab.

es.title: LÁMPARA SUCULENTA
es.description: Dado que el espacio en los escritorios cada vez escaseaba más, los diseñadores de muebles del hogar buscaron nuevas formas de combinar objetos de mesa comunes. Esta lámpara en maceta es el resultado del cruce entre un aloe vera y una bombilla. La planta apenas requiere riego y, cuando florece, la flor emite un práctico brillo nocturno.

it.title: LAMPADA PIANTA GRASSA
it.description: A causa del calo dello spazio disponibile sulle scrivanie, i progettisti di arredamento per case iniziarono a combinare più oggetti da tavolo. Questa lampada in vaso rappresenta l'unione tra una pianta di aloe e una lampadina. La pianta richiede poca acqua e, quando fiorisce, emette un utile bagliore notturno.

ja.title: 多肉植物ランプ
ja.description: 机上スペースがが減少傾向にある中、家庭家具デザイナーたちが一般的な机上オブジェクトを組み合わせる新たな方法を模索しました。この鉢植えランプは、アロエを電球と交配したことによって生まれました。この植物への水やりは最小限でよく、花が咲くと、役に立つ夜間の光を放ちます。

ko.title: 다육이 램프
ko.description: 책상 위 부동산 산업이 사양에 접어들면서 실내 가구 디자이너들은 책상 위 물체들을 한데 묶을 새로운 방법을 고민하기 시작했습니다. 이 화분에 심은 램프는 알로에와 전구를 이종 교배한 것입니다. 이 식물은 물이 거의 필요하지 않으며, 꽃이 피면 아름다운 야광으로 빛납니다.

zh-Hans.title: 盆栽灯
zh-Hans.description: 随着桌面空间的缩小，家具设计师们开始寻找新的方法来收纳常见的桌面物件。这盏盆栽灯是芦荟和灯泡杂交的结果。植物只需要少量浇水，当它开花时，就会发出实用的夜光。

zh-Hant.title: 多肉植物燈
zh-Hant.description: 隨著桌面空間縮小，家具設計師便開始尋找新方法來結合常見的桌面物品。這個盆栽燈是以蘆薈和燈泡雜交配種的成果。這種植物不太需要澆水，當它開花時，花朵會發出實用的夜光。

ru.title: ЛАМПА-СУККУЛЕНТ
ru.description: С уменьшением полезной площади рабочего стола дизайнеры домашней мебели искали новые способы комбинирования привычных настольных предметов. Эта лампа в горшке — результат скрещивания алоэ и лампочки. Растение требует минимального полива, а при цветении излучает удобное свечение ночного неба.

pt-BR.title: LÂMPADA SUCULENTA
pt-BR.description: Com o aumento do preço do metro quadrado de superfície de escrivaninha no mercado mobiliário, decoradores passaram a procurar formas diferentes de combinar objetos de mesa comuns. Esta lâmpada foi cruzada com uma suculenta: o resultado é uma planta que exige cuidado mínimo e emite uma luz noturna muito útil ao florescer.

nl.title: VETPLANTLAMP
nl.description: Omdat bureaus steeds kleiner werden, zochten meubelontwerpers naar nieuwe manieren waarop ze veelvoorkomende voorwerpen konden combineren. Deze lamp in een bloempot is een kruising tussen een vetplantje en een lamp. De plant heeft weinig water nodig en wanneer ze bloeit, geeft ze 's nachts een handig licht af.

ar.title: اﻟﻤﺼﺒﺎح اﻟﻌﺼﺎري
ar.description: ﻣﻊ زﻳﺎدة ﺗﺰاﺣﻢ اﻷﺳﻄﺢ اﻟﻤﺨﺼﺼﺔ ﻟﻠﻌﻤﻞ ﺑﺄﺷﻴﺎء أﺧﺮى، ﺑﺤﺚ ﻣﺼﻤﻤﻮ أﺛﺎث اﻟﻤﻨﺎزل ﻋﻦ ﻃﺮق ﺟﺪﻳﺪة ﻟﺪﻣﺞ اﻷﺷﻴﺎء اﻟﺘﻲ ﻳﺸﻴﻊ وﺿﻌﻬﺎ ﻋﻠﯽ أﺳﻄﺢ اﻟﻌﻤﻞ. ﻓﻜﺎن اﻟﻤﺼﺒﺎح اﻟﻤﺰود ﺑﺄﺻﻴﺺ ﻫﻮ ﺛﻤﺮة دﻣﺞ اﻟﺼﺒﺎر واﻟﻤﺼﺒﺎح اﻟﻜﻬﺮﺑﺎﺋﻲ ﻋﻦ ﻃﺮﻳﻖ اﻟﺘﻬﺠﻴﻦ. وﻳﺘﻄﻠﺐ ﻫﺬا اﻟﻨﺒﺎت اﻟﻘﻠﻴﻞ ﻣﻦ اﻟﺮي وﻋﻨﺪﻣﺎ ﻳﺰﻫﺮ، ﻳﻨﺒﻌﺚ ﻣﻦ اﻷزﻫﺎر ﺿﻮء ﻣﻔﻴﺪ ﻓﻲ اﻟﻠﻴﻞ.

tk.title: SUKULENT LAMBA
tk.description: Masalar giderek küçüldükçe mobilya tasarımcıları masaların üzerinde sık rastlanan eşyaları birleştirmenin yeni yollarını aramaya başladı. Saksıya konulmuş bu lamba, aloe bitkisiyle ampul melezidir. Az su isteyen bitki çiçeklendiğinde geceleri işe yarar bir ışık yayar.

fr-CA.title: LAMPE SUCCULENTE
fr-CA.description: Avec la diminution de l'espace disponible sur les bureaux, les concepteurs de meubles ont cherché de nouvelles façons de combiner des objets de table courants. Cette lampe en pot est le résultat du croisement entre un aloès et une ampoule. La plante demande peu d'arrosage et, lorsqu'elle éclot, sa fleur émet une lueur nocturne des plus pratiques.

en-AU.title: SUCCULENT LAMP
en-AU.description: With desktop real estate dwindling, home furniture designers looked for new ways to combine common tabletop objects. This potted lamp is the result of cross-breeding an aloe with a lightbulb. The plant requires minimal watering and, when it flowers, the bloom emits a useful nocturnal glow.

landmarks.title: SUCCULENT LAMP
landmarks.description: With desktop real estate dwindling, home furniture designers looked for new ways to combine common tabletop objects. This potted lamp is the result of cross-breeding an aloe with a lightbulb. The plant requires minimal watering and, when it flowers, the bloom emits a useful nocturnal glow.

landmarks.name: LM_BabyShoes

en.title: BABY SHOES, NEVER WORN
en.description: These miniature human shoes are in pristine condition due to lack of use. Eventually, after many years of conflict between tiny, screaming, crumpled humans and big, tired humans, the practice of shoeing babies was deemed "futile" and abandoned.

en-GB.title: BABY SHOES, NEVER WORN
en-GB.description: These miniature human shoes are in pristine condition due to lack of use. Eventually, after many years of conflict between tiny, screaming, crumpled humans and big, tired humans, the practice of shoeing babies was deemed "futile" and abandoned.

fr.title: PETITES CHAUSSURES, JAMAIS PORTÉES
fr.description: Ces chaussures humaines miniatures sont en parfait état à la suite d’une utilisation mesurée. En effet, après de nombreuses années de conflit entre petits humains bruyants et grincheux et gros humains fatigués, la pratique consistant à chausser les bébés a été jugée « futile » avant d'être abandonnée.

de.title: BABYSCHUHE, NIE GETRAGEN
de.description: Diese menschlichen Schuhe im Miniaturformat sind aufgrund mangelnder Benutzung in makellosem Zustand. Nach vielen Jahren des Konflikts zwischen winzigen, schreienden, verschrumpelten Menschen und großen, müden Menschen wurde die Praxis des Beschuhens von Babys für „vergeblich“ erachtet und schließlich aufgegeben.

es.title: ZAPATOS DE BEBÉ, SIN USAR
es.description: Estos zapatos humanos en miniatura están en perfectas condiciones debido a la falta de uso. Finalmente, tras muchos años de conflicto entre humanos arrugados, gritones y diminutos y otros grandes y cansados, la práctica de poner zapatos a los bebés se consideró "inútil" y fue abandonada.

it.title: SCARPE DA BIMBO, MAI INDOSSATE
it.description: Queste scarpe umane in miniatura sono in condizioni perfette visto il mancato utilizzo. Alla fine, dopo anni di conflitto tra piccoli umani urlanti e umani grandi e stanchi, la pratica di mettere le scarpe ai bimbi fu definita "futile" e venne abbandonata.

ja.title: 赤ちゃんの靴、未使用
ja.description: これらのミニチュアの靴は未使用品で、新品同様の状態です。泣き叫んでいるくしゃくしゃ顔の小さな人間と、疲れ果てた大きな人間の間で引き起こされた長年の衝突の末、赤ちゃんに靴を履かせることは「無益である」とみなされ、以後誰も行わなくなりました。

ko.title: 아기 신발, 사용한 적 없음
ko.description: 이 미니어처 인간 신발은 사용하지 않아 완벽한 상태를 유지하고 있습니다. 소리를 지르며 쭈글쭈글한 작은 인간들과 지치고 큰 인간들 사이의 몇 년에 걸친 분쟁으로 아기에게 신발을 신긴다는 것은 '무의미'하다는 결론이 내려졌으며, 결국 신발도 버려졌습니다.

zh-Hans.title: 全新婴儿鞋
zh-Hans.description: 由于未穿过，这些小号人类鞋处于全新状态。在弱小、歇斯底里、崩溃的人类和高大、厌倦的人类之间发生了多年的冲突之后，大家认为给婴儿穿鞋的做法“徒劳无功”，并最终摒弃了。

zh-Hant.title: 全新嬰兒鞋
zh-Hant.description: 由於從未穿過，這些小型人類鞋子保持全新狀態。後來，在愛哭鬧且崩潰的嬌小人類和疲累的高大人類雙方多年的紛爭下，替嬰兒穿鞋的慣例被視為「徒勞無功」而遭到放棄。

ru.title: ДЕТСКИЕ БОТИНКИ, НЕНОШЕНЫЕ
ru.description: Эти крошечные человеческие ботинки находятся в первозданном виде из-за отсутствия эксплуатации. В конце концов, после многолетнего конфликта между маленькими, вопящими, сморщенными людьми и большими усталыми людьми, традиция обувания детей была признана «тщетной», и ее забросили.

pt-BR.title: SAPATINHOS DE BEBÊ NUNCA USADOS
pt-BR.description: Estes sapatinhos humanos estão em perfeitas condições por nunca terem sido usados. Depois de muitos anos de conflito entre os pequenos humanos enrugados birrentos e os grandes humanos cansados, a prática de calçar bebês passou a ser considerada fútil e foi abandonada.

nl.title: BABYSCHOENEN, NOOIT GEDRAGEN
nl.description: Deze menselijke miniatuurschoenen zijn in ongerepte staat wegens gebrek aan gebruik. Uiteindelijk, na vele jaren van conflict tussen kleine, schreeuwende, gerimpelde mensen en grote, vermoeide mensen, werd de praktijk van baby's schoenen aantrekken als "zinloos" beschouwd en verlaten.

ar.title: ﺣﺬاء أﻃﻔﺎل، ﻟﻢ ﻳﺴﺒﻖ اﺳﺘﺨﺪاﻣﻪ
ar.description: ﻫﺬا اﻟﺤﺬاء اﻟﺒﺸﺮي اﻟﺼﻐﻴﺮ ﻓﻲ ﺣﺎﻟﺔ ﺟﻴﺪة ﺑﺴﺒﺐ ﻗﻠﺔ اﺳﺘﺨﺪاﻣﻪ. ﻓﻔﻲ اﻟﻨﻬﺎﻳﺔ ﺑﻌﺪ ﻣﺮور ﻋﺪة ﺳﻨﻮات ﻣﻦ اﻟﻨﺰاع ﺑﻴﻦ اﻟﺒﺸﺮ اﻟﺼﻐﺎر اﻟﺼﺎرﺧﻴﻦ اﻟﻐﺎﺿﺒﻴﻦ واﻟﺒﺸﺮ اﻟﻜﺒﺎر اﻟﻤﻨﻬﻜﻴﻦ، أﻟﻐﻴﺖ ﻣﻤﺎرﺳﺔ إﻟﺒﺎس اﻷﻃﻔﺎل اﻷﺣﺬﻳﺔ واﻋﺘﻘﺪ ﺑﺄﻧﻬﺎ "ﻏﻴﺮ ﻣﺠﺪﻳﺔ" .

tk.title: HİÇ GİYİLMEMİŞ BEBEK AYAKKABILARI
tk.description: Bu minyatür insan ayakkabıları, kullanılmadıkları için yeni ve iyi durumdadır. Çığlık atan ve buruşuk minik insanlarla yorgun büyük insanlar arasındaki bitmek bilmeyen çatışmanın ardından bebeklere ayakkabı giydirmenin "anlamsız" olduğuna karar verildi ve bu işten vazgeçildi.

fr-CA.title: CHAUSSURES DE BÉBÉ, JAMAIS PORTÉES
fr-CA.description: Ces chaussures humaines miniatures sont en parfait état suite à une non-utilisation. En effet, après de nombreuses années de conflit entre petits humains bruyants et difformes et gros humains fatigués, la pratique consistant à chausser les bébés a été jugée « futile » avant d'être abandonnée.

en-AU.title: BABY SHOES, NEVER WORN
en-AU.description: These miniature human shoes are in pristine condition due to lack of use. Eventually, after many years of conflict between tiny, screaming, crumpled humans and big, tired humans, the practice of shoeing babies was deemed "futile" and abandoned.

landmarks.title: BABY SHOES, NEVER WORN
landmarks.description: These miniature human shoes are in pristine condition due to lack of use. Eventually, after many years of conflict between tiny, screaming, crumpled humans and big, tired humans, the practice of shoeing babies was deemed "futile" and abandoned.

landmarks.name: LM_Backpack

en.title: HUMAN BACKPACK
en.description: Human backpacks look a lot like monster backpacks, but if you open one up you can see that they are exactly as big on the inside as they seem from the outside, implying humans never quite mastered basic dimensional design theory.

en-GB.title: HUMAN BACKPACK
en-GB.description: Human backpacks look a lot like monster backpacks, but if you open one up you can see that they are exactly as big on the inside as they seem from the outside, implying humans never quite mastered basic dimensional design theory.

fr.title: SAC À DOS HUMAIN
fr.description: Les sacs à dos humains ressemblent beaucoup à ceux des monstres, à ceci près que si vous en ouvrez un, vous verrez qu'ils sont tout aussi grands à l'intérieur qu'ils le paraissent de l'extérieur, ce qui indique que les humains n'ont jamais vraiment maîtrisé les rudiments de la conception dimensionnelle.

de.title: MENSCHLICHER RUCKSACK
de.description: Menschliche Rucksäcke sahen aus wie die von Monstern; allerdings zeigt sich beim Öffnen der menschlichen Variante, dass sie innen genauso groß sind wie von außen, was darauf hinweist, dass Menschen grundlegende dimensionale Designtheorien nie begriffen haben.

es.title: MOCHILA HUMANA
es.description: Las mochilas humanas se parecen mucho a las mochilas de los monstruos, pero si abres una podrás ver que son exactamente tan grandes por dentro como parecen por fuera, lo cual implica que los humanos nunca dominaron la teoría del diseño dimensional básica.

it.title: ZAINETTO UMANO
it.description: Gli zainetti umani assomigliano molto a quelli dei mostri, ma se se ne apre uno si noterà che all'interno sono grandi esattamente quanto sembrino dall'esterno, implicando che gli umani non hanno mai perfezionato le basi della teoria del design dimensionale.

ja.title: 人間のリュック
ja.description: 人間のリュックはモンスターのリュックとそっくりですが、このリュックを開けてみると、その中身の大きさは外側から見た大きさとほとんど同じであり、人間が基本的な次元設計理論をマスターできなかったことを顕著に示しています。

ko.title: 인간 배낭
ko.description: 인간 배낭은 몬스터 배낭과 비슷하지만, 열어보면 내부의 크기도 밖에서 볼 때와 똑같다는 걸 알 수 있습니다. 여기에서 인간들은 기본적인 차원 설계 이론도 익히지 못했다는 걸 알 수 있습니다.

zh-Hans.title: 人类背包
zh-Hans.description: 人类背包看起来很像怪兽的背包，但如果你打开一个，你会发现它们的里面和外面看起来一样大，这意味着人类从来没有完全掌握基本的空间设计理论。

zh-Hant.title: 人類背包
zh-Hant.description: 人類背包的外觀和怪獸背包很像，但如果你打開，會發現前者內部的大小和外部看起來一模一樣，意味著人類從未掌握基本的維度空間設計原理。

ru.title: ЧЕЛОВЕЧЕСКИЙ РЮКЗАК
ru.description: Человеческие рюкзаки очень похожи на рюкзаки монстров, но если открыть один из них, то можно увидеть, что внутри он того же размера, что и снаружи. Это наводит на мысль, что люди так и не освоили базовую теорию проектирования пространства.

pt-BR.title: MOCHILA HUMANA
pt-BR.description: As mochilas humanas são muito parecidas com as mochilas dos monstros mas, ao abri-las, é possível perceber que elas têm o mesmo tamanho por dentro e por fora. Aparentemente os humanos nunca dominaram a teoria básica da organização dimensional.

nl.title: MENSENRUGZAK
nl.description: Mensenrugzakken lijken veel op monsterrugzakken, maar als je er een opent, kun je zien dat ze van binnen net zo groot zijn als ze van buiten lijken, wat betekent dat de mens de basale dimensionale ontwerptheorie nooit onder de knie heeft gekregen.

ar.title: ﺣﻘﻴﺒﺔ ﻇﻬﺮ ﻟﻠﺒﺸﺮ
ar.description: ﺗﺘﺸﺎﺑﻪ ﺣﻘﺎﺋﺐ اﻟﻈﻬﺮ ﻟﻠﺒﺸﺮ ﻓﻲ اﻟﺸﻜﻞ ﻣﻊ ﺣﻘﺎﺋﺐ اﻟﻈﻬﺮ ﻟﻠﻮﺣﻮش إﻟﯽ ﺣﺪ ﻛﺒﻴﺮ، ﻟﻜﻦ إذا ﻓﺘﺤﻨﺎ إﺣﺪاﻫﺎ، ﻓﺴﻨﺠﺪ أن ﺣﺠﻤﻬﺎ ﻣﻦ اﻟﺪاﺧﻞ ﻫﻮ ﺣﺠﻤﻬﺎ ﻧﻔﺴﻪ ﻣﻦ اﻟﺨﺎرج، ﻣﺎ ﻳﻌﻨﻲ أن اﻟﺒﺸﺮ ﻟﻢ ﻳﺘﻘﻨﻮا أﺑﺪا ﻧﻈﺮﻳﺔ ﺗﺼﻤﻴﻢ اﻷﺑﻌﺎد اﻷﺳﺎﺳﻴﺔ.

tk.title: İNSAN SIRT ÇANTASI
tk.description: İnsanların sırt çantaları, canavar sırt çantalarına epey benzer. Ancak bir tanesinin içini açtığınızda içinin tam olarak dıştan göründüğü kadar büyük olduğunu görebilirsiniz. Bu da insanların asla temel boyutsal tasarım teorisine tam olarak hakim olmadığını gösterir.

fr-CA.title: SAC À DOS HUMAIN
fr-CA.description: Les sacs à dos humains ressemblent beaucoup à ceux des monstres, sauf que si vous en ouvrez un, vous verrez qu'ils sont tout aussi grands à l'intérieur qu'ils le paraissent de l'extérieur, ce qui indique que les humains n'ont jamais vraiment maîtrisé les bases de la conception dimensionnelle.

en-AU.title: HUMAN BACKPACK
en-AU.description: Human backpacks look a lot like monster backpacks, but if you open one up you can see that they are exactly as big on the inside as they seem from the outside, implying humans never quite mastered basic dimensional design theory.

landmarks.title: HUMAN BACKPACK
landmarks.description: Human backpacks look a lot like monster backpacks, but if you open one up you can see that they are exactly as big on the inside as they seem from the outside, implying humans never quite mastered basic dimensional design theory.

landmarks.name: LM_BeesKneePads

en.title: BEES' KNEEPADS (SCALE MODEL)
en.description: Here you see one full set of protective padding designed to fit the legs of an adult honeybee. Humans created these support garments to help protect the bee's knees—a valuable commodity in Englandland.

en-GB.title: BEES' KNEEPADS (SCALE MODEL)
en-GB.description: Here you see one full set of protective padding designed to fit the legs of an adult honeybee. Humans created these support garments to help protect the bee's knees—a valuable commodity in Englandland.

fr.title: GENOUILLÈRES D'ABEILLE (MODÈLE RÉDUIT)
fr.description: Voici un ensemble complet de rembourrages protecteurs conçus pour s'adapter aux pattes d'une abeille adulte. Les humains ont conçu ces habits de soutien pour aider à protéger les genoux des abeilles, une denrée précieuse en Angleterre.

de.title: BIENEN-KNIESCHONER (MASSSTABSGETREUES MODELL)
de.description: Hier sieht man einen kompletten Satz Knieschoner, die genau an die Beine einer ausgewachsenen Honigbiene passten. Die Menschen haben diese schützenden Kleidungsstücke entwickelt, um die Knie der Bienen zu schützen. Ein wertvoller Gebrauchsartikel in Englandland.

es.title: MANGUITOS DE ABEJA (MODELO A ESCALA)
es.description: Aquí puedes ver un set completo de manguitos diseñadas para las patas de una abeja adulta. Los humanos crearon estas prendas para que las abejas se mantuvieran a flote al posarse sobre miel o sobre hojuelas.

it.title: IL MEGLIO DEL MEGLIO (MODELLO IN SCALA)
it.description: Ecco uno dei migliori kit d'imbottitura protettiva progettato per adattarsi alle zampe di un'ape adulta, e quindi per proteggere quello che per gli inglesesi era considerato il meglio del meglio.

ja.title: 最高の膝あて(縮尺模型)
ja.description: ここでは、大人のミツバチの脚にぴったりになるようデザインされた保護パッドの完全セットをご覧いただくことができます。人間たちはこの補助衣服を作り、ハチの膝を守る助けをしました。ハチの膝は、イングランドランドのの貴重な商品だったのです。

ko.title: 꿀벌 무릎 보호대(축소판)
ko.description: 이것은 어른 꿀벌의 무릎을 보호하기 위한 무릎 보호대 세트입니다. 인간들은 이 보조 의상으로 꿀벌의 무릎을 보호했습니다. 꿀벌은 영국나라의 귀중한 상품이었습니다.

zh-Hans.title: 蜜蜂护膝（成比例模型）
zh-Hans.description: 在这里你可以看到为适配成年蜜蜂腿而设计的一整套保护垫。人类打造了这些支撑护具，以帮助保护蜜蜂的膝盖 – 它们在英国是一种很有价值的商品。

zh-Hant.title: 蜜蜂護膝 (比例模型)
zh-Hant.description: 你在這看到的是全套的防護襯墊，用途是給成年蜜蜂的腳穿戴。人類發明了這種支撐性服裝，是要保護蜜蜂的膝部，這在英格蘭大陸是寶貴的商品。

ru.title: ПЧЕЛИНЫЕ НАКОЛЕННИКИ (МОДЕЛЬ В МАСШТАБЕ)
ru.description: Здесь вы видите полный набор защитных накладок, созданных специально для ног взрослой пчелы. Люди создали это поддерживающее приспособление, чтобы защитить пчелиные колени — ценный товар в Англоземье.

pt-BR.title: JOELHEIRA DE ABELHA (EM ESCALA)
pt-BR.description: Este é um conjunto completo de equipamentos de proteção ideal para uma abelha adulta. Estas peças protetoras criadas pelos humanos nunca foram amplamente utilizadas, visto que uma boa abelha não pousa em flores murchas.

nl.title: BIJENKNIEBESCHERMERS (SCHAALMODEL)
nl.description: Hier ziet u een complete set van beschermende wattering, ontworpen voor de poten van een volwassen honingbij. Mensen hebben deze ondersteunende kledingstukken gemaakt om de knieën van de bij te helpen beschermen - een waardevol goed in Engelandland.

ar.title: واﻗﻲ رﻛﺒﺔ اﻟﻨﺤﻞ )ﻧﻤﻮذج ﻣﺼﻐﺮ(
ar.description: ﻫﻨﺎ ﺗﺮى إﺣﺪى اﻟﻤﺠﻤﻮﻋﺎت اﻟﻜﺎﻣﻠﺔ ﻟﻸرﺑﻄﺔ اﻟﻮاﻗﻴﺔ اﻟﻤﺼﻤﻤﺔ ﻟﻤﻼءﻣﺔ ﺳﻴﻘﺎن اﻟﻨﺤﻞ اﻟﺒﺎﻟﻎ. ﺻﻨﻊ اﻟﺒﺸﺮ ﻫﺬه اﻟﺜﻴﺎب ﻟﻠﻤﺴﺎﻋﺪة ﻋﻠﯽ ﺣﻤﺎﻳﺔ رﻛﺐ اﻟﻨﺤﻞ اﻟﺬي ﻳﻤﺜﻞ ﺳﻠﻌﺔ ﻗﻴﻤﺔ ﻓﻲ إﻧﺠﻠﺘﺮا.

tk.title: ARILAR İÇİN DİZLİK (ÖLÇEKLİ MAKET)
tk.description: İşte karşınızda yetişkin bir bal arısının bacaklarına uyacak şekilde tasarlanan koruyucu bir dolgu seti. İnsanlar, İngiltere'de çok değer verilen arı dizlerini korumak için bu koruyucu kıyafeti tasarladı.

fr-CA.title: GENOUILLÈRES D'ABEILLES (MODÈLE RÉDUIT)
fr-CA.description: Voici un ensemble complet de rembourrage protecteur conçu pour s'adapter aux pattes d'une abeille adulte. Les humains ont conçu ces habits de soutien pour aider à protéger les genoux de l'abeille, une denrée précieuse en Angleterre.

en-AU.title: BEES' KNEEPADS (SCALE MODEL)
en-AU.description: Here you see one full set of protective padding designed to fit the legs of an adult honeybee. Humans created these support garments to help protect the bee's knees—a valuable commodity in Englandland.

landmarks.title: BEES' KNEEPADS (SCALE MODEL)
landmarks.description: Here you see one full set of protective padding designed to fit the legs of an adult honeybee. Humans created these support garments to help protect the bee's knees—a valuable commodity in Englandland.

landmarks.name: LM_Bike

en.title: MOBILE LAUNDRY RACK
en.description: On breeze-less laundry days, humans added wheels to their drying racks and rode back and forth to generate a wind effect. As well as drying the clothes faster, laundry day thus also increased cardiovascular fitness, and saw an uptick in visits to neighbors.

en-GB.title: MOBILE LAUNDRY RACK
en-GB.description: On breeze-less laundry days, humans added wheels to their drying racks and rode back and forth to generate a wind effect. As well as drying the clothes faster, laundry day thus also increased cardiovascular fitness, and saw an uptick in visits to neighbours.

fr.title: SÉCHOIR MOBILE
fr.description: Les jours de lessive sans vent, les humains ajoutaient des roues à leurs séchoirs et allaient et venaient pour générer de l'air. En plus de sécher le textile plus rapidement, les journées de lessive devenaient bénéfiques pour la santé cardiovasculaire, entraînant une augmentation du nombre de visites inter-voisins.

de.title: MOBILER WÄSCHESTÄNDER
de.description: An windstillen Waschtagen haben Menschen Räder an ihre Wäscheständer gebaut und sind herumgefahren, um einen Windeffekt zu erzeugen. So konnten sie gleichzeitig ihre Wäsche schneller trocknen, am Waschtag ihre Herz-Kreislauf-Fitness verbessern und häufiger ihre Nachbarn besuchen.

es.title: ESTANTE PARA ROPA SUCIA MÓVIL
es.description: En los días de colada de menos viento, los humanos añadían ruedas a sus estantes de secado y los hacían moverse adelante y hacia atrás para generar un efecto de viento. Además de secar la ropa más rápido, el día de la colada aumentaba así el fitness cardiovascular y se producía un repunte en las visitas a los vecinos.

it.title: APPENDIBIANCHERIA MOBILE
it.description: Nei giorni in cui si faceva il bucato e non tirava neanche un filo d'aria, gli umani aggiungevano ruote agli appendibiancheria e pedalavano avanti e indietro per generare un effetto vento. Oltre a prodigarsi ad asciugare i vestiti più velocemente, nel giorno del bucato gli umani aumentavano anche il proprio fitness cardiovascolare e registravano un aumento nelle visite ai vicini.

ja.title: 携帯用の洗濯ラック
ja.description: 風がなく洗濯日和でない日のために、人間たちは洗濯竿に車輪を取り付け、風の効果を生み出すためにこの洗濯竿を乗り回しました。洗濯物を早く乾かすこともそうですが、洗濯をする日は心肺フィットネスを増進させる結果ともなり、隣人に会いに行く頻度も増えました。

ko.title: 휴대용 빨래 팩
ko.description: 빨래를 했는데 바람이 불지 않는 날에 인간들은 빨래 건조대에 바퀴를 추가하여 앞뒤로 움직이며 바람 효과를 만들어냈습니다. 옷을 더 빨리 말리고, 유산소 운동도 하고, 이웃집을 구경할 수도 있었죠.

zh-Hans.title: 移动晾衣架
zh-Hans.description: 在没有微风的洗衣日，人类在晾衣架上加上轮子来回骑，以产生风的效应。“洗衣日”不仅能让衣服干得更快，还能增强心血管健康，而且还可以促进邻里之间的走动。

zh-Hant.title: 行動曬衣架
zh-Hant.description: 如果洗衣日沒有微風，人類會將曬衣架裝上輪子，並來回踩動以產生風力。洗衣日不僅讓衣物更快乾燥，也促進了心血管健康，並使人類更常拜訪鄰居。

ru.title: ПЕРЕДВИЖНАЯ ВЕШАЛКА ДЛЯ БЕЛЬЯ
ru.description: В безветренные дни люди добавляли к своим вешалкам для сушки белья колеса и ездили взад и вперед, чтобы создать эффект ветра. Таким образом в день стирки не только ускорялась сушка белья, но также повышалось количество кардиотренировок и визитов к соседям.

pt-BR.title: VARAL MÓVEL
pt-BR.description: Nos dias em que não ventava, os humanos adicionavam rodinhas aos varais e iam de um lado para o outro para gerar o efeito da brisa. Além de secar as roupas mais rápido, os dias de lavanderia se tornavam saudáveis para o sistema cardiovascular e geravam um aumento no número de visitas a vizinhos.

nl.title: MOBIEL WASREK
nl.description: Op windloze wasdagen plaatsen de mensen wielen onder hun droogrekken en reden ze heen en weer om een windeffect op te wekken. Naast dat de was sneller droogde, zorgde wasdag zo ook voor een gezonder hart- en vatenstelsel en een toename van het aantal bezoeken aan buren.

ar.title: رف اﻟﻐﺴﻴﻞ اﻟﻤﺘﻨﻘﻞ
ar.description: ﻋﻨﺪ ﺗﺠﻔﻴﻒ اﻟﻐﺴﻴﻞ ﻓﻲ أﻳﺎم ﻻ ﺗﻬﺐ ﻓﻴﻬﺎ اﻟﺮﻳﺎح، أﺿﺎف اﻟﺒﺸﺮ ﻋﺠﻼت ﻟﺮﻓﻮف اﻟﻐﺴﻴﻞ اﻟﺨﺎﺻﺔ ﺑﻬﻢ وﻛﺎﻧﻮا ﻳﻘﻮدوﻧﻬﺎ إﻟﯽ اﻷﻣﺎم واﻟﺨﻠﻒ ﻹﺣﺪاث ﺗﺄﺛﻴﺮ ﻛﺎﻟﺮﻳﺎح. وأﻳﻀﺎ ﻟﺘﺠﻔﻴﻒ اﻟﻐﺴﻴﻞ ﺑﺸﻜﻞ أﺳﺮع، وﻫﻜﺬا أﺳﻬﻢ ﻳﻮم اﻟﻐﺴﻴﻞ أﻳﻀﺎ ﻓﻲ زﻳﺎدة ﺻﺤﺔ اﻷوﻋﻴﺔ اﻟﺪﻣﻮﻳﺔ، وﻣﻨﺢ اﻟﺠﻴﺮان ﻧﻘﺎﻃﺎ ﻟﻠﺘﻔﻮق ﻋﻠﯽ ﺑﻌﻀﻬﻢ ﻋﻨﺪ اﻟﺰﻳﺎرات.

tk.title: TAŞINABİLİR ÇAMAŞIR ASKISI
tk.description: Pek rüzgar esmeyen çamaşır günlerinde insanlar kurutma askılarına tekerlek ekleyerek rüzgar etkisi yaratmak için bu aleti ileri geri sürüyorlardı. Kıyafetleri daha hızlı kurutmasının yanı sıra kardiyovasküler sağlığa iyi geliyordu. Ayrıca komşu ziyaretlerinde de artış görülüyordu.

fr-CA.title: SÉCHOIR À LINGE MOBILE
fr-CA.description: Les jours de lessive sans vent, les humains ajoutaient des roues à leurs séchoirs à linge, puis allaient et venaient pour générer du vent. En plus de sécher les vêtements plus rapidement, les journées de lessive devenaient bénéfiques pour la santé cardiovasculaire, et entraînaient une augmentation du nombre de visites inter-voisins.

en-AU.title: MOBILE LAUNDRY RACK
en-AU.description: On breeze-less laundry days, humans added wheels to their drying racks and rode back and forth to generate a wind effect. As well as drying the clothes faster, laundry day thus also increased cardiovascular fitness, and saw an uptick in visits to neighbours.

landmarks.title: MOBILE LAUNDRY RACK
landmarks.description: On breeze-less laundry days, humans added wheels to their drying racks and rode back and forth to generate a wind effect. As well as drying the clothes faster, laundry day thus also increased cardiovascular fitness, and saw an uptick in visits to neighbors.

landmarks.name: LM_BirdFeeder

en.title: BIRD SNACK BAR
en.description: Besides bathing facilities and residential services, humans would also commonly offer birds free snack bars in their gardens. These eateries also attracted squirrels, so humans sometimes hired ravens to act as bouncers and chase the rodents away.

en-GB.title: BIRD SNACK BAR
en-GB.description: Besides bathing facilities and residential services, humans would also commonly offer birds free snack bars in their gardens. These eateries also attracted squirrels, so humans sometimes hired ravens to act as bouncers and chase the rodents away.

fr.title: BAR À TAPAS OISEAU
fr.description: Outre les installations de baignade et les services résidentiels, les humains proposaient également aux oiseaux des bars à tapas gratuits dans leurs jardins. Ces établissements attiraient aussi les écureuils, de sorte que les humains embauchaient parfois des corbeaux pour jouer le rôle de videurs et chasser les rongeurs.

de.title: VOGEL-SCHNELLIMBISS
de.description: Neben Badeeinrichtungen und Wohnanlagen boten Menschen den Vögeln in ihren Gärten außerdem oft kostenlose Schnellimbisse an. Diese Gaststätten zogen allerdings auch Eichhörnchen an, weshalb die Menschen oft Raben als Rausschmeißer anheuerten, um die Nagetiere zu vertreiben.

es.title: CAFETERÍA PAJARERA
es.description: Además de las instalaciones de baño y los servicios residenciales, los humanos también solían ofrecer a los pájaros cafeterías gratuitas en sus jardines. Estos comedores también atraían a las ardillas, de manera que los humanos contrataban a veces a cuervos para que hicieran de porteros y ahuyentasen a los roedores.

it.title: BAR PER UCCELLI
it.description: Oltre ad offrire strutture balneari e servizi residenziali, gli umani fornivano agli uccelli dei bar gratuiti nei loro giardini. Questi punti di ristoro attraevano anche gli scoiattoli, quindi talvolta gli umani assoldavano dei corvi come buttafuori per cacciare via i roditori.

ja.title: 鳥のスナックバー
ja.description: 浴場施設や住居サービスに加え、人間たちは一般的に自分たちの庭で、鳥たちへ無料のスナックバーを提供していました。これらの飲食店はリスにも人気があったため、人間たちは時折カラスをバウンサーとして雇い、この齧歯動物たちを追い払っていたのです。

ko.title: 새 스낵바
ko.description: 목욕 시설이나 집 외에도 인간들은 정원에 새들이 간식을 즐길 수 있는 스낵바를 만들었습니다. 이 식당에는 다람쥐들도 방문했는데, 그래서 인간들은 설치류를 쫓기 위해 까마귀를 종종 문지기로 고용했습니다.

zh-Hans.title: 鸟类小吃店
zh-Hans.description: 除了沐浴设施和住宿服务，人类通常还会在他们花园中提供免费的鸟类小吃店。这些小吃店还吸引了松鼠，所以人类有时会雇乌鸦来当保镖，驱赶这些啮齿动物。

zh-Hant.title: 鳥點心吧
zh-Hant.description: 除了沐浴設施和住宿服務，人類通常也會在鳥類的花園提供免費的點心。這種提供食物的場所也會引來松鼠，所以人類有時候會僱用烏鴉當作守衛，趕走那些齧齒類動物。

ru.title: ПТИЧЬЯ ЗАКУСОЧНАЯ
ru.description: Помимо услуг купания и проживания, люди также обычно устраивали в своих садах бесплатные закусочные для птиц. Эти забегаловки также привлекали белок, поэтому люди приглашали в качестве вышибал воронов, чтобы те прогоняли грызунов.

pt-BR.title: LANCHONETE DE PASSARINHOS
pt-BR.description: Além das instalações para banho e dos serviços residenciais, os humanos também ofereciam lanchonetes para passarinhos em seus quintais. Estes comedouros também atraíam esquilos, por isso os humanos costumavam contratar gralhas como seguranças para afugentar os roedores.

nl.title: VOGELSNACKBAR
nl.description: Naast bad- en accommodatiefaciliteiten boden mensen vogels ook gratis versnaperingen aan in hun tuin. Deze eetgelegenheden trokken ook eekhoorns aan en dus huurden mensen soms raven in als uitsmijter om de eekhoorns weg te jagen.

ar.title: ﻣﻄﻌﻢ اﻟﻮﺟﺒﺎت اﻟﺨﻔﻴﻔﺔ ﻟﻠﻄﻴﻮر
ar.description: وﻓﺮ اﻟﺒﺸﺮ ﻟﻠﻄﻴﻮر ﻣﺮاﻓﻖ ﻟﻼﺳﺘﺤﻤﺎم واﻟﺨﺪﻣﺎت اﻟﺴﻜﻨﻴﺔ ﺑﺎﻹﺿﺎﻓﺔ إﻟﯽ ﻣﻄﺎﻋﻢ ﻟﻠﻮﺟﺒﺎت اﻟﺨﻔﻴﻔﺔ اﻟﻤﺠﺎﻧﻴﺔ ﻓﻲ ﺣﺪاﺋﻘﻬﻢ ﻋﺎدة. ﺟﺬﺑﺖ ﻫﺬه اﻟﻤﻄﺎﻋﻢ اﻟﺴﻨﺎﺟﺐ ﻛﺬﻟﻚ، ﻟﺬا اﺳﺘﺄﺟﺮ اﻟﺒﺸﺮ اﻟﻐﺮﺑﺎن ﻟﻠﻘﻴﺎم ﺑﺪور اﻟﺤﺮاس وﻣﻄﺎردة اﻟﻘﻮارض.

tk.title: KUŞLAR İÇİN ATIŞTIRMALIK
tk.description: İnsanlar, banyo tesisleri ve konaklama hizmetlerinin yanı sıra kuşlara bahçelerinde ücretsiz atıştırmalıklar da sunardı. Bu büfeler aynı zamanda sincapları da çekerdi. Bu yüzden insanlar fedai olarak kuzgun alır, kemirgenleri uzak tutmaya çalışırlardı.

fr-CA.title: CASSE-CROUTE D'OISEAU
fr-CA.description: Outre les installations de baignade et les services résidentiels, les humains offraient également aux oiseaux des casse-croutes gratuits dans leurs jardins. Ces restaurants attiraient aussi les écureuils, donc les humains embauchaient parfois des corbeaux pour jouer le rôle de portiers pour chasser les rongeurs.

en-AU.title: BIRD SNACK BAR
en-AU.description: Besides bathing facilities and residential services, humans would also commonly offer birds free snack bars in their gardens. These eateries also attracted squirrels, so humans sometimes hired ravens to act as bouncers and chase the rodents away.

landmarks.title: BIRD SNACK BAR
landmarks.description: Besides bathing facilities and residential services, humans would also commonly offer birds free snack bars in their gardens. These eateries also attracted squirrels, so humans sometimes hired ravens to act as bouncers and chase the rodents away.

landmarks.name: LM_BirdHouse

en.title: BIRD HOME
en.description: The birdhouse was the standard unit of human-made avian accommodation. Variations included the bird manor, the bird pied-a-terre, the bird bedsit, the bird flat above the chip shop, and, of course, the bird panopticon.

en-GB.title: BIRD HOME
en-GB.description: The birdhouse was the standard unit of human-made avian accommodation. Variations included the bird manor, the bird pied-a-terre, the bird bedsit, the bird flat above the chip shop, and, of course, the bird panopticon.

fr.title: MAISON OISEAU
fr.description: La maison oiseau était le standard d'hébergement aviaire de nature humaine. Les variantes comprenaient le manoir oiseau, le pied-à-terre oiseau, la studette oiseau, l'appartement oiseau en étage de friterie et, bien sûr, le panoptique oiseau.

de.title: VOGELHEIM
de.description: Das Vogelhaus war die standardmäßige Einheit der menschengemachten Unterkunft für Vögel. Zu den Varianten zählten das Vogel-Herrenhaus, die Vogel-Zweitwohnung, die Vogel-Einzimmerwohnung, die Vogelwohnung über dem Fish-und-Chips-Laden und natürlich das Vogel-Panoptikum.

es.title: CASA PAJARERA
es.description: La casa pajarera era la unidad estándar de alojamiento aviar fabricada por los humanos. Las variaciones incluían la finca pajarera, la segunda residencia pajarera, el estudio pajarero, el apartamento pajarero encima de la pescadería y, por supuesto, el panóptico pajarero.

it.title: CASA PER UCCELLI
it.description: La casa per uccelli rappresentava lo standard degli alloggi aviari creati dagli umani. Le varianti includevano la reggia per uccelli, il pied-à-terre per uccelli, il monolocale per uccelli, l'appartamento sopra la friggitoria per uccelli e, ovviamente, il panottico per uccelli.

ja.title: 鳥の家
ja.description: この鳥の家は、人間が作った鳥用住居の標準ユニットでした。他にも、鳥の館、鳥の仮の宿、鳥のワンルームアパート、フライドポテト屋の上の鳥のアパート、そして当然ながら、鳥の円形刑務所などがありました。

ko.title: 새집
ko.description: 새집은 인간이 제작한 조류 주거지의 기본형입니다. 변형으로는 새 저택, 새 아파트, 새 셋방, 참새 방앗간, 그리고 새 전망대 등이 있습니다.

zh-Hans.title: 鸟舍
zh-Hans.description: 鸟舍是人工饲养鸟类居住的标准单位。有各种各样的鸟舍，包括鸟庄园、临时鸟住所、客卧两用鸟屋、楼下为薯条店鸟公寓，当然还有圆形鸟监狱。

zh-Hant.title: 鳥舍
zh-Hant.description: 鳥舍是基本樣式的人造禽類住所。其他樣式包括鳥莊園、鳥備用公寓、鳥套房、鳥小吃店上公寓，以及鳥環形監獄。

ru.title: ДОМИК ДЛЯ ПТИЦ
ru.description: Скворечник был обычным пристанищем для птиц, сделанным людьми. Были экземпляры с птичьим поместьем, птичьим пристанищем, птичьим общежитием, птичьей квартирой над закусочной с едой на вынос и, конечно же, птичьим паноптикумом.

pt-BR.title: LAR DE PASSARINHOS
pt-BR.description: A casinha de passarinhos era a unidade humana padrão de acomodação aviária. Suas variações incluíam a mansão de passarinhos, o condomínio de passarinhos, a quitinete de passarinhos, a sobreloja de passarinhos e, é claro, o panóptico de passarinhos.

nl.title: VOGELHUIS
nl.description: Het vogelhuis was de standaardaccommodatie voor vogels gemaakt door mensen. Enkele andere soorten vogelhuizen zijn vogelvilla's, vogelpied-à-terres, vogelstudio's, vogelappartementen en natuurlijk vogelpanoptica.

ar.title: ﺑﻴﺖ اﻟﻄﻴﻮر
ar.description: ﻛﺎن ﺑﻴﺖ اﻟﻄﻴﻮر ﻫﻮ وﺣﺪة اﻟﺴﻜﻦ اﻟﻘﻴﺎﺳﻴﺔ اﻟﺘﻲ ﺻﻨﻌﻬﺎ اﻟﺒﺸﺮ ﻟﻠﻄﻴﻮر. وﺗﻨﻮﻋﺖ ﻫﺬه اﻟﻤﺴﺎﻛﻦ اﻟﺨﺎﺻﺔ ﺑﺎﻟﻄﻴﻮر، ﻓﻤﻨﻬﺎ ﻣﺜﻼ اﻟﻘﺼﺮ اﻟﺮﻳﻔﻲ واﻟﻤﺴﺎﻛﻦ اﻟﻤﺆﻗﺘﺔ وﺷﻘﻖ أﺳﺘﻮدﻳﻮ واﻟﺸﻘﻖ ﻓﻮق اﻟﻤﺤﺎل اﻟﺘﺠﺎرﻳﺔ وﺑﺎﻟﻄﺒﻊ ﻛﺎن ﻫﻨﺎك ﺳﺠﻦ ﺑﺎﻧﻮﺑﺘﻴﻜﻮن.

tk.title: KUŞ EVİ
tk.description: Kuş evi, insan yapımı kuş konaklama tesislerinin standart birimiydi. Diğer konaklama varyasyonları arasında kuş köşkü, kuş garsoniyeri, kuş kiralık odası, balıkçı üzeri kuş apartman dairesi ve tabii ki kuş panoptikonu yer alıyordu.

fr-CA.title: MAISON D'OISEAU
fr-CA.description: La « cabane à oiseau » était le standard d'hébergement aviaire d'origine humaine. Les variantes comprenaient le manoir d'oiseau, le pied-à-terre d'oiseau, la pension d'oiseau, l'appartement d'oiseau au-dessus de la friterie et, bien sûr, le panoptique oiseau.

en-AU.title: BIRD HOME
en-AU.description: The birdhouse was the standard unit of human-made avian accommodation. Variations included the bird manor, the bird pied-a-terre, the bird bedsit, the bird flat above the chip shop, and, of course, the bird panopticon.

landmarks.title: BIRD HOME
landmarks.description: The birdhouse was the standard unit of human-made avian accommodation. Variations included the bird manor, the bird pied-a-terre, the bird bedsit, the bird flat above the chip shop, and, of course, the bird panopticon.

landmarks.name: LM_BlanketPub

en.title: BLANKET PUB
en.description: As coziness became an increasingly important element of human architecture, designers began to explore the potential of blanket forts. This is an example of a cozy but ultimately uninsurable blanket pub.

en-GB.title: BLANKET PUB
en-GB.description: As cosiness became an increasingly important element of human architecture, designers began to explore the potential of blanket forts. This is an example of a cosy but ultimately uninsurable blanket pub.

fr.title: PUB DE COUVERTURES
fr.description: Alors que le confort prenait de plus en plus de place dans l'architecture humaine, les designers ont voulu exploiter le potentiel des cabanes de couvertures. Voici un exemple de pub de couvertures certes confortable, mais impossible à assurer.

de.title: DECKENKNEIPE
de.description: Als Gemütlichkeit in der menschlichen Architektur immer wichtiger wurde, begannen Designer damit, das Potenzial von Deckenfestungen zu untersuchen. Dies ist ein Beispiel für eine gemütliche, aber letztendlich nicht versicherbare Deckenkneipe.

es.title: PUB DE SÁBANAS
es.description: Conforme la comodidad se iba haciendo un elemento cada vez más importante en la arquitectura humana, los diseñadores empezaron a explorar el potencial de los fuertes de sábanas. Esto es un ejemplo de un cómodo pero poco seguro pub de sábanas.

it.title: PUB DI COPERTE
it.description: Man mano che la comodità diventava sempre più importante nell'architettura degli umani, gli architetti iniziarono ad esplorare l'idea di realizzare fortini fatti di coperte. Questo è un esempio di un comodo, ma impossibile da assicurare, pub di coperte.

ja.title: ブランケットパブ
ja.description: 心地よさが人間の建築に関してますます重要な要素になるにつれて、デザイナーはブランケットの砦の可能性を探求し始めました。これは、居心地は良いのだけれど、結局のところは保険をかけられないブランケットパブの例です。

ko.title: 담요 펍
ko.description: 인간 건축물에서 안락함은 매우 중요한 요소가 되었습니다. 그래서 디자이너들은 담요로 요새를 짓는 방법을 연구했죠. 이것은 안락하면서도 매우 불안정해 보이는 담요 펍입니다.

zh-Hans.title: 毛毯酒吧
zh-Hans.description: 随着舒适成为人类建筑中越来越重要的元素，设计师们开始探索毛毯堡垒的潜力。这是一个舒适但根本无法投保的毛毯酒吧的例子。

zh-Hant.title: 毛毯酒館
zh-Hant.description: 由於舒適度日漸成為人類建築物的重要元素，設計師開始探求毛毯城堡的潛力。這是一間舒適的毛毯酒館，但到頭來卻沒有安全保障。

ru.title: БАР ИЗ ПОКРЫВАЛ
ru.description: По мере того, как уют становился крайне важным элементом человеческой архитектуры, дизайнеры начали исследовать возможное применение крепостей из покрывал. Перед нами образец очень уютного, но совершенно не подлежащего страхованию бара из покрывал.

pt-BR.title: BOTECO DE COBERTOR
pt-BR.description: Com o aumento da importância do conforto como elemento arquitetônico humano, os projetistas passaram a explorar cada vez mais o potencial das cabanas de cobertor. Este exemplo se trata de um confortável — mas completamente inelegível a ser assegurado — boteco de cobertor.

nl.title: DEKENCAFÉ
nl.description: Gezelligheid was een belangrijk aspect van menselijke architectuur en ontwerpers zagen wel voordelen in een constructie met dekens. Dit is een voorbeeld van een erg gezellig dekencafé, maar het is onmogelijk om hier een verzekering voor te krijgen.

ar.title: ﻓﻨﺪق ﻣﻦ اﻟﺒﻄﺎﻃﻴﻦ
ar.description: ﻧﻈﺮا إﻟﯽ اﻷﻫﻤﻴﺔ اﻟﻤﺘﺰاﻳﺪة ﻟﺘﻮﻓﻴﺮ ﻋﻨﺼﺮ اﻟﺮاﺣﺔ ﻓﻲ اﻟﻤﺒﺎﻧﻲ اﻟﺒﺸﺮﻳﺔ، ﺑﺪأ اﻟﻤﺼﻤﻤﻮن ﺑﺎﻛﺘﺸﺎف إﻣﻜﺎﻧﻴﺔ إﻧﺸﺎء ﺣﺼﻮن ﻣﻦ اﻟﺒﻄﺎﻃﻴﻦ. وﻳﻌﺪ ﻫﺬا ﻣﺜﺎﻻ ﻋﻠﯽ ﻓﻨﺪق ﻣﺮﻳﺢ ﻣﺼﻨﻮع ﻣﻦ اﻟﺒﻄﺎﻃﻴﻦ ﻟﻜﻨﻪ ﻻ ﻳﻤﻜﻦ اﻟﺘﺄﻣﻴﻦ ﻋﻠﻴﻪ.

tk.title: BATTANİYE PUB'I
tk.description: İnsan mimarisinde sıcaklık hissinin önemi giderek artarken battaniyeden yapılma kalelerin potansiyeli tasarımcıların gözünden kaçmamıştı. Son derece sıcak bir atmosfere sahip olmasına rağmen nihayetinde sigortalanamayacak bir battaniye pub'ı örneği görüyorsunuz.

fr-CA.title: PUB DE COUVERTURES
fr-CA.description: Alors que le confort devenait un élément de plus en plus présent dans l'architecture humaine, les concepteurs ont voulu exploiter le potentiel des cabanes de couvertures. Voici un exemple de pub de couvertures : confortable, mais impossible à assurer.

en-AU.title: BLANKET PUB
en-AU.description: As cosiness became an increasingly important element of human architecture, designers began to explore the potential of blanket forts. This is an example of a cosy but ultimately uninsurable blanket pub.

landmarks.title: BLANKET PUB
landmarks.description: As coziness became an increasingly important element of human architecture, designers began to explore the potential of blanket forts. This is an example of a cozy but ultimately uninsurable blanket pub.

landmarks.name: LM_Bubblewrap

en.title: POPPING PAPER
en.description: This bubbly plastic was a popular stress-relieving toy. Humans would grab handfuls and squeeze, bursting the bubbles with glee. For extreme stress, the human could lay a big sheet of the stuff down on the ground and roll around for hours.

en-GB.title: POPPING PAPER
en-GB.description: This bubbly plastic was a popular stress-relieving toy. Humans would grab handfuls and squeeze, bursting the bubbles with glee. For extreme stress, the human could lay a big sheet of the stuff down on the ground and roll around for hours.

fr.title: PAPIER BULLE
fr.description: Ce plastique crépitant était un jouet anti-stress populaire. Les humains en saisissaient des poignées pour les presser, faisant allègrement éclater les bulles dans le processus. Lors des périodes de stress extrême, l'humain pouvait déposer une feuille géante sur le sol et se rouler dessus pendant des heures.

de.title: KNALLPAPIER
de.description: Dieses blasenbesetzte Plastik war ein beliebtes Spielzeug zum Stressabbau. Menschen nahmen es in die Hand, zerdrückten es und ließen dabei mit Entzücken die Blasen zerplatzten. Bei extremem Stress legten Menschen große Planen Knallpapier auf dem Boden aus und rollten stundenlang darauf herum.

es.title: PAPEL DE EXPLOTAR
es.description: Este plástico de burbujas era un juguete relajante muy popular. Los humanos cogían montones y los estrujaban, explotando las burbujas con regocijo. En casos de estrés extremo, el humano podía poner una gran lámina de estas en el suelo y rodar sobre ella durante horas.

it.title: CARTA DA SCOPPIARE
it.description: Questa carta piena di bolle era un antistress molto popolare. Gli umani la prendevano e la schiacciavano, facendo scoppiare le bolle con gioia. In caso di stress estremo, gli umani potevano appoggiarne un grande foglio a terra e rotolarcisi per ore.

ja.title: プチプチ紙
ja.description: このプクプクとしたプラスチックは、人気のあるストレス解消用のおもちゃでした。人間たちはこれを手のひらいっぱいに取って押し潰し、歓喜と共にそのプチプチを割るのでした。ストレスが最大限になっている時の人間は、このプチプチ紙を大きく広げて床に置き、その上で何時間もゴロゴロと寝転がるのでした。

ko.title: 뽁뽁이 종이
ko.description: 이 뽁뽁이는 인기 있는 스트레스 완화용 장난감이었습니다. 인간들은 이걸 주물럭대며 즐겁게 뽁뽁이를 터뜨렸습니다. 스트레스가 아주 심한 경우에는 커다란 걸로 가져와서 그 위에서 몇 시간이고 구르기도 했습니다.

zh-Hans.title: 泡泡纸
zh-Hans.description: 这种泡泡塑料是一种流行的解压玩具。人类会抓一把，挤一挤，乐呵呵地把泡沫挤破。在压力很大的时候，人类可能会把一大张泡泡纸铺在地上，然后在上面打几个小时的滚。

zh-Hant.title: 氣泡紙
zh-Hant.description: 這個充滿氣泡的塑膠製品是熱門的舒壓玩具。人類會抓起一堆擠壓，開心地擠破氣泡。對有重大壓力的人類來說，他們會將一大片氣泡紙放在地上，然後在上面滾動好幾個小時。

ru.title: ЛОПАЮЩИЕСЯ ЛИСТЫ
ru.description: Полиэтилен с пузырьками воздуха был популярной игрушкой для снятия стресса. Люди сжимали пузырьки в кулаке, с восторгом их лопая. При сильном стрессе человек мог положить большую широкую полосу материала на землю и кататься по ней часами.

pt-BR.title: PAPEL DE ESTOURAR
pt-BR.description: O plástico-bolha era um popular método de alívio de estresse: os humanos apertavam, com a mão cheia, para estourar as bolhas de ar. Para casos mais graves, o humano podia estender uma enorme folha de plástico bolha no chão e rolar sobre ele por horas a fio.

nl.title: BUBBELTJESPAPIER
nl.description: Dit vel met bubbeltjes was een populair speeltje tegen stress. Mensen knepen in het papier, zodat de bubbels op een leuke manier openspatten. Als mensen onder grote stress stonden, konden ze enkele lagen vellen ervan op de grond leggen en er urenlang op rollen.

ar.title: ورق اﻟﻔﺮﻗﻌﺔ
ar.description: ﻛﺎن ﻫﺬا اﻟﺒﻼﺳﺘﻴﻚ اﻟﻤﻠﻲء ﺑﺎﻟﻔﻘﺎﻋﺎت ﻟﻌﺒﺔ ﻣﺸﻬﻮرة ﻟﺘﺨﻔﻴﻒ اﻟﺘﻮﺗﺮ ﻟﺪى اﻟﺒﺸﺮ. ﻓﻜﺎﻧﻮا ﻳﻤﺴﻜﻮن ﺑﻪ وﻳﻀﻐﻄﻮن ﻋﻠﻴﻪ ﻓﺘﻨﻔﺠﺮ ﻫﺬه اﻟﻔﻘﺎﻋﺎت ﺗﺎرﻛﺔ إﻳﺎﻫﻢ ﺳﻌﺪاء. وﻓﻲ ﺣﺎل اﻟﺘﻮﺗﺮ اﻟﺸﺪﻳﺪ، ﻛﺎﻧﻮا ﻳﻀﻌﻮن ﻓﺮﺧﺎ ﻛﺒﻴﺮا ﻣﻦ ﻫﺬا اﻟﺒﻼﺳﺘﻴﻚ ﻋﻠﯽ اﻷرض وﻳﺘﻘﻠﺒﻮن ﻓﻮﻗﻪ ﻟﺴﺎﻋﺎت.

tk.title: BALONCUKLU KAĞIT
tk.description: Bu baloncuklu plastik, çok popüler bir stres giderme oyuncağıydı. İnsanlar bu plastiği avuçlayıp sıkardı ve baloncukları keyifle patlatırdı. Aşırı stresli olan insanlar ise bu plastiği yere boylu boyunca serip üzerinde saatlerce yuvarlanırlardı.

fr-CA.title: PAPIER BULLE
fr-CA.description: Ce plastique crépitant était un jouet anti-stress populaire. Les humains en saisissaient des poignées pour les presser, faisant gaiement éclater les bulles. Lors de périodes de stress intense, l'humain pouvait en déposer une feuille géante sur le sol et se rouler dessus pendant des heures.

en-AU.title: POPPING PAPER
en-AU.description: This bubbly plastic was a popular stress-relieving toy. Humans would grab handfuls and squeeze, bursting the bubbles with glee. For extreme stress, the human could lay a big sheet of the stuff down on the ground and roll around for hours.

landmarks.title: POPPING PAPER
landmarks.description: This bubbly plastic was a popular stress-relieving toy. Humans would grab handfuls and squeeze, bursting the bubbles with glee. For extreme stress, the human could lay a big sheet of the stuff down on the ground and roll around for hours.

landmarks.name: LM_BusTimetable

en.title: BUS TIMETABLE
en.description: It's hard for us to be certain, given the centuries which have elapsed, but every single arrival time listed in this pamphlet appears to be an outright lie. The mystery of how any human managed to catch a bus in Englandland continues.

en-GB.title: BUS TIMETABLE
en-GB.description: It's hard for us to be certain, given the centuries which have elapsed, but every single arrival time listed in this pamphlet appears to be an outright lie. The mystery of how any human managed to catch a bus in Englandland continues.

fr.title: HORAIRES DE BUS
fr.description: Il est difficile de l'affirmer étant donné les siècles écoulés, mais chaque heure d'arrivée mentionnée dans cette brochure semble être un mensonge éhonté. On ignore toujours comment les humains parvenaient à prendre le bus en Angleterre.

de.title: BUSFAHRPLAN
de.description: Nach all den vergangenen Jahrhunderten können wir uns kaum sicher sein, aber jede einzelne Ankunftszeit in diesem Prospekt scheint eine glatte Lüge zu sein. Das Rätsel darum, wie Menschen in Englandland jemals Busse erwischen konnten, bleibt bestehen.

es.title: HORARIO DE AUTOBÚS
es.description: Nos resulta difícil estar seguros, dados los siglos que han pasado, pero cada hora de llegada mencionada en este panfleto parece ser una mentira absoluta. El misterio de cómo cualquier humano conseguía coger un autobús en Inglaterralandia continúa.

it.title: ORARI DELL'AUTOBUS
it.description: È difficile per noi esserne certi, considerati i secoli trascorsi, ma ogni orario di arrivo su questo opuscolo sembra essere una mera bugia. Il mistero di come gli umani riuscissero a prendere un autobus in Inghilterraterra prosegue.

ja.title: バスの時刻表
ja.description: もう何世紀もの時間が経過しているため、確かなことを言うのは難しいことですが、このパンフレットに記載されている到着時間はすべて、まったくの嘘です。イングランドランドの人間たちがどうやってバスに乗れていたのかは、謎のままです。

ko.title: 버스 시간표
ko.description: 몇 세기가 흘렀으므로 확신할 수는 없지만, 여기에 적힌 시간표는 전부 새빨간 거짓말로 보입니다. 어떻게 영국나라 인간들이 버스를 잡을 수 있었는지에 대한 연구는 계속되고 있습니다.

zh-Hans.title: 巴士时刻表
zh-Hans.description: 我们很难确定，因为已经过去了几个世纪，但这本小册子中列出的每一个到达时间似乎都是彻头彻尾的谎言。在英格兰大陆，人类是怎么成功赶上巴士的，这仍然是个谜团。

zh-Hant.title: 公車時刻表
zh-Hant.description: 由於已經過了好幾世紀的時間，我們很難確定，但是這本冊子所列出的每一個抵達時間完全不準確。英格蘭大陸的人類如何順利搭上公車至今仍是個謎題。

ru.title: РАСПИСАНИЕ АВТОБУСОВ
ru.description: Сложно быть уверенным с учетом прошедших веков, но абсолютно каждое время прибытия, перечисленное в этой брошюре, представляется стопроцентной ложью. Тайна о том, как люди умудрялись поймать автобус в Англоземье, все еще не раскрыта.

pt-BR.title: HORÁRIOS DO ÔNIBUS
pt-BR.description: Devido aos séculos que se passaram pode ser difícil de comprovar, mas aparentemente todos os horários de chegada deste panfleto são falsos. O mistério de como os humanos conseguiam andar de ônibus na Terra da Inglaterra continua sem resposta.

nl.title: BUSTIJDEN
nl.description: Het is moeilijk om hier zekerheid over te hebben, want het is al eeuwen geleden, maar elke aankomsttijd die in deze brochure wordt vermeld, lijkt een leugen te zijn. Engelandland geeft zijn geheimen over het nemen van een bus nog steeds niet prijs.

ar.title: اﻟﺠﺪول اﻟﺰﻣﻨﻲ ﻟﻠﺤﺎﻓﻼت
ar.description: ﻳﺒﺪو أن ﺟﻤﻴﻊ ﻣﻮاﻋﻴﺪ اﻟﻮﺻﻮل اﻟﻤﺪرﺟﺔ ﻓﻲ ﻫﺬا اﻟﻜﺘﻴﺐ ﻛﺬب ﻣﺤﺾ، ﻟﻜﻦ ﺑﻌﺪ ﻣﺮور ﻋﺪة ﻗﺮون ﻳﺼﻌﺐ ﻋﻠﻴﻨﺎ اﻟﺘﺄﻛﺪ ﻣﻦ ﺻﺤﺔ ذﻟﻚ. وﻣﺎ زال ﺳﺮ ﻧﺠﺎح ﺑﻌﺾ اﻷﺷﺨﺎص ﻓﻲ اﻟﻠﺤﺎق ﺑﺎﻟﺤﺎﻓﻠﺔ ﻓﻲ إﻧﺠﻠﺘﺮا ﻏﺎﻣﻀﺎ.

tk.title: OTOBÜS TARİFESİ
tk.description: Kesin konuşamayız tabii ama geçen yüzyılları göz önüne aldığımızda bu broşürde listelenen varış zamanlarının her biri düpedüz yalan gibi görünüyor. İngiltere'de insanların otobüsü nasıl yakalamayı başardığı ise gizemini koruyor.

fr-CA.title: HORAIRES DE BUS
fr-CA.description: Il est difficile de l'affirmer étant donné les siècles écoulés, mais chaque heure d'arrivée mentionnée dans ce dépliant semble être un mensonge éhonté. On ignore toujours comment les humains parvenaient à prendre le bus en Angleterre.

en-AU.title: BUS TIMETABLE
en-AU.description: It's hard for us to be certain, given the centuries which have elapsed, but every single arrival time listed in this pamphlet appears to be an outright lie. The mystery of how any human managed to catch a bus in Englandland continues.

landmarks.title: BUS TIMETABLE
landmarks.description: It's hard for us to be certain, given the centuries which have elapsed, but every single arrival time listed in this pamphlet appears to be an outright lie. The mystery of how any human managed to catch a bus in Englandland continues.

landmarks.name: LM_Button

en.title: "DO NOT PRESS" BUTTON
en.description: The first time our monster experts pressed this button, they heard a loud crunching noise followed by a scream. We assume that was a coincidence, because we pressed it again—more than fifty times!—and there was no further crunching or screaming.

en-GB.title: "DO NOT PRESS" BUTTON
en-GB.description: The first time our monster experts pressed this button, they heard a loud crunching noise followed by a scream. We assume that was a coincidence, because we pressed it again—more than fifty times!—and there was no further crunching or screaming.

fr.title: BOUTON « NE PAS APPUYER »
fr.description: La première fois que nos experts monstres ont appuyé sur ce bouton, ils ont entendu un grand craquement suivi d'un cri. Il devait cependant s'agir d'une coïncidence, car nous avons appuyé à nouveau (plus de cinquante fois !) et plus rien ne s'est produit.

de.title: „NICHT DRÜCKEN“-KNOPF
de.description: Als unsere Monsterexperten diesen Knopf zum ersten Mal drückten, hörten sie ein lautes Knirschen, gefolgt von einem Schrei. Wir gehen davon aus, dass es sich um einen Zufall handelte, denn als wir ihn nochmal drückten – mehr als fünfzig Mal! – ertönte kein weiteres Knirschen oder Schreien.

es.title: BOTÓN DE "NO PULSAR"
es.description: La primera vez que nuestros monstruos expertos pulsaron este botón, escucharon un ruidoso crujido seguido de un grito. Damos por hecho que fue una coincidencia, porque lo volvimos a pulsar (¡más de cincuenta veces!) y ya no sonó ningún crujido ni grito.

it.title: PULSANTE "NON PREMERE"
it.description: La prima volta che i nostri esperti mostri premettero questo pulsante, avvertirono un forte scricchiolio seguito da un urlo. Possiamo immaginare che sia stata una coincidenza, perché lo abbiamo premuto di nuovo, più di cinquanta volte, e non ci sono stati altri scricchiolii o urla.

ja.title: 「押すな」ボタン
ja.description: 最初にモンスター専門家がこのボタンを押した時、大きなバリバリという音に続いて叫び声を聞きました。でもそれはただの偶然だったようです。だって、念のためにもう一回押してみたんです…ついでに、あと50回くらい押しておきました！—もうバリバリという音も、叫び声も聞こえませんでしたよ。

ko.title: 누르지 마시오' 버튼
ko.description: 우리 전문 몬스터들이 처음 이 버튼을 눌렀을 때, 거대한 충돌음과 비명을 들었다고 합니다. 우리는 그것을 우연으로 간주하고 이후 50회를 더 눌렀습니다! 그 후부터는 더 이상 충돌음도, 비명도 들리지 않았습니다.

zh-Hans.title: “不要按”按钮
zh-Hans.description: 我们的怪兽专家第一次按下这个按钮时，他们听到了巨大的嘎吱声，接着是一声尖叫。我们认为这是一个巧合，因为我们又按了 – 50 多次！ – 再也没有嘎吱声和尖叫了。

zh-Hant.title: 「請勿按下」按鈕
zh-Hant.description: 我們的怪獸專家第一次按下這個按鈕時，牠們先聽到震耳的嘎吱聲，接著是一聲尖叫聲。我們推測這是巧合，因為我們再次按下時 (超過五十次！)，再也沒有聽到嘎吱聲或尖叫聲。

ru.title: КНОПКА «НЕ НАЖИМАТЬ»
ru.description: Когда эксперты монстров впервые нажали эту кнопку, они услышали громкий хруст, за которым последовал крик. Мы предполагаем, что это было совпадением, потому что мы снова ее нажали — более пятидесяти раз! — и больше не было ни хруста, ни криков.

pt-BR.title: BOTÃO DE “NÃO APERTAR”
pt-BR.description: Da primeira vez que os monstros especialistas apertaram este botão, eles escutaram um estrondo seguido de um grito. Presumimos que tenha sido uma coincidência pois, ao apertar de novo — e mais de quinze vezes seguidas! — não houve nenhum estrondo ou grito.

nl.title: NIET DRUKKEN'-KNOP
nl.description: Toen onze monsterexperts voor het eerst op de knop drukten, hoorden ze een luide krak en een schreeuw. We dachten dat dit toeval was, want we drukten wel vijftig keer opnieuw op de knop en we hoorden nooit meer gekraak en geschreeuw.

ar.title: زر "ﻋﺪم اﻟﻀﻐﻂ"
ar.description: ﻓﻲ أول ﻣﺮة ﺿﻐﻂ أﺣﺪ ﺧﺒﺮاﺋﻨﺎ ﻣﻦ اﻟﻮﺣﻮش ﻋﻠﯽ ﻫﺬا اﻟﺰر، ﺳﻤﻊ ﺻﺨﺐ ﻋﺎل ﻣﺘﺒﻮﻋﺎ ﺑﺼﻴﺎح. وﻧﻔﺘﺮض أن ﻫﺬه ﻛﺎﻧﺖ ﻣﺼﺎدﻓﺔ، ﻓﻘﺪ ﺿﻐﻄﻨﺎ ﻋﻠﻴﻪ ﻣﺮارا، أﻛﺜﺮ ﻣﻦ ﺧﻤﺴﻴﻦ ﻣﺮة!، وﻟﻢ ﻧﺴﻤﻊ أي ﺻﻮت أو ﺻﻴﺎح.

tk.title: "BASMAYIN" DÜĞMESİ
tk.description: Canavar uzmanlarımız bu düğmeye ilk bastığında şiddetli bir gürültü ve ardından bir çığlık duyuldu. Bunun bir tesadüf olduğunu düşünüyoruz çünkü düğmeye bir daha bastık, hatta elliden fazla kez bastık ve bir daha gürültü veya çığlık duyulmadı.

fr-CA.title: BOUTON « NE PAS APPUYER »
fr-CA.description: La première fois que nos experts monstres ont appuyé sur ce bouton, ils ont entendu un grand craquement suivi d'un cri. Nous croyons qu'il s'agissait d'une coïncidence, car nous avons appuyé à nouveau (plus de cinquante fois!) et il ne s'est rien produit.

en-AU.title: "DO NOT PRESS" BUTTON
en-AU.description: The first time our monster experts pressed this button, they heard a loud crunching noise followed by a scream. We assume that was a coincidence, because we pressed it again—more than fifty times!—and there was no further crunching or screaming.

landmarks.title: "DO NOT PRESS" BUTTON
landmarks.description: The first time our monster experts pressed this button, they heard a loud crunching noise followed by a scream. We assume that was a coincidence, because we pressed it again—more than fifty times!—and there was no further crunching or screaming.

landmarks.name: LM_CallBell

en.title: HAND-OPERATED BELL
en.description: This device produces a very pleasing sound, but appears not to have been used to make music. We assume this is because the chime tended to summon a human in business attire who would try to offer assistance. That would have been quite disruptive to an orchestra.

en-GB.title: HAND-OPERATED BELL
en-GB.description: This device produces a very pleasing sound, but appears not to have been used to make music. We assume this is because the chime tended to summon a human in business attire who would try to offer assistance. That would have been quite disruptive to an orchestra.

fr.title: CLOCHE DE MAIN
fr.description: Cet appareil produit un son très agréable, mais ne semble pas avoir été exploité à des fins musicales. Cela serait dû au fait que le carillon avait tendance à appeler un humain en costume désireux d'offrir son aide. Un élément plutôt perturbateur pour un orchestre.

de.title: HANDBETRIEBENE GLOCKE
de.description: Dieses Gerät erzeugt ein sehr wohlklingendes Geräusch, scheint aber nicht benutzt worden zu sein, um Musik zu machen. Wir gehen davon aus, dass es daran liegt, dass der Klang für gewöhnlich einen Menschen in Geschäftskleidung herbeirief, der daraufhin seine Hilfe anbot, was in einem Orchester in der Tat sehr störend gewesen wäre.

es.title: TIMBRE DE MANO
es.description: Este dispositivo produce un sonido muy placentero, pero parece que no se usó para hacer música. Suponemos que porque el repique solía invocar a un humano trajeado que intentaba ofrecer ayuda. Eso habría sido bastante molesto en una orquesta.

it.title: CAMPANA A PRESSIONE
it.description: Questo strumento produce un suono molto piacevole ma sembra che non venisse usato per fare musica, visto che il suono tendeva ad evocare umani in vestiti eleganti che provavano a offrire assistenza. Sarebbe stato piuttosto fastidioso per un'orchestra.

ja.title: 手動ベル
ja.description: このデバイスは非常に気持ちが良い音を出すのですが、音楽を作り出すために使われたわけではないようです。私たちの予想では、このベルはビジネス風の装いをしてお手伝いをする人間を召喚するチャイムとして使われていたのだと思います。これをオーケストラで演奏していたら、大問題だったでしょう。

ko.title: 수동 조작 종
ko.description: 이 장치는 매우 아름다운 소리를 내지만, 음악을 연주하기 위한 용도는 아니었던 것 같습니다. 이 종은 도움을 줄 수 있는 업무용 의상을 입은 인간을 소환하기 위한 용도로 추정됩니다. 이걸 오케스트라에 썼으면 꽤 방해가 됐을 것 같습니다.

zh-Hans.title: 手动操作铃
zh-Hans.description: 这个装置可以发出非常悦耳的声音，但似乎还没有用来制作音乐。我们认为，这是因为响声一般会把穿着商务正装并试图提供协助的人类召唤来。这会给管弦乐队造成相当大的混乱。

zh-Hant.title: 手動響鈴
zh-Hant.description: 這個裝置能發出悅耳的聲音，但人類似乎沒有用它來奏樂。我們猜測，響聲一般會召喚穿著商務服裝並提供協助的人類。這樣會嚴重影響到管弦樂隊。

ru.title: КОЛОКОЛЬЧИК С РУЧНЫМ УПРАВЛЕНИЕМ
ru.description: Это устройство издает очень приятный звук, но, похоже, для создания музыки оно не использовалось. Мы предполагаем, что причина в том, что звон колокольчика имел обыкновение призывать человека в деловой одежде, который пытался предложить помощь. Для оркестра это было бы довольно неудобно.

pt-BR.title: SINO MANUAL
pt-BR.description: Este dispositivo produz um som muito agradável, mas não era usado em composições musicais. Presumimos que é porque seu barulho costumava evocar um humano completo, com trajes sociais, para oferecer auxílio. Isso seria um tanto incômodo para uma orquestra.

nl.title: HANDBEDIENDE BEL
nl.description: Dit toestel produceert een zeer aangenaam geluid, maar lijkt niet te zijn gebruikt om muziek te maken. We nemen aan dat dit komt omdat de bel de neiging had een mens in zakelijke kledij op te roepen die probeerde hulp te bieden. Dat zou nogal storend zijn geweest voor een orkest.

ar.title: اﻟﺠﺮس اﻟﻴﺪوي
ar.description: ﻳﺼﺪر ﻫﺬا اﻟﺠﻬﺎز ﺻﻮﺗﺎ ﻋﺬﺑﺎ ﻟﻠﻐﺎﻳﺔ، ﻟﻜﻦ ﻳﺒﺪو أﻧﻪ ﻟﻢ ﻳﻜﻦ ﻳﺴﺘﺨﺪم ﻹﺻﺪار اﻟﻤﻮﺳﻴﻘﯽ. وﻧﺘﻮﻗﻊ ذﻟﻚ ﻷن اﻟﺮﻧﻴﻦ ﻛﺎن ﻏﺎﻟﺒﺎ ﻳﺴﺘﺪﻋﻲ ﺑﺸﺮا ﻳﺮﺗﺪون زي اﻟﻌﻤﻞ وﻳﺤﺎوﻟﻮن ﺗﻘﺪﻳﻢ اﻟﻤﺴﺎﻋﺪة. وﻛﺎن ﻫﺬا ﺳﻴﻌﻴﻖ ﻋﻤﻞ اﻷورﻛﺴﺘﺮا.

tk.title: ELLE ÇALIŞAN ZİL
tk.description: Bu alet çok hoş bir ses çıkarıyor fakat belli ki müzik yapmak için üretilmemiş. Böyle varsayıyoruz çünkü zil sesi ne zaman duyulsa iş kıyafeti giyen bir insan gelip yardım etmeyi teklif ediyor. Orkestrada böyle bir hareket epey dikkat dağıtıcı olurdu.

fr-CA.title: CLOCHETTE À MAIN
fr-CA.description: Cet appareil produit un son très agréable, mais ne semble pas avoir été utilisé à des fins musicales. Cela serait dû au fait que le carillon avait tendance à invoquer un humain en costume désireux d'offrir son aide. Un élément qui aurait été plutôt dérangeant pour un orchestre.

en-AU.title: HAND-OPERATED BELL
en-AU.description: This device produces a very pleasing sound, but appears not to have been used to make music. We assume this is because the chime tended to summon a human in business attire who would try to offer assistance. That would have been quite disruptive to an orchestra.

landmarks.title: HAND-OPERATED BELL
landmarks.description: This device produces a very pleasing sound, but appears not to have been used to make music. We assume this is because the chime tended to summon a human in business attire who would try to offer assistance. That would have been quite disruptive to an orchestra.

landmarks.name: LM_Canapes

en.title: MINI DINNER
en.description: The mini dinner was a key part of a human game called a "cocktail party". At a cocktail party, a squad of butlers would circulate the arena carrying platters of mini dinners. Attacking players ("guests") tried to steal these without being deemed "gauche". Whoever possessed the most mini dinners by the end of the party was declared the winner.

en-GB.title: MINI DINNER
en-GB.description: The mini dinner was a key part of a human game called a "cocktail party". At a cocktail party, a squad of butlers would circulate the arena carrying platters of mini dinners. Attacking players ("guests") tried to steal these without being deemed "gauche". Whoever possessed the most mini dinners by the end of the party was declared the winner.

fr.title: MINI CANAPÉS
fr.description: Le mini canapé était un élément clé d'un jeu humain appelé « soirée cocktail ». Dans une soirée cocktail, une équipe de majordomes circulait dans l'arène en portant des plateaux de mini canapés. Les joueurs attaquants (« invités ») essayaient de les dérober sans faire de « faux-pas ». Celui qui possédait le plus de mini canapés à la fin de la soirée était déclaré vainqueur.

de.title: MINI-ABENDESSEN
de.description: Das Mini-Abendessen war ein Schlüsselelement eines Menschenspiels mit dem Namen „Cocktail-Party“. Auf einer Cocktail-Party zirkuliert ein Butler-Trupp durch die Arena, wobei jeder von ihnen ein Silbertablett mit Mini-Abendessen darauf herumträgt. Angreifende Spieler („Gäste“) versuchen dann, etwas davon zu stehlen, ohne „ungehobelt“ rüberzukommen. Wer am Ende der Party die meisten Mini-Abendessen besitzt, wird zum Sieger erklärt.

es.title: MINICENA
es.description: La minicena era una parte muy importante de un juego humano llamado "cóctel". En los cócteles, un grupo de sirvientes circula por una arena con un montón de platos de minicenas. Los jugadores atacantes ("invitados") intentan robarlas sin que se les considere "desvergonzados". Quien consiga más minicenas al final de la fiesta, se alza con la victoria.

it.title: MINI CENA
it.description: La mini cena era una parte importante di un gioco umano chiamato "cocktail party". In un cocktail party, una squadra di maggiordomi girava per l'arena con portate di mini cene. I giocatori attaccanti (gli "ospiti") provavano a rubarle cercando di non essere considerati "inopportuni". Chiunque riusciva a ottenere più mini cene entro la fine dell'evento veniva dichiarato vincitore.

ja.title: ミニディナー
ja.description: ミニディナーは、「カクテルパーティー」と呼ばれる人間のパーティーで重要な役割を果たします。カクテルパーティーでは、執事のチームはミニディナーが載った大皿を持ってアリーナをグルグルと巡回します。攻撃プレイヤー(「ゲスト」)は、「武骨だ」と思われることなくこのミニディナーを盗もうとしました。パーティー終了時に最もたくさんミニディナーを持っていた人物が、勝者と見なされるのです。

ko.title: 작은 식사
ko.description: 이 작은 식사는 인간들이 '칵테일 파티'라고 부르는 게임의 일부였던 것 같습니다. 칵테일 파티에서는 집사들이 부대를 구성하고 한 손에 작은 식사를 얹은 접시를 든 상태로 투기장을 배회했습니다. 선수('손님'이라고 부름)들은 '천박해' 보이지 않는 방식으로 이 식사를 몰래 훔쳤습니다. 파티가 끝날 무렵 가장 많은 작은 식사를 보유한 사람이 승자가 되었습니다.

zh-Hans.title: 小小餐点
zh-Hans.description: 在名叫“鸡尾酒会”的人类游戏中，小小餐点是关键的一环。在鸡尾酒会上，一队管家会拿着大浅盘，放着小小餐点巡游竞技场。攻方玩家（“来宾”）要尝试偷取这些餐点，而不能被认定为“举止粗鲁”。而在派对结束时，持有最多小小餐点的玩家将会成为胜利者。

zh-Hant.title: 迷你晚餐
zh-Hant.description: 迷你晚餐是人類遊戲「雞尾酒會」的主角。在雞尾酒會上，管家們會端著一盤盤迷你晚餐在活動場所穿梭。進攻的玩家 (來賓) 企圖偷走這些迷你晚餐，而不會被視為「粗俗無禮」。酒會結束後，誰拿到最多迷你晚餐的人就獲勝。

ru.title: МИНИ-ОБЕД
ru.description: Мини-обед был важной частью человеческой игры, которая называлась «коктейльная вечеринка». На коктейльной вечеринке отряд официантов ходит по арене с блюдами мини-обедов. Атакующие игроки («гости») пытаются украсть мини-обеды таким образом, чтобы их не запятнали и не прозвали обжорами. Побеждает тот, кто к концу вечеринки набрал наибольшее количество мини-обедов.

pt-BR.title: MINIJANTAR
pt-BR.description: O minijantar era parte de um jogo humano chamado “coquetel”. Nos coquetéis, um pelotão de mordomos circulava pela arena carregando travessas de minijantares. Os jogadores atacantes (“convidados”) tentavam roubá-los sem que fossem considerados “deselegantes”. Quem ficava com a maioria dos minijantares ao final do encontro era considerado o vencedor.

nl.title: MINIDINER
nl.description: Het minidiner was een belangrijk onderdeel van een menselijk spel dat een 'cocktailparty' werd genoemd. Op een cocktailparty circuleerde een groep butlers door de arena met schotels met minidiners. Aanvallende spelers ('gasten') probeerden deze te stelen zonder als 'tactloos' te worden beschouwd. Wie aan het einde van het feest de meeste minidiners had, werd uitgeroepen tot winnaar.

ar.title: ﻋﺸﺎء ﺻﻐﻴﺮ
ar.description: ﻛﺎن اﻟﻌﺸﺎء اﻟﺼﻐﻴﺮ ﺟﺰءا أﺳﺎﺳﻴﺎ ﻣﻦ ﻟﻌﺒﺔ ﺑﺸﺮﻳﺔ ﺗﺴﻤﯽ "ﺣﻔﻠﺔ اﻟﻜﻮﻛﺘﻴﻞ". وﺧﻼل ﺗﻠﻚ اﻟﺤﻔﻠﺔ، ﻛﺎن ﻳﻄﻮف ﻣﺠﻤﻮﻋﺔ ﻣﻦ ﻛﺒﺎر اﻟﺨﺪم ﻓﻲ اﻟﺴﺎﺣﺔ ﺣﺎﻣﻠﻴﻦ أﻃﺒﺎق ﻋﺸﺎء ﺻﻐﻴﺮة. وﻗﺪ ﺣﺎول اﻟﻤﻬﺎﺟﻤﻮن )"اﻟﻀﻴﻮف"( ﺳﺮﻗﺘﻬﺎ دون اﻋﺘﺒﺎر ذﻟﻚ "ﺗﺼﺮف أرﻋﻦ". وﻳﻜﻮن اﻟﻔﺎﺋﺰ ﻣﻦ اﻣﺘﻠﻚ أﻛﺒﺮ ﻋﺪد ﻣﻦ وﺟﺒﺎت اﻟﻌﺸﺎء اﻟﺼﻐﻴﺮة ﺑﻨﻬﺎﻳﺔ اﻟﺤﻔﻠﺔ.

tk.title: MİNİ AKŞAM YEMEĞİ
tk.description: Mini akşam yemeği, "kokteyl partisi" olarak adlandırılan bir insan oyununun önemli bir parçasıydı. Bir kokteyl partisinde, bir uşak ekibi, mini yemek tabaklarıyla alanda dolaşırdı. Saldıran oyuncular ("misafirler"), mini yemek tabaklarını "beceriksiz" addedilmeden çalmaya çalışırdı. Partinin sonunda en çok mini akşam yemeği tabağına sahip olan taraf kazanırdı.

fr-CA.title: MINI-CANAPÉS
fr-CA.description: Le mini-canapé était un élément clé d'un jeu humain appelé « soirée cocktail ». Dans une soirée cocktail, une équipe de majordomes circulait dans l'arène en portant des plateaux de mini-canapés. Les joueurs attaquants (les « invités ») essayaient de les dérober sans faire de « faux-pas ». Celui qui possédait le plus de mini canapés à la fin de la soirée était déclaré vainqueur.

en-AU.title: MINI DINNER
en-AU.description: The mini dinner was a key part of a human game called a "cocktail party". At a cocktail party, a squad of butlers would circulate the arena carrying platters of mini dinners. Attacking players ("guests") tried to steal these without being deemed "gauche". Whoever possessed the most mini dinners by the end of the party was declared the winner.

landmarks.title: MINI DINNER
landmarks.description: The mini dinner was a key part of a human game called a "cocktail party". At a cocktail party, a squad of butlers would circulate the arena carrying platters of mini dinners. Attacking players ("guests") tried to steal these without being deemed "gauche". Whoever possessed the most mini dinners by the end of the party was declared the winner.

landmarks.name: LM_CandyBars

en.title: THE FUN-SIZED CHOCOLATE ERA
en.description: Chocolate bar manufacturers briefly convinced other humans that smaller portions of their wares were "fun-sized". The ruse was exposed at a child's birthday party in Clacton-on-Sea, when one attendee yelled, "It's not more fun, it's just more SMALL! I want a proper one!" Monster scientists concur with the human child.

en-GB.title: THE FUN-SIZED CHOCOLATE ERA
en-GB.description: Chocolate bar manufacturers briefly convinced other humans that smaller portions of their wares were "fun-sized". The ruse was exposed at a child's birthday party in Clacton-on-Sea, when one attendee yelled, "It's not more fun, it's just more SMALL! I want a proper one!" Monster scientists concur with the human child.

fr.title: L'ÈRE DU CHOCOLAT EN MINI-BARRES
fr.description: Les fabricants de barres de chocolat avaient brièvement convaincu les autres humains que les mini portions de leurs produits étaient « mignonnes ». Leur ruse fut révélée lors de la fête d'anniversaire d'un enfant à Ploucos-sur-Mer, lorsqu'un participant s'écria : « C'est pas mignon, c'est juste plus PETIT ! J'en veux un normal ! » Les scientifiques monstres sont d'accord avec l'enfant humain.

de.title: DIE MUNDGERECHTE-SCHOKOLADEN-ÄRA
de.description: Schokoriegelhersteller konnten kurzzeitig andere Menschen davon überzeugen, dass kleinere Portionen ihrer Ware „mundgerecht“ wären. Diese Trickserei wurde auf einem Kindergeburtstag bei Clacton-on-Sea aufgedeckt, als ein Teilnehmer schrie: „Es ist gar nicht mundgerecht, es ist einfach nur mehr KLEIN! Ich will ein Richtiges!“ Monsterforscher stimmen dem Menschenkind zu.

es.title: LA ERA DEL CHOCOLATE DE TAMAÑO DIVERTIDO
es.description: Los fabricantes de barritas de chocolate convencieron brevemente a otros humanos de que las porciones más pequeñas de chocolate eran de "tamaño divertido". Esta estratagema fue descubierta en la fiesta de cumpleaños de una niña en Clacton del Mar, cuando uno de los asistentes gritó: "¡Que no es más divertido, solo es más PEQUEÑO! ¡Quiero uno de tamaño normal!". Los monstruos científicos coinciden con el niño humano.

it.title: L'ERA DEL CIOCCOLATO MIGNON
it.description: Per un certo periodo di tempo, i produttori di barrette di cioccolato convinsero gli altri umani a comprare porzioni più piccole dei loro prodotti, dette "mignon". L'inganno fu svelato alla festa di compleanno di un bambino di Clacton-on-Sea quando un invitato iniziò a urlare: "Non è mignon, è soltanto più PICCOLA! Ne voglio una vera!" Gli scienziati mostri concordano con il bambino umano.

ja.title: お楽しみサイズのチョコレート時代
ja.description: チョコレートバーの製造元は少しの間、小さ目の大きさの商品が「お楽しみサイズ」である、と他の人間たちに信じ込ませていました。この策略は、クラクトン・オン・シーで行われた子供の誕生日会にて参加者が「こんなのお楽しみじゃない、ただの小さなチョコバーじゃん！ちゃんとしたサイズのが欲しいよ！」と叫んだ際に発覚してしまったのです。モンスター科学者たちは、人間の子供のこの意見に賛同しています。

ko.title: 펀 사이즈 초콜릿 시대
ko.description: 초콜릿 바 제작자들은 다른 인간들에게 더 작은 크기의 제품을 '재미있는' 크기라고 주장했습니다. 그러나 클랙튼 온 씨에서 한 어린이의 생일 파티 때 참석자가 "이건 재미없어! 그냥 더 작은 것뿐이잖아! 제대로 된 걸 내놔!"라고 외치면서 이들의 사기 행각이 폭로되었습니다. 몬스터 과학자들도 어린이들의 의견에 동의하고 있습니다.

zh-Hans.title: 趣味大小的巧克力时代
zh-Hans.description: 巧克力板的制造商有短暂的时间向其他人类说服，他们商品中的较小部分是“趣味大小”的。这个计策在滨海克拉克顿举办的一场儿童生日派对上被戳穿了 – 一名参加者大喊大叫道：“这才没有更有趣呢，这只是更小了而已！我要普通版的！”怪兽科学家对这个人类孩童的意见表示同意。

zh-Hant.title: 小不點巧克力年代
zh-Hant.description: 巧克力棒製造商簡短的說服其他人類說，較小份量的巧克力棒稱做「小不點」巧克力棒。這種招術在濱海克拉克頓的一場兒童生日派對上曝了光；當時參加派對的一位小朋友大喊道「這不只是小不點，這是小很多點！我要原來的巧克力棒！」怪獸科學家們都力挺這位人類小朋友。

ru.title: ЭПОХА ЗАБАВНЫХ ШОКОЛАДОК
ru.description: Производители шоколадных плиток ненадолго сумели убедить людей, что маленькие шоколадки — это забавно. Их коварство было обличено на празднике в честь дня рождения ребенка в Клактон-он-Си, когда один из маленьких гостей закричал: «Это не забавно! Эта шоколадка — МАЛЕНЬКАЯ! Хочу нормальную шоколадку!» Ученые монстры склонны согласиться с человеческим ребенком.

pt-BR.title: A ERA DOS CHOCOLATES TAMANHO DIVERSÃO
pt-BR.description: Os fabricantes de barras de chocolate convenceram outros humanos, por um tempo, de que porções menores de seus produtos eram de “tamanho diversão”. O estratagema foi desbaratado numa festa de aniversário infantil em Clacton-on-Sea, quando um conviva gritou: “Não é tamanho diversão: é só MAIS PEQUENO! Eu quero um normal!” Os cientistas monstros concordam com a criança humana.

nl.title: HET TIJDPERK VAN DE LEUKE CHOCOLADE
nl.description: Fabrikanten van chocoladerepen overtuigden andere mensen er kortstondig van dat kleinere porties van hun producten 'leuk' waren. De list kwam aan het licht op een kinderverjaardagsfeestje in Clacton-on-Sea, toen een deelnemer riep: "Het is niet leuker, het is gewoon KLEINER! Ik wil een echte!" Monsterwetenschappers zijn het eens met het mensenkind.

ar.title: ﻋﺼﺮ اﻟﺸﻮﻛﻮﻻﺗﺔ ذات اﻟﺤﺠﻢ اﻟﻤﻤﺘﻊ
ar.description: أﻗﻨﻊ ﻣﺼﻨﻌﻮ أﻟﻮاح اﻟﺸﻮﻛﻮﻻﺗﺔ، اﻟﺒﺸﺮ اﻵﺧﺮﻳﻦ ﻟﻔﺘﺮة وﺟﻴﺰة ﺑﺄن اﻷﺟﺰاء اﻷﺻﻐﺮ ﻣﻦ ﺑﻀﺎﻋﺘﻬﻢ ﻛﺎﻧﺖ "ذات ﺣﺠﻢ ﻣﻤﺘﻊ". ﺗﻢ اﻟﻜﺸﻒ ﻋﻦ اﻟﺤﻴﻠﺔ ﻓﻲ ﺣﻔﻞ ﻋﻴﺪ ﻣﻴﻼد ﻃﻔﻞ ﻓﻲ ﻛﻼﻛﺘﻮن أون ﺳﻲ، ﻋﻨﺪﻣﺎ ﺻﺮخ أﺣﺪ اﻟﺤﻀﻮر ﻗﺎﺋﻼ "إﻧﻬﺎ ﻟﻴﺴﺖ أﻛﺜﺮ ﻣﺘﻌﺔ، إﻧﻬﺎ أﺻﻐﺮ! أرﻳﺪ واﺣﺪة ذات ﺣﺠﻢ ﻣﻨﺎﺳﺐ!" واﺗﻔﻖ ﻋﻠﻤﺎء retsnoM ﻣﻊ رأي اﻟﻄﻔﻞ اﻟﺒﺸﺮي.

tk.title: KÜÇÜK EĞLENCE PAKETLİ ÇİKOLATA DÖNEMİ
tk.description: Çikolata barı üreticileri, ürünlerinin daha küçük versiyonlarının "küçük eğlence paketi" olduğuna insanları neredeyse ikna etmişti. Clacton-on-Sea'deki bir çocuğun doğum günü partisine gelen bir davetlinin sözleriyle bu kurnazlık ifşa oldu: "Eğlenceli değil, sadece daha KÜÇÜK! Düzgün bir çikolata istiyorum!" Canavar bilim insanları, insan çocukla aynı fikirde.

fr-CA.title: L'ÈRE DU CHOCOLAT EN MINI-BARRES
fr-CA.description: Les fabricants de barres de chocolat avaient brièvement convaincu les autres humains que les mini-portions de leurs produits étaient « amusantes ». Leur ruse fut révélée lors de la fête d'un enfant à Clacton-sur-Mer, lorsqu'un participant s'écria : « C'est pas amusant, c'est juste plus PETIT! J'en veux un normal! » Les scientifiques monstres sont d'accord avec l'enfant humain.

en-AU.title: THE FUN-SIZED CHOCOLATE ERA
en-AU.description: Chocolate bar manufacturers briefly convinced other humans that smaller portions of their wares were "fun-sized". The ruse was exposed at a child's birthday party in Clacton-on-Sea, when one attendee yelled, "It's not more fun, it's just more SMALL! I want a proper one!" Monster scientists concur with the human child.

landmarks.title: THE FUN-SIZED CHOCOLATE ERA
landmarks.description: Chocolate bar manufacturers briefly convinced other humans that smaller portions of their wares were "fun-sized". The ruse was exposed at a child's birthday party in Clacton-on-Sea, when one attendee yelled, "It's not more fun, it's just more SMALL! I want a proper one!" Monster scientists concur with the human child.

landmarks.name: LM_CarBootSale

en.title: CAR BOOT SALE
en.description: Englandlanders with an excess of cassette tapes, distressed denim, and collectible sporks would occasionally all flock to the same carpark in the early hours of the weekend and turn their vehicles into mobile shops. The money they earned selling their wares would be spent on hot cocoa.

en-GB.title: CAR BOOT SALE
en-GB.description: Englandlanders with an excess of cassette tapes, distressed denim, and collectible sporks would occasionally all flock to the same carpark in the early hours of the weekend and turn their vehicles into mobile shops. The money they earned selling their wares would be spent on hot cocoa.

fr.title: VIDE-GRENIER
fr.description: Les Angleterriens en excès de cassettes, jeans déchirés et cuillères-fourchettes de collection se réunissaient parfois tous sur le même parking dès l'aube pour transformer leurs véhicules en magasins mobiles. L'argent qu'ils récoltaient en vendant leurs marchandises était dépensé en chocolat chaud.

de.title: KOFFERAUMVERKAUF
de.description: Englandländer mit überschüssigen Tonbandkassetten, alten Jeanshosen und Sammler-Göffeln versammelten sich bisweilen frühmorgens am Wochenende auf Parkplätzen und machten aus ihren Fahrzeugen mobile Verkaufsstände. Das Geld, das sie beim Verkauf ihrer Waren verdienten, wurde in heißen Kakao angelegt.

es.title: MERCADILLO
es.description: Los de Inglaterralandia con exceso de cintas de casete, vaqueros desgastados y tenedores coleccionables acudían en manada al mismo aparcamiento en horas tempranas del fin de semana y convertían sus vehículos en tiendas móviles. El dinero que ganaban vendiendo sus mercancías se lo gastaban en chocolate caliente.

it.title: MECATINO DELL'USATO
it.description: Gli inglesesi che avevano cassette, jeans vecchi e posate da collezione in eccesso ogni tanto si fiondavano nello stesso parcheggio alle prime ore del mattino durante il fine settimana e trasformavano i propri veicoli in negozi mobili. Il denaro che guadagnavano vendendo la merce veniva speso in cioccolata calda.

ja.title: トランクセール
ja.description: 余分のカセットテープ、アンティーク調のデニムや、収集価値のありそうなスポークを所有するイングランドランドの人々はしばしば、週末の午前中に駐車場に群がり、自分の車を移動ショップに変身させていました。これらの商品を売って獲得したお金で、ホットココアを買っていたのです。

ko.title: 중고품 판매
ko.description: 영국나라 인간들 중 남는 테이프나 청바지, 수집용 스포크가 많은 사람들은 주말 아침 같은 주차장에 모여 자신의 차량을 이동식 가게로 바꾸곤 했습니다. 인간들은 여기서 번 돈으로 뜨거운 코코아를 사서 마셨습니다.

zh-Hans.title: 汽车后备箱集市
zh-Hans.description: 周末的清晨，英格兰大陆人带着各种盒式磁带、破旧牛仔布和具有收藏价值的叉勺聚集在同一个停车场，把他们的汽车变成流动商店。他们卖货挣来的钱会用来买热巧克力。

zh-Hant.title: 後車廂市集
zh-Hant.description: 有多餘卡式錄音帶、破褲和收藏式湯叉的英格蘭大陸人，有時候會在週末早晨，聚集在同一個停車場，將他們的交通工具變成行動商店。他們販賣商品所賺來的貨幣會花在熱可可上。

ru.title: РАСПРОДАЖА ИЗ БАГАЖНИКА
ru.description: Время от времени англоземцы с избытком кассет, поношенных джинсов и коллекционных вилколожек скапливались на одной парковке ранним утром в выходной день и превращали свои автомобили в передвижные магазины. Заработанные деньги тратились на горячее какао.

pt-BR.title: AUTOMÓVENDA
pt-BR.description: Os habitantes da Terra da Inglaterra com muitas fitas cassete, jeans abarrotados e talheres plásticos se encontravam no mesmo estacionamento em algum dia do final de semana, bem cedo, e transformavam seus veículos em mercados ambulantes. O dinheiro que eles ganhavam com suas vendas era usado para comprar chocolate quente.

nl.title: VLOOIENMARKT
nl.description: Engelandlanders die te veel cassettes, jeansbroeken en sporks hebben, verzamelen soms tijdens de vroege uurtjes op dezelfde plaats en maken een kraam om hun spullen te verkopen. Het geld dat ze zo verdienen, besteden ze aan warme chocolademelk.

ar.title: اﻟﺒﻴﻊ ﻣﻦ ﺻﻨﺪوق اﻟﺴﻴﺎرة
