ar.description: ﻛﺎن اﻹﻧﺠﻠﻴﺰ اﻟﺬﻳﻦ ﻟﺪﻳﻬﻢ اﻟﻜﺜﻴﺮ ﻣﻦ اﻟﺸﺮاﺋﻂ اﻟﺴﻤﻌﻴﺔ وﻣﻼﺑﺲ اﻟﺪﻳﻨﻢ اﻟﻤﻘﻄﻌﺔ ﻋﻠﯽ اﻟﻤﻮﺿﺔ وﻣﻼﻋﻖ اﻟﻤﺸﻮك اﻟﻨﺎدرة ﻳﺠﺘﻤﻌﻮن ﻣﻦ وﻗﺖ إﻟﯽ آﺧﺮ ﻓﻲ ﻣﻮﻗﻒ ﺳﻴﺎرات واﺣﺪ ﻓﻲ اﻟﺴﺎﻋﺎت اﻷوﻟﯽ ﻣﻦ ﻳﻮم اﻟﻌﻄﻠﺔ اﻷﺳﺒﻮﻋﻴﺔ وﻳﺤﻮﻟﻮن ﺳﻴﺎراﺗﻬﻢ إﻟﯽ ﻣﺤﺎل ﻣﺘﻨﻘﻠﺔ. ﺛﻢ ﻳﻨﻔﻘﻮن اﻟﻤﺎل اﻟﺬي ﻛﺴﺒﻮه ﻣﻦ ﺑﻴﻊ ﺑﻀﺎﻋﺘﻬﻢ ﻋﻠﯽ ﺷﺮاء اﻟﻜﺎﻛﺎو اﻟﺴﺎﺧﻦ.

tk.title: BİTPAZARI
tk.description: Elinde bir sürü kaset, yıpranmış kot ve kaşal olan İngiltereliler, hafta sonu erken saatlerde aynı garaja akın eder, araçlarını gezer dükkanlara dönüştürürlerdi. Eşyalarını satarak kazandıkları parayı da sıcak çikolataya harcarlardı.

fr-CA.title: VENTE DE DÉBARRAS
fr-CA.description: Les Angleterriens qui avaient trop de cassettes, jeans déchirés et cuillères-fourchettes de collection se réunissaient parfois tous dans le même stationnement dès l'aube pour transformer leurs véhicules en magasins mobiles. L'argent qu'ils récoltaient en vendant leurs marchandises était dépensé en chocolat chaud.

en-AU.title: CAR BOOT SALE
en-AU.description: Englandlanders with an excess of cassette tapes, distressed denim, and collectible sporks would occasionally all flock to the same carpark in the early hours of the weekend and turn their vehicles into mobile shops. The money they earned selling their wares would be spent on hot cocoa.

landmarks.title: CAR BOOT SALE
landmarks.description: Englandlanders with an excess of cassette tapes, distressed denim, and collectible sporks would occasionally all flock to the same carpark in the early hours of the weekend and turn their vehicles into mobile shops. The money they earned selling their wares would be spent on hot cocoa.

landmarks.name: LM_Cardigan

en.title: EASY-RELEASE JUMPER
en.description: Unlike monster bodies, human bodies tapered abruptly just above the thorax, then ballooned out again to form the head. The head/neck size difference sometimes caused humans to become trapped in woolly jumpers. Hence, they engineered these easy-release versions.

en-GB.title: EASY-RELEASE JUMPER
en-GB.description: Unlike monster bodies, human bodies tapered abruptly just above the thorax, then ballooned out again to form the head. The head/neck size difference sometimes caused humans to become trapped in woolly jumpers. Hence, they engineered these easy-release versions.

fr.title: PULL FACILE-À-ÔTER
fr.description: Contrairement aux corps de monstres, les corps humains s'amincissaient brusquement juste au-dessus du thorax, pour gonfler de nouveau et former la tête. Cette différence de taille tête/cou a parfois amené les humains à se retrouver piégés dans des pulls en laine. Ils ont conçu ces versions faciles-à-ôter en réponse au problème.

de.title: PULLOVER FÜR SCHNELLE BEFREIUNG
de.description: Im Gegensatz zu Monsterkörpern verjüngten sich menschliche Körper plötzlich über dem Brustkorb und dehnten sich kurz darüber plötzlich wieder aus, um den Kopf zu bilden. Der Größenunterschied zwischen Kopf und Hals führte gelegentlich dazu, dass Menschen in Wollpullovern gefangen wurden. Aus diesem Grund entwickelten sie diese Version zur schnelleren Befreiung.

es.title: JERSEY DE SOLTADO RÁPIDO
es.description: A diferencia de los de los monstruos, los cuerpos humanos se estrechaban de forma abrupta por encima del tórax, para luego volver a ensancharse formando la cabeza. La diferencia de tamaño entre el cuello y la cabeza causaba a veces que los humanos quedasen atrapados en jerséis de lana. Así pues, inventaron estas versiones de soltado rápido.

it.title: MAGLIONE DI FACILE RIMOZIONE
it.description: A differenza dei corpi dei mostri, quelli degli umani si affusolavano all'improvviso sopra il torace e poi assumevano nuovamente una forma tondeggiante verso la testa. La differenza di grandezza tra testa e collo a volte li faceva rimanere intrappolati all'interno di maglioni di lana. Perciò, progettarono queste versioni di facile rimozione.

ja.title: 簡単リリース・セーター
ja.description: モンスターの体とは異なり、人間の体は胸部の真上で急激に先細りになり、その後再び膨らんで頭を形成します。頭/首のサイズの違いにより、人間が羊毛のセーターに閉じ込められてしまうことがありました。 したがって、彼らはこの簡単リリース版を設計したのです。

ko.title: 쉬운 탈출 점퍼
ko.description: 몬스터의 신체와 달리 인간들의 신체는 흉부 위에 가늘게 튀어나온 기둥 위에 풍선 같은 머리가 얹혀 있습니다. 모든 인간의 머리/목의 크기가 달라서 어떤 인간은 스웨터에 머리가 끼기도 했습니다. 그래서 쉽게 탈출이 가능한 의상이 개발되었습니다.

zh-Hans.title: 易穿脱开衫
zh-Hans.description: 与怪兽的身体不同，人类的身体在胸部以上突然变细，然后再膨胀，形成头部。头部和颈部的大小差异有时会导致人类卡在羊毛套衫中。因此，他们设计了这些可轻松穿脱的款式。

zh-Hant.title: 易脫針織衫
zh-Hant.description: 有別於怪獸的身軀，人類胸膛以上的身軀突然變成細狀，然後又變成球狀，形成頭部。頭部和頸部大小的差異有時候會使人類無法掙脫羊毛衫。因此，他們設計了這種容易脫掉的款式。

ru.title: ЛЕГКО СНИМАЕМЫЙ ДЖЕМПЕР
ru.description: В отличие от тел монстров, человеческие тела резко сужаются чуть выше грудной клетки, а потом снова увеличиваются, образуя голову. Иногда разница в размерах шеи и головы приводила к тому, что люди застревали в шерстяных джемперах. По этой причине они разработали эту легко снимаемую версию.

pt-BR.title: BLUSA-DE-FÁCIL-ACESSO
pt-BR.description: Diferentemente dos corpos dos monstros, os corpos humanos se afinavam de forma repentina logo acima do tórax e se expandiam novamente para formar a cabeça. A diferença de espessura entre o pescoço e a cabeça fazia com que eles às vezes ficassem presos na blusa e, por isso, criou-se uma versão de fácil acesso.

nl.title: TRUI MET UITWERPFUNCTIE
nl.description: In tegenstelling tot monsters waren menselijke lichamen smaller boven de schouders en was het hoofd weer wijder. Dat verschil tussen het hoofd en de nek zorgde er soms voor dat mensen vast kwamen te zitten in wollen truien. Daarom hebben ze een versie gemaakt die makkelijk kan worden losgemaakt.

ar.title: ﺳﺘﺮة ﺳﻬﻠﺔ اﻟﻔﺘﺢ
ar.description: ﻋﻠﯽ ﻋﻜﺲ أﺟﺴﺎم اﻟﻮﺣﻮش، ﻳﻨﻜﻤﺶ اﻟﺠﺰء ﻓﻮق اﻟﺼﺪر ﻓﻲ اﻷﺟﺴﺎم اﻟﺒﺸﺮﻳﺔ ﺑﺸﻜﻞ ﻣﻔﺎﺟﺊ، ﺛﻢ ﻳﺘﻤﺪد ﻣﺮة أﺧﺮى ﻋﻨﺪ ﻣﻨﻄﻘﺔ اﻟﺮأس. ﻛﺎﻧﺖ اﺧﺘﻼﻓﺎت ﺣﺠﻢ اﻟﺮأس/ اﻟﺮﻗﺒﺔ ﺗﺘﺴﺒﺐ أﺣﻴﺎﻧﺎ ﻓﻲ اﻧﺤﺸﺎر اﻟﺮأس ﻓﻲ ﻓﺘﺤﺔ اﻟﺴﺘﺮات اﻟﻤﺼﻨﻮﻋﺔ ﻣﻦ اﻟﺼﻮف أﺣﻴﺎﻧﺎ. ﻟﺬا، ﻓﻘﺪ ﺻﻤﻤﻮا ﻫﺬه اﻟﺴﺘﺮات ﺳﻬﻠﺔ اﻟﻔﺘﺢ.

tk.title: KOLAYCA ÇIKARILAN KAZAK
tk.description: Canavarların vücutlarından farklı olarak insan vücutları göğüs kafesinin hemen üstünde aniden inceliyor, sonra da kafayı oluşturmak için tekrar şişiyor. Kafa ve boynun boyutları arasındaki fark yüzünden insanlar bazen yün kazakların içinde sıkışıyor. İşte bu yüzden kolayca çıkarılabilen versiyonlarını icat etmişler.

fr-CA.title: CHANDAIL FACILE-À-ÔTER
fr-CA.description: Contrairement aux corps de monstres, les corps humains s'amincissaient brusquement juste au-dessus du thorax, pour gonfler de nouveau et former la tête. Cette différence de taille tête/cou a parfois amené les humains à se retrouver piégés dans des chandails de laine. Ils ont donc conçu ces versions faciles-à-ôter en réponse au problème.

en-AU.title: EASY-RELEASE JUMPER
en-AU.description: Unlike monster bodies, human bodies tapered abruptly just above the thorax, then ballooned out again to form the head. The head/neck size difference sometimes caused humans to become trapped in woolly jumpers. Hence, they engineered these easy-release versions.

landmarks.title: EASY-RELEASE JUMPER
landmarks.description: Unlike monster bodies, human bodies tapered abruptly just above the thorax, then ballooned out again to form the head. The head/neck size difference sometimes caused humans to become trapped in woolly jumpers. Hence, they engineered these easy-release versions.

landmarks.name: LM_Carousel

en.title: HORSE PRISON
en.description: Condemned to a lifetime of running in circles while a hellish melody plays, we can only assume that these wooden horses must have committed truly horrible crimes against the humans who imprisoned them.

en-GB.title: HORSE PRISON
en-GB.description: Condemned to a lifetime of running in circles while a hellish melody plays, we can only assume that these wooden horses must have committed truly horrible crimes against the humans who imprisoned them.

fr.title: PRISON POUR CHEVAL
fr.description: Condamnés à tourner en rond éternellement au son d'une mélodie infernale, nous ne pouvons que supposer que ces chevaux de bois ont dû commettre des crimes atroces contre les humains qui les ont emprisonnés.

de.title: PFERDEGEFÄNGNIS
de.description: Diese Pferde müssen wahrhaft entsetzliche Verbrechen gegen die Menschen begangen haben, von denen sie eingesperrt wurden, nachdem sie lebenslänglich im Kreis laufen mussten, während höllische Musik ertönte.

es.title: PRISIÓN DE CABALLOS
es.description: Condenados a toda una vida corriendo en círculos mientras suena una infernal melodía, solo podemos suponer que estos caballos de madera deben haber cometido crímenes realmente horribles contra los humanos que los encarcelaron.

it.title: PRIGIONE PER CAVALLI
it.description: Condannati a girare in tondo accompagnati dal suono di una melodia infernale per una vita intera, possiamo solo ipotizzare che questi cavalli di legno avessero commesso dei crimini davvero orribili verso gli umani per essere stati imprigionati così.

ja.title: 馬の牢獄
ja.description: 地獄のような音楽が再生される中、一生グルグルと走り回ることを宣告されたこの木製の馬たちは、ここに自分たちを投獄した人間たちに対してかなり酷い犯罪を犯したのだと思われます。

ko.title: 말 감옥
ko.description: 평생 끔찍한 음악을 들으며 빙글빙글 돌아야 하는 형벌을 받은 이 나무 말들이 과연 인간들에게 어떤 끔찍한 죄를 저질렀는지는 오직 짐작만 할 수 있을 뿐입니다.

zh-Hans.title: 马监狱
zh-Hans.description: 当地狱般的旋律响起时，这些木马注定一辈子只能在原地转圈，我们只能认为，它们一定对囚禁它们的人类犯下了不可饶恕的罪行。

zh-Hant.title: 馬牢
zh-Hant.description: 一群木馬伴隨著毛骨悚然的旋律，注定終生繞著圓圈奔跑，我們只能猜測，這些木馬肯定對囚禁它們的人類犯下嚴重罪行。

ru.title: ЛОШАДИНАЯ ТЮРЬМА
ru.description: Мы можем только предположить, насколько ужасные преступления против лишивших их свободы людей совершили эти деревянные лошади, приговоренные всю оставшуюся жизнь бегать по кругу под противную мелодию.

pt-BR.title: PRISÃO DE CAVALOS
pt-BR.description: Condenados à uma corrida perpétua em círculo ao som de uma música infernal, presume-se que estes cavalos de madeira tenham cometido os crimes mais hediondos contra a humanidade que os encarcerou.

nl.title: PAARDENGEVANGENIS
nl.description: Veroordeeld tot een leven lang rennen in cirkels terwijl er een helse melodie speelde, kunnen we slechts veronderstellen dat deze houten paarden werkelijk verschrikkelijke misdaden hebben begaan tegen de mensen die hen gevangen hebben genomen.

ar.title: ﺳﺠﻦ اﻟﺤﺼﺎن
ar.description: ﺑﺎﻟﻨﻈﺮ إﻟﯽ اﻟﺤﻜﻢ اﻟﻤﻨﻔﺬ ﻋﻠﯽ ﻫﺬه اﻷﺣﺼﻨﺔ اﻟﺨﺸﺒﻴﺔ اﻟﺘﻲ ﻛﺎﻧﺖ ﺗﺴﻴﺮ ﻓﻲ ﺣﻠﻘﺎت ﻃﻮال اﻟﻮﻗﺖ وﺗﺼﺪر ﻣﻮﺳﻴﻘﯽ وﺣﺸﻴﺔ، ﻻ ﻳﺴﻌﻨﺎ ﺳﻮى اﻓﺘﺮاض أﻧﻬﺎ ﻗﺪ ارﺗﻜﺒﺖ ﺟﺮاﺋﻢ ﺑﺸﻌﺔ ﻓﻲ ﺣﻖ اﻟﺒﺸﺮ اﻟﺬﻳﻦ ﺳﺠﻨﻮﻫﺎ.

tk.title: AT HAPİSHANESİ
tk.description: Korkunç bir müzik eşliğinde hayatları boyunca daire çizerek koşmaya mahkum edilen bu ahşap atların, onları cezalandıran insanlara karşı gerçekten korkunç suçlar işlediklerini tahmin ediyoruz.

fr-CA.title: PRISON POUR CHEVAL
fr-CA.description: Condamnés à tourner en rond éternellement au son d'une mélodie infernale, nous ne pouvons que supposer que ces chevaux de bois ont dû commettre des crimes atroces contre les humains qui les ont emprisonnés.

en-AU.title: HORSE PRISON
en-AU.description: Condemned to a lifetime of running in circles while a hellish melody plays, we can only assume that these wooden horses must have committed truly horrible crimes against the humans who imprisoned them.

landmarks.title: HORSE PRISON
landmarks.description: Condemned to a lifetime of running in circles while a hellish melody plays, we can only assume that these wooden horses must have committed truly horrible crimes against the humans who imprisoned them.

landmarks.name: LM_CatJetpack

en.title: CAT JETPACK
en.description: At some point in the 2100s, a human amateur scientist invented a feline jetpack to offer a greater range of movement to their pet cats. The cats immediately used it to ascend fifteen feet and scratch at the upstairs windows instead of those on the ground floor.

en-GB.title: CAT JETPACK
en-GB.description: At some point in the 2100s, a human amateur scientist invented a feline jetpack to offer a greater range of movement to their pet cats. The cats immediately used it to ascend fifteen feet and scratch at the upstairs windows instead of those on the ground floor.

fr.title: RÉACTEUR POUR CHAT
fr.description: Dans les années 2100, un scientifique amateur humain a inventé un réacteur pour félin visant à offrir une plus grande liberté de mouvement à ses chats de compagnie. Ceux-ci se sont empressés de l'utiliser pour s'élever à cinq mètres et gratter aux fenêtres de l'étage plutôt qu'à celles du rez-de-chaussée.

de.title: KATZEN-JETPACK
de.description: Irgendwann in den 2100er Jahren entwickelte ein menschlicher Hobbywissenschaftler ein Katzen-Jetpack, um seinen Haustieren eine größere Beweglichkeit zu ermöglichen. Die Katzen nutzten diese, um sofort fünf Meter in die Luft zu steigen und an den Fenstern im Obergeschoss zu kratzen, anstatt an denen im Erdgeschoss.

es.title: PROPULSOR PARA GATOS
es.description: En algún momento del siglo XXII, un científico humano amateur inventó un propulsor felino para ofrecer a sus gatos mascota una libertad de movimientos mucho mayor. Los gatos lo usaron de inmediato para ascender unos cuatro metros y medio y arañar las ventanas del piso de arriba en lugar de las de la planta baja.

it.title: JETPACK PER GATTI
it.description: A un certo punto nel 2100, uno scienziato umano dilettante inventò un jetpack felino per offrire ai gatti domestici maggiori possibilità di movimento. I gatti iniziarono immediatamente a salire a quattro metri e mezzo da terra e a graffiare le finestre dei piani superiori invece di quelle del piano terra.

ja.title: 猫のジェットパック
ja.description: 2100年代のどこかで、ペットの猫がさらに広範囲で動けるようにと人間のアマチュア科学者が猫のジェットパックを開発しました。猫たちはすぐに、このジェットパックを使って地上階ではなく15フィート上にある二階の窓を引っ掻き始めたのです。

ko.title: 고양이 제트팩
ko.description: 2100년경, 인간 아마추어 과학자가 자신의 반려 고양이가 더 자유롭게 이동할 수 있도록 고양이용 제트팩을 개발했습니다. 고양이는 즉시 아래가 아닌 5미터 위로 날아 올라가 위층 창문을 긁었다고 합니다.

zh-Hans.title: 猫咪喷气背包
zh-Hans.description: 在 22 世纪的某个时候，一位人类业余科学家发明了一种猫科动物喷气背包，这让他们的宠物猫有了更大的移动范围。猫咪们很快用它蹦到 15 英尺高的地方，抓楼上的窗户，而不是一楼。

zh-Hant.title: 貓用噴射背包
zh-Hant.description: 在 2100 年某個時間點，一名人類業餘科學家發明了一款貓用噴射背包，好讓他們的寵物貓能有更廣闊的移動範圍。貓咪立刻用它飛升到十五英尺高的地方，抓房屋上層的窗戶，而非底層的。

ru.title: РЕАКТИВНЫЙ РАНЕЦ ДЛЯ КОШЕК
ru.description: В какой-то момент в 2100-х годах ученый-любитель изобрел реактивный ранец для кошек, чтобы увеличить им диапазон передвижений. Кошки сразу же стали его использовать, чтобы взмывать вверх на 4,5 метра и скрестись в окна верхних этажей вместо первого.

pt-BR.title: JATO FELINO
pt-BR.description: Em meados de 2100, um cientista amador humano inventou um jato felino para aumentar o alcance de movimento de seus gatos domésticos, que passou a ser usado pelos animais como método de propulsão para que eles pudessem bater nas janelas do segundo andar, pedindo para abrir, em vez das janelas do primeiro.

nl.title: JETPACK VOOR KATTEN
nl.description: In de jaren 2100 vond een menselijke amateurwetenschapper een jetpack voor katten uit, zodat ze hun huisdier meer beweging konden geven. De katten vlogen meteen vijf meter omhoog en krabden aan de ramen bovenaan in plaats van die beneden.

ar.title: ﺳﺘﺮة ﻃﺎﺋﺮة ﻟﻠﻘﻄﻂ
ar.description: ﻓﻲ وﻗﺖ ﻣﺎ ﻓﻲ ﻣﻄﻠﻊ 0012، اﺧﺘﺮع ﻋﺎﻟﻢ ﻫﺎو ﻣﻦ اﻟﺒﺸﺮ ﺳﺘﺮة ﻃﺎﺋﺮة ﻟﻠﻘﻄﻂ اﻷﻟﻴﻔﺔ ﺗﺘﻴﺢ ﻟﻬﺎ اﻟﺤﺮﻛﺔ ﻋﻠﯽ ﻣﺪى أوﺳﻊ. وﺳﺮﻋﺎن ﻣﺎ اﺳﺘﺨﺪﻣﺘﻬﺎ اﻟﻘﻄﻂ ﻟﻠﺼﻌﻮد ﺧﻤﺲ ﻋﺸﺮة ﻗﺪﻣﺎ وﺧﺪش ﻧﻮاﻓﺬ اﻟﻄﻮاﺑﻖ اﻟﻌﻠﻮﻳﺔ ﺑﺪﻻ ﻣﻦ ﺧﺪش ﻧﻮاﻓﺬ اﻟﻄﻮاﺑﻖ اﻷرﺿﻴﺔ.

tk.title: KEDİ SIRT ROKETİ
tk.description: 2100'lerde amatör bir insan bilim insanı, evcil kedileri için daha büyük bir hareket menzili sunan bir kedi sırt roketi icat etti. Kediler bu sırt roketini kullanarak dört metre kadar yükseldi ve zemin kattaki pencereler yerine üst katın pencerelerini tırmaladı.

fr-CA.title: PROPULSEUR POUR CHAT
fr-CA.description: Dans les années 2100, un scientifique amateur humain a inventé un propulseur pour félin pour offrir une plus grande liberté de mouvement à ses chats de compagnie. Ceux-ci se sont empressés de l'utiliser pour prendre cinq mètres d'altitude et gratter aux fenêtres de l'étage plutôt qu'à celles du rez-de-chaussée.

en-AU.title: CAT JETPACK
en-AU.description: At some point in the 2100s, a human amateur scientist invented a feline jetpack to offer a greater range of movement to their pet cats. The cats immediately used it to ascend fifteen feet and scratch at the upstairs windows instead of those on the ground floor.

landmarks.title: CAT JETPACK
landmarks.description: At some point in the 2100s, a human amateur scientist invented a feline jetpack to offer a greater range of movement to their pet cats. The cats immediately used it to ascend fifteen feet and scratch at the upstairs windows instead of those on the ground floor.

landmarks.name: LM_Cereal

en.title: BARON BONBON'S SUGAR FLAKES
en.description: Baron Bonbon's was a short-lived breakfast cereal. Its popularity was attributed to a combination of superdense sugar and 57 different highly unstable (and very experimental) food colorings. After a particularly bloody intervention by a consumer watchdog, it was given a new recipe and rebranded as Fibre Flakes For Sensible Children.

en-GB.title: BARON BONBON'S SUGAR FLAKES
en-GB.description: Baron Bonbon's was a short-lived breakfast cereal. Its popularity was attributed to a combination of superdense sugar and 57 different highly unstable (and very experimental) food colourings. After a particularly bloody intervention by a consumer watchdog, it was given a new recipe and rebranded as Fibre Flakes For Sensible Children.

fr.title: SUCRE EN PÉTALES DU BARON BONBON
fr.description: « Baron Bonbon » qualifiait(désignait) des céréales de petit déjeuner pendant une courte période. Sa popularité a été attribuée à une combinaison de sucre très dense et de 57 colorants alimentaires très instables (et très expérimentaux). Après une intervention particulièrement musclée d'un consommateur éveillé, la recette a été remaniée et rebaptisée « Fibres en pétales pour enfants raisonnables ».

de.title: BARON BONBONS ZUCKERFLOCKEN
de.description: Baron Bonbon war eine recht kurzlebige Marke von Frühstücksflocken. Ihre Beliebtheit war auf eine Kombination aus superdichtem Zucker und 57 verschiedenen höchst instabilen (und experimentellen) Lebensmittelfarben zurückzuführen. Nach einer besonders blutigen Intervention durch einen Verbraucherschutz-Wachhund wurde die Rezeptur geändert und in „Ballaststoffflocken für vernünftige Kinder“ umbenannt.

es.title: COPOS AZUCARADOS BARÓN BONBON
es.description: Barón Bonbon fue un cereal de desayuno efímero. Su popularidad se atribuyó a una combinación de azúcar superdenso y 57 colorantes alimenticios altamente inestables diferentes (y muy experimentales). Tras una intervención particularmente cruenta por parte de una asociación de consumidores, se cambió la receta y se le puso un nuevo nombre: Copos de Fibra para Niños Sensatos.

it.title: CEREALI BARONE BONBON
it.description: I Barone Bonbon erano dei cereali per la colazione che hanno avuto vita breve. La loro popolarità era dovuta a una combinazione di zucchero incredibilmente denso e di 57 coloranti diversi per cibo molto instabili (e molto sperimentali). Dopo un intervento particolarmente sanguinario messo in atto da parte di un'associazione di consumatori, fu creata una nuova ricetta e furono rinominati come Fiocchi di fibre per bambini sensibili.

ja.title: バロン・ボンボンのシュガーフレーク
ja.description: バロン・ボンボンは、非常に短命な朝ごはん用のシリアルでした。その人気は、超高密度の砂糖と57種類の非常に不安定な（そして非常に実験的な）食品着色料の組み合わせがもたらしたものでした。消費者監視機関による特段に血なまぐさい介入の後、このシリアルには新しいレシピが与えられ、分別のある子供のための繊維フレークとしてブランドを変えることになりました。

ko.title: 배런 봉봉의 슈가 플레이크
ko.description: 배런 봉봉은 잠깐 출시되어 팔린 아침식사용 시리얼입니다. 엄청난 양의 설탕과 57종의 매우 불안정하고 실험적인 식용 색소로 구성되어 있습니다. 소비자 감시 단체의 특별히 치열한 항의로 새로운 레시피가 도입되었고, 이후 '똑똑한 어린이를 위한 식이섬유 시리얼'로 이름이 바뀌었습니다.

zh-Hans.title: 邦邦男爵麦片
zh-Hans.description: 邦邦男爵是一种很快就消失了的早餐麦片。它之所以如此受欢迎，是因为它混合了超高密度的糖和 57 种非常不稳定（同时也极具实验性）的食用色素。在消费者保护组织强力干预之后，它采用了一种新的配方，并改名为“儿童益智纤维片”。

zh-Hant.title: 蹦蹦大亨的甜麥片
zh-Hant.description: 蹦蹦大亨是一款推出時間短暫的早餐麥片。它因為結合超濃縮糖精和 57 種不同的高度不穩定 (且非常實驗性) 的食用色素而打響名聲。在一名消費者的監督和大力介入下，這款麥片使用新的製作配方，並將品牌重新命名為「聰明孩童專用的高纖維麥片」。

ru.title: СЛАДКИЕ ХЛОПЬЯ «БАРОН БОНБОН»
ru.description: Хлопья «Барон Бонбон» были скоропортящимся сухим завтраком. Его популярность объяснялась сочетанием сверхплотного сахара и 57 различных высоконеустойчивых (и очень экспериментальных) пищевых красителей. После особо беспощадного вмешательства организации по защите прав потребителей, им обновили рецепт и поменяли название на «Волокнистые хлопья для сообразительных детей».

pt-BR.title: FLOCOS AÇUCARADOS DO BARÃO BOMBOM
pt-BR.description: Os cereais do Barão Bombom não durarão muito tempo: sua popularidade foi atribuída a combinação de açúcar adensado com 57 tipos de colorantes instáveis (e um tanto experimentais). Depois de uma intervenção particularmente sangrenta por parte de um fiscal, os cereais mudaram a receita e renovaram a marca para Flocos de Fibras para Crianças Sensíveis.

nl.title: SUIKERCORNFLAKES VAN BARON BONBON
nl.description: De cornflakes van Baron Bonbon waren niet lang op de markt. Dit product was echter populair, waarschijnlijk door de grote hoeveelheid suiker en het gebruik van 57 verschillende (experimentele) kleurstoffen. Maar na een strenge controle door een consumentenorganisatie werd een nieuw recept gebruikt en kregen de cornflakes een nieuwe naam: volkorentarwevlokken voor gehoorzame kinderen.

ar.title: رﻗﺎﺋﻖ ﺳﻜﺮ ﺑﺎرون ﺑﻮﻧﺒﻮن
ar.description: ﻛﺎﻧﺖ ﺑﺎرون ﺑﻮﻧﺒﻮن ﺣﺒﻮب إﻓﻄﺎر اﺳﺘﻤﺮت ﻓﺘﺮة ﻗﺼﻴﺮة. وﺳﺒﺐ ﺷﻌﺒﻴﺘﻬﺎ ﻫﻮ ﺗﺮﻛﻴﺒﺘﻬﺎ اﻟﺘﻲ ﺟﻤﻌﺖ ﺑﻴﻦ ﺳﻜﺮ ﻋﺎﻟﻲ اﻟﻜﺜﺎﻓﺔ و75 ﻟﻮﻧﺎ ﻏﺬاﺋﻴﺎ ﻣﺨﺘﻠﻔﺎ ﻏﻴﺮ ﻣﺴﺘﻘﺮ ﺑﺪرﺟﺔ ﻋﺎﻟﻴﺔ )وﺗﺠﺮﻳﺒﻲ ﻟﻠﻐﺎﻳﺔ(. وﺑﻌﺪ ﺗﺪﺧﻞ دﻣﻮي ﻣﻦ إﺣﺪى ﻫﻴﺌﺎت ﻣﺮاﻗﺒﺔ اﻟﻤﺴﺘﻬﻠﻚ، ﺗﻢ إﻋﻄﺎء اﻟﺸﺮﻛﺔ اﻟﻤﺼﻨﻌﺔ وﺻﻔﺔ ﺟﺪﻳﺪة وﺗﻢ ﺗﻐﻴﻴﺮ ﻋﻼﻣﺘﻬﺎ اﻟﺘﺠﺎرﻳﺔ إﻟﯽ ﻓﺎﻳﺒﺮ ﻓﻼﻛﺲ ﻓﻮر ﺳﻴﻨﺴﻴﺒﻞ ﺗﺸﻠﻴﺪرﻳﻦ "رﻗﺎﺋﻖ ﻏﻨﻴﺔ ﺑﺎﻷﻟﻴﺎف ﻟﻸﻃﻔﺎل اﻟﺮاﺷﺪﻳﻦ" .

tk.title: BARON BONBON ŞEKER GEVREĞİ
tk.description: Baron Bonbon bir kahvaltılık gevrek markasıydı. Popülerliğini aşırı yoğun şeker ile son derece kararsız (ve henüz deney aşamasındaki) 57 farklı gıda boyasının birleşimine borçlu olduğu düşünülüyor. Tüketici haklarını savunan bir örgütün kanlı müdahalesinden sonra tarifi değiştirilerek Uslu Çocuklar için Lifli Gevrek adıyla raflarda tekrar yerini aldı.

fr-CA.title: FLOCONS SUCRÉS DU BARON BONBON
fr-CA.description: « Baron Bonbon » est une marque de céréales à déjeuner qui a eu une courte vie. Sa popularité a été attribuée à une combinaison de sucre très dense et de 57 colorants alimentaires très instables (et très expérimentaux). Après l'intervention sanglante d'un organisme de protection du consommateur, la recette a été revue et la marque rebaptisée « Flocons de fibres pour enfants raisonnables ».

en-AU.title: BARON BONBON'S SUGAR FLAKES
en-AU.description: Baron Bonbon's was a short-lived breakfast cereal. Its popularity was attributed to a combination of superdense sugar and 57 different highly unstable (and very experimental) food colourings. After a particularly bloody intervention by a consumer watchdog, it was given a new recipe and rebranded as Fibre Flakes For Sensible Children.

landmarks.title: BARON BONBON'S SUGAR FLAKES
landmarks.description: Baron Bonbon's was a short-lived breakfast cereal. Its popularity was attributed to a combination of superdense sugar and 57 different highly unstable (and very experimental) food colorings. After a particularly bloody intervention by a consumer watchdog, it was given a new recipe and rebranded as Fibre Flakes For Sensible Children.

landmarks.name: LM_CertificateOfExcellence

en.title: CERTIFICATE OF EXCELLENCE
en.description: Okay, this isn't a human object BUT we won a Monster Travel Award for the museum! Look! There's a trophy too, except we sort of knocked it over and now there's a bit missing so it's in the mending cupboard at Head Office. But the certificate is GREAT!

en-GB.title: CERTIFICATE OF EXCELLENCE
en-GB.description: Okay, this isn't a human object BUT we won a Monster Travel Award for the museum! Look! There's a trophy too, except we sort of knocked it over and now there's a bit missing so it's in the mending cupboard at Head Office. But the certificate is GREAT!

fr.title: CERTIFICAT D'EXCELLENCE
fr.description: Certes, il ne s'agit pas là d'une exposition humaine MAIS nous avons gagné un prix de voyage monstre pour le musée ! Regardez ! Il y a même un trophée, mais comme nous l'avons fait tomber, il en manque un morceau. Il se trouve dans le placard des réparations du siège social. Mais le certificat reste SUPERBE !

de.title: QUALITÄTSAUSZEICHNUNG
de.description: Na gut, das ist kein menschliches Ausstellungsstück, ABER wir haben eine Monster-Reiseauszeichnung für das Museum gewonnen! Es gibt auch eine Trophäe, aber wir haben sie runtergeworfen und jetzt fehlt ein Stück, also ist sie momentan im Reparaturschrank im Hauptbüro. Aber das Zertifikat ist GROSSARTIG!

es.title: CERTIFICADO DE EXCELENCIA
es.description: Vale, esta no es una exposición humana, ¡pero ganamos un PREMIO DE VIAJE MONSTRUOSO para el museo! ¡Mira! También hay un trofeo, pero lo tiramos al suelo sin querer y ahora falta un trozo, de manera que está en el armario de reparación de la oficina central. ¡No obstante, el certificado está GENIAL!

it.title: CERTIFICATO D'ECCELLENZA
it.description: Okay, questo non è un reperto umano MA abbiamo vinto un Monster Travel Award per il museo! Guardate! C'è anche un trofeo, se non fosse che l'abbiamo rotto e gli manca un pezzo, quindi è in riparazione in amministrazione. Ma il certificato è FANTASTICO!

ja.title: 優秀証明書
ja.description: 分かってます、これは人間の展示品ではありませんが、私たちがこの博物館でモンスタートラベル賞を受賞したんです！見てください！トロフィーだってあるんです、でもそのトロフィーを倒してしまったのでちょっと欠けてしまっているんです。だからメインオフィスの修理棚に入れてあります。でもこの証明書は最高ですよね！

ko.title: 최고 여행지 인증서
ko.description: 이것은 인간들의 물건은 아니지만, 몬스터 여행 어워드에서 우리 박물관에 보낸 인증서입니다! 보세요! 트로피도 있었지만 우리가 넘어뜨리는 바람에 좀 부서져서, 지금 감독관 사무실에서 수리 중입니다. 그래도 인증서만 봐도 충분히 멋지지 않나요!

zh-Hans.title: 优秀证书
zh-Hans.description: 好吧，这不是人类展览，但我们为博物馆赢得了怪兽旅行奖！看！还有一个奖杯，只是我们不小心把它打翻了，现在缺失了一小块，所以它在总部的修补橱柜里。但是这个证书很棒！

zh-Hant.title: 優秀證書
zh-Hant.description: 好，這個不是人類的展品，但是我們為博物館贏得一個怪獸旅行獎！快看！還有一個獎盃，只是我們撞壞了獎盃，現在缺了一些部位，所以放到總部辦公室的修復櫃中。但是這個證書很棒！

ru.title: СЕРТИФИКАТ КАЧЕСТВА
ru.description: Ладно, это не человеческий экспонат, НО наш музей выиграл премию Monster Travel Award! Посмотрите! Еще был трофей, но его уронили, и кусочек от него откололся, поэтому он спрятан в шкафу в главном офисе. Зато сертификат просто ОТЛИЧНЫЙ!

pt-BR.title: CERTIFICADO DE EXCELÊNCIA
pt-BR.description: Tudo bem que isso não faz parte da exposição humana, mas olhe só! Nós fomos condecorados pela Premiação Turística dos Monstros! Também ganhamos um troféu, mas alguém deixou cair e a diretoria está arrumando. Mas o certificado é EXCELENTE!

nl.title: CERTIFICAAT VAN UITMUNTENDHEID
nl.description: Oké, dit is geen mensententoonstelling, maar we hebben wel een Monsterreisaward gewonnen voor het museum! Kijk! Er is ook een trofee, maar die hebben we zo'n beetje omver gegooid en nu ontbreekt er een stuk, dus die ligt in de herstelkast op het hoofdkantoor. Maar het certificaat is GEWELDIG!

ar.title: ﺷﻬﺎدة اﻣﺘﻴﺎز
ar.description: ﺣﺴﻨﺎ ﻫﺬه ﻟﻴﺴﺖ أﺣﺪ اﻟﻤﻌﺮوﺿﺎت اﻟﺨﺎﺻﺔ ﺑﺎﻟﺒﺸﺮ وﻟﻜﻨﻨﺎ ﻗﺪ رﺑﺤﻨﺎ ﻣﻜﺎﻓﺄة ﺗﻤﻨﺢ ﻟﻠﻮﺣﻮش ﻣﻦ أﺟﻞ اﻟﺴﻔﺮ وزﻳﺎرة اﻟﻤﺘﺤﻒ! اﻧﻈﺮوا! ﻫﻨﺎك ﻛﺄس أﻳﻀﺎ، ﻳﺒﺪو أﻧﻨﺎ ﻗﻤﻨﺎ ﺑﺈﺳﻘﺎﻃﻬﺎ واﻵن ﻫﻨﺎك ﺟﺰء ﻣﻨﻬﺎ ﻣﻔﻘﻮد ﻓﻲ دوﻻب اﻹﺻﻼح ﻓﻲ اﻟﻤﻜﺘﺐ اﻟﺮﺋﻴﺴﻲ. وﻟﻜﻦ اﻟﺸﻬﺎدة راﺋﻌﺔ!

tk.title: MÜKEMMELLİYET SERTİFİKASI
tk.description: Pekala, bu bir insan sergisi değil AMA biz bir Canavar Seyahat Ödülü kazandık! Bakın! Bir kupa da var, gerçi biz kupayı devirip kırdık ve eksik bir parçası eksik olduğu için Genel Merkezdeki tamir dolabında duruyor. Ama sertifika MÜTHİŞ!

fr-CA.title: CERTIFICAT D'EXCELLENCE
fr-CA.description: Certes, il ne s'agit pas d'une pièce humaine, MAIS nous avons gagné un Prix de voyage monstre pour le musée! Regardez! Il y a aussi un trophée, sauf que nous l'avons fait tomber, alors il en manque un morceau. Il est dans le placard des pièces à réparer au siège social. Mais le certificat est SUPERBE!

en-AU.title: CERTIFICATE OF EXCELLENCE
en-AU.description: Okay, this isn't a human object BUT we won a Monster Travel Award for the museum! Look! There's a trophy too, except we sort of knocked it over and now there's a bit missing so it's in the mending cupboard at Head Office. But the certificate is GREAT!

landmarks.title: CERTIFICATE OF EXCELLENCE
landmarks.description: Okay, this isn't a human object BUT we won a Monster Travel Award for the museum! Look! There's a trophy too, except we sort of knocked it over and now there's a bit missing so it's in the mending cupboard at Head Office. But the certificate is GREAT!

landmarks.name: LM_ChildsDrawing

en.title: DIAGRAM OF HUMAN BEHAVIOUR
en.description: This diagram is labelled "Daddy eating breakfast". Expert monsters are still investigating the accuracy of this image. If it is verified, we will have to radically rethink what we know about human anatomy, gravity, and breakfast.

en-GB.title: DIAGRAM OF HUMAN BEHAVIOUR
en-GB.description: This diagram is labelled "Daddy eating breakfast". Expert monsters are still investigating the accuracy of this image. If it is verified, we will have to radically rethink what we know about human anatomy, gravity, and breakfast.

fr.title: DIAGRAMME DU COMPORTEMENT HUMAIN
fr.description: Ce diagramme est intitulé « Papa qui prend son petit déjeuner ». Les experts monstres étudient toujours l'authenticité de cette image. Si elle est vérifiée, nous devrons tout revoir de nos acquis sur l'anatomie humaine, la gravité et le petit déjeuner.

de.title: DIAGRAMM MENSCHLICHEN VERHALTENS
de.description: Dieses Diagramm trägt die Aufschrift „Daddy beim Frühstück“. Monsterexperten untersuchen immer noch die Genauigkeit des Bildes. Falls es sich als richtig erweisen sollte, müssen wir unser Wissen über menschliche Anatomie, Schwerkraft und Frühstücke radikal überdenken.

es.title: DIAGRAMA DE COMPORTAMIENTO HUMANO
es.description: Este diagrama se titula "Papi desayunando". Los monstruos expertos continúan investigando la precisión de esta imagen. Si se verifica su autenticidad, hará falta una revisión radical de todo lo que sabemos sobre anatomía, gravedad y desayunos humanos.

it.title: GRAFICO DI COMPORTAMENTO UMANO
it.description: Questo grafico è intitolato "Papà mangia la colazione". Gli esperti mostri stanno ancora interrogandosi sull'accuratezza dell'immagine. Se è effettivamente corretta, dovremo rivalutare completamente quel che sappiamo sull'anatomia, sulla forza di gravità e sulla colazione umana.

ja.title: 人間行動パターンの図
ja.description: この図には、「パパが朝ごはんを食べてるところ」というラベルが付けられています。モンスター専門家は現在も、この画像の正確性についての調査をしています。これが立証されれば、人間の解剖学、重力、朝食について私たちが知っていることを根本的に再考する必要がでてくるでしょう。

ko.title: 인간 행동 도표
ko.description: 이 도표에는 '아침을 먹는 아빠'라고 적혀 있습니다. 전문 몬스터들은 아직 이 이미지의 진위성을 따지고 있습니다. 만일 이것이 진짜라면 몬스터들이 지금까지 믿어왔던 인간의 신체 구조, 중력, 아침 식사에 대한 지식도 크게 바뀔 것입니다.

zh-Hans.title: 人类行为图
zh-Hans.description: 此图标有“吃早餐的爸爸”。专家怪兽仍在研究这幅图的确切含义。如果得到证实，我们将不得不彻底重新思考我们对人类解剖学、重力和早餐的理解。

zh-Hant.title: 人類行為圖表
zh-Hant.description: 這張圖表標示著「吃早餐的爸爸」。怪獸專家們還在調查這張圖像的準確性。如果圖像屬實，我們就必須徹底重新思考我們對人類構造、重力和早餐的了解。

ru.title: СХЕМА ПОВЕДЕНИЯ ЧЕЛОВЕКА
ru.description: Эта схема называется «Папочка ест завтрак». Эксперты монстров всё еще выясняют точность этого изображения. Если она подтвердится, мы должны будем в корне переосмыслить всё, что знаем про анатомию человека, гравитацию и завтрак.

pt-BR.title: DIAGRAMA DO COMPORTAMENTO HUMANO
pt-BR.description: Este diagrama é denominado “papai tomando café da manhã”. Monstros especialistas ainda investigam a precisão da representação. Caso seja confirmada, será necessário reestruturar todo o pensamento em relação à anatomia humana, à gravidade e ao café da manhã.

nl.title: DIAGRAM VAN MENSELIJK GEDRAG
nl.description: De titel van dit diagram is 'Papa eet ontbijt'. Monsterexperts onderzoeken nog steeds de nauwkeurigheid van deze afbeelding. Als we eenmaal zeker weten dat de afbeelding authentiek is, moeten we onze kijk op menselijke anatomie, zwaartekracht en ontbijt helemaal veranderen.

ar.title: رﺳﻢ إﻳﻀﺎﺣﻲ ﻟﻠﺴﻠﻮﻛﻴﺎت اﻟﺒﺸﺮﻳﺔ
ar.description: ﻳﺤﻤﻞ ﻫﺬا اﻟﺮﺳﻢ اﻹﻳﻀﺎﺣﻲ ﻣﻠﺼﻘﺎ ﻣﻜﺘﻮﺑﺎ ﻓﻴﻪ "أﺑﻲ ﻳﺘﻨﺎول وﺟﺒﺔ اﻹﻓﻄﺎر". ﻣﺎ زال ﺧﺒﺮاء اﻟﻮﺣﻮش ﻳﺒﺤﺜﻮن ﻋﻦ ﻣﺪى دﻗﺔ ﻫﺬه اﻟﺼﻮرة. إذا ﺗﻢ اﻟﺘﺤﻘﻖ ﻣﻦ دﻗﺘﻬﺎ، ﻓﺴﺘﺘﻌﻴﻦ ﻋﻠﻴﻨﺎ إﻋﺎدة اﻟﻨﻈﺮ ﺑﺸﻜﻞ ﺟﺬري ﻓﻴﻤﺎ ﻧﻌﺮﻓﻪ ﻋﻦ ﺗﺸﺮﻳﺢ اﻟﺒﺸﺮ واﻟﺠﺎذﺑﻴﺔ ووﺟﺒﺔ اﻹﻓﻄﺎر.

tk.title: İNSAN DAVRANIŞI ŞEMASI
tk.description: Bu şemaya "Babam kahvaltı yaparken" adı verilmiş. Uzman canavarların bu görüntünün gerçeği yansıtıp yansıtmadığına ilişkin araştırmaları devam ediyor. Araştırmalar olumlu sonuçlanırsa insan anatomisine, yer çekimine ve kahvaltıya dair tüm bildiklerimizi gözden geçirmemiz gerekecek.

fr-CA.title: DIAGRAMME DU COMPORTEMENT HUMAIN
fr-CA.description: Ce diagramme est intitulé « Papa qui déjeune ». Les experts monstres étudient toujours l'authenticité de cette image. Si elle est confirmée, nous devrons tout revoir de nos acquis sur l'anatomie humaine, la gravité et le déjeuner.

en-AU.title: DIAGRAM OF HUMAN BEHAVIOUR
en-AU.description: This diagram is labelled "Daddy eating breakfast". Expert monsters are still investigating the accuracy of this image. If it is verified, we will have to radically rethink what we know about human anatomy, gravity, and breakfast.

landmarks.title: DIAGRAM OF HUMAN BEHAVIOUR
landmarks.description: This diagram is labelled "Daddy eating breakfast". Expert monsters are still investigating the accuracy of this image. If it is verified, we will have to radically rethink what we know about human anatomy, gravity, and breakfast.

landmarks.name: LM_ChocolateCoins

en.title: CHOCOLATE COINS
en.description: This was a form of human currency aimed primarily at children. It was never truly functional on account of being a) melty, b) edible, c) subject to highly localized exchange rate fluctuations, and d) vulnerable to massive inflation during midwinter festivals.

en-GB.title: CHOCOLATE COINS
en-GB.description: This was a form of human currency aimed primarily at children. It was never truly functional on account of being a) melty, b) edible, c) subject to highly localised exchange rate fluctuations, and d) vulnerable to massive inflation during midwinter festivals.

fr.title: PIÈCES EN CHOCOLAT
fr.description: Il s'agissait là d'une forme de monnaie humaine destinée principalement aux enfants. Elle n'a cependant jamais vraiment fonctionné car elle était : a) fondante, b) comestible, c) soumise à des fluctuations de taux de change très localisées et d) sujette à une inflation massive pendant les festivals d'hiver.

de.title: SCHOKOLADENMÜNZEN
de.description: Dies war eine Form der menschlichen Währung, die sich in erster Linie an Kinder richtete. Sie war allerdings nie wirklich funktionsfähig, da sie a) schmolz, b) essbar war, c) stark örtlich begrenzten Wechselkursschwankungen unterlag und d) anfällig für gewaltige Inflationen während Festivitäten zur Wintersonnwende war.

es.title: MONEDAS DE CHOCOLATE
es.description: Este era un tipo de efectivo humano dirigido sobre todo a los niños. Nunca fue realmente funcional, puesto que a) se derretía, b) era comestible, c) era dado a causar fluctuaciones cambiarias altamente localizadas y d) era vulnerable a una inflación masiva durante las fiestas invernales.

it.title: MONETE DI CIOCCOLATA
it.description: Questa era una forma di valuta principalmente rivolta ai bambini. Non è mai stata davvero funzionale visto che a) si scioglieva, b) si poteva mangiare, c) era soggetta a fluttuazioni nel tasso di cambio molto alte e d) era vulnerabile a enormi inflazioni durante le celebrazioni del solstizio d'inverno.

ja.title: チョコレートのコイン
ja.description: これは元々子供向けに作られた人間の貨幣の一種でした。このコインは、a) 溶けてしまう、b) 食べることができる、c) 極めて局地的な為替レート変動の影響を受けてしまう、そして d) 真冬のお祭り中の大規模なインフレに対して脆弱であるという理由から、実際に貨幣としての働きを果たしたことはありませんでした。

ko.title: 초콜릿 동전
ko.description: 아이들을 타겟으로 제작된 인간들의 화폐 중 하나입니다. 그러나 a) 녹고, b) 먹을 수 있고, c) 지역 환율 변동의 영향을 크게 받으며, d) 한겨울에 특히 대량 생산된다는 점으로 인해 실제로 사용되지는 않았습니다.

zh-Hans.title: 巧克力硬币
zh-Hans.description: 这是一种主要针对儿童的人类货币形式。它从来没有真正发挥过作用，这是因为它：1) 易融化，2) 很容易被吃掉，3) 受高度本地化的汇率波动影响，而且；4) 在冬至节日期间容易受到大规模通货膨胀的影响。

zh-Hant.title: 巧克力金幣
zh-Hant.description: 這是一種人類貨幣，主要是孩童在使用。這種貨幣沒有實際功用，有以下幾個原因：1) 容易融化、2) 可食用、3) 受到局部匯率波動影響，以及 4) 在冬至節慶時容易受到大規模通貨膨脹的影響。

ru.title: ШОКОЛАДНЫЕ МОНЕТЫ
ru.description: Эта форма человеческой валюты была предназначена прежде всего для детей. Она никогда не была по-настоящему практичной, потому что а) таяла, б) была съедобной, в) подвергалась сильным колебаниям местного обменного курса и г) была уязвима к массовой инфляции в период праздников середины зимы.

pt-BR.title: MOEDAS DE CHOCOLATE
pt-BR.description: Esta moeda humana era trocada principalmente por crianças. Ela nunca se tornou um numerário funcional por a) derreter, b) ser comestível, c) estar à mercê de flutuações de câmbio locais e d) ser vulnerável à inflação considerável perto da Páscoa.

nl.title: CHOCOLADEMUNTEN
nl.description: Deze munten waren een vorm van menselijke valuta, hoofdzakelijk gericht op kinderen. Ze waren nooit werkelijk functioneel omdat ze a) smelterig, b) eetbaar, c) blootgesteld aan zeer lokale koersschommelingen en d) kwetsbaar voor enorme inflatie tijdens midwinterfestivals waren.

ar.title: ﻋﻤﻼت اﻟﺸﻮﻛﻮﻻﺗﺔ
ar.description: ﻛﺎﻧﺖ ﻫﺬه اﻟﻌﻤﻼت ﻧﻮﻋﺎ ﻣﻦ اﻟﻌﻤﻼت اﻟﺒﺸﺮﻳﺔ ﻣﺼﻤﻤﺔ ﺑﺸﻜﻞ أﺳﺎﺳﻲ ﻟﻸﻃﻔﺎل. وﻟﻜﻦ ﻟﻢ ﺗﻜﻦ أﺑﺪا ذات ﻗﻴﻤﺔ ﻓﻌﻠﻴﺔ ﺑﺴﺒﺐ أ( ﻛﻮﻧﻬﺎ ﻋﺮﺿﺔ ﻟﻠﺬوﺑﺎن، ب( وﻗﺎﺑﻠﺔ ﻟﻸﻛﻞ، ج( وﺧﺎﺿﻌﺔ ﻟﻠﺘﻘﻠﺒﺎت اﻟﻤﺤﻠﻴﺔ ﻟﺴﻌﺮ اﻟﺼﺮف، د( وﻋﺮﺿﺔ ﻟﻠﺘﻀﺨﻢ ﺑﺸﻜﻞ ﻛﺒﻴﺮ ﺧﻼل ﻣﻬﺮﺟﺎﻧﺎت ﻣﻨﺘﺼﻒ اﻟﺸﺘﺎء.

tk.title: PARA ÇİKOLATA
tk.description: Bu insan para birimi, ağırlıklı olarak çocukları hedef alan bir para birimiydi. A) Erimiş olduğu, b) yenilebilir olduğu, c) yüksek oranda yerel döviz kuru dalgalanmalarına maruz kaldığı ve d) kış ortası festivalleri sırasında büyük enflasyona karşı savunmasız olduğu için hiçbir zaman gerçekten işlevsel olmamıştır.

fr-CA.title: PIÈCES EN CHOCOLAT
fr-CA.description: Il s'agissait là d'une forme de monnaie humaine destinée principalement aux enfants. Elle n'a cependant jamais vraiment fonctionné car elle était : a) fondante, b) comestible, c) soumise à des fluctuations de taux de change très localisées et d) sujette à une inflation massive pendant les fêtes hivernales.

en-AU.title: CHOCOLATE COINS
en-AU.description: This was a form of human currency aimed primarily at children. It was never truly functional on account of being a) melty, b) edible, c) subject to highly localised exchange rate fluctuations, and d) vulnerable to massive inflation during midwinter festivals.

landmarks.title: CHOCOLATE COINS
landmarks.description: This was a form of human currency aimed primarily at children. It was never truly functional on account of being a) melty, b) edible, c) subject to highly localized exchange rate fluctuations, and d) vulnerable to massive inflation during midwinter festivals.

landmarks.name: LM_ClimbingWall

en.title: HUMAN STORAGE RACK
en.description: The hooked protrusions on this wall suggest it performed a similar function to the familiar human coat rack. But instead of collecting coats, it allowed users to store multiple humans without them getting crumpled or wrinkled.

en-GB.title: HUMAN STORAGE RACK
en-GB.description: The hooked protrusions on this wall suggest it performed a similar function to the familiar human coat rack. But instead of collecting coats, it allowed users to store multiple humans without them getting crumpled or wrinkled.

fr.title: PORTE-HUMAIN
fr.description: Les saillies crochues sur ce mur suggèrent qu'il remplissait une fonction similaire au portemanteau humain connu. Mais au lieu de manteaux, il permettait aux utilisateurs de stocker plusieurs humains sans qu'ils se froissent.

de.title: MENSCHLICHER LAGERSTÄNDER
de.description: Die hakenförmigen Ausbuchtungen dieser Wand legen nahe, dass sie zu einem ähnlichen Zweck genutzt wurde wie der bekannte menschliche Kleiderständer. Aber anstatt Mäntel konnten hier mehrere Menschen aufgehängt werden, ohne dass diese zerknittert oder faltig wurden.

es.title: ESTANTE DE ALMACENAMIENTO DE HUMANOS
es.description: Los salientes ganchudos de este muro sugieren que llevaba a cabo una función similar a la del conocido perchero humano. Pero, en lugar de acaparar abrigos, permitía a los usuarios almacenar múltiples humanos sin que se doblasen ni arrugasen.

it.title: ATTACCAUMANI
it.description: Le sporgenze attaccate a questa parete indicano che svolgessero una funzione simile all'attaccapanni umano. Ma invece di esservi attaccati cappotti, vi erano attaccati svariati umani senza che si stropicciassero.

ja.title: 人間用収納ラック
ja.description: この壁に付いているフック付きの突起は、おなじみの人間のコートラックと同様の機能を果たしていることを示唆しています。ですが、これはコートを収集する代わりに、使用者が複数の人間を潰さず、シワにすることもなく収容することを可能にしたのです。

ko.title: 인간 보관대
ko.description: 벽에서 튀어나온 후크로 미루어 아마 인간 코트 걸이와 비슷한 역할을 한 물건인 것 같습니다. 하지만 이 걸이에는 코트가 아니라 인간을 걸어 주름이 생기는 걸 방지할 수 있었습니다.

zh-Hans.title: 人类存放架
zh-Hans.description: 这面墙上的钩状突出物意味着，它与我们熟悉的人类衣帽架有着相似的功能。但它不是用来挂外套的，而是用来悬挂多个人的，因为这样就不会弄皱或起皱。

zh-Hant.title: 人類吊掛架
zh-Hant.description: 這面牆上的鉤狀突出物，與常見的人類掛衣架的功用相似。但是它不是用來堆積衣物，而是讓使用者吊掛多個人類，使他們不會產生摺痕或皺紋。

ru.title: ВЕШАЛКА ДЛЯ ХРАНЕНИЯ ЛЮДЕЙ
ru.description: Крючковатые выступы на стене означают, что она выполняла ту же роль, что и хорошо известная человеческая вешалка для пальто. Вместо коллекции пальто на ней могло храниться несколько человек, не опасаясь быть помятыми.

pt-BR.title: PORTA-HUMANOS
pt-BR.description: Os ganchos projetados da parede sugerem que eles eram usados para uma função semelhante à do porta casacos, mas com uma diferença: em vez de guardar as vestimentas, permitia ao usuário guardar vários humanos sem dobrá-los ou amassá-los.

nl.title: OPBERGREK VOOR MENSEN
nl.description: De hoekige uitsteeksels op deze muur doen vermoeden dat ze een gelijkaardige functie hebben als die van de bekende kapstok. In plaats van jassen, kunnen gebruikers meerdere mensen opbergen zonder dat deze verkreukeld of verfrommeld raken.

ar.title: ﺣﺎﺋﻂ ﺗﺨﺰﻳﻦ اﻟﺒﺸﺮ
ar.description: ﺗﺸﻴﺮ اﻟﻨﺘﻮءات ﻋﻠﯽ ﺷﻜﻞ ﺧﻄﺎف اﻟﻤﺜﻘﺒﺔ ﻓﻲ ﻫﺬا اﻟﺤﺎﺋﻂ إﻟﯽ أﻧﻬﺎ ﺗﻘﻮم ﺑﺪور ﻣﻤﺎﺛﻞ ﻟﺸﻤﺎﻋﺔ اﻟﻤﻌﺎﻃﻒ ﻟﺪى اﻟﺒﺸﺮ. ﻟﻜﻦ ﺑﺪﻻ ﻣﻦ ﺗﻌﻠﻴﻖ اﻟﻤﻌﺎﻃﻒ ﻋﻠﻴﻬﺎ، ﻓﺈﻧﻬﺎ ﺳﻤﺤﺖ ﻟﻠﻤﺴﺘﺨﺪﻣﻴﻦ ﺑﺘﻌﻠﻴﻖ اﻟﻌﺪﻳﺪ ﻣﻦ اﻟﺒﺸﺮ دون ﺗﺠﻌﻴﺪﻫﻢ أو ﺗﻜﻮﻳﻤﻬﻢ.

tk.title: İNSAN DEPOLAMA ASKISI
tk.description: Duvardaki çengel çıkıntılar, bu duvarın insanların ceket astığı askıya benzer bir işleve sahip olduğunu gösteriyor. Bu askıyı kullanan kişiler, ceket yerine birden fazla insanı buruşmadan veya kırışmadan depolayabilirdi.

fr-CA.title: PORTE-HUMAIN
fr-CA.description: Les saillies crochues sur ce mur portent à croire qu'il remplissait une fonction similaire au portemanteau humain connu. Mais au lieu de manteaux, il permettait aux utilisateurs de stocker plusieurs humains sans qu'ils ne se froissent.

en-AU.title: HUMAN STORAGE RACK
en-AU.description: The hooked protrusions on this wall suggest it performed a similar function to the familiar human coat rack. But instead of collecting coats, it allowed users to store multiple humans without them getting crumpled or wrinkled.

landmarks.title: HUMAN STORAGE RACK
landmarks.description: The hooked protrusions on this wall suggest it performed a similar function to the familiar human coat rack. But instead of collecting coats, it allowed users to store multiple humans without them getting crumpled or wrinkled.

landmarks.name: LM_Cloche

en.title: DINNER SURPRISER
en.description: If a dinner experiment went awry, humans could use these silver pods to conceal the charred mess until the last minute. This was useful at dinner parties, as the guest would be seated by the time the disaster was uncovered, and would thus find it harder to flee.

en-GB.title: DINNER SURPRISER
en-GB.description: If a dinner experiment went awry, humans could use these silver pods to conceal the charred mess until the last minute. This was useful at dinner parties, as the guest would be seated by the time the disaster was uncovered, and would thus find it harder to flee.

fr.title: CACHOTTERIE DÎNATOIRE
fr.description: Lorsqu'une expérience dînatoire tournait mal, les humains pouvaient utiliser ces couvercles argentés pour dissimuler le massacre jusqu'à la dernière minute. Particulièrement utiles lors des dîners, car l'invité était déjà assis à la découverte de la catastrophe et avait donc plus de mal à s'enfuir.

de.title: ABENDESSEN-ÜBERRASCHER
de.description: Wenn ein Experiment zum Abendessen schiefging, konnten Menschen diese silbernen Kapseln einsetzen, um das verbrannte Schlamassel bis zum letzten Moment zu verbergen. Dies war nützlich auf Dinnerpartys, da sich der Gast etwa zur gleichen Zeit setzte, wie die Katastrophe aufgedeckt wurde, und so weniger Chancen zur Flucht hatte.

es.title: SORPRENDEDOR DE COMIDAS
es.description: Si un experimento alimenticio salía mal, los humanos podían usar estas cápsulas plateadas para ocultar el caos carbonizado hasta el último minuto. Esto resultaba útil en cenas de gala, ya que los invitados estaban sentados para cuando se descubría el desastre, resultándoles así más difícil huir.

it.title: SORPRESA A CENA
it.description: Se un esperimento culinario andava male, gli umani usavano questi gusci argentati per nascondere il pasticcio carbonizzato fino all'ultimo secondo. Era utile durante le cene, visto che le persone sarebbero già state sedute a tavola prima di scoprire il disastro e per questo non sarebbero potute fuggire via.

ja.title: ディナーのサプライズ器
ja.description: もし晩御飯の実験が失敗に終わってしまっても、人間たちはこの銀の容器を使い、黒こげの汚らしい失敗作を最後の最後まで隠すことができました。これにより、ディナーパーティーのゲストは悲惨な晩御飯を目の当たりにするまでテーブルに着いていることになり、もうそのころにはパーティーから抜け出すのも容易ではなくなっている、という訳です。

ko.title: 깜짝 저녁 식사
ko.description: 새로운 저녁 요리 시도를 망치면 인간들은 먹어야 하는 순간 직전까지 이 은빛 용기에 숯덩이가 된 음식을 숨겼습니다. 손님들이 자리에 앉은 뒤 망친 음식을 발견하면 도망치기가 좀 더 어려워질 테니까요.

zh-Hans.title: “惊喜”晚餐罩
zh-Hans.description: 如果晚餐实验出了差错，人类可以用这些银色的罩子来隐藏烧焦的饭菜，直到最后一刻。这在晚宴上很有用，因为当灾难显露无遗的时候，客人已经坐好了，所以更难溜走。

zh-Hant.title: 餐點驚喜裝置
zh-Hant.description: 如果餐點實驗出錯，人類可以在最後一刻使用這種銀色罩遮住燒焦的食物。這個東西在晚宴很實用，因為當失敗的餐點顯露出來時，客人已經入座，所以要離開是更加困難。

ru.title: ОБЕД С СЮРПРИЗОМ
ru.description: Люди могли использовать эти серебряные контейнеры, чтобы до последней минуты скрывать обугленное месиво, если эксперимент с обедом оказывался неудачным. Это было полезно на званых обедах, поскольку к моменту обнаружения катастрофы гости уже сидели и сбежать им, таким образом, было куда труднее.

pt-BR.title: SURPREENDEDOR PRANDIAL
pt-BR.description: Os experimentos alimentícios mal sucedidos realizados pelos humanos podiam ser escondidos com estes invólucros prateados até o último instante. Era um aparato muito útil em jantares formais, visto que os convidados já estariam sentados quando o desastre culinário fosse revelado e não conseguiriam fugir.

nl.title: DINERVERRASSER
nl.description: Als een culinair experiment verkeerd afliep, konden mensen hun verbrande gerechten dankzij deze zilveren koepels tot het laatste moment verbergen. Dit was erg handig tijdens feestjes, omdat de gasten al zitten tegen de tijd dat ze hun eten te zien krijgen en ze dus niet kunnen weglopen.

ar.title: ﻋﻨﺼﺮ اﻟﻤﻔﺎﺟﺄة ﻓﻲ اﻟﻌﺸﺎء
ar.description: إذا ﺳﺎءت ﺗﺠﺮﺑﺔ إﻋﺪاد اﻟﻌﺸﺎء وﻛﺎن ﻧﺘﺎﺟﻬﺎ ﻃﻌﺎﻣﺎ ﻣﺤﺮوﻗﺎ، ﻓﺴﻴﻠﺠﺄ اﻟﺒﺸﺮ إﻟﯽ ﺗﻐﻄﻴﺘﻪ ﺑﻬﺬه اﻷﻏﻄﻴﺔ اﻟﻔﻀﻴﺔ ﺣﺘﯽ ﻳﺤﻞ ﻣﻴﻌﺎد ﺗﻨﺎول اﻷﻛﻞ ﺑﺎﻟﻀﺒﻂ. وﻛﺎن ذﻟﻚ ﻣﻔﻴﺪا ﻓﻲ ﺣﻔﻼت اﻟﻌﺸﺎء، ﺑﻴﻨﻤﺎ ﻳﻜﻮن اﻟﻀﻴﻒ ﺟﺎﻟﺴﺎ ﻋﻨﺪ اﻟﻜﺸﻒ ﻋﻦ ﻫﺬه اﻟﻜﺎرﺛﺔ، ﺗﺒﻬﺘﻪ اﻟﻤﻔﺎﺟﺄة وﻻ ﺗﺘﺴﻨﯽ ﻟﻪ ﻓﺮﺻﺔ اﻟﻬﺮوب ﻣﻦ اﻟﻤﻜﺎن.

tk.title: AKŞAM YEMEĞİ SÜRPRİZCİSİ
tk.description: Akşam yemeğini hazırlarken bir şeyler ters giderse insanlar yaktıkları korkunç hâldeki yemekleri son ana kadar bu gümüş renkli kapakları kullanarak gizleyebiliyordu. Akşam yemeği partilerinde epey kullanışlıydı. Facianın üstündeki kapak kalkana kadar misafirler çoktan yerlerine oturuyordu ve bu yüzden kaçmaları da mümkün olmuyordu.

fr-CA.title: SURPRISE DÎNATOIRE
fr-CA.description: Lorsqu'une expérience dînatoire tournait mal, les humains pouvaient utiliser ces couvercles argentés pour dissimuler le massacre jusqu'à la dernière minute. Particulièrement utiles lors des souper entre amis, car l'invité était déjà assis à la découverte de la catastrophe, et il était donc plus délicat de s'enfuir.

en-AU.title: DINNER SURPRISER
en-AU.description: If a dinner experiment went awry, humans could use these silver pods to conceal the charred mess until the last minute. This was useful at dinner parties, as the guest would be seated by the time the disaster was uncovered, and would thus find it harder to flee.

landmarks.title: DINNER SURPRISER
landmarks.description: If a dinner experiment went awry, humans could use these silver pods to conceal the charred mess until the last minute. This was useful at dinner parties, as the guest would be seated by the time the disaster was uncovered, and would thus find it harder to flee.

landmarks.name: LM_CoffeeMaker

en.title: COFFEE DISPENSING MACHINE
en.description: This mechanical box was voted employee of the month by its colleagues for eighteen months in a row.

en-GB.title: COFFEE DISPENSING MACHINE
en-GB.description: This mechanical box was voted employee of the month by its colleagues for eighteen months in a row.

fr.title: MACHINE À CAFÉ
fr.description: Cette boîte mécanique a été élue employée du mois par ses collègues dix-huit fois consécutives.

de.title: KAFFEE-AUTOMAT
de.description: Dieser mechanische Apparat wurde von seinen Kollegen achtzehn Monate in Folge zum Angestellten des Monats gewählt.

es.title: MÁQUINA DISPENSADORA DE CAFÉ
es.description: Esta caja mecánica fue elegida empleada del año por sus colegas durante dieciocho meses seguidos.

it.title: MACCHINA DISPENSACAFFÈ
it.description: Questa scatola meccanica fu votata come impiegato dell'anno dai suoi colleghi per diciotto mesi di fila.

ja.title: コーヒー出しマシーン
ja.description: この機械の箱は、18カ月連続で「今月の最優秀従業員」として表彰されました。

ko.title: 커피 추출 기계
ko.description: 이 기계 상자는 동료들에 의해 18개월 동안 이번 달 최고의 직원으로 선정되었습니다.

zh-Hans.title: 自动咖啡机
zh-Hans.description: 这个机械箱连续十八个月被同事评选为月度最佳雇员。

zh-Hant.title: 咖啡分配機
zh-Hant.description: 這個機械箱連續十八個月被工作同伴票選為當月最佳員工。

ru.title: МАШИНА ПОДАЧИ КОФЕ
ru.description: Коллеги выбирали эту механическую коробку лучшим сотрудником месяца в течение восемнадцати месяцев подряд.

pt-BR.title: CAFETEIRA
pt-BR.description: Esta caixa mecânica foi considerada a funcionária do mês pelos colegas por dezoito meses seguidos.

nl.title: KOFFIEAPPARAAT
nl.description: Deze mechanische doos werd door zijn collega's achttien maanden op rij verkozen tot medewerker van de maand.

ar.title: ﻣﺎﻛﻴﻨﺔ ﺗﻮزﻳﻊ اﻟﻘﻬﻮة
ar.description: رﺑﺢ ﻫﺬا اﻟﺼﻨﺪوق اﻟﻤﻴﻜﺎﻧﻴﻜﻲ ﺗﺼﻮﻳﺖ زﻣﻼﺋﻪ ﻟﺠﺎﺋﺰة ﻣﻮﻇﻒ اﻟﺸﻬﺮ ﻟﺜﻤﺎﻧﻴﺔ ﻋﺸﺮ ﺷﻬﺮا ﻋﻠﯽ اﻟﺘﻮاﻟﻲ.

tk.title: KAHVE MAKİNESİ
tk.description: Bu mekanik kutu, iş arkadaşları tarafından art arda on sekiz ay ayın çalışanı seçildi.

fr-CA.title: MACHINE À CAFÉ
fr-CA.description: Cette boîte mécanique a été élue employée du mois par ses collègues dix-huit fois consécutives.

en-AU.title: COFFEE DISPENSING MACHINE
en-AU.description: This mechanical box was voted employee of the month by its colleagues for eighteen months in a row.

landmarks.title: COFFEE DISPENSING MACHINE
landmarks.description: This mechanical box was voted employee of the month by its colleagues for eighteen months in a row.

landmarks.name: LM_ConcreteBirthdayCake

en.title: CONCRETE BIRTHDAY CAKE
en.description: A cadre of rebel bakers started making concrete cakes to protest the Englandland cake industry's obsession with light and fluffy textures. The cakes became very popular, as they could be rinsed clean of icing and reused for different occasions. This one also doubled as an anchor.

en-GB.title: CONCRETE BIRTHDAY CAKE
en-GB.description: A cadre of rebel bakers started making concrete cakes to protest the Englandland cake industry's obsession with light and fluffy textures. The cakes became very popular, as they could be rinsed clean of icing and reused for different occasions. This one also doubled as an anchor.

fr.title: GÂTEAU D'ANNIVERSAIRE BÉTONNÉ
fr.description: Un groupe de boulangers rebelles s'est mis à fabriquer des gâteaux en béton pour protester contre l'obsession de l'industrie angleterrienne pour les textures légères et moelleuses. Les gâteaux ont trouvé leur public sans mal, car ils pouvaient être lavés et réutilisés pour différentes occasions. Celui-ci a également servi d'ancre.

de.title: BETON-GEBURTSTAGSKUCHEN
de.description: Eine Gruppe rebellischer Bäcker hat angefangen, Kuchen aus Beton herzustellen, um gegen die Besessenheit der Gebäckindustrie Englandlands von leichten und luftigen Kuchen zu protestieren. Die Kuchen wurden sehr beliebt, da man die Glasur abwaschen und sie zu anderen Zwecken einsetzen konnte. Dieser hier wurde als Anker verwendet.

es.title: TARTA DE CUMPLEAÑOS DE CEMENTO
es.description: Un grupo de pasteleros rebeldes empezaron a hacer tartas de cemento para protestar contra la obsesión de la industria pastelera de Inglaterralandia por las texturas esponjosas y ligeras. Las tartas se hicieron muy famosas, ya que se les podía limpiar el glaseado y reutilizarlas para diferentes ocasiones. Esta también servía como ancla.

it.title: TORTA DI COMPLEANNO DI CEMENTO
it.description: Un manipolo di pasticcieri ribelli iniziò a realizzare torte di cemento per protestare contro l'ossessione dell'industria delle torte in Inghilterraterra per le consistenze spumose e ariose. Le torte diventarono molto famose, poiché era possibile rimuovere le decorazioni e riutilizzarle in altre occasioni. Questa è stata usata anche come ancora.

ja.title: コンクリートの誕生日ケーキ
ja.description: 反逆的な焼き菓子職人の軍団が、イングランドランドのケーキ産業が作り出した「ケーキは軽くてフワフワな食感である」という強迫観念に抗議をするため、コンクリートのケーキを作り始めました。このケーキはアイシングを洗い落とせばまた再利用ができるため、非常に人気のケーキとなりました。しかもこのケーキは、いかりの役割を果たすこともできたのです。

ko.title: 콘크리트 생일 케이크
ko.description: 저항 정신이 강한 요리사들은 콘크리트 케이크를 만들어 보송보송한 식감에만 집착하던 영국나라의 케이크 산업계를 비판했습니다. 케이크는 위에 덮인 아이싱을 씻어내고 재활용할 수 있었기 때문에, 큰 인기를 얻었습니다. 이 케이크의 경우 닻으로도 사용했었습니다.

zh-Hans.title: 混凝土生日蛋糕
zh-Hans.description: 一群反叛的面包师，为了抗议英格兰大陆蛋糕产业过度迷恋柔软蓬松的口感，开始制作起混凝土蛋糕。这款蛋糕大受好评，因为糖霜可以冲洗掉，蛋糕亦可在不同场合重复使用。这款蛋糕还兼具船锚功能。

zh-Hant.title: 水泥生日蛋糕
zh-Hant.description: 一群反叛的麵包師，為了抗議英格蘭大陸蛋糕產業過度愛好柔軟蓬鬆的口感，開始製作起水泥蛋糕。這款蛋糕推出後大受好評，因為蛋糕的糖粉可以沖洗掉，所以也能在不同場合重複使用。這款蛋糕還兼具船錨功能。

ru.title: БЕТОННЫЙ ТОРТ КО ДНЮ РОЖДЕНИЯ
ru.description: Коллектив бастующих пекарей стал делать бетонные торты в знак протеста против одержимости английской кондитерской промышленности легкими взбитыми структурами. Торты стали очень популярны, поскольку их можно было просто сполоснуть от глазури и использовать заново в другой ситуации. Этот послужил еще и якорем.

pt-BR.title: BOLO DE ANIVERSÁRIO DE CONCRETO
pt-BR.description: Um grupo de boleiros rebeldes passou a confeccionar bolos de concreto para protestar contra a obsessão do ramo de bolos da Terra da Inglaterra com texturas leves e macias. Tais bolos ganharam popularidade, pois podiam ser lavados e reutilizados em diversas ocasiões, além de servir de âncora, se necessário.

nl.title: BETONNEN VERJAARDAGSTAART
nl.description: Een reeks rebelse bakkers is begonnen met het maken van betonnen taarten om te protesteren tegen de obsessie van de Engelse taartenindustrie met lichte en luchtige texturen. De taarten werden erg populair, omdat het glazuur eraf kon worden gespoeld en ze konden worden hergebruikt voor verschillende gelegenheden. Deze deed ook dienst als anker.

ar.title: ﻛﻌﻜﺔ ﻋﻴﺪ اﻟﻤﻴﻼد اﻟﺨﺮﺳﺎﻧﻴﺔ
ar.description: ﺑﺪأت ﻣﺠﻤﻮﻋﺔ ﻣﻦ اﻟﺨﺒﺎزﻳﻦ اﻟﻤﺘﻤﺮدﻳﻦ ﺑﺼﻨﺎﻋﺔ ﻛﻌﻚ ﺧﺮﺳﺎﻧﻲ ﻟﻼﺣﺘﺠﺎج ﻋﻠﯽ وﻟﻊ ﺻﻨﺎﻋﺔ اﻟﻜﻌﻚ اﻹﻧﺠﻠﻴﺰﻳﺔ ﺑﺎﻟﻘﻮام اﻟﺨﻔﻴﻒ اﻟﻤﻨﻔﻮش. وأﺻﺒﺢ ﻫﺬا اﻟﻜﻌﻚ ذاﺋﻊ اﻟﺼﻴﺖ، ﺣﻴﺚ ﻳﻤﻜﻦ ﺷﻄﻔﻪ وﺗﻨﻈﻴﻔﻪ ﻣﻦ اﻟﻜﺮﻳﻤﺔ اﻟﺘﻲ ﺗﻐﻄﻴﻪ وإﻋﺎدة اﺳﺘﺨﺪاﻣﻪ ﻓﻲ ﻣﻨﺎﺳﺒﺎت ﻣﺨﺘﻠﻔﺔ. وأﺻﺒﺢ ﻳﺘﻮﻓﺮ ﻣﻨﻪ ﻛﻌﻚ ﺑﻄﺎﺑﻘﻴﻦ ﻟﻴﺼﺒﺢ ﻧﻘﻄﺔ ارﺗﻜﺎز.

tk.title: BETONDAN DOĞUM GÜNÜ PASTASI
tk.description: Bir grup asi pastacı, İngiltere'nin pasta endüstrisinin hafif ve pofuduk pastalara olan takıntısını protesto etmek için betondan pasta yapmaya başladı. Pastalar epey ilgi gördü. Bunun nedeni ise üzerindeki kremanın temizlenip pastanın farklı amaçlar için kullanılabilmesi. Örneğin bu, gemi çapası olarak da kullanılabiliyor.

fr-CA.title: GÂTEAU D'ANNIVERSAIRE BÉTONNÉ
fr-CA.description: Un groupe de boulangers rebelles s'est mis à fabriquer des gâteaux en béton pour protester contre l'obsession de l'industrie anglaise du gâteau pour les textures légères et moelleuses. Les gâteaux ont trouvé leur public sans mal, car ils pouvaient être lavés et réutilisés pour différentes occasions. Celui-ci a également servi d'ancre.

en-AU.title: CONCRETE BIRTHDAY CAKE
en-AU.description: A cadre of rebel bakers started making concrete cakes to protest the Englandland cake industry's obsession with light and fluffy textures. The cakes became very popular, as they could be rinsed clean of icing and reused for different occasions. This one also doubled as an anchor.

landmarks.title: CONCRETE BIRTHDAY CAKE
landmarks.description: A cadre of rebel bakers started making concrete cakes to protest the Englandland cake industry's obsession with light and fluffy textures. The cakes became very popular, as they could be rinsed clean of icing and reused for different occasions. This one also doubled as an anchor.

landmarks.name: LM_CoolSkull

en.title: A COOL SKULL
en.description: It took an incredibly long time for humans to realize that evolution was not purely about which traits would help a creature survive. Some attributes persisted simply because nature felt they looked "really cool".

en-GB.title: A COOL SKULL
en-GB.description: It took an incredibly long time for humans to realise that evolution was not purely about which traits would help a creature survive. Some attributes persisted simply because nature felt they looked "really cool".

fr.title: MAGNIFIQUE CRÂNE
fr.description: Les humains ont mis énormément de temps à comprendre que l'évolution ne concernait pas seulement les caractéristiques qui aidaient une créature à survivre. Certains attributs ont ainsi traversé les âges sous le seul prétexte que la nature les trouvait « vraiment cool ».

de.title: EIN COOLER SCHÄDEL
de.description: Es hat Menschen extrem viel Zeit gekostet, herauszufinden, dass es in der Evolution nicht allein darum ging, welche Merkmale dem Überleben förderlich sind. Manche Eigenschaften blieben einfach nur bestehen, weil die Natur sich dachte, dass sie „echt cool“ aussehen.

es.title: UNA CALAVERA MOLONA
es.description: A los humanos les llevó muchísimo tiempo darse cuenta de que la evolución no trataba exclusivamente de los rasgos que ayudaban a sobrevivir a una criatura. Algunos atributos persistieron sencillamente porque a la naturaleza le pareció que eran "muy molones".

it.title: UN TESCHIO INTERESSANTE
it.description: Gli umani impiegarono tempi incredibilmente lunghi per capire che l'evoluzione non consisteva esclusivamente nelle caratteristiche che aiutassero una creatura a sopravvivere. Alcune di esse resistettero alla prova del tempo perché la natura le riteneva "strepitose".

ja.title: カッコいい頭蓋骨
ja.description: 人間たちが、進化論というものが単に、適者生存というルールのみに基づいてはいないと気付くまで、驚くほど長い時間がかかりました。一部の特長は、自然から見て「めちゃくちゃカッコいい」と感じたという理由だけで持続できたものもあるのです。

ko.title: 멋진 해골
ko.description: 진화가 단순히 생명체가 생존하는 데 어떤 특성이 필요한지를 결정하는 게 아니라는 걸 인간이 깨닫기까지는 믿을 수 없을 만큼 오랜 시간이 걸렸습니다. 어떤 특성은 그냥 '멋있어서' 계속 이어지기도 합니다.

zh-Hans.title: 酷炫骷髅头
zh-Hans.description: 人类花了相当长的时间才意识到，进化并不仅仅是哪些特质能帮助生物生存。有些属性得以保留，只是因为大自然觉得它们看起来“真的很酷”。

zh-Hant.title: 酷炫的頭骨
zh-Hant.description: 人類花了好長一段時間才意識到，演化不是只有幫助生物求生的特性。有些特性持續存在的原因，單純因為大自然覺得它們看起來「酷到不行」。

ru.title: КРУТОЙ ЧЕРЕП
ru.description: Людям потребовалось невероятно много времени, чтобы понять, что эволюция не сводится только к тем особенностям, которые помогают выживать. Некоторые признаки сохраняются просто потому, что природе кажется, что они выглядят «действительно крутыми».

pt-BR.title: CAVEIRA MANEIRA
pt-BR.description: Demorou tempo demais para os humanos perceberem que a evolução não se tratava apenas da propagação de traços que auxiliariam na sobrevivência da espécie. Alguns atributos persistiam simplesmente porque a natureza os achava “maneiros”.

nl.title: EEN COOLE SCHEDEL
nl.description: Het duurde erg lang voordat mensen beseften dat evolutie niet alleen ging om kenmerken die de overlevingskansen vergrootten. Sommige kenmerken bleven bestaan omdat de natuur vond dat ze er 'supercool' uitzagen.

ar.title: ﺟﻤﺠﻤﺔ ﻇﺮﻳﻔﺔ
ar.description: اﺳﺘﻐﺮق اﻟﺒﺸﺮ وﻗﺘﺎ ﻃﻮﻳﻼ ﻹدراك أن اﻟﺘﻄﻮر ﻟﻢ ﻳﻘﺘﺼﺮ ﻋﻠﯽ اﻟﺼﻔﺎت اﻟﺘﻲ ﺗﺴﺎﻋﺪ أي ﻛﺎﺋﻦ ﻋﻠﯽ اﻟﻨﺠﺎة ﻓﺤﺴﺐ. ﻓﻘﺪ أﺑﻘﺖ اﻟﻄﺒﻴﻌﺔ ﻋﻠﯽ ﺑﻌﺾ اﻟﺼﻔﺎت ﺑﺒﺴﺎﻃﺔ ﻷﻧﻬﺎ "ﺗﺒﺪو ﻇﺮﻳﻔﺔ ﺑﺎﻟﻔﻌﻞ" .

tk.title: HAVALI KAFATASI
tk.description: İnsanların evrimin yalnızca canlının hayatta kalmasına yardımcı olan özelliklerle ilgili olmadığını anlaması inanılmaz derecede uzun sürdü. Bazı özellikler, yalnızca doğa "havalı göründüklerini" düşündüğü için varlığını sürdürdü.

fr-CA.title: CRÂNE COOL
fr-CA.description: Les humains ont mis énormément de temps à comprendre que l'évolution ne consistait pas seulement à déterminer quelles caractéristiques aideraient une créature à survivre. Certains attributs sont restés sous le seul prétexte que la nature les trouvait « vraiment cool ».

en-AU.title: A COOL SKULL
en-AU.description: It took an incredibly long time for humans to realise that evolution was not purely about which traits would help a creature survive. Some attributes persisted simply because nature felt they looked "really cool".

landmarks.title: A COOL SKULL
landmarks.description: It took an incredibly long time for humans to realize that evolution was not purely about which traits would help a creature survive. Some attributes persisted simply because nature felt they looked "really cool".

landmarks.name: LM_CreamTea

en.title: A CREAM TEA
en.description: Arguments over whether cream or jam should be applied to a scone first escalated during the 2500s. Tensions culminated in the Cream Tea Conflicts (2576-2578) when Devonian and Cornish zealots waged mid-afternoon warfare on a gingham battlefield.

en-GB.title: A CREAM TEA
en-GB.description: Arguments over whether cream or jam should be applied to a scone first escalated during the 2500s. Tensions culminated in the Cream Tea Conflicts (2576-2578) when Devonian and Cornish zealots waged mid-afternoon warfare on a gingham battlefield.

fr.title: THÉ À LA CRÈME
fr.description: Les prises de bec pour savoir si de la crème ou de la confiture devait être appliquée sur les scones se sont intensifiées au cours des années 2500. Les tensions étaient maximales lors des Conflits du Thé à la crème (2576-2578), lorsque les adeptes du Devon et de Cornouailles ont pris les armes en milieu d'après-midi sur un champ de bataille en vichy.

de.title: EIN CREAM TEA
de.description: Streitigkeiten darüber, ob „Scones“ zuerst mit Sahne oder Marmelade bestrichen werden sollten, eskalierten erstmals in den 2500er Jahren. Die Spannungen eskalierten in den Cream-Tea-Konflikten (2576–2578), in denen Fanatiker aus Devon und Cornwall auf einem Schlachtfeld in Gingham nachmittägliche Kriege ausfochten.

es.title: MERIENDA
es.description: Los debates sobre si debería aplicarse antes la mantequilla o la mermelada a un bollo comenzaron a intensificarse en torno al año 2500. Las tensiones culminaron en el Conflicto de la Merienda (2576-2578) cuando fanáticos de Cornualles y de Devon se enzarzaron en una guerra de media tarde sobre un mantel como campo de batalla.

it.title: CREAM TEA
it.description: Le discussioni su quale tra panna e marmellata vada spalmata per prima su una sorta di tipica focaccina da tè degenerarono per la prima volta nel 2500. Le tensioni culminarono nella Battaglia del Cream Tea (2576-2578) quando i zeloti abitanti del Devon e della Cornovaglia intrapresero un conflitto di metà pomeriggio su un campo di battaglia a quadretti.

ja.title: クリームティー
ja.description: スコーンにクリームをつけるべきか、はたまたジャムをつけるべきかという議論は、2500年代からどんどん白熱していきました。この緊張状態は、デボン紀とコーンウオールの狂信者がギンガムの戦場行った午後の武力衝突であるクリームティー紛争(2576年～2578年)で最高潮に達しました。

ko.title: 크림 티
ko.description: 스콘에 크림을 먼저 바를지 잼을 먼저 바를지에 대한 논쟁은 2500년대에 더욱 격화되었습니다. 크림 티 분쟁(2576~2578)으로 인해 갈등이 심각해지자 데노비안과 코니쉬 광신도들은 깅엄에서 오후의 전쟁을 벌였습니다.

zh-Hans.title: 奶油茶
zh-Hans.description: 关于烤饼应该加奶油还是果酱的争论在 26 世纪首次升级了。在奶油茶斗争 (2576-2578) 中，德文郡和康沃尔郡的狂热分子在金厄姆战场发动了午后战争，紧张气氛达到高潮。

zh-Hant.title: 奶油茶
zh-Hant.description: 在 2500 年期間，人類開始在爭論司康餅要先塗奶油還是果醬。後來，緊張情勢加劇，引發了奶油茶衝突事件 (2576-2578)，導致德文郡和康瓦耳狂熱分子在格子布戰場上發起午後戰爭。

ru.title: ЧАЙ С ХЛЕБОМ, СЛИВКАМИ И ВАРЕНЬЕМ
ru.description: Споры о том, чем в первую очередь должна быть намазана булочка — взбитыми сливками или джемом, возникли в 2500-х гг. Напряженность достигла апогея в конфликте «Чай с хлебом, сливками и вареньем» (2576–2578), когда фанатики из Девоншира и Корнуолла развернули послеполуденные боевые действия на льняном поле боя в клетку.

pt-BR.title: UM LANCHINHO VESPERTINO
pt-BR.description: A discussão sobre qual era o melhor recheio do sonho tomou grandes proporções nos anos 2500. A tensão resultou nos Conflitos do Lanchinho Vespertino (2576-2578), onde os zelotes da nata e do doce de leite travaram uma guerra nos campos de creme.

nl.title: EEN HIGH TEA
nl.description: Geschillen over de vraag of crème of jam op een scone hoort, escaleerden voor het eerst tijdens de jaren 2500. De spanningen bereikten hun hoogtepunt met de High Tea Conflicten (2576-2578) toen fanatici uit Devon en Cornwall halverwege de middag slag leverden op een gingham slagveld.

ar.title: ﺷﺎي ﺑﺎﻟﻜﺮﻳﻤﺔ
ar.description: اﺣﺘﺪم اﻟﺠﺪال ﺣﻮل وﺿﻊ اﻟﻜﺮﻳﻤﺔ أم اﻟﻤﺮﺑﯽ ﻋﻠﯽ اﻟﻜﻌﻚ اﻟﻤﻘﺪم ﻣﻊ اﻟﺸﺎي ﻷول ﻣﺮة ﻓﻲ أﺛﻨﺎء ﻓﺘﺮة ﻣﺘﻮﺳﻂ اﻷﻟﻔﻴﺔ اﻟﺜﺎﻟﺜﺔ 0052. وزادت ﺣﺪة اﻟﺘﻮﺗﺮ ﻓﻲ ﻧﺰاﻋﺎت اﻟﺸﺎي ﺑﺎﻟﻜﺮﻳﻤﺔ ﻓﻲ اﻟﻔﺘﺮة ﺑﻴﻦ ﻋﺎﻣﻲ)6752 - 8752(  ﺣﻴﺚ ﺷﻦ اﻟﻤﺘﻌﺼﺒﻮن اﻟﺪﻳﻔﻮﻧﻴﻮن واﻟﻜﻮرﻧﻴﻮن ﺣﺮﺑﺎ ﻓﻲ ﻣﻨﺘﺼﻒ اﻟﻈﻬﻴﺮة أﻗﻴﻤﺖ ﻋﻠﯽ ﻗﻤﺎش ﻗﻄﻨﻲ ﺑﻨﻘﺶ ﻣﺮﺑﻌﺎت.

tk.title: KREMALI ÇAY
tk.description: Yağlı çöreğe krema mı yoksa reçel mi sürülmesi gerektiğine dair tartışmalar ilk olarak 2500'lü yıllarda kızıştı. Devonyen ve Kernevekeli partizanlar, pötikareli savaş meydanında bir akşamüstü savaşı başlattığında Kremalı Çay Çatışmaları'nda (2576-2578) gerilimler doruk noktasına ulaştı.

fr-CA.title: THÉ À LA CRÈME
fr-CA.description: Les prises de bec pour savoir si de la crème ou de la confiture devait être appliquée d'abord sur les scones se sont intensifiées au cours des années 2500. Les tensions étaient maximales lors des Conflits du Thé à la crème (2576-2578), lorsque les adeptes du Devon et de Cornouailles ont pris les armes en milieu d'après-midi sur un champ de bataille carreauté.

en-AU.title: A CREAM TEA
en-AU.description: Arguments over whether cream or jam should be applied to a scone first escalated during the 2500s. Tensions culminated in the Cream Tea Conflicts (2576-2578) when Devonian and Cornish zealots waged mid-afternoon warfare on a gingham battlefield.

landmarks.title: A CREAM TEA
landmarks.description: Arguments over whether cream or jam should be applied to a scone first escalated during the 2500s. Tensions culminated in the Cream Tea Conflicts (2576-2578) when Devonian and Cornish zealots waged mid-afternoon warfare on a gingham battlefield.

landmarks.name: LM_CricketWicket

en.title: WOODHENGE
en.description: This portable wooden henge consists of three slender vertical sticks and two stubbier horizontal ones. It was presumably a travel-sized version of the larger (and much heavier) stone henges that humans liked to construct.

en-GB.title: WOODHENGE
en-GB.description: This portable wooden henge consists of three slender vertical sticks and two stubbier horizontal ones. It was presumably a travel-sized version of the larger (and much heavier) stone henges that humans liked to construct.

fr.title: CROMLECH EN BOIS
fr.description: Ce cromlech en bois portatif se compose de trois bâtons verticaux fins et de deux bâtons horizontaux plus épais. Il s'agissait vraisemblablement d'une version de voyage des modèles en pierre plus grands (et beaucoup plus lourds) que les humains aimaient construire.

de.title: WOODHENGE
de.description: Diese tragbare Henge aus Holz besteht aus drei schmalen vertikalen und zwei dickeren horizontalen Stöcken. Sie war vermutlich eine Reiseversion der größeren (und ungleich schwereren) Stonehenges, die von Menschen gern gebaut wurden.

es.title: WOODHENGE
es.description: Este círculo portátil de madera consta de tres esbeltos palos verticales y dos horizontales más robustos. Se supone que se usaba como versión tamaño viaje de los círculos de piedra más grandes (y mucho más pesados) que a los humanos les gustaba construir.

it.title: BLOCCO DI LEGNO
it.description: Questo blocco di legno portatile è composto da tre paletti sottili verticali e due orizzontali più tozzi. Era, probabilmente, una versione da viaggio dei blocchi di pietra più grandi (e pesanti) che gli umani amavano costruire disponendoli in un cerchio.

ja.title: ウッドヘンジ
ja.description: この携帯用木製ヘンジは、3本の細い縦長の棒と、2本のずんぐりとした横向きの棒でできています。これはおそらく、人間が造ることを好んでいたもっと大きくて(そしてかなり重たい)ストーンヘンジの旅行用サイズ版だったのだと思われます。

ko.title: 우드헨지
ko.description: 이 휴대용 우드헨지는 세 개의 수직 막대와 두 개의 더 짧은 수평 막대로 구성되어 있습니다. 인간들이 즐겨 만든 더 크고 무거운 스톤헨지의 휴대용 버전으로 추정됩니다.

zh-Hans.title: 巨木阵
zh-Hans.description: 这个便携式巨木阵由三根细长的垂直棒和两根较为短粗的水平棒组成。它可能是人类喜欢建造的更大（也更重）的巨石阵的便携旅行款。

zh-Hant.title: 木頭陣
zh-Hant.description: 這種可攜式的木頭陣由三根細長的垂直木棍和兩根較粗短的水平木棍組成。據推測，相較於較大型 (且笨重) 的石頭陣，人類喜歡建造便於攜帶的樣式。

ru.title: ВУДХЕНДЖ
ru.description: Этот переносной деревянный ритуальный памятник состоит из трех тонких вертикальных палочек и двух горизонтальных поменьше. Предположительно, это аналог для путешествий более большой (и куда более тяжелой) версии каменных хенджей, которые люди так любили сооружать.

pt-BR.title: PENTALITOS DE MADEIRA
pt-BR.description: Este pequeno monumento de madeira é composto de três varetas verticais e dois tocos horizontais. Presume-se que seja a versão portátil dos maiores — e muito mais pesados — monumentos de pedra construídos por humanos.

nl.title: HOUTBOUWSEL
nl.description: Dit draagbare houten bouwsel bestaat uit drie slanke verticale stokken en twee stevigere horizontale. Het was waarschijnlijk een reisversie van de grotere (en veel zwaardere) "Stonehenge" die mensen graag bouwden.

ar.title: اﻟﻮﺗﺪ اﻟﺨﺸﺒﻲ
ar.description: ﻳﺘﻜﻮن ﻫﺬا اﻟﻮﺗﺪ اﻟﺨﺸﺒﻲ اﻟﻤﺘﻨﻘﻞ ﻣﻦ ﺛﻼث ﻋﺼﻲ ﺧﺸﺒﻴﺔ رﻓﻴﻌﺔ ﻣﻮﺿﻮﻋﺔ ﺑﺸﻜﻞ رأﺳﻲ وﻋﺼﻮﻳﻦ ﻗﺼﻴﺮﺗﻴﻦ وأﻛﺜﺮ ﺳﻤﻜﺎ ﻣﻮﺿﻮﻋﺘﻴﻦ ﺑﺸﻜﻞ أﻓﻘﻲ. وﻳﺤﺘﻤﻞ أن ﻳﻜﻮن ﻣﻦ اﻟﻨﻮع اﻟﻘﺎﺑﻞ ﻟﻠﻨﻘﻞ ﻣﻦ اﻷوﺗﺎد اﻟﺤﺠﺮﻳﺔ اﻟﻜﺒﻴﺮة )واﻟﺜﻘﻴﻠﺔ( اﻟﺘﻲ ﻛﺎن ﻳﺤﺐ اﻟﺒﺸﺮ ﺗﺸﻴﻴﺪﻫﺎ.

tk.title: TAHTA YAPIT
tk.description: Bu taşınabilir tahta yapıt, üç ince dikey çubuktan ve iki kalın yatay çubuktan oluşuyor. Muhtemelen insanların inşa etmeyi sevdiği daha büyük (ve çok daha ağır) taş yapıtın seyahat boyu versiyonuydu.

fr-CA.title: CROMLECH EN BOIS
fr-CA.description: Ce cromlech portatif en bois se compose de trois bâtons verticaux fins et de deux bâtons horizontaux plus épais. Il s'agissait vraisemblablement d'une version voyage des modèles en pierre plus grands (et beaucoup plus lourds) que les humains aimaient construire.

en-AU.title: WOODHENGE
en-AU.description: This portable wooden henge consists of three slender vertical sticks and two stubbier horizontal ones. It was presumably a travel-sized version of the larger (and much heavier) stone henges that humans liked to construct.

landmarks.title: WOODHENGE
landmarks.description: This portable wooden henge consists of three slender vertical sticks and two stubbier horizontal ones. It was presumably a travel-sized version of the larger (and much heavier) stone henges that humans liked to construct.

landmarks.name: LM_CrossStitch

en.title: EMBROIDERED MEMO
en.description: These curios seem to perform a similar function to doodle pads and sticky notes: they helped humans remember vital information. This sewn reminder system was far more resource-intensive than pen and paper, so it was reserved for truly crucial data. This one is reminding the human of where they live.

en-GB.title: EMBROIDERED MEMO
en-GB.description: These curios seem to perform a similar function to doodle pads and sticky notes: they helped humans remember vital information. This sewn reminder system was far more resource-intensive than pen and paper, so it was reserved for truly crucial data. This one is reminding the human of where they live.

fr.title: CARNET BRODÉ
fr.description: Ces bibelots semblent remplir une fonction similaire aux blocs à griffonner et autres notes autocollantes : ils ont aidé les humains à se souvenir d'informations vitales. Ce système de rappel cousu consommait beaucoup plus de ressources que le stylo et le papier : il était donc réservé aux données les plus cruciales. Celui-ci rappelle à l'humain où il habite.

de.title: BESTICKTE NOTIZ
de.description: Diese Kuriosität scheint eine ähnliche Funktion zu erfüllen wie Kritzelblöcke und Notizzettel: Sie halfen Menschen, sich an wichtige Informationen zu erinnern. Dieses gestickte Erinnerungssystem war allerdings weitaus ressourcenintensiver als Stift und Papier, also war es für wirklich wesentliche Daten vorbehalten. Dieses erinnert den Menschen daran, wo er wohnt.

es.title: RECORDATORIO BORDADO
es.description: Este curioso objeto parecía llevar a cabo una función similar a la de las pizarras mágicas y los pósits: ayudaban a los humanos a recordar información vital. Este sistema de recordatorio cosido requería mucho más tiempo y recursos que el bolígrafo y el papel, de manera que se reservaba para datos verdaderamente cruciales. Este recuerda al humano dónde vive.

it.title: APPUNTO RICAMATO
it.description: Sembra avere una funzione simile ai quadernetti e ai post-it: aiutava gli umani a ricordare informazioni importanti. Questo sistema di promemoria cucito richiedeva molte più risorse piuttosto che il semplice utilizzo di carta e penna, quindi era riservato solo ai dati veramente necessari. Questo qui ricorda al suo umano qual era il luogo in cui viveva.

ja.title: 刺しゅう飾りのメモ
ja.description: この骨董品は、落書き帳やポストイットと似たような働きを行っているようです：つまり、人間たちが重要な情報を覚えておくための手助けをしたのです。この刺しゅうされたリマインダーシステムは、ペンと紙切れだけを使うものに比べて非常に多くの資源を使用するため、本当に重要なデータの記録にのみ使用されていたのです。これは、人間がどこに住んでいるのかについてのリマインダーです。

ko.title: 자수로 기록한 메모
ko.description: 이 물건은 접착식 메모지나 낙서장처럼 인간들이 중요한 정보를 기억할 수 있게 도와줍니다. 메시지를 자수로 기록해야 하기 때문에 펜이나 종이보다 훨씬 노동력이 많이 들어서, 정말 중요한 데이터만 기록했습니다. 이 메모에는 인간이 자신의 집 위치를 기록해놓았습니다.

zh-Hans.title: 刺绣备忘录
zh-Hans.description: 这些古董的功能似乎跟涂鸦板和便利贴类似：它们帮助人类记住重要信息。这个缝制的提醒系统比笔和纸要耗费更多的资源，所以它是留给真正重要的数据的。这一个是告诉大家他们住的地方。

zh-Hant.title: 刺繡備忘錄
zh-Hant.description: 這些珍品的功用好像和塗鴉墊及黏貼式紙條相似，都是幫助人類記住重要資訊。這種縫紉提醒方式比起紙筆更具資源密集性，因此人類用來保留真正重要的資料。這一個是提醒人類的居住地。

ru.title: ВЫШИТОЕ НАПОМИНАНИЕ
ru.description: Эти самодельные безделушки, похоже, выполняли ту же роль, что и блокноты с каракулями и стикеры: помогали людям запоминать важную информацию. Вышитая система напоминаний была более ресурсоемкой, поэтому использовалась для действительно значимых данных. Этот экземпляр напоминал людям, где они жили.

pt-BR.title: NOTA BORDADA
pt-BR.description: Estas raridades serviam a mesma função de blocos de rabisco ou papeizinhos colantes: elas ajudavam os humanos a lembrar de informações vitais. Este sistema de lembretes costurados exigia muito mais recursos que apenas caneta e papel, por isso era reservado apenas para dados verdadeiramente cruciais. Este, em específico, foi feito para lembrar o humano de onde ele morava.

nl.title: GEBORDUURDE NOTITIE
nl.description: Deze voorwerpen hadden ongeveer dezelfde functie als tekenblokken en plakbriefjes: ze hielpen mensen bij het herinneren van belangrijke informatie. Dit geborduurde systeem vergde meer moeite dan pen en papier, dus het werd enkel gebruikt voor de allerbelangrijkste gegevens. Deze notitie herinnert mensen er bijvoorbeeld aan waar ze wonen.

ar.title: اﻟﻤﺬﻛﺮة اﻟﻤﻄﺮزة
ar.description: ﻳﺒﺪو أن ﻫﺬه اﻟﺘﺤﻒ ﻗﺎﻣﺖ ﺑﺪور ﻣﻤﺎﺛﻞ ﻟﻠﻤﻼﺣﻈﺎت اﻟﻼﺻﻘﺔ وﻟﻮﺣﺎت اﻟﺨﺮﺑﺸﺔ وﻫﻮ ﻣﺴﺎﻋﺪة اﻟﺒﺸﺮ ﻋﻠﯽ ﺗﺬﻛﺮ اﻟﻤﻌﻠﻮﻣﺎت اﻟﻤﻬﻤﺔ. ﻟﻜﻦ دﺧﻠﺖ ﻓﻲ ﺗﻜﻮﻳﻦ ﻧﻈﺎم اﻟﺘﺬﻛﻴﺮ ﻫﺬا ﻣﻮارد أﻛﺜﺮ ﺑﻜﺜﻴﺮ ﻣﻦ اﻟﻮرﻗﺔ واﻟﻘﻠﻢ، ﻟﺬا ﻟﻢ ﻳﻌﺪ ﻳﺴﺘﺨﺪم إﻻ ﻟﻠﺒﻴﺎﻧﺎت اﻟﻤﻬﻤﺔ ﻣﻨﻬﺎ ﺗﺬﻛﻴﺮ اﻹﻧﺴﺎن ﺑﻤﻜﺎن ﺳﻜﻨﻪ.

tk.title: NAKIŞLI KISA NOT
tk.description: Görünüşe göre bu tuhaf icat, not yazılan bloknot ve yapışkan notlarla aynı görevi görüyor: İnsanların önemli bilgileri hatırlamalarına yardımcı oluyor. Bu dikişli hatırlatma sistemi, kalem ve kağıttan daha zor bulunan kaynaklar gerektirdiği için çok daha önemli verileri hatırlatmak için kullanılıyor. Örneğin bu, insanlara nerede yaşadıklarını hatırlatıyor.

fr-CA.title: MESSAGE BRODÉ
fr-CA.description: Ces babioles semblent remplir une fonction similaire aux carnets de notes et autres notes autocollantes : ils ont aidé les humains à se souvenir d'informations vitales. Ce système de rappel cousu consommait beaucoup plus de ressources que le stylo et le papier et était donc réservé aux données les plus importantes. Celui-ci rappelle à l'humain où il habite.

en-AU.title: EMBROIDERED MEMO
en-AU.description: These curios seem to perform a similar function to doodle pads and sticky notes: they helped humans remember vital information. This sewn reminder system was far more resource-intensive than pen and paper, so it was reserved for truly crucial data. This one is reminding the human of where they live.

landmarks.title: EMBROIDERED MEMO
landmarks.description: These curios seem to perform a similar function to doodle pads and sticky notes: they helped humans remember vital information. This sewn reminder system was far more resource-intensive than pen and paper, so it was reserved for truly crucial data. This one is reminding the human of where they live.

landmarks.name: LM_Cubecumber

en.title: CUBECUMBERS
en.description: Humans eventually noticed that their vegetation was inefficiently shaped for their storage methods. By cross-breeding cucumbers with ice-cubes scientists managed to create a chilly, six-sided, easily stackable salad plant. This is the origin of the phrase "cool as a cube-cumber".

en-GB.title: CUBECUMBERS
en-GB.description: Humans eventually noticed that their vegetation was inefficiently shaped for their storage methods. By cross-breeding cucumbers with ice-cubes scientists managed to create a chilly, six-sided, easily stackable salad plant. This is the origin of the phrase "cool as a cube-cumber".

fr.title: CONCUBIQUES
fr.description: Les humains ont fini par remarquer que la forme de leur végétation n'était pas adaptée à leurs méthodes de stockage. Puis en croisant des concombres avec des glaçons, les scientifiques ont réussi à créer une plante froide à six faces facilement empilable. C'est de là qu'est née l'expression « cool comme un concubique ».

de.title: WÜRFELGURKEN
de.description: Die Menschen stellten irgendwann fest, dass ihre Vegetation meist nicht die geeignete Form für ihre Lagermethoden besaß. Indem sie Gurken mit Eiswürfeln kreuzten, konnten Wissenschaftler eine kühle, sechsseitige und leicht zu stapelnde Salatpflanze entwickeln. Aus ähnlichen Experimenten stammt wohl auch der sogenannte „Eissalat“.

es.title: CUBIPINO
es.description: Los humanos acabaron dándose cuenta de que su vegetación tenía unas formas ineficientes para sus métodos de almacenamiento. Cruzando pepinos con cubitos de hielo, los científicos consiguieron crear una planta de ensalada fresca, de seis lados y fácilmente apilable. Por eso se dice que algo "es un cubipino" cuando es muy bueno.

it.title: CUBRIOLI
it.description: Gli umani a un certo punto si resero conto che la vegetazione aveva delle forme troppo scomode per le loro modalità di conservazione. Incrociando dei cetrioli con dei cubetti di ghiaccio riuscirono a creare una pianta per insalata fresca, a sei lati e facilmente impilabile. Questa è l'origine della frase: "Fresco come un cubriolo".

ja.title: キューブのキュウリ
ja.description: 人間たちは、彼らが食す野菜の形は収容の面から言えば、極めて非効率的であることに気が付きました。科学者たちがキュウリと氷の交配を行い、よく冷えた六面体の、簡単に重ねることのできる野菜を作ることに成功しました。これが「キューブ・カンバーみたいにクールだね」というフレーズの由来となりました。

ko.title: 오이 큐브
ko.description: 인간들은 결국 채소가 자신들의 저장 방법에 맞지 않는 형태를 하고 있다는 걸 깨달았습니다. 과학자들은 오이를 얼음과 이종 교배하여 시원하면서도 육각 형태를 보유하여 쌓는 것이 가능한 샐러드 채소를 제작했습니다.

zh-Hans.title: 立方黄瓜
zh-Hans.description: 人类最终注意到，他们的植物的形状非常不利于有效储存。通过将黄瓜与冰块进行杂交，科学家们成功地培育出了一种容易堆放的寒性六面体色拉蔬菜。这就是短语“酷得像个立方黄瓜”的来源。

zh-Hant.title: 方塊黃瓜
zh-Hant.description: 人類最後發覺到，他們植物的形狀非常不利於存放。因此，人類科學家使用冰塊和黃瓜雜交，成功配種出一種容易堆疊的寒性六面體沙拉植物。「像方塊黃瓜一樣冷靜」，這句話就是出自於這種植物。

ru.title: ОКУБРЕЦ
ru.description: Наступил момент, когда люди заметили, что форма растений плохо сочетается со способами хранения. Путем скрещивания огурцов с кубиками льда ученым удалось создать ледяное, шестигранное, удобно складируемое салатное растение. Отсюда пошла фраза «свеж, как о-куб-рец».

pt-BR.title: PEPINO CÚBICO
pt-BR.description: Os humanos, ao perceberem que suas hortaliças tinham formatos que tornavam seus métodos de depósito ineficientes, cruzaram pepinos com cubos de gelo para criar um componente de salada fresco, de seis lados, fácil de se guardar.
