É daí que surgiu a frase “é de pequenino é que se torce o cúbico pepino”.

nl.title: KUBUSKOMMERS
nl.description: De mensen merkten uiteindelijk dat hun vegetatie een inefficiënte vorm had voor hun bewaarmethoden. Door het kruisen van komkommers met ijsblokjes is het wetenschappers gelukt om een koele, zeszijdige, eenvoudig stapelbare saladeplant te creëren. Dit is de oorsprong van de uitdrukking "koel als een kubuskommer".

ar.title: ﺧﻴﺎر ﻣﻜﻌﺐ
ar.description: ﻻﺣﻆ اﻟﺒﺸﺮ ﻓﻲ ﻧﻬﺎﻳﺔ اﻟﻤﻄﺎف أن ﺷﻜﻞ ﺧﻀﺮواﺗﻬﻢ ﻟﻢ ﻳﻜﻦ ﻣﻨﺎﺳﺒﺎ ﻟﻄﺮق اﻟﺘﺨﺰﻳﻦ ﻟﺪﻳﻬﻢ. واﺳﺘﻄﺎع اﻟﻌﻠﻤﺎء ﻣﻦ ﺧﻼل ﺗﻬﺠﻴﻦ اﻟﺨﻴﺎر ﻣﻊ ﻣﻜﻌﺒﺎت اﻟﺜﻠﺞ ﺻﻨﻊ ﻧﺒﺎت ﻣﻠﻄﻒ ﺳﺪاﺳﻲ اﻟﻮﺟﻪ ﺳﻬﻞ اﻟﺘﺨﺰﻳﻦ ﻳﺴﺘﺨﺪم ﻟﻠﺴﻠﻄﺔ. وﻣﻦ ﻫﻨﺎ أﺗﺖ ﻋﺒﺎرة "ﻟﻄﻴﻒ ﻋﻠﯽ اﻟﻘﻠﺐ ﻣﺜﻞ اﻟﺨﻴﺎر اﻟﻤﻜﻌﺐ" .

tk.title: KÜP SALATALIK
tk.description: İnsanlar, sebzelerinin saklama yöntemleri için çok verimsiz biçimde şekillendirildiğini fark etti. Buz küpleriyle salatalıkları melezleyerek serin, altı taraflı, kolayca istiflenebilen salata bitkisi üretmeyi başardılar. "Salatalık gibi serinkanlı" deyimi de buradan geliyor.

fr-CA.title: CONCUBIQUES
fr-CA.description: Les humains ont fini par remarquer que la forme de leur végétation n'était pas adaptée à leurs méthodes de stockage. Puis en croisant des concombres avec des glaçons, les scientifiques ont réussi à créer une plante froide à six faces, facilement empilable. C'est de là qu'est née l'expression « cool comme un concubique ».

en-AU.title: CUBECUMBERS
en-AU.description: Humans eventually noticed that their vegetation was inefficiently shaped for their storage methods. By cross-breeding cucumbers with ice-cubes scientists managed to create a chilly, six-sided, easily stackable salad plant. This is the origin of the phrase "cool as a cube-cumber".

landmarks.title: CUBECUMBERS
landmarks.description: Humans eventually noticed that their vegetation was inefficiently shaped for their storage methods. By cross-breeding cucumbers with ice-cubes scientists managed to create a chilly, six-sided, easily stackable salad plant. This is the origin of the phrase "cool as a cube-cumber".

landmarks.name: LM_DandelionClock

en.title: DANDELION CLOCK
en.description: Human legend holds that the number of breaths it takes to blow all the seeds off a dandelion clock will reveal the time. But how does the dandelion know? Experts currently suspect the dandelion of wearing a tiny wristwatch.

en-GB.title: DANDELION CLOCK
en-GB.description: Human legend holds that the number of breaths it takes to blow all the seeds off a dandelion clock will reveal the time. But how does the dandelion know? Experts currently suspect the dandelion of wearing a tiny wristwatch.

fr.title: HORLOGE PISSENLIT
fr.description: Les légendes humaines soutiennent que le nombre de respirations nécessaires pour souffler toutes les graines d'une horloge pissenlit révélera l'heure. Mais comment le pissenlit peut-il la connaître ? Les experts le soupçonnent de porter une minuscule montre-bracelet.

de.title: LÖWENZAHNUHR
de.description: Menschlichen Legenden zufolge zeigt die Anzahl der Atemzüge, die man braucht, um alle Samen von einer Pusteblume zu pusten, die Zeit an. Aber woher weiß der Löwenzahn das? Experten vermuten derzeit, dass er eine winzige Armbanduhr trägt.

es.title: RELOJ DE DIENTE DE LEÓN
es.description: La leyenda humana asegura que el número de respiraciones necesarias para hacer volar todas las semillas de un reloj de diente de león revelará la hora. Pero, ¿cómo la sabe el diente de león? Actualmente, los expertos sospechan que el diente de león lleva un reloj de pulsera diminuto.

it.title: OROLOGIO TARASSACO
it.description: Una leggenda umana racconta che il numero di respiri impiegati per soffiare tutti i semi dell'orologio tarassaco riveli che ore siano. Ma il tarassaco come fa a saperlo? Gli esperti immaginano che il tarassaco indossi un minuscolo orologio da polso.

ja.title: タンポポの時計
ja.description: 人間の伝説によると、タンポポ時計からすべての種を吹き飛ばすのにかかった息の数が、その時の時間を教えてくれると言われています。ですが、タンポポが本当に時間を知っているのでしょうか？専門家は現在、タンポポが小さな腕時計を着けているかもしれないと疑っています。

ko.title: 민들레 시계
ko.description: 인간 전설에 의하면 몇 번 입김을 불면 민들레 시계의 모든 씨앗이 날아가며 시간을 알 수 있게 된다고 합니다. 하지만 민들레가 시간을 어떻게 알죠? 전문가들은 민들레가 사실은 손목시계를 차고 있었던 게 틀림없다고 추측하고 있습니다.

zh-Hans.title: 蒲公英钟
zh-Hans.description: 人类传说认为，吹掉蒲公英钟上所有的种子需要呼气次数可以显示时间。但是蒲公英是怎么知道的呢？目前，专家怀疑蒲公英戴着小手表。

zh-Hant.title: 蒲公英時鐘
zh-Hant.description: 人類的傳說認為，吹光所有蒲公英時鐘種子的次數會顯示時間。但是蒲公英要怎麼知道？專家們目前猜測，蒲公英戴著一個小型手錶。

ru.title: ГОЛОВКА ОДУВАНЧИКА
ru.description: Человеческая легенда гласит, что количество выдохов, необходимых, чтобы сдуть все семена с головки одуванчика, укажет на время. Но откуда одуванчик знает время? Теперь эксперты подозревают, что одуванчик носит крошечные наручные часы.

pt-BR.title: RELÓGIO DE DENTE-DE-LEÃO
pt-BR.description: Lendas humanas diziam que o número de sopros necessário para desprender todas as sementes de um relógio de dente-de-leão revelaria o horário, mas como é possível que o dente-de-leão saiba que horas são? Os especialistas suspeitam que o dente-de-leão usava seu próprio relógio.

nl.title: PAARDENBLOEMENWENS
nl.description: Er is een legende dat mensen een wens mochten doen als ze erin slaagden om alle pluisjes van een paardenbloem te blazen. Maar hoe kan een paardenbloem wensen vervullen? Experts zitten nog steeds met de handen in het haar.

ar.title: ﺳﺎﻋﺔ اﻟﻬﻨﺪﺑﺎء اﻟﺒﺮﻳﺔ
ar.description: ﺗﻘﻮل اﻷﺳﻄﻮرة اﻟﺒﺸﺮﻳﺔ إﻧﻪ ﻳﻤﻜﻦ ﺣﺴﺎب اﻟﻮﻗﺖ ﻣﻦ ﺧﻼل ﻣﻌﺮﻓﺔ ﻋﺪد اﻷﻧﻔﺎس اﻟﻼزﻣﺔ ﻟﺘﻄﻴﺮ ﻛﻞ ﺑﺬور زﻫﺮة اﻟﻬﻨﺪﺑﺎء اﻟﺒﺮﻳﺔ. وﻟﻜﻦ ﻛﻴﻒ ﻟﻬﺬه اﻟﻨﺒﺘﺔ ﺣﺴﺎب اﻟﻮﻗﺖ؟ ﻓﻲ اﻟﻮﻗﺖ اﻟﺤﺎﻟﻲ ﻳﻈﻦ اﻟﺨﺒﺮاء أن اﻟﻬﻨﺪﺑﺎء ﻛﺎﻧﺖ ﺗﺮﺗﺪي ﺳﺎﻋﺔ ﻳﺪ ﺻﻐﻴﺮة ﻟﻠﻐﺎﻳﺔ.

tk.title: KARAHİNDİBA SAATİ
tk.description: İnsan efsanelerine göre bir karahindiba saatinin tüm tohumlarını üfleyerek uçurmak için gereken nefes sayısı saati gösterir. Peki ya karahindiba nasıl bilebilir? Uzmanlar karahindibanın minik bir kol saati taktığından şüpheleniyor.

fr-CA.title: HORLOGE PISSENLIT
fr-CA.description: Les légendes humaines soutiennent que le nombre de souffles nécessaires pour retirer toutes les graines d'une horloge pissenlit révélera l'heure. Mais comment le pissenlit peut-il le savoir? Les experts soupçonnent le pissenlit de porter une minuscule montre-bracelet.

en-AU.title: DANDELION CLOCK
en-AU.description: Human legend holds that the number of breaths it takes to blow all the seeds off a dandelion clock will reveal the time. But how does the dandelion know? Experts currently suspect the dandelion of wearing a tiny wristwatch.

ar.description: "ﻟﻠﺒﻴﻊ، ﻣﻘﻌﺪ ﺷﻮاﻃﺊ، ﻟﻢ ﻳﺴﺒﻖ اﺳﺘﻌﻤﺎﻟﻪ" .

tk.description: "Satılık şezlong. Hiç kullanılmadı."

landmarks.name: LM_DeluxeBirdBath

en.title: BIRD BATH (DELUXE)
en.description: Englandland gardens were rarely large enough to support swimming pools, so humans had to content themselves with providing bathing facilities for birds. The national sport of "one-upping" one's neighbors meant the humble birdbath soon evolved into a luxurious spa-type facility complete with towels and fluffy robes.

en-GB.title: BIRD BATH (DELUXE)
en-GB.description: Englandland gardens were rarely large enough to support swimming pools, so humans had to content themselves with providing bathing facilities for birds. The national sport of "one-upping" one's neighbours meant the humble birdbath soon evolved into a luxurious spa-type facility complete with towels and fluffy robes.

fr.title: BAIGNOIRE À OISEAU (DE LUXE)
fr.description: Les jardins angleterriens avaient rarement la place d'accueillir des piscines : les humains ont donc dû se contenter de baignoires à oiseaux. Le sport national consistant à « surpasser » ses voisins a rapidement permis à l'humble installation d'évoluer en un type spa de luxe incluant serviettes et peignoirs moelleux.

de.title: VOGELBAD (LUXUSVERSION)
de.description: Die Gärten von Englandland waren selten groß genug, um Swimming Pools Platz zu bieten, also mussten Menschen sich manchmal damit zufrieden geben, Vögeln Badeplätze zu bieten. Der Nationalsport des „Übertreffens“ der Nachbarn führte dazu, dass sich das einfache Vogelbad bald zu einer luxuriösen Wellnesseinrichtung mit Handtüchern und kuscheligen Bademänteln entwickelte.

es.title: BAÑOS PARA PÁJAROS (DELUXE)
es.description: Rara vez los jardines de Inglaterralandia eran lo suficientemente grandes como para poder tener piscinas, de manera que los humanos tenían que conformarse con proporcionar instalaciones de baño para pájaros. El deporte nacional de constante competencia entre vecinos supuso que la humilde fuente para pájaros pronto evolucionase hasta convertirse en una lujosa instalación tipo spa con suaves toallas y batas.

it.title: VASCA PER GLI UCCELLI (DELUXE)
it.description: Raramente i giardini dell'Inghilterraterra erano grandi abbastanza da contenere una piscina, quindi gli umani dovevano accontentarsi di fornire vasche agli uccelli affinché questi ultimi potessero rinfrescarsi. Lo sport nazionale di "essere sempre un passo avanti" rispetto ai vicini portò presto a un'evoluzione delle vasche più umili in strutture tipo spa, complete di asciugamani e soffici accappatoi.

ja.title: 小鳥の水浴び用水盤(デラックス)
ja.description: イングランドランドの庭園のほとんどは、水泳用プールを設置できるほどの広さがなく、人間たちは鳥用の水浴び施設を用意することで満足しなければなりませんでした。国技ともいえる国民の「負けず嫌い」の気質のせいで、隣人の言う質素な水浴び用水盤は、タオルやフワフワのローブが付いてくる豪華なスパのような施設に進化したのです。

ko.title: 새 목욕대(디럭스)
ko.description: 영국나라 정원은 수영장을 설치하기에는 너무 작아서 인간들은 새들을 위한 욕조를 설치하는 것으로 만족해야 했습니다. 처음에는 작은 새 목욕대였지만 인간들이 이웃들과 경쟁을 하며 이는 곧 수건과 목욕 가운이 있는 화려한 스파 시설로 바뀌었습니다.

zh-Hans.title: 小鸟浴池（豪华版）
zh-Hans.description: 英格兰大陆花园很少有大到可以建游泳池的，所以人类只能靠为鸟儿提供洗浴设施来取悦自己。这项“让邻居相形见绌”的全民休闲活动导致这种不起眼的小鸟浴池很快就变成了配有毛巾和蓬松长袍的豪华温泉疗养地。

zh-Hant.title: 小鳥浴池 (豪華版)
zh-Hant.description: 英格蘭大陸花園鮮少有足夠的空間能蓋游泳池，因此人類只能建造給鳥用的沐浴設施來滿足自己。這項「勝過他人」的國民休閒運動，很快就演變成將普通的小鳥浴池，打造成配上毛巾和絨毛浴袍的奢華浴場設施。

ru.title: ПОИЛКА ДЛЯ ПТИЦ (ЭЛИТНАЯ)
ru.description: Англоземские сады редко бывали достаточно большими, чтобы там поместился бассейн, поэтому люди довольствовались тем, что предоставляли помывочное оборудование птицам. Национальный вид спорта «переплюнь соседа» привел к тому, что скромные поилки для птиц вскоре превратились в роскошные спа-комплексы с полотенцами и пушистыми халатами.

pt-BR.title: FONTE (DE LUXO)
pt-BR.description: Os jardins da Terra da Inglaterra raramente eram grandes o suficiente para acomodar piscinas, por isso os humanos se contentavam com fontes para banho de pássaros. O esporte nacional de “fazer melhor que o vizinho” fez com que as humildes fontes evoluíssem para instalações luxuosas de spa, completas com toalhas felpudas e roupões.

nl.title: VOGELBADJE (LUXE)
nl.description: Tuinen in Engelandland waren zelden groot genoeg voor zwembaden, dus mensen moesten zich tevreden stellen met het beschikbaar stellen van badfaciliteiten voor vogels. De nationale sport van de buren aftroeven betekende dat het bescheiden vogelbadje al snel ontwikkelde tot een luxe, kuuroordachtige faciliteit, compleet met handdoeken en zachte badjassen.

ar.title: ﺣﻤﺎم اﻟﻄﻴﻮر )ﻓﺎﺧﺮ(
ar.description: ﻧﺎدرا ﻣﺎ ﺗﻜﻮن ﺣﺪاﺋﻖ إﻧﺠﻠﺘﺮا واﺳﻌﺔ ﻻﺳﺘﻴﻌﺎب ﺣﻤﺎﻣﺎت اﻟﺴﺒﺎﺣﺔ، ﻟﺬﻟﻚ اﺿﻄﺮ اﻟﺒﺸﺮ إﻟﯽ أن ﻳﻜﺘﻔﻮا ﺑﺘﻮﻓﻴﺮ ﻣﺮاﻓﻖ اﺳﺘﺤﻤﺎم ﻟﻠﻄﻴﻮر. وأدت اﻟﻌﺎدة اﻟﻘﻮﻣﻴﺔ ﻓﻲ "اﻟﺘﻔﻮق" ﻋﻠﯽ اﻟﺠﻴﺮان إﻟﯽ ﺗﻄﻮر ﺣﻤﺎﻣﺎت اﻟﻄﻴﻮر اﻟﻤﺘﻮاﺿﻌﺔ ﻟﺘﺼﺒﺢ ﻣﺮاﻓﻖ ﻓﺎﺧﺮة ﻣﻦ ﻧﻮع اﻟﺤﻤﺎﻣﺎت اﻟﻤﻌﺪﻧﻴﺔ اﻟﻤﺠﻬﺰة ﺑﻤﻨﺎﺷﻒ وأردﻳﺔ ﻣﻨﻔﻮﺷﺔ.

tk.title: KUŞ BANYOSU (LÜKS)
tk.description: İngiltere'deki bahçelerde genellikle yüzme havuzları için yeterli alan olmadığından insanlar da kuşlar için banyo imkanları sağlamakla yetiniyor. Komşuna "her şeyde üstün gelme" geleneksel sporu, mütevazı kuş banyosunun çok geçmeden havlular ve tüylü kaftanlarla tamamlanarak lüks spa tarzı tesislere dönüşmesine neden oldu.

fr-CA.title: BAIGNOIRE À OISEAU (DE LUXE)
fr-CA.description: Les jardins d'Angleterre avaient rarement l'espace pour accueillir des piscines : les humains ont donc dû se contenter de baignoires à oiseaux. Le sport national consistant à « surpasser » ses voisins a rapidement permis à l'humble installation d'évoluer en un type spa de luxe incluant serviettes et robes de chambre moelleuses.

en-AU.title: BIRD BATH (DELUXE)
en-AU.description: Englandland gardens were rarely large enough to support swimming pools, so humans had to content themselves with providing bathing facilities for birds. The national sport of "one-upping" one's neighbours meant the humble birdbath soon evolved into a luxurious spa-type facility complete with towels and fluffy robes.

landmarks.title: BIRD BATH (DELUXE)
landmarks.description: Englandland gardens were rarely large enough to support swimming pools, so humans had to content themselves with providing bathing facilities for birds. The national sport of "one-upping" one's neighbors meant the humble birdbath soon evolved into a luxurious spa-type facility complete with towels and fluffy robes.

landmarks.name: LM_DiamondSolitaireRing

en.title: DATING LASSO
en.description: One human courtship ritual was to "capture" a mate using a lasso of solid gold and shiny rocks. Rich humans could afford larger lassos (such as this one), which increased the chances of catching someone if thrown correctly. This lasso was dropped from a helicopter, missed its target by two miles, and landed in the sea.

en-GB.title: DATING LASSO
en-GB.description: One human courtship ritual was to "capture" a mate using a lasso of solid gold and shiny rocks. Rich humans could afford larger lassos (such as this one), which increased the chances of catching someone if thrown correctly. This lasso was dropped from a helicopter, missed its target by two miles, and landed in the sea.

fr.title: LASSO DE L'AMOUR
fr.description: Un rituel de parade humain consistait à « capturer » un partenaire à l'aide d'un lasso fait d'or massif et de roches brillantes. Les humains fortunés pouvaient s'offrir des lassos plus gros (comme celui-ci), ce qui augmentait leurs chances d'attraper un congénère s'il était lancé correctement. Ce lasso a été largué d'un hélicoptère, a raté de trois kilomètres sa cible et a fini dans la mer.

de.title: PARTNER-LASSO
de.description: Ein menschliches Ritual bei der Brautwerbung war es, einen Partner mit einem Lasso aus purem Gold und glänzenden Steinen „einzufangen“. Reiche Menschen konnten sich größere Lassos (wie dieses) leisten, was die Chancen auf einen erfolgreichen Fang erhöhte. Dieses Lasso wurde von einem Hubschrauber abgeworfen, verfehlte sein Ziel um drei Kilometer und landete im Meer.

es.title: LAZO DE CITAS
es.description: Uno de los rituales de cortejo humanos consistía en "capturar" a una pareja usando un lazo de oro sólido y piedras brillantes. Los humanos ricos podían permitirse lazos más grandes (como este), lo cual aumentaba las probabilidades de atrapar a alguien si se lanzaba correctamente. Este lazo se dejó caer desde un helicóptero, no alcanzó su objetivo por dos millas y aterrizó en el mar.

it.title: LAZO DA CONQUISTA
it.description: Uno dei rituali di corteggiamento degli umani era quello di "catturare" un compagno con un lazo fatto di oro e pietre luccicanti. Gli umani più ricchi potevano permettersi lazi più grandi (come questo qui), aumentando le possibilità di cattura se lanciati nel modo giusto. Questo lazo venne gettato da un elicottero, mancò l'obiettivo di due miglia, e cadde in mare.

ja.title: デート用の投げ縄
ja.description: 人間が使っていた求婚の儀式の一つは、金合金とキラキラの石でできた投げ縄を使い、結婚相手を「捕まえる」ことでした。裕福な人間は大きな投げ縄(こちらに展示中)を購入することができ、サイズが大きいほど、正しく投げれば相手を捕まえられる確率が上がりました。この投げ縄はヘリコプターから落下し、標的から2マイル外れた場所へ行き、海へ落ちたのです。

ko.title: 데이트 올가미
ko.description: 인간들은 구애를 할 때 짝짓기 상대를 황금 올가미와 빛나는 돌로 '사로잡았'습니다. 부유한 인간들은 더 큰 올가미(지금 이 물건)을 구해서 던졌을 때 더 높은 확률로 누군가를 붙잡을 수 있었습니다. 이 올가미는 헬리콥터에서 떨어져서 목표와 몇 킬로미터 떨어진 바다에 추락했습니다.

zh-Hans.title: 求偶套索
zh-Hans.description: 人类的一种求偶礼节是用纯金闪亮的岩石制成的套索“捕获”伴侣。有钱的人可以负担得起更大的套索（比如这个），如果瞄得准，可以增加捕获的机率。这个套索是从直升飞机上扔下的，偏离目标两英里远，落在了海里。

zh-Hant.title: 求偶套索
zh-Hant.description: 人類有一種求偶儀式是用純金和閃亮石頭做成的套索來「擄獲」伴侶。富有的人類負擔得起更大的套索 (好比這個)，如果丟得正確，能夠提高擄獲他人的機會。這個套索是從直升機上丟下來的，與目標差了兩英里而落入海裡。

ru.title: АРКАН ДЛЯ ОТНОШЕНИЙ
ru.description: Один из человеческих ритуалов ухаживания заключался в том, чтобы «поймать» партнера, используя аркан из чистого золота и блестящих камней. Богатые люди могли позволить себе крупные арканы (такие как этот), что увеличивало шансы заарканить кого-то при правильном забрасывании. Этот аркан был выброшен из вертолета и, промазав по цели на три километра, упал в море.

pt-BR.title: LAÇO ROMÂNTICO
pt-BR.description: Um dos rituais de cortejo humano consistia em “capturar” um parceiro ou parceira com um laço de ouro ornamentado com pedras brilhantes. Humanos abastados conseguiam pagar por laços maiores — como este — que aumentavam significativamente as chances de captura. Este laço caiu de um helicóptero, errou feio o alvo e acabou no mar.

nl.title: DATINGLASSO
nl.description: Een menselijk baltsritueel was het "vangen" van een partner met behulp van een lasso van massief goud en glimmende stenen. Rijke mensen konden zich grotere lasso's veroorloven (zoals deze), waardoor de kans op het vangen van iemand groter werd als deze op de juiste manier werd gegooid. Deze lasso werd vanuit een helikopter gedropt, miste zijn doel met drie kilometer en landde in zee.

ar.title: ﻃﻮق اﻟﻤﻮاﻋﺪة
ar.description: أﺣﺪ ﻃﻘﻮس اﻟﻤﻮاﻋﺪة ﻟﺪى اﻟﺒﺸﺮ ﻛﺎن "اﺻﻄﻴﺎد" اﻟﺸﺮﻳﻚ ﺑﺎﺳﺘﺨﺪام ﻃﻮق ﻣﻦ اﻟﺬﻫﺐ اﻟﺼﻠﺐ واﻟﺼﺨﻮر اﻟﻼﻣﻌﺔ. وﻛﺎن ﻳﻤﻜﻦ ﻟﻠﺒﺸﺮ اﻷﻏﻨﻴﺎء ﺗﺤﻤﻞ ﺗﻜﻠﻔﺔ أﻃﻮاق أﻃﻮل )ﻣﺜﻞ ﻫﺬا(، ﻣﺎ ﻳﺰﻳﺪ ﻣﻦ ﻓﺮص اﺻﻄﻴﺎد ﺷﺮﻳﻚ إذا رﻣﻲ ﺑﺎﻟﺸﻜﻞ اﻟﺼﺤﻴﺢ. وﻫﺬا اﻟﻄﻮق ﻗﺪ رﻣﻲ ﻣﻦ ﻃﺎﺋﺮة ﻣﺮوﺣﻴﺔ واﻧﺤﺮف ﻋﻦ ﻫﺪﻓﻪ ﺑﻤﻴﻠﻴﻦ ﺛﻢ اﺳﺘﻘﺮ ﻓﻲ اﻟﺒﺤﺮ.

tk.title: FLÖRT KEMENTİ
tk.description: İnsanların kur yapma ritüellerinden biri de altın ve parlak taşlardan yapılma kementler kullanarak eşini "yakalamaktır". Zengin insanlar daha büyük kementlere (bunun gibi) para yetirebildikleri için doğru bir şekilde atıldığında birini yakalama şansları daha yüksektir. Bu kement, bir helikopterden atıldı ve hedefini üç kilometre kadar kaçırarak denize iniş yaptı.

fr-CA.title: LASSO ROMANTIQUE
fr-CA.description: Un rituel de séduction humain consistait à « capturer » un partenaire à l'aide d'un lasso fait d'or massif et de roches brillantes. Les humains fortunés pouvaient s'offrir des lassos plus gros (comme celui-ci), ce qui augmentait leurs chances d'attraper quelqu'un s'il était lancé correctement. Ce lasso a été largué d'un hélicoptère, a raté sa cible de trois kilomètres et a fini dans la mer.

en-AU.title: DATING LASSO
en-AU.description: One human courtship ritual was to "capture" a mate using a lasso of solid gold and shiny rocks. Rich humans could afford larger lassos (such as this one), which increased the chances of catching someone if thrown correctly. This lasso was dropped from a helicopter, missed its target by two miles, and landed in the sea.

landmarks.title: DATING LASSO
landmarks.description: One human courtship ritual was to "capture" a mate using a lasso of solid gold and shiny rocks. Rich humans could afford larger lassos (such as this one), which increased the chances of catching someone if thrown correctly. This lasso was dropped from a helicopter, missed its target by two miles, and landed in the sea.

landmarks.name: LM_DigitalAssistantPet

en.title: PET FOR DIGITAL ASSISTANT
en.description: Humans began to worry that their digital assistants might get lonely when not in use, so they developed digital pets to keep them company. These pets were actually just low-level computer viruses that learned to interrupt the assistant at key moments.

en-GB.title: PET FOR DIGITAL ASSISTANT
en-GB.description: Humans began to worry that their digital assistants might get lonely when not in use, so they developed digital pets to keep them company. These pets were actually just low-level computer viruses that learned to interrupt the assistant at key moments.

fr.title: ANIMAL POUR ASSISTANT NUMÉRIQUE
fr.description: Craignant que leurs assistants numériques ne se sentent seuls au repos, les humains ont développé des animaux digitaux pour leur tenir compagnie. Ceux-ci n'étaient en fait que des virus informatiques de bas étage qui ont appris à interrompre l'assistant à des moments clés.

de.title: HAUSTIER FÜR DIGITALE ASSISTENTEN
de.description: Die Menschen begannen, sich Sorgen zu machen, dass sich ihre digitalen Assistenten einsam fühlen konnten, wenn sie nicht gebraucht wurden, also entwickelten sie digitale Haustiere, um ihnen Gesellschaft zu leisten. Diese Haustiere waren im Grunde genommen nur einfache Computerviren, die lernten, den Assistenten zu bestimmten Zeitpunkten abzulenken.

es.title: MASCOTA PARA ASISTENTE DIGITAL
es.description: A los humanos empezó a preocuparles que sus asistentes digitales pudieran sentirse solos mientras no se les usaba, de manera que desarrollaron mascotas digitales para que les hicieran compañía. Estas mascotas eran en realidad virus informáticos de bajo nivel que aprendían a interrumpir al asistente en momentos clave.

it.title: ANIMALETTO PER L'ASSISTENTE DIGITALE
it.description: Gli umani iniziarono a preoccuparsi che i loro assistenti digitali potessero sentirsi soli se inutilizzati, così svilupparono degli animali digitali per far loro compagnia. Questi animali erano in realtà dei virus di bassa qualità che impararono a interrompere gli assistenti nei momenti più importanti.

ja.title: デジタルアシスタントのペット
ja.description: 人間たちは、自分たちがデジタルアシスタントを使っていない時にアシスタントたちが孤独を感じてしまうと思い、アシスタントたちのためにデジタルペットを開発しました。ところがこのペットは、実際には低レベルのコンピューターウイルスで、大切なところでアシスタントを邪魔することを学習してしまいました。

ko.title: 디지털 조수를 위한 반려동물
ko.description: 인간들은 자신의 디지털 조수가 일하지 않는 동안 쓸쓸할지도 모른다는 걱정에 디지털 반려동물을 만들었습니다. 이 반려동물은 사실은 낮은 수준의 컴퓨터 바이러스로, 중요한 순간에 조수들이 일하는 것을 방해했습니다.

zh-Hans.title: 数字助手宠物
zh-Hans.description: 人类开始担心他们的数字助手在未使用时会感到孤独，所以发明了数字宠物来陪伴它们。这些宠物实际上只是低级的电脑病毒，它们学会了在关键时刻打断助手的工作。

zh-Hant.title: 數位助理的寵物
zh-Hant.description: 人類開始擔心，他們的數位助理可能在沒有使用時會寂寞，所以研發了數位寵物來陪伴它們。這種寵物其實是低階的電腦病毒，懂得在重要時刻擾亂助理。

ru.title: ПИТОМЕЦ ДЛЯ ЦИФРОВОГО ПОМОЩНИКА
ru.description: Люди беспокоились, что их цифровым помощникам может быть одиноко, когда их не используют, поэтому, чтобы не дать им заскучать, разработали цифровых питомцев. На самом деле эти питомцы были просто низкоуровневыми компьютерными вирусами, которые должны были прерывать помощников в ключевые моменты времени.

pt-BR.title: BICHINHO DE ESTIMAÇÃO DE ASSISTENTE DIGITAL
pt-BR.description: Os humanos, preocupados com a solidão de seus assistentes digitais quando não estavam sendo usados, desenvolveram bichinhos de estimação digitais para lhes fazerem companhia. Estas mascotes eram, na verdade, um vírus de computador leve que aprendia a interromper o assistente em momentos determinados.

nl.title: HUISDIER VOOR DIGITALE ASSISTENT
nl.description: Omdat mensen zich zorgen maakten dat hun digitale assistenten zich eenzaam voelden wanneer ze niet in gebruik waren, ontwikkelden ze digitale gezelschapsdieren. Deze huisdieren waren echter eenvoudige virussen die de assistent op belangrijke momenten onderbraken.

ar.title: ﺣﻴﻮان أﻟﻴﻒ ﻟﻠﻤﺴﺎﻋﺪ اﻟﺮﻗﻤﻲ
ar.description: ﺳﺎور اﻟﺒﺸﺮ ﺑﻌﺾ اﻟﻘﻠﻖ ﺑﺸﺄن ﺷﻌﻮر ﻣﺴﺎﻋﺪﻳﻬﻢ اﻟﺮﻗﻤﻴﻴﻦ ﺑﺎﻟﻮﺣﺪة ﻓﻲ ﺣﺎﻟﺔ ﻋﺪم اﺳﺘﺨﺪاﻣﻬﻢ، ﻟﺬا ﺻﻤﻤﻮا ﺣﻴﻮاﻧﺎت أﻟﻴﻔﺔ رﻗﻤﻴﺔ ﻟﻴﻘﻀﻲ اﻟﻤﺴﺎﻋﺪون اﻟﻮﻗﺖ ﻣﻌﻬﻢ. ﻟﻜﻦ ﻓﻲ اﻟﻮاﻗﻊ ﻟﻢ ﺗﻜﻦ ﻫﺬه اﻟﺤﻴﻮاﻧﺎت إﻻ ﻓﻴﺮوﺳﺎت ﻛﻤﺒﻴﻮﺗﺮ ﻣﻨﺨﻔﻀﺔ اﻟﻤﺴﺘﻮى ﺗﻌﻤﺪت ﺗﻌﻄﻴﻞ اﻟﻤﺴﺎﻋﺪﻳﻦ ﻓﻲ ﻟﺤﻈﺎت ﻏﺎﻳﺔ ﻓﻲ اﻷﻫﻤﻴﺔ.

tk.title: DİJİTAL ASİSTAN EVCİL HAYVANI
tk.description: İnsanlar kullanılmadığı sırada dijital asistanlarının canı sıkılmasın ve yalnız kalmasın diye dijital evcil hayvanlar geliştirdi. Bu evcil hayvanlar aslında asistanın dikkatini önemli anlarda dağıtan basit bilgisayar virüsleriydi.

fr-CA.title: ANIMAL POUR ASSISTANT NUMÉRIQUE
fr-CA.description: Craignant que leurs assistants numériques ne se sentent seuls quand ils ne sont pas sollicités, les humains ont développé des animaux digitaux pour leur tenir compagnie. Ceux-ci n'étaient en fait que des virus informatiques rudimentaires qui ont appris à interrompre l'assistant à des moments clés.

en-AU.title: PET FOR DIGITAL ASSISTANT
en-AU.description: Humans began to worry that their digital assistants might get lonely when not in use, so they developed digital pets to keep them company. These pets were actually just low-level computer viruses that learned to interrupt the assistant at key moments.

landmarks.title: PET FOR DIGITAL ASSISTANT
landmarks.description: Humans began to worry that their digital assistants might get lonely when not in use, so they developed digital pets to keep them company. These pets were actually just low-level computer viruses that learned to interrupt the assistant at key moments.

landmarks.name: LM_DiscardedEmoji

en.title: ADVANCED EMOJI
en.description: Before Emoji became its own distinct language, humans would use little yellow faces to express emotions alongside written words. These could convey surprisingly subtle or complex emotions. This example shows the feeling of being angry with a friend in real life for something they did in a dream.

en-GB.title: ADVANCED EMOJI
en-GB.description: Before Emoji became its own distinct language, humans would use little yellow faces to express emotions alongside written words. These could convey surprisingly subtle or complex emotions. This example shows the feeling of being angry with a friend in real life for something they did in a dream.

fr.title: EMOJI AVANCÉ
fr.description: Avant que l'emoji ne devienne une langue à part entière, les humains utilisaient de petits visages jaunes pour exprimer des états d'âme aux côtés de mots écrits. En effet, ils pouvaient transmettre des émotions étonnamment subtiles et complexes. Cet exemple illustre le sentiment de colère envers un ami dans la vraie vie pour un acte commis en rêve.

de.title: FORTGESCHRITTENES EMOJI
de.description: Bevor Emojis zu einer eigenen, ausgeprägten Sprache wurden, nutzten Menschen kleine gelbe Gesichter, um neben geschriebenen Worten Emotionen zu übermitteln. Sie waren in der Lage, erstaunlich subtile oder komplexe Gefühle zu beschreiben. Dieses Beispiel drückt das Gefühl aus, auf einen Freund im echten Leben wütend über etwas zu sein, das dieser in einem Traum getan hat.

es.title: EMOJI AVANZADO
es.description: Antes de que el emoji se convirtiera en un lenguaje independiente, los humanos usaban caritas amarillas para expresar emociones junto a palabras escritas. Estas podían transmitir algo de forma sorprendentemente sutil o bien reflejar ideas complejas. Este ejemplo muestra la sensación de estar enfadado con un amigo en la vida real por algo que hizo en un sueño.

it.title: EMOJI AVANZATA
it.description: Prima che l'emoji divenne una lingua a parte, gli umani utilizzavano le faccine gialle per esprimere emozioni accompagnate alle parole, anche emozioni straordinariamente impercettibili e complesse. Questa esprime la sensazione di essere arrabbiati con un amico nella vita reale per qualcosa che ha fatto in un sogno.

ja.title: 発達した絵文字
ja.description: 絵文字が固有の言語となる前、人間は小さな黄色の顔と言葉を使って感情表現をしていました。これにより、驚くほど繊細、または複雑な感情を伝えることができるのです。この一例では、友達が夢の中で行ったことに、現実の世界で怒っている様子を表しています。

ko.title: 고급 이모티콘
ko.description: 이모티콘이 나름의 언어로 발전하기 전까지 인간은 문자와 작은 노란 얼굴을 함께 사용하곤 했습니다. 이걸로 놀라울 정도로 섬세하고 복잡한 감정을 전달할 수 있었죠. 여기 있는 이 예시는 꿈속에서 친구와 했던 일을 가지고 현실에서 화를 내는 것입니다.

zh-Hans.title: 高级表情包
zh-Hans.description: 在表情包成为一种独特的语言之前，人类会用小黄脸和文字一起表达情感。它们可以传达非常微妙或复杂的情感。这个例子展现了在现实生活中对朋友在梦中做的事情而生气的情绪。

zh-Hant.title: 進階表情符號
zh-Hant.description: 在表情符號成為獨特語言之前，人類會使用小黃臉配上書寫文字來表達情緒。這種符號能巧妙地傳達細微或複雜的情感。這個範例所呈現的心情是，在現實生活中對朋友在夢中做了某件事而生氣。

ru.title: УСОВЕРШЕНСТВОВАННЫЙ ЭМОДЗИ
ru.description: Прежде чем эмодзи стали самостоятельным языком, человечество использовало маленькие желтые рожицы для выражения эмоций наряду с текстом. Они могли передавать на удивление заковыристые и сложные эмоции. Этот образец показывает злость на друга в реальной жизни за то, что он совершил во сне.

pt-BR.title: EMOJI AVANÇADO
pt-BR.description: Antes de os emojis se tornarem um idioma próprio, os humanos usavam faces amarelas para expressar emoções em combinação com palavras. Estas faces demonstravam sentimentos de complexidade surpreendentemente sutil, como este exemplo que retrata a raiva por alguém por causa de algo que esta pessoa fez num sonho.

nl.title: GEAVANCEERDE EMOJI
nl.description: Voordat Emoji een afzonderlijke taal werd, gebruikte de mens naast geschreven woorden ook gele gezichtjes om emoties uit te drukken. Deze konden verrassend subtiele of complexe emoties overbrengen. Dit voorbeeld toont het gevoel van boos zijn op een vriend in het echte leven om iets wat hij deed in een droom.

ar.title: رﻣﻮز اﻟﻤﺸﺎﻋﺮ اﻟﻤﺘﻘﺪﻣﺔ
ar.description: ﻗﺒﻞ أن ﺗﺼﺒﺢ رﻣﻮز اﻟﻤﺸﺎﻋﺮ ﻟﻐﺔ ﻣﺘﻤﻴﺰة ﻗﺎﺋﻤﺔ ﺑﺬاﺗﻬﺎ، ﻛﺎن اﻟﺒﺸﺮ ﻳﺴﺘﺨﺪﻣﻮن وﺟﻮﻫﺎ ﺻﻔﺮاء ﺻﻐﻴﺮة ﺑﺠﺎﻧﺐ اﻟﻜﻼم اﻟﻤﻜﺘﻮب ﻟﻠﺘﻌﺒﻴﺮ ﻋﻦ اﻟﻤﺸﺎﻋﺮ. وﻳﻤﻜﻦ ﻟﻬﺬه اﻟﺮﻣﻮز ﻧﻘﻞ ﻣﺸﺎﻋﺮ رﻗﻴﻘﺔ أو ﻣﻌﻘﺪة ﺑﺸﻜﻞ ﻣﺪﻫﺶ. ﻫﺬا اﻟﺮﻣﺰ ﻳﻈﻬﺮ ﻣﺸﺎﻋﺮ ﻏﻀﺐ ﺻﺪﻳﻖ ﻓﻲ اﻟﺤﻴﺎة اﻟﻄﺒﻴﻌﻴﺔ ﺑﺴﺒﺐ ﺷﻲء ﻓﻌﻠﻪ ﻓﻲ ﺣﻠﻢ.

tk.title: GELİŞMİŞ EMOJİ
tk.description: İnsanlar, Emojiler ayrı bir dil hâline gelmeden önce kelimelerin yanı sıra küçük sarı suratlar kullanarak duygularını ifade ediyordu. Bunlar, şaşırtıcı derecede anlaşılmaz veya karmaşık duyguları karşıya iletebiliyorlardı. Örneğin bu, rüyada yaptığı bir şey yüzünden gerçek hayatta arkadaşına kızma duygusunu iletiyor.

fr-CA.title: ÉMOJI AVANCÉ
fr-CA.description: Avant que l'émoji ne devienne une langue distincte, les humains utilisaient de petits visages jaunes pour exprimer des émotions aux côtés de mots écrits. Ils pouvaient ainsi transmettre des émotions étonnamment subtiles et complexes. Cet exemple illustre le sentiment de colère contre un ami dans la vraie vie pour quelque chose qu'il a fait dans un rêve.

en-AU.title: ADVANCED EMOJI
en-AU.description: Before Emoji became its own distinct language, humans would use little yellow faces to express emotions alongside written words. These could convey surprisingly subtle or complex emotions. This example shows the feeling of being angry with a friend in real life for something they did in a dream.

landmarks.title: ADVANCED EMOJI
landmarks.description: Before Emoji became its own distinct language, humans would use little yellow faces to express emotions alongside written words. These could convey surprisingly subtle or complex emotions. This example shows the feeling of being angry with a friend in real life for something they did in a dream.

landmarks.name: LM_DivingHelmet

en.title: TELEVISION HAT
en.description: Many human children would cut a square out of a cardboard box, put the box on their head, and pretend to be part of a televised news broadcast. This particular metal and glass hat was presumably a television costume for rich children.

en-GB.title: TELEVISION HAT
en-GB.description: Many human children would cut a square out of a cardboard box, put the box on their head, and pretend to be part of a televised news broadcast. This particular metal and glass hat was presumably a television costume for rich children.

fr.title: CHAPEAU DE TÉLÉVISION
fr.description: De nombreux enfants humains découpaient un carré dans une boîte en carton et la mettaient sur leur tête en feignant de faire partie d'une émission télévisée. Ce chapeau en métal et en verre était vraisemblablement un costume de télévision pour les enfants de familles aisées.

de.title: FERNSEHHUT
de.description: Viele menschliche Kinder schnitten gern ein Quadrat aus einem Pappkarton aus, setzten den Karton auf den Kopf und taten so, als seien sie Teil einer Fernsehübertragung. Diese spezielle Kopfbedeckung aus Metall und Glas war vermutlich ein solches Fernsehkostüm für reiche Kinder.

es.title: SOMBRERO TELEVISIVO
es.description: Numerosos niños humanos cortaban un cuadrado de una caja de cartón, se ponían la caja en la cabeza y fingían ser salir en las noticias. Este particular sombrero de vidrio y metal era posiblemente un atuendo televisivo para niños ricos.

it.title: CAPPELLO TELEVISIVO
it.description: Molti bambini umani ritagliavano un quadrato da una scatola di cartone, mettevano la scatola sulla testa e facevano finta di far parte di un programma televisivo. Questo particolare copricapo di metallo e vetro era, presumibilmente, un costume da televisione per bambini ricchi.

ja.title: テレビの帽子
ja.description: 多くの人間の子供たちは段ボール箱を四角くくり抜き、その箱を頭に乗せて、テレビのニュースキャスターごっこをしていました。この金属とガラスの帽子は、裕福な子供向けのテレビ衣装だったのだと思われます。

ko.title: 텔레비전 모자
ko.description: 많은 인간 아이들은 골판지 상자에 네모난 구멍을 내고 그걸 머리에 쓴 뒤 자신이 텔레비전 방송에 나오는 흉내를 냈습니다. 이 금속과 유리로 만들어진 모자는 부유한 집 어린이가 사용하던 텔레비전 의상으로 추정됩니다.

zh-Hans.title: 电视帽
zh-Hans.description: 许多人类儿童会从纸板盒上剪出一个正方形，把盒子放在头上，然后假装自己在电视新闻广播里面。这种特别的金属玻璃帽大概是有钱人家孩子的电视装束。

zh-Hant.title: 電視帽
zh-Hant.description: 許多人類小孩會將紙箱割出一個方形，把紙箱戴在頭上，然後假裝自己在播送電視新聞。這個特殊的金屬玻璃帽可能是富有孩童的電視服裝。

ru.title: ШАПКА-ТЕЛЕВИЗОР
ru.description: Человеческие дети, прорезав квадрат в картонной коробке, надевали коробку на голову и представляли, что участвуют в телевизионном выпуске новостей. Предположительно, конкретно эта шапка из стекла и металла была костюмом-телевизором для богатых детей.

pt-BR.title: CHAPÉU TELEVISIVO
pt-BR.description: Muitas crianças humanas tinham o costume de recortar uma face de uma caixa de papelão e colocá-la na cabeça para fingir que eram uma transmissão televisiva. Este chapéu de metal e vidro em específico era uma destas fantasias, mas que pertenceu a uma criança rica.

nl.title: TELEVISIEHOED
nl.description: Vele mensenkinderen sneden een vierkant uit een kartonnen doos, zetten de doos op hun hoofd en deden alsof ze deel uitmaakten van een televisie-uitzending. Deze bijzondere metalen en glazen hoed was vermoedelijk een televisiekostuum voor rijke kinderen.

ar.title: ﻗﺒﻌﺔ اﻟﺘﻠﻔﺎز
ar.description: ﻛﺎن اﻟﻜﺜﻴﺮ ﻣﻦ أﻃﻔﺎل اﻟﺒﺸﺮ ﻳﻘﺼﻮن ﻗﻄﻌﺔ ﻣﺮﺑﻌﺔ اﻟﺸﻜﻞ ﻣﻦ ﺻﻨﺪوق ﻣﺼﻨﻮع ﻣﻦ اﻟﻮرق اﻟﻤﻘﻮى، وﻳﻀﻌﻮن اﻟﺼﻨﺪوق ﻋﻠﯽ رأﺳﻬﻢ ﺛﻢ ﻳﺘﻈﺎﻫﺮون ﺑﺄﻧﻬﻢ ﺟﺰء ﻣﻦ ﻧﺸﺮة أﺧﺒﺎر اﻟﺘﻠﻔﺎز. أﻣﺎ اﻟﻘﺒﻌﺔ اﻟﻤﺼﻨﻮﻋﺔ ﻣﻦ اﻟﻤﻌﺪن واﻟﺰﺟﺎج ﻫﺬه، ﻓﻴﺤﺘﻤﻞ أن ﺗﻜﻮن زي ﺗﻠﻔﺎز ﻟﻸﻃﻔﺎل اﻷﻏﻨﻴﺎء.

tk.title: TELEVİZYON ŞAPKASI
tk.description: Pek çok insan çocuğu karton kutudan bir kare keserek kafalarına koyar ve televizyonda gösterilen haber yayınının bir parçasıymış gibi davranırdı. Bu özel metal ve cam şapka, muhtemelen zengin çocuklar için bir televizyon kostümüydü.

fr-CA.title: CHAPEAU DE TÉLÉVISION
fr-CA.description: De nombreux enfants humains découpaient un carré dans une boîte en carton et la mettaient sur leur tête pour faire semblant d'être dans une émission de télévision. Ce chapeau en métal et en verre était vraisemblablement un costume de télévision pour les enfants de familles plus aisées.

en-AU.title: TELEVISION HAT
en-AU.description: Many human children would cut a square out of a cardboard box, put the box on their head, and pretend to be part of a televised news broadcast. This particular metal and glass hat was presumably a television costume for rich children.

landmarks.title: TELEVISION HAT
landmarks.description: Many human children would cut a square out of a cardboard box, put the box on their head, and pretend to be part of a televised news broadcast. This particular metal and glass hat was presumably a television costume for rich children.

landmarks.name: LM_EasterBonnet

en.title: PORTABLE SWAN HABITAT
en.description: Englandland conservationists were sometimes tasked with babysitting swan nests. This was an unpopular task as the human had to find ways to keep angry, hissing parents at bay, while also monitoring the eggs. One solution was to wear the nest as a hat, thus keeping the human well below the swan's eyeline.

en-GB.title: PORTABLE SWAN HABITAT
en-GB.description: Englandland conservationists were sometimes tasked with babysitting swan nests. This was an unpopular task as the human had to find ways to keep angry, hissing parents at bay, while also monitoring the eggs. One solution was to wear the nest as a hat, thus keeping the human well below the swan's eyeline.

fr.title: NID DE CYGNE PORTATIF
fr.description: Les défenseurs angleterriens de l'environnement étaient parfois chargés de protéger les nids des cygnes. Une tâche considérée comme pénible, car l'humain devait trouver des stratagèmes pour maintenir les parents en colère à distance, tout en surveillant leurs œufs. Une solution consistait à porter le nid tel un chapeau, assurant à l'humain de rester sous le champ visuel du cygne.

de.title: TRAGBARES SCHWANENBIOTOP
de.description: Die Tierschützer von Englandland hatten manchmal die Aufgabe, auf Schwanennester aufzupassen. Eine unbeliebte Aufgabe, da der Mensch dabei die wütenden und fauchenden Eltern fernhalten und gleichzeitig die Eier im Auge behalten musste. Eine Lösung war das Tragen des Nests als Kopfbedeckung, wodurch sich der Mensch weit unterhalb des Sichtfelds des Schwans aufhielt.

es.title: HÁBITAT DE CISNE PORTÁTIL
es.description: Los conservacionistas de Inglaterralandia recibían en ocasiones la tarea de cuidar de los nidos de cisne. Esta era una tarea impopular, puesto que el humano tenía que encontrar formas de mantener a raya a los chillones y enfadados padres a la vez que supervisaban los huevos. Una solución era la de llevar el nido como sombrero, manteniendo así al humano a salvo bajo la línea visual del cisne.

it.title: HABITAT PER CIGNI PORTATILE
it.description: Gli ambientalisti dell'Inghilterraterra a volte dovevano occuparsi di fare da babysitter ai nidi dei cigni. Non era un compito molto popolare, visto che gli umani dovevano escogitare un modo per tenere a bada i genitori arrabbiati dei cigni e monitorare allo stesso tempo le uova. Una soluzione era indossare il nido come cappello, mantenendo così gli umani al di sotto della linea visiva del cigno.

ja.title: 携帯用の白鳥の生息地
ja.description: イングランドランドの自然保護活動家は時折、白鳥の巣の子守りをするようにという任務を任されていました。この任務では、激怒してシューと音を立てている親鳥を食い止めながら卵の監視を続ける方法を模索しなければならないため、非常に不人気の任務となっていました。一つの解決策としては、巣を帽子のように被ることで、白鳥の目線の下にうまく人間を保つことができるというものでした。

ko.title: 휴대용 백조 둥지
ko.description: 영국나라의 환경 보호 활동가들은 가끔 백조 둥지를 돌보는 일을 맡았습니다. 화가 나서 날뛰는 부모들을 막아내며 이들의 알을 관찰해는 방법을 찾아내야 해서, 이 일은 인간들에게 인기가 없었습니다. 인간들은 백조 둥지를 머리에 모자로 쓰고 백조의 시선 아래에 머무는 해결책을 생각해냈습니다.

zh-Hans.title: 便携式天鹅窝
zh-Hans.description: 英格兰大陆的生态环保人士有时被派去照看天鹅窝。这并不是一项受欢迎的任务，因为人类必须想办法让愤怒的、发出嘶嘶声的父母远离它们，同时还要监视鸟蛋。一种解决方案是把鸟窝当作帽子戴在头上，这样人类就可以刚好在天鹅的视线范围以下。

zh-Hant.title: 便攜式天鵝棲息地
zh-Hant.description: 英格蘭大陸保育人士有時候需要照護天鵝的巢穴。這是一項不討好的工作，因為人類必須設法讓生氣且發出威嚇聲的天鵝父母不要靠近，同時還要監測天鵝蛋。有一個解決方法是，戴上外觀是帽子的巢穴，以便人類避開天鵝的視線。

ru.title: ПЕРЕНОСНАЯ СРЕДА ОБИТАНИЯ ЛЕБЕДЯ
ru.description: Англоземским защитникам окружающей среды иногда поручали приглядывать за гнездами лебедей. Это задание не пользовалось популярностью, поскольку людям приходилось искать способ удерживать злых шипящих родителей на расстоянии. Одним из решений ситуации было ношение гнезда вместо шляпы, оставляя таким образом человека ниже уровня глаз лебедя.

pt-BR.title: HABITAT PORTÁTIL PARA CISNES
pt-BR.description: Os conservacionistas da Terra da Inglaterra precisavam cuidar de ninhos de cisnes, uma tarefa pouco popular visto que os humanos precisavam descobrir como afastar os pais ferozes para monitorar os ovos. Uma solução adotada era a de usar o ninho como chapéu para que o humano ficasse abaixo da linha focal das aves.

nl.title: DRAAGBAAR ZWANENONDERKOMEN
nl.description: Natuurbeschermers in Engelandland werden soms belast met het oppassen op zwanennesten. Dit was een onpopulaire taak, omdat de mens manieren moest vinden om boze, sissende ouders op afstand te houden, terwijl ook de eieren in de gaten moesten worden gehouden. Een oplossing was om het nest als hoed te dragen en zo de mens ruim onder de zichtlijn van de zwaan te houden.

ar.title: ﻣﻮﺋﻞ اﻟﺒﺠﻊ اﻟﻤﺘﻨﻘﻞ
ar.description: ﻛﺎن ﻳﻄﻠﺐ ﻣﻦ اﻟﻤﺤﺎﻓﻈﻴﻦ ﻋﻠﯽ اﻟﺒﻴﺌﺔ ﻓﻲ إﻧﺠﻠﺘﺮا ﻓﻲ ﺑﻌﺾ اﻷﺣﻴﺎن اﻻﻋﺘﻨﺎء ﺑﺼﻐﺎر اﻟﺒﺠﻊ ﻓﻲ اﻷﻋﺸﺎش. وﻛﺎﻧﺖ ﻫﺬه ﻣﻬﻤﺔ ﻏﻴﺮ ﺷﺎﺋﻌﺔ، ﻓﻜﺎن ﻳﺠﺐ ﻋﻠﯽ اﻟﺒﺸﺮ اﻟﻤﺴﺆوﻟﻴﻦ ﻋﻦ ذﻟﻚ إﻳﺠﺎد ﻃﺮق ﻹﺑﻘﺎء اﻵﺑﺎء اﻟﻐﺎﺿﺒﻴﻦ اﻟﺬﻳﻦ ﻳﺼﺪرون أﺻﻮات ﺻﻔﻴﺮ ﻋﻨﺪ اﻟﺨﻠﻴﺞ، ﻣﻊ ﻣﺮاﻗﺒﺔ اﻟﺒﻴﺾ أﻳﻀﺎ. ﻛﺎن أﺣﺪ اﻟﺤﻠﻮل ﻫﻮ ارﺗﺪاء اﻟﻌﺶ ﻓﻲ ﺻﻮرة ﻗﺒﻌﺔ، وﺑﻬﺬا ﻳﺒﻘﯽ اﻟﺒﺸﺮ ﺗﺤﺖ ﻣﺴﺘﻮى ﻧﻈﺮ اﻟﺒﺠﻊ.

tk.title: TAŞINABİLİR KUĞU HABİTATI
tk.description: İngiltere'deki çevrecilere bazen kuğu yuvalarını koruma görevi verilirdi. Bu pek de hoş bir görev sayılmazdı çünkü insanların öfkeli ve tıslayan ebeveynleri güvende tutarken bir yandan da yumurtaları izlemeleri gerekiyordu. Çözüm yöntemlerinden biri de yuvayı şapka olarak kafaya takmaktı, böylece insanlar kuğunun görüş açısının altında kalıyordu.

fr-CA.title: NID DE CYGNE PORTATIF
fr-CA.description: Les défenseurs de l'environnement angleterriens étaient parfois chargés de protéger les nids de cygnes. Une tâche considérée pénible, car l'humain devait trouver des moyens de garder les parents en colère à distance, tout en surveillant les œufs. Une solution consistait à porter le nid comme un chapeau, assurant à l'humain de rester sous le champ de vision du cygne.

en-AU.title: PORTABLE SWAN HABITAT
en-AU.description: Englandland conservationists were sometimes tasked with babysitting swan nests. This was an unpopular task as the human had to find ways to keep angry, hissing parents at bay, while also monitoring the eggs. One solution was to wear the nest as a hat, thus keeping the human well below the swan's eyeline.

landmarks.title: PORTABLE SWAN HABITAT
landmarks.description: Englandland conservationists were sometimes tasked with babysitting swan nests. This was an unpopular task as the human had to find ways to keep angry, hissing parents at bay, while also monitoring the eggs. One solution was to wear the nest as a hat, thus keeping the human well below the swan's eyeline.

landmarks.name: LM_Elevenses

en.title: ELEVENSES
en.description: Juvenile humans often enjoyed a bonus snack at around 11 AM, called "elevenses". The monster writing this description can vouch for the appeal of elevenses. And twelveses. Also threeses, three-thirtieses, and three-thirty-fiveses. (It has been a long day!)

en-GB.title: ELEVENSES
en-GB.description: Juvenile humans often enjoyed a bonus snack at around 11 AM, called "elevenses". The monster writing this description can vouch for the appeal of elevenses. And twelveses. Also threeses, three-thirtieses, and three-thirty-fiveses. (It has been a long day!)

fr.title: ONZE HEURES
fr.description: Les jeunes humains appréciaient souvent une collation supplémentaire vers 11 heures du matin, sobrement baptisée « onze heures ». Le monstre chargé de cette description peut se porter garant de l'attrait des onze heures. Et des douze heures. Puis des trois heures, des trois heures trente et des trois heures trente-cinq aussi. (Encore une longue journée !)

de.title: ZWEITES FRÜHSTÜCK
de.description: Jugendliche Menschen nahmen oft gegen 11 Uhr vormittags einen Imbiss zu sich, den sie „zweites Frühstück“ nannten. Das Monster, das diese Beschreibung verfasst, kann den Reiz des zweiten Frühstücks nachvollziehen. Und des dritten. Und vierten, fünften und sechsten. (Es war ein langer Tag!)

es.title: TENTEMPIÉ DE LAS ONCE
es.description: Las crías de humano solían disfrutar de un aperitivo alrededor de las 11 de la mañana que recibía el nombre de "tentempié de las once". Y tentempié de las doce. También tentempié de las tres, de las tres y media y de las cuatro menos veinticinco (¡ha sido un día duro!).

it.title: SPUNTINO
it.description: I giovani umani spesso mangiavano uno snack intorno alle 11 del mattino, lo chiamavano "spuntino delle 11". Il mostro che scrive questa didascalia può testimoniare che sia un'ottima cosa. Anche alle 12. O alle tre e così via. (Lunga giornata!)

ja.title: イレブンシス(午前11時頃の軽食)
ja.description: 若い人間たちはしばしば、「イレブンシス(午前11時頃の軽食)」と呼ばれるおまけ的なおやつタイムを午前11時頃に楽しんでいました。この説明文を書いているモンスターは、「イレブンシス」が持つ魅力について太鼓判を押しています。それから、12時にも太鼓判を。あと、3時にも、3時半にも、それから3時35分にも(今日は忙殺されてるんです！)

ko.title: 11시
ko.description: 인간 청소년들은 오전 11시경에 '11시'라는 보너스 간식을 즐겼습니다. 그리고 이 설명을 기재한 몬스터 역시 11의 매력을 보증합니다. 12시도요. 3시랑 33시도요. 335시도요. (정말 긴 하루죠!)

zh-Hans.title: 11 点茶点
zh-Hans.description: 青少年人类通常会在上午 11 点左右享用一种奖励点心，叫做“11 点茶点”。作出这样描述的怪兽可以证明 11 点茶点的吸引力。还有 12 点茶点。以及 3 点茶点。3 点 30 分茶点、3 点 35 分茶点。（好长的一天啊！）

zh-Hant.title: 11 點茶
zh-Hant.description: 幼年人類喜歡在上午 11 點左右享用額外的點心，又稱作「11 點茶」。寫下這段說明的怪獸可以保證上午茶的吸引力。還有 12 點茶、3 點茶、3 點 30 分茶和 3 點 35 分茶。(真是漫長的一天！)

ru.title: ПОЛДНИК
ru.description: Несовершеннолетние люди часто лакомились дополнительным перекусом под названием «полдник» в районе полудня. Монстр, пишущий это описание, подтверждает привлекательность полдника. И часенника. А также пятичасенника, пятичасенника с четвертью и пятичасенника с половиной. (Это был очень длинный день!)

pt-BR.title: PRÉ-ALMOÇO
pt-BR.description: Humanos jovens costumavam apreciar um lanchinho às 11h, denominado “pré-almoço”. O monstro que vos escreve compreende o apelo do pré-almoço. E do almoço. E do pós-almoço, e do pós-pós-almoço, e do pós-pós-pós-almoço. (O dia foi cansativo!)

nl.title: ELFUURTJE
nl.description: Jonge mensen hadden vaak een extra versnapering rond 11.00 uur, namelijk het elfuurtje. Het monster dat deze beschrijving noteert, houdt ook wel van elfuurtjes. En twaalfuurtjes. En vergeet ook drie-uurtjes, drieëndertiguurtjes en drievijfendertiguurtjes niet. (Ik heb een lange dag gehad!)

ar.title: وﺟﺒﺎت اﻟﺼﺒﺎح اﻟﺨﻔﻴﻔﺔ
ar.description: ﻛﺎن ﺻﻐﺎر اﻟﺒﺸﺮ ﻳﺴﺘﻤﺘﻌﻮن أﺣﻴﺎﻧﺎ ﺑﺘﻨﺎول وﺟﺒﺔ إﺿﺎﻓﻴﺔ اﻟﺴﺎﻋﺔ 11 ﺻﺒﺎﺣﺎ ﻳﻄﻠﻖ ﻋﻠﻴﻬﺎ "وﺟﺒﺔ اﻟﺼﺒﺎح اﻟﺨﻔﻴﻔﺔ". وﻳﺠﺰم اﻟﻮﺣﺶ اﻟﺬي ﻛﺘﺐ ﻫﺬا اﻟﻮﺻﻒ ﻋﻠﯽ ﺷﻬﻴﺔ ﻫﺬه اﻟﻮﺟﺒﺎت. وﺗﻮﺟﺪ وﺟﺒﺎت اﻟﻈﻬﻴﺮة اﻟﺨﻔﻴﻔﺔ. ووﺟﺒﺎت اﻟﻮاﺣﺪة ﻇﻬﺮا اﻟﺨﻔﻴﻔﺔ، ووﺟﺒﺎت اﻟﺴﺎﻋﺔ اﻟﺜﺎﻟﺜﺔ واﻟﻨﺼﻒ اﻟﺨﻔﻴﻔﺔ. ووﺟﺒﺎت اﻟﺴﺎﻋﺔ اﻟﺜﺎﻟﺜﺔ واﻟﻨﺼﻒ وﺧﻤﺲ دﻗﺎﺋﻖ اﻟﺨﻔﻴﻔﺔ. )ﻳﻮم ﺣﺎﻓﻞ ﺑﺎﻟﻮﺟﺒﺎت اﻟﺨﻔﻴﻔﺔ! (

tk.title: SABAH ON BİR ARA ÖĞÜNÜ
tk.description: Genç insanlar sıklıkla sabah 11 civarı bir atıştırmalığın keyfini çıkarırdı. Buna da "sabah on bir ara öğünü" denirdi. Bu tanımı yazan canavar, sabah on bir ara öğününün çekiciliğini doğrulayabilir. Ve öğleden sonra üç ara öğününün, üç buçuk ara öğününün ve akşam beş ara öğününün de tabii. (Çok yorucu bir gündü!)

fr-CA.title: ONZE HEURES
fr-CA.description: Les jeunes humains appréciaient souvent une collation supplémentaire vers 11 heures du matin, sobrement baptisée « onze heures ». Le monstre chargé de cette description témoigne de l'attrait des onze heures. Et des douze heures. Puis des trois heures, des trois heures trente et des trois heures trente-cinq aussi. (J'ai eu une grosse journée!)

en-AU.title: ELEVENSES
en-AU.description: Juvenile humans often enjoyed a bonus snack at around 11 AM, called "elevenses". The monster writing this description can vouch for the appeal of elevenses. And twelveses. Also threeses, three-thirtieses, and three-thirty-fiveses. (It has been a long day!)

landmarks.title: ELEVENSES
landmarks.description: Juvenile humans often enjoyed a bonus snack at around 11 AM, called "elevenses". The monster writing this description can vouch for the appeal of elevenses. And twelveses. Also threeses, three-thirtieses, and three-thirty-fiveses. (It has been a long day!)

landmarks.name: LM_EmergencyCheeseSandwich

en.title: EMERGENCY CHEESE SANDWICH
en.description: Inscription reads: "In case of emergency, please break glass to release cheese sandwich. Breaking glass will activate sandwich alarm. Penalty for misuse of emergency cheese sandwich: £3.50"

en-GB.title: EMERGENCY CHEESE SANDWICH
en-GB.description: Inscription reads: "In case of emergency, please break glass to release cheese sandwich. Breaking glass will activate sandwich alarm. Penalty for misuse of emergency cheese sandwich: £3.50"

fr.title: SANDWICH DE SECOURS AU FROMAGE
fr.description: On lit : « En cas d'urgence, brisez la vitre pour libérer le sandwich au fromage. Briser la vitre activera l'alarme du sandwich. Pénalité pour utilisation abusive du sandwich de secours au fromage : 3,50 £ »

de.title: NOTFALL-KÄSESANDWICH
de.description: Die Inschrift lautet: „Im Notfall bitte das Glas zerbrechen, um das Käsesandwich zu befreien. Das Zerbrechen des Glases löst den Sandwich-Alarm aus. Strafe für Missbrauch des Notfall-Käsesandwiches: 3,50 Pfund“.

es.title: SÁNDWICH DE QUESO DE EMERGENCIA
es.description: La inscripción dice: "En caso de emergencia, rompa el cristal para acceder al sándwich de queso. Romper el cristal activará una alarma de sándwich. Penalización por uso inadecuado del sándwich de queso de emergencia: 3,50 £".

it.title: PANINO AL FORMAGGIO D'EMERGENZA
it.description: L'iscrizione dice: "In caso di emergenza, rompere il vetro per utilizzare il panino al formaggio. Rompere il vetro attiverà l'allarme. Multa per aver utilizzato il sandwich al formaggio d'emergenza in modo improprio: 3,50 £."

ja.title: 緊急チーズサンドイッチ
ja.description: 碑文にはこう書かれています：「緊急事態になったら、ガラスを壊してチーズサンドイッチを出してください。ガラスを壊すとサンドイッチ警報が起動されます。緊急チーズサンドイッチを悪用した場合の罰金： £3.50」

ko.title: 비상용 치즈 샌드위치
ko.description: 설명에는 이렇게 적혀 있습니다. "비상 사태 발생 시 유리를 깨고 치즈 샌드위치를 꺼내세요. 유리를 깨면 샌드위치 알람이 작동합니다. 부적절한 비상 치즈 샌드위치 사용 시 벌금: 3.50파운드"

zh-Hans.title: 紧急乳酪三明治
zh-Hans.description: 上面写着：“在紧急情况下，请打破玻璃，以拿出乳酪三明治。”打破玻璃会激活三明治警报。误用紧急乳酪三明治罚款：3.5 英镑”

zh-Hant.title: 緊急乳酪三明治
zh-Hant.description: 銘文寫道：「如遇緊急狀況，請擊破玻璃取出乳酪三明治。擊破玻璃會啟動三明治警報。濫用緊急乳酪三明治將處以罰款：3.5 英鎊」

ru.title: АВАРИЙНЫЙ СЭНДВИЧ С СЫРОМ
ru.description: Надпись гласит: «В случае крайней необходимости разбейте стекло, чтобы достать сэндвич с сыром. Разбитое стекло активирует сигнал тревоги. Штраф за неправильное использование аварийного сэндвича с сыром: 3,50 фунта»

pt-BR.title: MISTO-QUENTE EMERGENCIAL
pt-BR.description: A observação diz: “Em caso de emergência, quebre o vidro para ter acesso ao misto-quente. O alarme alimentício será ativado. A multa pelo uso indevido do misto-quente é de £ 3,50”.

nl.title: NOODBROODJE
nl.description: Het opschrift luidt: "In geval van nood glas breken om kaasbroodje vrij te maken. Breken van glas activeert broodjesalarm. Boete voor misbruik van noodbroodje: € 3,50"

ar.title: ﺷﻄﻴﺮة اﻟﺠﺒﻦ ﻟﻠﻄﻮارئ
ar.description: ﻳﻨﺺ اﻟﻨﺺ اﻟﻤﻜﺘﻮب ﻋﻠﯽ أﻧﻪ: "ﻓﻲ ﺣﺎﻟﺔ اﻟﻄﻮارئ، ﻳﺮﺟﯽ ﻛﺴﺮ اﻟﺰﺟﺎج وإﺧﺮاج ﺷﻄﻴﺮة اﻟﺠﺒﻦ. ﻳﻔﻌﻞ ﻛﺴﺮ اﻟﺰﺟﺎج إﻧﺬار اﻟﺸﻄﻴﺮة. وﺗﻘﺪر ﻏﺮاﻣﺔ ﺳﻮء اﺳﺘﻌﻤﺎل ﺷﻄﻴﺮة اﻟﺠﺒﻦ ﻟﻠﻄﻮارئ ﺑـ 05.3 ﺟﻨﻴﻬﺎت إﺳﺘﺮﻟﻴﻨﻴﺔ"

tk.title: ACİL DURUM PEYNİRLİ SANDVİÇİ
tk.description: Şöyle yazıyor: "Acil durumlarda peynirli sandviç almak için lütfen camı kırın. Camı kırdığınızda sandviç alarmı devreye girer. Acil durum peynirli sandviçinin kötüye kullanımının cezası 3,50 İngiliz Sterlinidir."

fr-CA.title: SANDWICH AU FROMAGE D'URGENCE
fr-CA.description: On lit : « En cas d'urgence, brisez la vitre pour accéder au sandwich au fromage. Briser la vitre activera l'alarme du sandwich. Amende pour utilisation abusive du sandwich au fromage d'urgence : 3,50 £ »

en-AU.title: EMERGENCY CHEESE SANDWICH
en-AU.description: Inscription reads: "In case of emergency, please break glass to release cheese sandwich. Breaking glass will activate sandwich alarm. Penalty for misuse of emergency cheese sandwich: £3.50"

landmarks.title: EMERGENCY CHEESE SANDWICH
landmarks.description: Inscription reads: "In case of emergency, please break glass to release cheese sandwich. Breaking glass will activate sandwich alarm. Penalty for misuse of emergency cheese sandwich: £3.50"

landmarks.name: LM_EmperorsNewClothes

en.title: EMPEROR'S NEW CLOTHES
en.description: This spectacular ceremonial outfit was created for a powerful ruler. The cloth is so sophisticated that it is actually invisible to unrefined observers. If you cannot see this outfit, we suggest you book a place on the Monster Finishing School package holiday.

en-GB.title: EMPEROR'S NEW CLOTHES
en-GB.description: This spectacular ceremonial outfit was created for a powerful ruler. The cloth is so sophisticated that it is actually invisible to unrefined observers. If you cannot see this outfit, we suggest you book a place on the Monster Finishing School package holiday.

fr.title: PETIT SOLDAT DE PLOMB
fr.description: Cette tenue de cérémonie spectaculaire a été confectionnée pour un puissant monarque. Le tissu est si sophistiqué qu'il devient invisible à l'œil peu raffiné. Si vous ne voyez pas cette tenue, nous vous suggérons de réserver un forfait vacances à l'Académie monstre du raffinement.

de.title: DES KAISERS NEUE KLEIDER
de.description: Dieses spektakuläre Zeremoniengewand wurde für einen mächtigen Herrscher hergestellt. Der Stoff ist so fein, dass er für unkultivierte Beobachter tatsächlich nicht sichtbar ist. Wenn du diese Kleidung nicht sehen kannst, empfehlen wir ein Urlaubspaket im Monsterinternat.

es.title: EL TRAJE NUEVO DEL EMPERADOR
es.description: Este espectacular conjunto ceremonial fue elaborado para un poderoso gobernante. El tejido es tan sofisticado que es invisible para los observadores poco refinados. Si no ves este traje, te sugerimos que reserves plaza en el paquete de vacaciones del Colegio de Perfeccionamiento de Monstruos.

it.title: I VESTITI NUOVI DELL'IMPERATORE
it.description: Questo spettacolare abito cerimoniale venne creato per un re molto potente. La stoffa è così sofisticata da risultare invisibile a occhi poco raffinati. Se non riesci a vedere questo vestito, ti suggeriamo di prenotare un posto per la vacanza con il pacchetto Scuola di ricercatezza per mostri.

ja.title: 皇帝の新しい洋服
ja.description: この美しい礼服は、強力な統治者のために作られました。この洋服は非常に洗練されており、垢ぬけない人には実際に見ることができません。この洋服を目にできていないのであれば、モンスター釣り学校のパッケージ休暇で宿舎を予約することをお勧めします。

ko.title: 황제의 새 옷
ko.description: 이 멋진 예식용 의복은 강력한 지도자를 위한 옷입니다. 너무나도 섬세해서 섬세함이 떨어지는 사람에게는 보이지 않는 옷이죠. 이 옷이 보이지 않는다면 몬스터 교양 학교 방학 패키지에 등록하시는 걸 권장합니다.

zh-Hans.title: 国王的新衣
zh-Hans.description: 这套华丽的礼服是为一位权高位重的统治者制作的。布料十分精致，没有鉴赏力的人根本无法肉眼识别。如果你看不到这套礼服，建议你报个怪兽礼仪教育学校的全包班。

zh-Hant.title: 國王的新衣
zh-Hant.description: 這一席華麗的禮服是為一位國力強盛的統治者製作的。這件禮服設計精緻，沒有鑑賞力的人是無法以肉眼看出。如果你看不到這件禮服，建議你報名怪獸禮儀學校的全包式專班。

ru.title: НОВОЕ ПЛАТЬЕ КОРОЛЯ
ru.description: Этот впечатляющий парадный наряд был создан для могущественного правителя. Платье настолько изысканное, что невидимо для неподготовленных зрителей. Если вы его не видите, то предлагаем вам забронировать место в школе-пансионе для монстров с полным пакетом услуг.

pt-BR.title: A NOVA ROUPA DO IMPERADOR
pt-BR.description: Estas fabulosas vestes cerimoniais foram confeccionadas para um poderoso governante e são feitas de um tecido tão sofisticado que é invisível para observadores não refinados. Se você não consegue enxergar esta roupa, sugerimos um curso relâmpago de etiqueta para monstros.

nl.title: NIEUWE KLEREN VAN DE KEIZER
nl.description: Deze spectaculaire ceremoniële outfit werd gecreëerd voor een machtige heerser. De stof is zo verfijnd dat deze zelfs onzichtbaar is voor onverfijnde toeschouwers. Als je deze outfit niet kunt zien, raden we je aan een plek te boeken op de Middelbare Monsterschool-pakketvakantie.

ar.title: ﻣﻼﺑﺲ اﻹﻣﺒﺮاﻃﻮر اﻟﺠﺪﻳﺪة
ar.description: ﺻﻤﻢ زي اﻟﻤﺮاﺳﻢ اﻟﺮاﺋﻊ ﻫﺬا ﻟﺤﺎﻛﻢ ﻗﻮي. إﻧﻪ رداء ﻣﻌﻘﺪ ﺟﺪا ﻟﺪرﺟﺔ أﻧﻪ ﻻ ﻳﺮاه ﺳﻮى اﻟﻤﺤﻨﻜﻴﻦ. إذا ﻛﻨﺖ ﻻ ﺗﺴﺘﻄﻴﻊ رؤﻳﺔ ﻫﺬا اﻟﺰي، ﻓﺴﻨﻨﺼﺤﻚ ﺑﺤﺠﺰ ﻣﻜﺎن ﻓﻲ اﻟﺮﺣﻠﺔ اﻟﺸﺎﻣﻠﺔ اﻟﺘﻲ ﺗﻘﺪﻣﻬﺎ ﻣﺪرﺳﺔ ﺗﻌﻠﻴﻢ اﻟﺴﻠﻮك ﻟﻠﻮﺣﻮش.

tk.title: İMPARATORUN YENİ KIYAFETLERİ
tk.description: Bu göz alıcı tören kıyafeti, güçlü bir hükümdar için hazırlandı. Kıyafet o kadar özel bir kıyafet ki yalnızca görgülü insanlar tarafından görülebiliyor. Bu kıyafeti göremiyorsanız Monster Görgü Okulu tatil paketinde yerinizi ayırtmanızı tavsiye ediyoruz.

fr-CA.title: LES HABITS NEUFS DE L'EMPEREUR
fr-CA.description: Cette tenue de cérémonie spectaculaire a été créée pour un puissant monarque. Le tissu est si sophistiqué qu'il est invisible aux yeux moins raffinés. Si vous ne voyez pas cette tenue, nous vous suggérons de réserver un forfait vacances à l'Académie monstre du raffinement.

en-AU.title: EMPEROR'S NEW CLOTHES
en-AU.description: This spectacular ceremonial outfit was created for a powerful ruler. The cloth is so sophisticated that it is actually invisible to unrefined observers. If you cannot see this outfit, we suggest you book a place on the Monster Finishing School package holiday.

landmarks.title: EMPEROR'S NEW CLOTHES
landmarks.description: This spectacular ceremonial outfit was created for a powerful ruler. The cloth is so sophisticated that it is actually invisible to unrefined observers. If you cannot see this outfit, we suggest you book a place on the Monster Finishing School package holiday.

landmarks.name: LM_ExtinctishViolet

en.title: EXTINCT-ISH VIOLET
en.description: This species of violet made its home on the limestone slopes of Southern Englandland. Thanks to the predations of overzealous human botanists, the plant was officially declared extinct in 1930. Meanwhile, the violet says it is "making sure human botanists are extinct, and then we'll see who has the last laugh".

en-GB.title: EXTINCT-ISH VIOLET
en-GB.description: This species of violet made its home on the limestone slopes of Southern Englandland. Thanks to the predations of overzealous human botanists, the plant was officially declared extinct in 1930. Meanwhile, the violet says it is "making sure human botanists are extinct, and then we'll see who has the last laugh".

fr.title: VIOLETTE QUASI-ÉTEINTE
fr.description: Cette espèce de violette a élu domicile sur les pentes calcaires du sud de l'Angleterre. Très convoitée par les botanistes humains trop zélés, la plante a été officiellement déclarée éteinte en 1930. Depuis, la violette dit « s'assurer que les botanistes humains s'éteignent, et alors nous verrons qui aura le dernier mot ».

de.title: MEHR ODER WENIGER AUSGESTORBENES VEILCHEN
de.description: Diese Veilchenspezies hat sich auf den Kalksteinhügeln des südlichen Englandlands angesiedelt. Aufgrund der Plünderung übereifriger menschlicher Botaniker wurde die Pflanze im Jahr 1930 offiziell für ausgestorben erklärt. Das Veilchen unterdessen sagt dazu: „Ich gehe nur sicher, dass die menschlichen Botaniker ausgestorben sind, dann werden wir ja sehen, wer zuletzt lacht“.

es.title: VIOLETA MÁS O MENOS EXTINTA
es.description: Esta especie de violeta habitaba las pendientes de piedra caliza del sur de Inglaterralandia. Debido a la depredación de botánicos humanos demasiado entusiastas, esta planta se declaró oficialmente extinta en 1930. Por su parte, la violeta dice que se está "asegurando de que los botánicos humanos estén extintos, y entonces veremos quién ríe el último".

it.title: VIOLETTA QUASI ESTINTA
it.description: Questa specie di violetta si trovava sulle rocce calcaree dell'Inghilterraterra del Sud. Grazie al comportamento predatorio di botanici umani troppo zelanti, la pianta fu dichiarata ufficialmente estinta nel 1930. Nel frattempo, la violetta dice che sta "aspettando che i botanici umani si estinguano, e vedremo chi riderà per ultimo".

ja.title: 絶滅しそうなスミレ
ja.description: このスミレの一種は、南イングランドランドにある石灰岩の斜面に住み着きました。熱心な人間の植物学者による破壊のせいで、この植物は1930年に絶滅したと正式に発表されました。一方で、このスミレは「私たちが必ず人間の植物学者を絶滅させてやるから、どっちが最後に笑うのかが見物だね」と言っています。

ko.title: 멸종한 듯한 바이올렛
ko.description: 이 바이올렛은 남부 영국나라의 석회암 언덕에 자리를 잡았습니다. 인간 식물학자들의 지나친 포식 행위로 이 종은 1930년대에 공식적으로 멸종했다고 선포되었습니다. 하지만 이 바이올렛은 "인간 식물학자들은 이제 모두 멸종했지, 마지막으로 웃는 건 나다"라고 말하고 있습니다.

zh-Hans.title: 绝迹紫罗兰
zh-Hans.description: 这种紫罗兰在英格兰大陆南部的石灰岩山坡上生长。由于过度热心的人类植物学家的掠夺，这种植物在 1930 年正式宣布灭绝。与此同时，紫罗兰表示，它要“确保人类植物学家灭绝，到时候我们看看谁能笑到最后”。

zh-Hant.title: 瀕臨絕種的紫蘿蘭
zh-Hant.description: 這種紫蘿蘭生長在南英格蘭大陸的石灰岩坡上。由於過度熱心的人類植物學家的捕食，這種植物在 1930 年正式宣布絕種。與此同時，紫蘿蘭表示，它是要「確定人類植物學家滅絕，再來看看誰才是最後贏家。」

ru.title: ВЫМЕРШАЯ ФИАЛКА
ru.description: Этот вид фиалки обосновался на известняковых склонах южной Англии. Растение официально назвали вымершим в 1930 году, после истребления излишне усердными человеческими ботаниками. Между тем, фиалка как бы говорит: «Надо убедиться, что человеческие ботаники вымерли, и тогда мы посмотрим, кто смеется последним».

pt-BR.title: VIOLETA MEIO QUE EXTINTA
pt-BR.description: Esta espécie de violeta passou a habitar os desfiladeiros calcários do sul da Terra da Inglaterra. Devido à ação predatória de botânicos humanos obcecados, a planta foi declarada extinta em 1930. Todavia, as violetas declaram que estão certas de que são os botânicos humanos que estão extintos e, segundo elas, “quem ri por último, ri melhor”.

nl.title: UITGESTORVEN-IG VIOOLTJE
nl.description: Deze viooltjessoort was thuis op de kalksteenhellingen van zuidelijk Engelandland. Door de predatie van overijverige menselijke botanici werd de plant in 1930 officieel uitgestorven verklaard. Ondertussen zegt het viooltje dat het "ervoor zorgt dat de menselijke botanici uitgestorven zijn en dan zullen we zien wie er het laatst lacht".

ar.title: زﻫﻮر اﻟﺒﻨﻔﺴﺞ اﻟﻤﻨﻘﺮﺿﺔ
ar.description: ﻛﺎن ﻣﻮﻃﻦ ﻫﺬا اﻟﻨﻮع ﻣﻦ أزﻫﺎر اﻟﺒﻨﻔﺴﺞ ﻫﻮ ﻣﻨﺤﺪرات اﻟﺤﺠﺮ اﻟﺠﻴﺮي اﻟﻤﻮﺟﻮدة ﺟﻨﻮب إﻧﺠﻠﺘﺮا. وﺑﺴﺒﺐ اﻓﺘﺮاس ﻋﻠﻤﺎء اﻟﻨﺒﺎت اﻟﺒﺸﺮ ﺷﺪﻳﺪي اﻟﺤﻤﺎس ﻟﻬﺎ، أﻋﻠﻦ رﺳﻤﻴﺎ اﻧﻘﺮاض ﻫﺬا اﻟﻨﺒﺎت ﻋﺎم 0391. وﻓﻲ ﻫﺬه اﻷﺛﻨﺎء، ﺗﻘﻮل زﻫﻮر اﻟﺒﻨﻔﺴﺞ "إﻧﻨﺎ ﺳﻨﺤﺮص ﻋﻠﯽ اﻧﻘﺮاض ﻋﻠﻤﺎء اﻟﻨﺒﺎت اﻟﺒﺸﺮ، وﻋﻨﺪﻫﺎ ﺳﻨﺮى ﻣﻦ ﻳﻀﺤﻚ أﺧﻴﺮا".

tk.title: SOYU TÜKENMİŞİMSİ MENEKŞE
tk.description: Bu menekşe türü, Güney İngiltere'nin kireç taşı yamaçlarını yuvası belledi. Aşırı hevesli insan botanikçiler sayesinde, 1930 yılında bu bitkinin soyunun tükendiği resmi olarak duyuruldu. Bu sırada menekşe, "İnsan botanikçilerin soyunun tükenmesini bekliyoruz. O zaman son gülen kim olacak göreceğiz." diyor.

fr-CA.title: VIOLETTE QUASI-ÉTEINTE
fr-CA.description: Cette espèce de violette a élu domicile sur les pentes calcaires du sud de l'Angleterre. Très convoitée par les botanistes humains trop zélés, la plante a été officiellement déclarée éteinte en 1930. Depuis, la violette dit « s'assurer que les botanistes humains s'éteignent, et alors nous verrons qui aura le dernier mot ».

en-AU.title: EXTINCT-ISH VIOLET
en-AU.description: This species of violet made its home on the limestone slopes of Southern Englandland. Thanks to the predations of overzealous human botanists, the plant was officially declared extinct in 1930. Meanwhile, the violet says it is "making sure human botanists are extinct, and then we'll see who has the last laugh".

landmarks.title: EXTINCT-ISH VIOLET
landmarks.description: This species of violet made its home on the limestone slopes of Southern Englandland. Thanks to the predations of overzealous human botanists, the plant was officially declared extinct in 1930. Meanwhile, the violet says it is "making sure human botanists are extinct, and then we'll see who has the last laugh".

fr.description: Techniquement c’est une bibliothèque* ? * Quelqu'un devrait en parler à un expert car il semble y avoir un problème.

de.title: 2D-MÖBEL
de.description: Eigentlich ist das ein Bücherregal*? *Kann bitte mal jemand einen Experten fragen, das scheint absolut nicht zu stimmen.

es.title: MUEBLES 2D
es.description: Técnicamente, esto es una estantería* *Por favor, ¿puede alguien consultarlo con un experto? Esto tiene que estar mal.

it.title: ARREDAMENTO 2D
it.description: Ma questa è una libreria*? *Qualcuno può chiedere a un esperto? Tutto questo non torna.

ru.description: Технически это книжный шкаф*? *Проконсультируйтесь с экспертом, тут явно что-то не так.

pt-BR.title: MOBILIÁRIO BIDIMENSIONAL
pt-BR.description: Tecnicamente, trata-se de uma estante*? *Alguém pode, por favor, verificar esta informação falaciosa com um especialista?

nl.title: 2D-MEUBEL
nl.description: Dit is technisch gezien een boekenkast*? *Kan iemand dit nog eens controleren, want dit lijkt me niet correct.

ar.title: أﺛﺎث ﺛﻨﺎﺋﻲ اﻷﺑﻌﺎد
ar.description: ﻣﻦ اﻟﻨﺎﺣﻴﺔ اﻟﻔﻨﻴﺔ، ﻫﺬه ﺧﺰاﻧﺔ ﻛﺘﺐ؟* *أﻳﻤﻜﻦ ﻷي ﺷﺨﺺ اﺳﺘﺸﺎرة أﺣﺪ اﻟﺨﺒﺮاء؛ ﻷن ﻫﺬا ﻻ ﻳﺒﺪو ﺻﺎﺋﺒﺎ ﻋﻠﯽ اﻹﻃﻼق؟

tk.title: 2 BOYUTLU MOBİLYA
tk.description: Teknik olarak kitaplık* bu mu? *Lütfen bir uzmanla kontrol edin çünkü bu pek de olması gerektiği gibi görünmüyor.

landmarks.name: LM_FrenchHorn

en.title: FRENCH HORN
en.description: This convoluted musical instrument consists of multiple valves, tubes, and 52cc human saliva. Human records offer conflicting accounts of its desirability. It was either a "valuable addition to the orchestra" or "a cacophonous and distressing racket, I don't care if your tutor says you need the practice".

en-GB.title: FRENCH HORN
en-GB.description: This convoluted musical instrument consists of multiple valves, tubes, and 52cc human saliva. Human records offer conflicting accounts of its desirability. It was either a "valuable addition to the orchestra" or "a cacophonous and distressing racket, I don't care if your tutor says you need the practice".

fr.title: COR D'HARMONIE
fr.description: Cet instrument de musique alambiqué se compose de plusieurs valves, tubes et de 52 cc de salive humaine. Les archives contiennent des témoignages contradictoires quant à son attrait. Il s'agissait soit d'un « atout(ajout) essentiel à l'orchestre », soit d'un « vacarme cacophonique et angoissant, je me fiche qu'on t'ait dit de t'exercer ».

de.title: WALDHORN
de.description: Dieses verschnörkelte Musikinstrument besteht aus verschiedenen Röhren, Ventilen sowie 52 ml menschlichen Speichels. Menschliche Aufzeichnungen enthalten oft widersprüchliche Berichte zu seiner Erwünschtheit. Es war entweder eine „wertvolle Ergänzung des Orchesters“ oder „ein misstönender und quälender Lärm, es ist mir egal, ob dein Lehrer sagt, dass du üben musst“.

es.title: CORNO FRANCÉS
es.description: Este enrevesado instrumento musical consta de múltiples válvulas, tubos y 52 cc de saliva humana. Los registros humanos ofrecen narraciones contradictorias sobre su conveniencia. Podía ser "una valiosa adición a la orquesta" o bien "un estruendo angustioso y cacofónico, y no me importa que tu tutor diga que necesitas practicar".

it.title: CORNO FRANCESE
it.description: Questo strumento musicale intricato è composto da valvole, tubi e saliva umana. I resoconti umani offrono visioni contrastanti riguardo alla sua desiderabilità: o era considerato una "preziosa integrazione all'orchestra" o "un frastuono cacofonico e fastidioso, non mi importa se il tuo maestro ha detto che devi esercitarti".

ja.title: フレンチホルン
ja.description: この渦巻き状の楽器は、複数のバルブチューブ、そして52ccの人間の唾液で作られています。人間の記録には、この楽器についての相反する説明が残っています。その内容は、「オーケストラへの貴重なプラス要素」または「不協和音で悲惨な騒音、先生にもっと練習しろと言われようとどうだっていい」と書いてあります。

ko.title: 프렌치 호른
ko.description: 이 나선형 악기에는 여러 개의 밸브와 튜브, 52cc의 인간 침이 포함되어 있습니다. 이 물건에 대한 인간들의 기록은 엇갈립니다. 내용은 항상 "오케스트라의 소중한 멤버", "불협화음이 끔찍해, 너네 선생이 연습 더 하라고 했다면서." 둘 중 하나입니다.

zh-Hans.title: 法国号
zh-Hans.description: 这件回旋状乐器包含多个阀门、铜管，还有 52毫升的人类唾液。人类记录对于其可取性提出了相互矛盾的说法。正面的说法是，“为管弦乐队增添音色”，负面的说法是，“刺耳难听的噪音，我才不管你的老师是不是说你还没练好。”

zh-Hant.title: 法國號
zh-Hant.description: 這個彎曲狀的樂器由多個活塞、管子和 52 毫升的人類唾液組成。人類的紀錄對這個樂器有著矛盾的觀點。好的話就是「為管弦樂隊增添音色」，壞的話則是「刺耳難聽的噪音，我才不管你的老師說你需要練習。」

ru.title: ВАЛТОРНА
ru.description: Этот свернутый спиралью музыкальный инструмент состоит из нескольких клапанов, трубок и 52 кубических сантиметров человеческой слюны. Человеческие записи о его целесообразности весьма противоречивы. Это либо «ценное пополнение оркестра», либо «какофоничный и раздражающий шум, меня не волнует, что твой учитель говорит, что тебе нужна практика».

pt-BR.title: TROMPA
pt-BR.description: Complexo instrumento musical composto de diversas válvulas, tubos e 52 mL de saliva humana. Os registros humanos demonstram resultados conflitantes no que diz respeito à sua aceitação: havia quem a considerasse uma “parte valiosa da orquestra” e os que diziam que era “um alvoroço cacofônico perturbador, não importa o quanto se tenha ensaiado”.

nl.title: FRANSE HOORN
nl.description: Dit gecompliceerde muziekinstrument bestaat uit meerdere kleppen, buizen en 52 cc menselijk speeksel. De menselijke geschiedenis vertelt tegenstrijdige verhalen over de wenselijkheid ervan. Het was ofwel een "waardevolle aanvulling op het orkest" of "een kakofonie en verontrustend kabaal, het kan me niet schelen of je leraar zegt dat je moet oefenen".

ar.title: اﻟﺒﻮق اﻟﻔﺮﻧﺴﻲ
ar.description: ﺗﺘﻜﻮن ﻫﺬه اﻵﻟﺔ اﻟﻤﻮﺳﻴﻘﻴﺔ اﻟﻤﻠﻔﻮﻓﺔ ﻣﻦ ﻋﺪة ﺻﻤﺎﻣﺎت وأﻧﺎﺑﻴﺐ و25 ﺳﻢ ﻣﻜﻌﺒﺎ ﻣﻦ اﻟﻠﻌﺎب اﻟﺒﺸﺮي. وﻗﺪ اﺧﺘﻠﻒ اﻟﺒﺸﺮ ﻋﻠﯽ ﻛﻮﻧﻬﺎ آﻟﺔ ﻣﺮﻏﻮﺑﺔ. ﻓﻜﺎن رأﻳﻬﻢ ﻓﻴﻬﺎ إﻣﺎ "إﺿﺎﻓﺔ ﻗﻴﻤﺔ إﻟﯽ اﻷورﻛﺴﺘﺮا" أو "ﺿﺠﻴﺞ ﻣﻔﺠﻊ ﻧﺎﺷﺰ اﻷﻧﻐﺎم، ﻟﻦ ﻳﺠﺪي اﻟﺘﺪرﻳﺐ ﻋﻠﻴﻪ ﻧﻔﻌﺎ".

tk.title: FRANSIZ KORNOSU
tk.description: Bu kıvrımlı müzik enstrümanında birden fazla valf, boru ve 52 ml insan salyası bulunuyor. İnsan kayıtlarında bu enstrümanın istenirliğine dair çelişkili ifadeler yer alıyor. Ya "orkestraya değer katan bir enstrüman" ya da "ahenksiz ve ıstırap veren bir şamata, öğretmenin alıştırma yapman gerektiğini söylediyse bundan bana ne?" olarak bahsedilmiş.

fr-CA.title: COR D'HARMONIE
fr-CA.description: Cet instrument de musique tordu se compose de plusieurs valves et tubes et de 52 cc de salive humaine. Les archives contiennent des témoignages contradictoires quant à son attrait. Il s'agissait soit d'un « atout essentiel à l'orchestre », soit d'un « vacarme cacophonique et pénible, je me fous que tu aies besoin de pratique ».

en-AU.title: FRENCH HORN
en-AU.description: This convoluted musical instrument consists of multiple valves, tubes, and 52cc human saliva. Human records offer conflicting accounts of its desirability. It was either a "valuable addition to the orchestra" or "a cacophonous and distressing racket, I don't care if your tutor says you need the practice".

landmarks.title: FRENCH HORN
landmarks.description: This convoluted musical instrument consists of multiple valves, tubes, and 52cc human saliva. Human records offer conflicting accounts of its desirability. It was either a "valuable addition to the orchestra" or "a cacophonous and distressing racket, I don't care if your tutor says you need the practice".

landmarks.name: LM_FrogWork

en.title: FROG WORK OUTFIT
en.description: During one local election in Englandland, a human candidate pledged to "make frogs useful". After the curious electorate voted for this scheme, every frog in the district was fitted with shoes and a backpack and told to "get on with it".

en-GB.title: FROG WORK OUTFIT
en-GB.description: During one local election in Englandland, a human candidate pledged to "make frogs useful". After the curious electorate voted for this scheme, every frog in the district was fitted with shoes and a backpack and told to "get on with it".

fr.title: BLEU DE TRAVAIL AMPHIBIEN
fr.description: Au cours d'une élection locale en Angleterre, un candidat humain s'est engagé à « rendre les grenouilles utiles ». Curieux, l'électorat s'est empressé de voter en faveur du projet, à la suite de quoi chaque grenouille du quartier a été équipée de chaussures et d'un sac à dos pour « aller de l'avant ».

de.title: ARBEITSKLEIDUNG FÜR FRÖSCHE
de.description: Während einer lokalen Wahl in Englandland versprach ein menschlicher Kandidat „Frösche nützlich zu machen“. Nachdem die neugierigen Wähler für dieses Programm stimmten, wurde jeder Frosch im Wahlkreis mit Schuhen und einem Rucksack ausgestattet und ihnen wurde gesagt: „An die Arbeit!“.

es.title: TRAJE DE TRABAJO DE RANA
es.description: Durante unas elecciones locales en Inglaterralandia, un candidato humano prometió "hacer que las ranas fueran útiles". Cuando el electorado votó a favor de este proyecto por curiosidad, se les pusieron zapatos y mochilas a todas las ranas del distrito, y se les dijo que "espabilasen".

it.title: COMPLETO DA LAVORO PER RANE
it.description: Durante un'elezione locale in Inghilterraterra, un candidato umano promise di "rendere utili le rane". Dopo che l'elettorato votò per questo progetto, ogni rana nel distretto fu dotata di scarpe e zaino e gli venne detto di "darsi da fare".

ja.title: カエルの運動着
ja.description: イングランドランドのある地域の選挙中、一人の人間の候補者が「カエルを役立つものにする」と公約をしました。興味津々な有権者がこの計画に対して投票した後、この地域にいたすべてのカエルに靴とリュックが持たされ、「さっさと行動開始をしろ」と言われました。

ko.title: 개구리 작업 의상
ko.description: 영국나라 지역 투표 당시 한 인간이 "개구리를 유용하게 만들자"라는 정책을 내걸었습니다. 호기심에 찬 유권자들이 이 정책에 표를 던진 뒤, 이 지역의 모든 개구리들이 신발과 가방을 착용하고 "꾸물대지 마"라는 소리를 들어야 했습니다.

zh-Hans.title: 青蛙工作装备
zh-Hans.description: 在英格兰大陆的一次地方选举中，一位人类候选人承诺要“让青蛙变得有用”。好奇的选民投票赞成这个计划后，该地区的每只青蛙都配备了鞋子和背包，他们告诉青蛙“好好干”。

zh-Hant.title: 青蛙工作服
zh-Hant.description: 在英格蘭大陸一場地方選舉中，一位人類候選人承諾要「讓青蛙有用處」。在好奇的選民投票支持這項法案下，該地區的每隻青蛙都要穿鞋子和揹背包，並被告知要「努力幹活」。

ru.title: ДЕЛОВОЙ КОСТЮМ ЛЯГУШКИ
ru.description: Во время местных выборов в Англоземье кандидат-человек пообещал «сделать лягушек полезными». После того, как любознательные избиратели проголосовали за этот проект, каждую лягушку в округе экипировали ботинками и рюкзаком и приказали «привыкать».

pt-BR.title: UNIFORME DE TRABALHO PARA SAPOS
pt-BR.description: Numa eleição local na Terra da Inglaterra, um candidato humano prometeu “tornar os sapos úteis”. Depois de o eleitorado curioso comprar a ideia, todos os sapos do distrito ganharam sapatos e mochilas para botar a mão na massa.

nl.title: KIKKERWERKKLEDING
nl.description: Tijdens een lokale verkiezing in Engelandland beloofde een menselijke kandidaat om "kikkers nuttig te maken". Nadat de nieuwsgierige kiezers voor deze regeling hadden gestemd, werd elke kikker in het district voorzien van schoenen en een rugzak en werd deze verteld dat hij "aan de slag" moest.

ar.title: زي ﻋﻤﻞ اﻟﻀﻔﺪع
ar.description: ﺧﻼل أﺣﺪ اﻻﻧﺘﺨﺎﺑﺎت اﻟﻤﺤﻠﻴﺔ ﻓﻲ إﻧﺠﻠﺘﺮا، ﺗﻌﻬﺪ أﺣﺪ اﻟﻤﺮﺷﺤﻴﻦ اﻟﺒﺸﺮ ﺑـ "ﺗﺤﻮﻳﻞ اﻟﻀﻔﺎدع إﻟﯽ ﻛﺎﺋﻨﺎت ﻣﻔﻴﺪة". وﺑﻌﺪ أن ﺻﻮﺗﺖ ﺟﻤﻮع اﻟﻨﺎﺧﺒﻴﻦ اﻟﻤﺤﺒﺔ ﻟﻼﺳﺘﻄﻼع ﻟﺼﺎﻟﺢ ﺧﻄﺘﻪ، ﺗﻢ ﺗﺰوﻳﺪ ﻛﻞ ﺿﻔﺪﻋﺔ ﻓﻲ اﻟﻤﻨﻄﻘﺔ ﺑﺤﺬاء وﺣﻘﻴﺒﺔ ﻇﻬﺮ وإﺧﺒﺎرﻫﺎ ﺑﺄن " ﺗﺘﻌﺎﻳﺶ ﻣﻊ اﻷﻣﺮ" .

tk.title: KURBAĞA İŞ KIYAFETİ
tk.description: İngiltere'de bir yerel seçimde bir insan aday "kurbağaları işe yarar hâle" getirme vaadinde bulunmuştu. Ne olacağını merak eden seçmenler de bu tasarıya evet oyu verdiler. Ardından bölgedeki tüm kurbağalara ayakkabı giydirildi, sırt çantası takıldı ve "işe koyulmaları" söylendi.

fr-CA.title: CHIENNE DE TRAVAIL POUR GRENOUILLE
fr-CA.description: Au cours d'une élection locale en Angleterre, un candidat humain s'est engagé à « rendre les grenouilles utiles ». Curieusement, l'électorat a voté en faveur du projet, suite à quoi chaque grenouille du quartier a reçu des chaussures et un sac à dos pour « se prendre en main ».

en-AU.title: FROG WORK OUTFIT
en-AU.description: During one local election in Englandland, a human candidate pledged to "make frogs useful". After the curious electorate voted for this scheme, every frog in the district was fitted with shoes and a backpack and told to "get on with it".

landmarks.title: FROG WORK OUTFIT
landmarks.description: During one local election in Englandland, a human candidate pledged to "make frogs useful". After the curious electorate voted for this scheme, every frog in the district was fitted with shoes and a backpack and told to "get on with it".

landmarks.name: LM_GardenSpade

en.title: A GARDEN SPOON
en.description: This Garden Spoon actually serves a dual purpose in the museum. Right now it is functioning as an exhibit in its own right - Englandlanders used them to poke holes in their gardens. But sometimes we loan it out to archaeological sites so monsters can use it to dig for even more human objects!

en-GB.title: A GARDEN SPOON
en-GB.description: This Garden Spoon actually serves a dual purpose in the museum. Right now it is functioning as an exhibit in its own right - Englandlanders used them to poke holes in their gardens. But sometimes we loan it out to archaeological sites so monsters can use it to dig for even more human objects!

fr.title: CUILLÈRE DE JARDIN
fr.description: Cette cuillère de jardin remplit une double fonction au musée. À l'heure actuelle, elle est une exposition à part entière ; les Angleterriens l'utilisaient pour percer des trous dans leurs jardins. Mais il arrive que nous la prêtions à des sites archéologiques pour aider les monstres à déterrer encore plus d'objets humains !

de.title: EIN GARTENLÖFFEL
de.description: Dieser Gartenlöffel dient im Museum zweierlei Nutzen: Derzeit fungiert er als eigenes Ausstellungsstück – Englandländer nutzten sie, um Löcher in ihre Gärten zu bohren. Aber manchmal vermieten wir ihn an archäologische Ausgrabungsstätten, damit Monster damit nach weiteren menschlichen Objekten graben können!

es.title: UNA CUCHARA DE JARDÍN
es.description: Esta cuchara de jardín sirve para un propósito doble en el museo. Ahora mismo está funcionando como pieza de exposición por derecho propio (los de Inglaterralandia las usaban para picar agujeros en sus jardines). ¡Pero, a veces, se la prestamos a excavaciones arqueológicas para que los monstruos puedan usarla para cavar y encontrar aún más objetos humanos!

it.title: CUCCHIAIO DA GIARDINO
it.description: Questo cucchiaio da giardino ha un doppio scopo nel museo. Al momento funziona come mostra a sé, in quanto gli inglesesi lo usavano per fare delle buche nei loro giardini. Ma a volte lo prestiamo a siti archeologici cosicché i mostri possano usarlo per scavare in cerca di altri oggetti umani!

ja.title: 庭のスプーン
ja.description: 実はこの庭のスプーンは、本博物館では2つの機能を果たしています。現在は展示品としての役割を果たしていますが、イングランドランドの人々は庭に穴を掘るために使用していました。ですが、私たちは時折これを遺跡発掘現場で貸し出して、モンスターが人間のオブジェクトを発掘できるようにしてあげています！

ko.title: 정원 삽
ko.description: 이 박물관에서 정원 삽은 두 가지 역할을 합니다. 옛날 영국나라 사람들이 정원에 구멍을 낼 때 사용했던 물건으로서 전시되는 동시에, 가끔 고고학 발굴지에서 몬스터들이 더 많은 인간 물품을 발굴할 때 사용하기도 하죠!

zh-Hans.title: 园艺锹
zh-Hans.description: 这把园艺锹在博物馆里实际上有双重用途。现在，它它本身就是一个展览品 – 英格兰大陆的人还用它们在花园挖洞。但有时我们会把它借给考古遗址，这样怪兽们就可以用它来挖掘更多的人类物品了！

zh-Hant.title: 園藝鏟
zh-Hant.description: 這個園藝鏟在博物館其實有兩種用途。如今，這個展品發揮它原有的功用：英格蘭大陸的人以前用這種工具在花園戳洞。但是，我們有時候會借到考古遺址使用，這樣怪獸才能挖掘出更多人類的物品！

ru.title: САДОВАЯ ЛОЖКА
ru.description: Вообще-то, у садовой ложки в музее две задачи. Прямо сейчас она выполняет роль выставочного экспоната — англоземцы использовали ее, чтобы протыкать дыры в своих садах. Но иногда мы передаем ее на археологические площадки, чтобы монстры могли выкопать еще больше человеческих объектов!

pt-BR.title: COLHER DE JARDIM
pt-BR.description: Esta colher de jardim serve para duas coisas no museu: no momento, é a exposição da ferramenta com a qual o povo da Terra da Inglaterra furava seus jardins, mas, às vezes, nós a emprestamos a sítios arqueológicos para que os monstros possam usá-la para escavar ainda mais objetos humanos!

nl.title: EEN TUINLEPEL
nl.description: Deze tuinlepel dient eigenlijk een tweeledig doel in het museum. Op dit moment fungeert hij als een tentoonstelling op zich - de Engelandlanders gebruikten hem om gaten in hun tuinen te prikken. Maar soms lenen we hem uit aan archeologische vindplaatsen, zodat monsters hem kunnen gebruiken om naar nog meer menselijke voorwerpen te graven!

ar.title: ﻣﺠﺮﻓﺔ ﻟﻠﺤﺪاﺋﻖ
ar.description: ﻓﻲ اﻟﻮاﻗﻊ ﺗﻘﻮم ﻣﺠﺮﻓﺔ اﻟﺤﺪاﺋﻖ ﻫﺬه ﺑﻮﻇﻴﻔﺔ ﻣﺰدوﺟﺔ ﻓﻲ اﻟﻤﺘﺤﻒ. ﺗﻌﺮض اﻵن ﻓﻲ اﻟﻤﺘﺤﻒ ﺑﺤﺪ ذاﺗﻬﺎ - ﻛﺎن اﻹﻧﺠﻠﻴﺰ ﻳﺴﺘﺨﺪﻣﻮﻧﻬﺎ ﻓﻲ ﺣﻔﺮ ﺛﻘﻮب ﻓﻲ ﺣﺪاﺋﻘﻬﻢ. وﻟﻜﻦ ﻧﺤﻦ ﻧﻌﻴﺮﻫﺎ أﺣﻴﺎﻧﺎ ﻟﻠﻤﻮاﻗﻊ اﻷﺛﺮﻳﺔ ﻟﻴﺴﺘﺨﺪﻣﻬﺎ اﻟﻮﺣﻮش ﻓﻲ اﻟﺤﻔﺮ ﻟﻠﺘﻨﻘﻴﺐ ﻋﻦ اﻟﻤﺰﻳﺪ ﻣﻦ اﻷﻏﺮاض اﻟﺒﺸﺮﻳﺔ!

tk.title: BAHÇE KAŞIĞI
tk.description: Bu Bahçe Kaşığı müzede iki amaç için kullanılıyor. Şu anda sergi eseri olarak işlev görüyor. İngiltereliler bu kaşıkları bahçelerinde delik açmak için kullanırlardı. Tabii bazen arkeolojik kazı yerlerine ödünç veriyoruz ki canavarlar daha fazla insan nesnesi bulabilmek için kazı yaparken kullanabilsin!

fr-CA.title: CUILLÈRE DE JARDIN
fr-CA.description: Cette cuillère de jardin remplit une double fonction au musée. À l'heure actuelle, elle est une pièce d'exposition à part entière; les Angleterriens l'utilisaient pour percer des trous dans leurs jardins. Mais il arrive aussi que nous la prêtions à des sites archéologiques pour aider les monstres à déterrer encore plus d'objets humains!

en-AU.title: A GARDEN SPOON
en-AU.description: This Garden Spoon actually serves a dual purpose in the museum. Right now it is functioning as an exhibit in its own right - Englandlanders used them to poke holes in their gardens. But sometimes we loan it out to archaeological sites so monsters can use it to dig for even more human objects!

landmarks.title: A GARDEN SPOON
landmarks.description: This Garden Spoon actually serves a dual purpose in the museum. Right now it is functioning as an exhibit in its own right - Englandlanders used them to poke holes in their gardens. But sometimes we loan it out to archaeological sites so monsters can use it to dig for even more human objects!

landmarks.name: LM_GasPump

en.title: FOUNTAIN SODA (FUEL EDITION)
en.description: Much like humans, each mode of human transportation had its own soda preference. The options at this particular dispenser are, from left to right, Leaded, Unleaded, Diesel, and Blue Raspberry.

en-GB.title: FOUNTAIN SODA (FUEL EDITION)
en-GB.description: Much like humans, each mode of human transportation had its own soda preference. The options at this particular dispenser are, from left to right, Leaded, Unleaded, Diesel, and Blue Raspberry.

fr.title: FOUNTAINE À SODA (VERSION CARBURANT)
