landmarks.name: LM_LeechCleaner

en.title: LEECH-POWERED STAIN REMOVER
en.description: Cleaning was an experimental area of leech tech. This stain removal system let humans hire specialist leeches to suck up spillages. Leeches proved effective (but rowdy) on red wine and nail varnish, but refused ketchup ("Too sweet!") and instant coffee ("Undrinkable swill!").

en-GB.title: LEECH-POWERED STAIN REMOVER
en-GB.description: Cleaning was an experimental area of leech tech. This stain removal system let humans hire specialist leeches to suck up spillages. Leeches proved effective (but rowdy) on red wine and nail varnish, but refused ketchup ("Too sweet!") and instant coffee ("Undrinkable swill!").

fr.title: DÉTACHANT SANGSUE
fr.description: Le nettoyage était un domaine expérimental de la technologie sangsue. Ce système d'élimination des taches permettait aux humains d'embaucher des sangsues entraînées pour aspirer les liquides renversés. Celles-ci se sont avérées efficaces (bien que bagarreuses) sur le vin rouge et le vernis à ongles, mais ont refusé le ketchup (« trop sucré ! ») et le café instantané (« des eaux usées imbuvables ! »).

de.title: EGELBETRIEBENER FLECKENTFERNER
de.description: Reinigung war ein experimentelles Feld der Egeltechnologie. Bei diesem Fleckentferner wurden speziell ausgebildete Egel eingesetzt, um Verschüttetes aufzusaugen. Die Egel waren effektiv (wenn auch rauflustig) bei Rotwein und Nagellack, lehnten aber Ketchup („zu süß!“) und Instant-Kaffee („untrinkbares Gebräu“!) ab.

es.title: QUITAMANCHAS IMPULSADO POR SANGUIJUELAS
es.description: La limpieza era un área experimental de la tecnología de sanguijuelas. Este sistema de eliminación de manchas llevó a los humanos a contratar a sanguijuelas especialistas para succionar vertidos. Las sanguijuelas demostraron ser efectivas (aunque escandalosas) con el vino tinto y el esmalte de uñas, pero se negaban a succionar kétchup ("¡demasiado dulce!") y el café instantáneo ("¡bazofia imbebible!").

it.title: SMACCHIATORE SANGUISUGA
it.description: La pulizia era un'area sperimentale della tecnologia sanguisuga. Il sistema di rimozione delle macchie permise agli umani di assumere sanguisughe specializzate nell'aspirazione di sostanze liquide riversate. Le sanguisughe si dimostrarono efficaci (ma chiassose) con il vino rosso e lo smalto per unghie, ma rifiutarono il ketchup ("Troppo dolce!") e il caffè istantaneo ("Brodaglia imbevibile!").

ja.title: ヒル動力の染み抜き
ja.description: ヒル技術のなかでも掃除は実験的な分野でした。この染み抜きシステムでは、人間がこの作業に特化したヒルを雇い、こぼしたものを吸い込ませました。ヒルは赤ワインやマニキュア液に対しては効果的である(仕事は乱暴ですが)と証明されましたが、ケチャップ(「甘すぎなんです！」)やインスタントコーヒー(「飲めたモンじゃない！」)を吸い込むことは断固拒否していました。

ko.title: 거머리 기술 얼룩 제거제
ko.description: 거머리 기술에서 청소는 아직 실험적인 영역이었습니다. 인간들이 사용한 이 얼룩 제거제는 전문 거머리들을 사용하여 얼룩을 빨아먹게 하는 것이었습니다. 거머리들은 레드 와인이나 매니큐어 얼룩 제거에는 뛰어났지만(좀 게걸스러웠음), 케첩과(너무 달아서) 인스턴트 커피(역겨운 검은 물!) 얼룩 제거는 거부했습니다.

zh-Hans.title: 水蛭动力去污器
zh-Hans.description: 清洁是水蛭技术的试验领域。该去污系统可供人类雇用专业的水蛭来吸收溢出物。事实证明，水蛭对红酒和指甲油很有效（但很粗暴），但它们拒绝番茄酱（“太甜了！”）和速溶咖啡（“像泔水一样难以下咽！”）。

zh-Hant.title: 水蛭動力去漬器
zh-Hant.description: 清潔是水蛭技術中的實驗性領域。這種去漬方式可讓人類僱用專門的水蛭來吸收溢出物。水蛭能有效 (但粗暴) 清除紅酒和指甲油，但不願清除番茄醬 (「太甜了！」) 和即溶咖啡 (「難喝的東西！」)。

ru.title: ПИЯВОЧНЫЙ ПЯТНОВЫВОДИТЕЛЬ
ru.description: Уборка была экспериментальной областью пиявочных технологий. Согласно данной схеме удаления пятен человек приглашал специальных пиявок, чтобы те высасывали разлившиеся жидкости. Пиявки зарекомендовали себя эффективными (но буйными) в отношении вина и лака для ногтей, но отказались работать с кетчупом («Слишком сладкий!») и растворимым кофе («Пойло, непригодное для питья!»).

pt-BR.title: REMOVEDOR DE MANCHAS A SANGUESSUGA
pt-BR.description: A limpeza foi uma área experimental para a tecnologia a sanguessuga. Este sistema de remoção de manchas permitia que os humanos contratassem sanguessugas especialistas que consumiam derramamentos. Apesar de um pouco ríspidas, as sanguessugas eram eficazes no recolhimento de vinho tinto e esmalte de unha, mas recusavam-se a consumir ketchup (“Doce demais!”) e café solúvel (“Lavagem!”).

nl.title: VLEKKENVERWIJDERAAR OP BLOEDZUIGERS
nl.description: Schoonmaken met bloedzuigertechnologie was vrij experimenteel. Gespecialiseerde bloedzuigers hielpen mensen met het opzuigen van gemorste vloeistoffen. De bloedzuigers waren erg efficiënt (maar onstuimig) bij het verwijderen van rode wijn en nagellakremover, maar weigerden ketchup (te zoet!) en oploskoffie (ondrinkbare troep!).

ar.title: ﻣﺰﻳﻞ ﺑﻘﻊ ﻳﻌﻤﻞ ﺑﺎﻟﻌﻠﻘﻴﺎت
ar.description: ﻛﺎن اﻟﺘﻨﻈﻴﻒ ﻣﺠﺎﻻ ﺗﺠﺮﻳﺒﻴﺎ ﻓﻲ ﺗﻘﻨﻴﺔ اﻟﻌﻠﻘﻴﺎت. ﻓﺄﺗﺎح ﻧﻈﺎم إزاﻟﺔ اﻟﺒﻘﻊ ﻫﺬا ﻟﻠﺒﺸﺮ ﺗﺄﺟﻴﺮ ﻋﻠﻘﻴﺎت ﻣﺘﺨﺼﺼﺔ ﺑﻬﺪف ﻟﻌﻖ اﻻﻧﺴﻜﺎﺑﺎت. أﺛﺒﺘﺖ اﻟﻌﻠﻘﻴﺎت ﻓﻌﺎﻟﻴﺘﻬﺎ )ﻟﻜﻨﻬﺎ أﺣﺪﺛﺖ ﺿﻮﺿﺎء ﻋﺎﻟﻴﺔ( ﻓﻲ أﺛﻨﺎء ﻟﻌﻖ اﻟﻨﺒﻴﺬ اﻷﺣﻤﺮ وﻃﻼء اﻷﻇﺎﻓﺮ وﻟﻜﻨﻬﺎ رﻓﻀﺖ ﻟﻌﻖ اﻟﻜﺎﺗﺸﺐ )"ﻻرﺗﻔﺎع ﻧﺴﺒﺔ اﻟﺴﻜﺮ ﻓﻴﻪ"( واﻟﻘﻬﻮة ﺳﺮﻳﻌﺔ اﻟﺘﺤﻀﻴﺮ )"ﻓﻬﻲ ﺷﺮاب ﻏﻴﺮ ﺻﺎﻟﺢ ﻟﻠﺸﺮب!"( .

tk.title: SÜLÜKLE ÇALIŞAN LEKE ÇIKARICI
tk.description: Temizlik, deneysel bir sülük teknolojisi alanıydı. Bu leke çıkarma sistemi, insanların lekeleri emen uzman sülükler almalarını sağlıyordu. Sülüklerin kırmızı şarap ve oje lekelerine karşı etkili olduğu ama lekeleri çıkarırken çok gürültü yaptığı kanıtlandı. Fakat sülükler, ketçap ("Fazla tatlı!") ve hazır kahve ("Bulaşık suyu gibi!") lekelerini çıkarmayı reddettiler.

fr-CA.title: DÉTACHANT SANGSUE
fr-CA.description: Le nettoyage était un domaine expérimental de la technologie sangsue. Ce système d'élimination des taches permettait aux humains d'embaucher des sangsues spécialisées dans l'aspiration de liquides renversés. Celles-ci se sont avérées efficaces (bien que bagarreuses) sur le vin rouge et le vernis à ongles, mais ont refusé le ketchup (« trop sucré! ») et le café instantané (« des eaux de fond de lave-vaisselle! »).

en-AU.title: LEECH-POWERED STAIN REMOVER
en-AU.description: Cleaning was an experimental area of leech tech. This stain removal system let humans hire specialist leeches to suck up spillages. Leeches proved effective (but rowdy) on red wine and nail varnish, but refused ketchup ("Too sweet!") and instant coffee ("Undrinkable swill!").

landmarks.title: LEECH-POWERED STAIN REMOVER
landmarks.description: Cleaning was an experimental area of leech tech. This stain removal system let humans hire specialist leeches to suck up spillages. Leeches proved effective (but rowdy) on red wine and nail varnish, but refused ketchup ("Too sweet!") and instant coffee ("Undrinkable swill!").

landmarks.name: LM_LeechDifferenceEngine

en.title: LEECH-POWERED PERCENTAGE GENERATOR
en.description: While this device may seem primitive compared with Monster Calculators, these percentage generators made efficient use of the leech's innate ability to work out ratios. Fun fact: leeches were sometimes called "tax accountant worms"!

en-GB.title: LEECH-POWERED PERCENTAGE GENERATOR
en-GB.description: While this device may seem primitive compared with Monster Calculators, these percentage generators made efficient use of the leech's innate ability to work out ratios. Fun fact: leeches were sometimes called "tax accountant worms"!

fr.title: GÉNÉRATEUR DE POURCENTAGE SANGSUE
fr.description: Bien que cet appareil puisse sembler primitif comparé aux calculatrices monstres, ces générateurs de pourcentages ont su tirer parti des capacités innées des sangsues à calculer les ratios. Fait amusant : les sangsues étaient parfois appelées « vers fiscaux » !

de.title: EGELBETRIEBENER PROZENTGENERATOR
de.description: Dieses Gerät mag im Vergleich zu Monster-Taschenrechnern zwar primitiv erscheinen, nutzte aber auf effektive Weise die angeborene Fähigkeit von Egeln, Zahlenverhältnisse zu berechnen. Interessanter Fakt: Egel wurden manchmal auch „Steuerberater-Würmer“ genannt!

es.title: GENERADOR DE PORCENTAJES IMPULSADO POR SANGUIJUELAS
es.description: Aunque este dispositivo pueda parecer primitivo en comparación con las calculadoras de monstruos, estos generadores de porcentajes hacían un uso eficiente de la capacidad innata de las sanguijuelas para calcular coeficientes. Dato curioso: ¡a veces, las sanguijuelas recibían el nombre de "gusanos contables"!

it.title: GENERATORE DI PERCENTUALE SANGUISUGA
it.description: Nonostante il dispositivo possa sembrare antiquato se comparato alle Calcolatrici mostro, questi generatori di percentuale facevano un uso efficiente dell'innata abilità delle sanguisughe di calcolare le proporzioni. Curiosità: a volte le sanguisughe erano chiamate "vermi consulenti fiscali"!

ja.title: ヒル動力の割合ジェネレーター
ja.description: このデバイスはモンスター計算機と比べると原始的に見えるかもしれませんが、この割合ジェネレーターはヒルの生来の能力を使って割合を出せるよう有効活用することに成功しました。豆知識：ヒルは「税理士虫」と呼ばることがあったんですよ！

ko.title: 거머리 기술 비율 생성기
ko.description: 이 장치는 몬스터 계산기에 비하면 꽤 원시적이지만, 이 비율 생성기를 통해 거머리는 비율을 계산할 수 있었다는 걸 알 수 있습니다. 재미있는 사실은, 사람들이 가끔 거머리들을 '회계사 벌레'라고 불렀다는 점입니다!

zh-Hans.title: 水蛭动力百分比生成器
zh-Hans.description: 与怪兽计算器相比，这个装置可能看起来很原始，但这些百分比生成器有效地利用了水蛭天生的比例计算能力。有趣的事实：水蛭有时被称为“税务会计虫”！

zh-Hant.title: 水蛭動力百分比產生器
zh-Hant.description: 與怪獸計算器相較之下，這種裝置雖然較原始，但這種百分比產生器有效利用水蛭固有的能力來運算比例。冷知識：水蛭有時候被稱作「稅務會計蟲」！

ru.title: ПИЯВОЧНЫЙ ГЕНЕРАТОР ПРОЦЕНТНЫХ СТАВОК
ru.description: Хотя это устройство кажется примитивным по сравнению с калькуляторами монстров, в генераторах процентных ставок эффективно использовались врожденные способности пиявок к подсчету коэффициентов. Забавный факт: пиявок иногда называли «личинками бухгалтеров по налогообложению»!

pt-BR.title: GERADOR DE PORCENTAGEM A SANGUESSUGA
pt-BR.description: Este dispositivo pode parecer primitivo se comparado a calculadoras dos monstros, mas os geradores de porcentagem usavam de forma eficiente a afinidade natural que sanguessugas têm com probabilidade. Uma curiosidade: há quem diga que as sanguessugas são as minhocas da contabilidade!

nl.title: PERCENTAGEGENERATOR OP BLOEDZUIGERS
nl.description: Hoewel de percentagegenerator erg primitief lijkt in vergelijking met monsterrekenmachines, maakten deze apparaten op een efficiënte manier gebruik van de rekenkundige vaardigheden van bloedzuigers. Wist je dat bloedzuigers soms 'belastingwormen' werden genoemd?

ar.title: ﻣﺤﻮل ﻧﺴﺐ ﻣﺌﻮﻳﺔ ﻳﻌﻤﻞ ﺑﺎﻟﻌﻠﻘﻴﺎت
ar.description: ﻋﻠﯽ اﻟﺮﻏﻢ ﻣﻦ أن ﻫﺬا اﻟﺠﻬﺎز ﻳﻌﺪ ﺑﺪاﺋﻴﺎ ﻣﻘﺎرﻧﺔ ﺑﺎﻵﻻت اﻟﺤﺎﺳﺒﺔ اﻟﺨﺎﺻﺔ ﺑﺎﻟﻮﺣﻮش، اﺳﺘﺨﺪﻣﺖ ﻫﺬه اﻟﻤﺤﻮﻻت اﻟﻘﺪرة اﻟﻔﻄﺮﻳﺔ ﻟﻠﻌﻠﻘﻴﺎت ﻋﻠﯽ ﺣﺴﺎب اﻟﻨﺴﺐ اﺳﺘﺨﺪاﻣﺎ ﻛﻔﺌﺎ. ﺣﻘﻴﻘﺔ ﻃﺮﻳﻔﺔ: ﻛﺎن ﻳﻄﻠﻖ أﺣﻴﺎﻧﺎ ﻋﻠﯽ اﻟﻌﻠﻘﻴﺎت "اﻟﺪﻳﺪان ﻣﺤﺎﺳﺒﻮ اﻟﻀﺮاﺋﺐ" !

tk.title: SÜLÜKLE ÇALIŞAN YÜZDE HESAPLAYICI
tk.description: Bu cihaz, Canavar Hesap Makinelerine kıyasla ilkel görünse de bu yüzde hesaplayıcılar sülüklerin oranları hesaplama konusunda doğuştan gelen yeteneklerini etkili bir şekilde kullanıldı. İlginç bilgi: Sülüklere bazen "vergi muhasebecisi solucanlar" denirdi!

fr-CA.title: GÉNÉRATEUR DE POURCENTAGE SANGSUE
fr-CA.description: Bien que cet appareil puisse sembler primitif comparé aux calculatrices monstres, ces générateurs de pourcentage utilisent efficacement les capacités innées des sangsues à calculer les ratios. Fait amusant : les sangsues étaient parfois appelées « vers fiscaux »!

en-AU.title: LEECH-POWERED PERCENTAGE GENERATOR
en-AU.description: While this device may seem primitive compared with Monster Calculators, these percentage generators made efficient use of the leech's innate ability to work out ratios. Fun fact: leeches were sometimes called "tax accountant worms"!

landmarks.title: LEECH-POWERED PERCENTAGE GENERATOR
landmarks.description: While this device may seem primitive compared with Monster Calculators, these percentage generators made efficient use of the leech's innate ability to work out ratios. Fun fact: leeches were sometimes called "tax accountant worms"!

landmarks.name: LM_LeechMonitor

en.title: LEECH-POWERED COMPUTER MONITOR
en.description: The leech-powered color printer standardized cyan-, magenta- and yellow-loving leeches. It also inspired scientists to seek leeches that could imbibe and excrete colored light, in order to make computer screen displays. Alas, the framerate of RGB leeches was terrible.

en-GB.title: LEECH-POWERED COMPUTER MONITOR
en-GB.description: The leech-powered colour printer standardised cyan-, magenta- and yellow-loving leeches. It also inspired scientists to seek leeches that could imbibe and excrete coloured light, in order to make computer screen displays. Alas, the framerate of RGB leeches was terrible.

fr.title: ÉCRAN D'ORDINATEUR SANGSUE
fr.description: L'imprimante couleur sangsue a standardisé les spécimens friands de cyan, de magenta et de jaune. Elle a également incité les scientifiques à rechercher des sangsues capables de s'imprégner et d'excréter de la lumière colorée pour fabriquer des écrans d'ordinateur. Hélas, le framerate des sangsues RGB était catastrophique.

de.title: EGELBETRIEBENER COMPUTERMONITOR
de.description: Der egelbetriebene Farbdrucker verwendete standardmäßig Egel, die Cyan, Magenta und Gelb liebten. Er inspirierte Wissenschaftler außerdem dazu, sich Egel zu suchen, die farbiges Licht aufnehmen und wieder ausscheiden konnten, um mit ihnen Computermonitore herzustellen. Leider war die Bildrate der RGB-Egel fürchterlich.

es.title: MONITOR DE ORDENADOR IMPULSADO POR SANGUIJUELAS
es.description: La impresora a color impulsada por sanguijuelas estandarizó las sanguijuelas amantes del amarillo, el magenta y el cian. También inspiró a los científicos a buscar sanguijuelas que pudieran beber y excretar luz de colores para poder hacer pantallas de ordenador. Por desgracia, la velocidad de fotogramas de las sanguijuelas RGB era terrible.

it.title: MONITOR DEL COMPUTER SANGUISUGA
it.description: La stampante a colori sanguisuga uniformò le sanguisughe amanti del ciano, del magenta e del giallo. Questo ispirò gli scienziati nel cercare sanguisughe che potessero assorbire ed espellere luce colorata, così da fungere come display per computer. In ogni caso, la frequenza dei fotogrammi delle sanguisughe RGB era terribile.

ja.title: ヒル動力のパソコンモニター
ja.description: ヒル動力のカラープリンターは、シアン・マゼンタ・イエローが好きなヒルを標準化しました。これはまた、パソコン画面に表示させるため、色のついた光を吸収し、分泌することのできるヒルを見つけたいと科学者を感化したのです。悲しいかな、RGBヒルのフレームレートは最悪でした。

ko.title: 거머리 기술 컴퓨터 모니터
ko.description: 거머리 기술을 활용한 컬러 프린터에는 사이언, 마젠타, 노란색을 좋아하는 거머리를 사용하는 것이 표준이었습니다. 여기에 영감을 받은 과학자들은 컴퓨터 모니터 제작을 위해 색이 있는 빛을 먹고 뱉을 수 있는 거머리를 찾기 시작했습니다. 하지만 RGB 거머리들의 프레임 재생 속도는 형편없었습니다.

zh-Hans.title: 水蛭动力电脑显示器
zh-Hans.description: 以水蛭为动力的彩色打印机让喜爱蓝绿色、品红和黄色的水蛭标准化了。这也激发了科学家们寻找能够吸收和排出彩色光的水蛭，以制造电脑屏幕显示器。唉，红绿蓝水蛭的帧频太可怕了。

zh-Hant.title: 水蛭動力電腦顯示器
zh-Hant.description: 水蛭動力彩色印表機有三種標準色的水蛭，分別是藍、紅和黃色。這種裝置也啟發科學家尋找能吸入並排出彩色光的水蛭，好讓科學家能製作電腦螢幕顯示器。可惜的是，三色水蛭所呈現的畫面播放速率效果不佳。

ru.title: ПИЯВОЧНЫЙ КОМПЬЮТЕРНЫЙ МОНИТОР
ru.description: Пиявки, предпочитающие голубой, пурпурный и желтый, стали типовыми для цветных принтеров. Это вдохновило ученых искать пиявок, которые могли бы поглощать и выделять цветной свет для создания компьютерных экранов. Увы, частота кадров RGB-пиявок была ужасной.

pt-BR.title: MONITOR A SANGUESSUGA
pt-BR.description: A impressora a sanguessuga padronizou as sanguessugas que apreciavam ciano, magenta e amarelo, mas também inspirou os cientistas a procurar sanguessugas que podiam consumir e excretar luz colorida, com o objetivo de confeccionar telas para computadores. Infelizmente a taxa de quadros de sanguessugas RGB era terrível.

nl.title: COMPUTERSCHERM OP BLOEDZUIGERS
nl.description: De kleurenprinter op bloedzuigers zorgde voor gestandaardiseerde cyaan-, magenta- en gele bloedzuigers. Bovendien zochten wetenschappers bloedzuigers die gekleurd licht konden absorberen en uitscheiden om computerschermen te maken. De beeldsnelheid van deze RGB-bloedzuigers was echter verschrikkelijk slecht.

ar.title: ﺷﺎﺷﺔ ﻛﻤﺒﻴﻮﺗﺮ ﺗﻌﻤﻞ ﺑﺎﻟﻌﻠﻘﻴﺎت
ar.description: ﺗﻢ ﺗﻮﺣﻴﺪ اﺳﺘﺨﺪام اﻟﻌﻠﻘﻴﺎت اﻟﻤﺤﺒﺔ ﻟﻸﻟﻮان اﻷزرق واﻷرﺟﻮاﻧﻲ واﻷﺻﻔﺮ ﻓﻲ اﻟﻄﺎﺑﻌﺎت اﻟﺘﻲ ﺗﻌﻤﻞ ﺑﺎﻟﻌﻠﻘﻴﺎت اﻟﻤﻠﻮﻧﺔ. وأﻟﻬﻤﺖ اﻟﻄﺎﺑﻌﺎت اﻟﻌﻠﻤﺎء ﻟﻠﺒﺤﺚ ﻋﻦ اﻟﻌﻠﻘﻴﺎت اﻟﺘﻲ ﺗﻤﺘﺺ اﻟﻀﻮء اﻟﻤﻠﻮن وﺗﺼﺪره ﻣﻦ أﺟﻞ ﺗﻤﻜﻴﻦ ﺷﺎﺷﺔ اﻟﻜﻤﺒﻴﻮﺗﺮ ﻣﻦ اﻟﻌﺮض. وﻟﻜﻦ ﻣﻊ اﻷﺳﻒ ﻛﺎن ﻣﻌﺪل اﻹﻃﺎر اﻟﺨﺎص ﺑﻌﻠﻘﻴﺎت ﻧﻤﻮذج اﻷﻟﻮان اﻷﺣﻤﺮ واﻷﺧﻀﺮ واﻷزرق ﺳﻴﺌﺎ.

tk.title: SÜLÜKLE ÇALIŞAN BİLGİSAYAR EKRANI
tk.description: Sülükle çalışan yazıcı, cam göbeği, mor ve sarı seven sülükleri standart hâle getirdi. Ayrıca bilim insanları, bilgisayar ekranı üretmek için renkli ışıkları emebilen ve salgılayabilen sülük arayışına girdi. Ne yazık ki RGB sülüklerinin kare hızı korkunçtu.

fr-CA.title: ÉCRAN D'ORDINATEUR SANGSUE
fr-CA.description: L'imprimante couleur sangsue a standardisé les sangsues friandes de cyan, de magenta et de jaune. Elle a également incité les scientifiques à rechercher des sangsues capables de s'imprégner et d'excréter de la lumière colorée pour fabriquer des écrans d'ordinateur. Hélas, le framerate des sangsues RGB était atroce.

en-AU.title: LEECH-POWERED COMPUTER MONITOR
en-AU.description: The leech-powered colour printer standardised cyan-, magenta- and yellow-loving leeches. It also inspired scientists to seek leeches that could imbibe and excrete coloured light, in order to make computer screen displays. Alas, the framerate of RGB leeches was terrible.

landmarks.title: LEECH-POWERED COMPUTER MONITOR
landmarks.description: The leech-powered color printer standardized cyan-, magenta- and yellow-loving leeches. It also inspired scientists to seek leeches that could imbibe and excrete colored light, in order to make computer screen displays. Alas, the framerate of RGB leeches was terrible.

en.title: MONUMENT TO LEECHES
en.description: Inscription reads: "Leeches! Is there anything they can't do?"

en-GB.title: MONUMENT TO LEECHES
en-GB.description: Inscription reads: "Leeches! Is there anything they can't do?"

fr.title: MONUMENT AUX SANGSUES
fr.description: On lit : « Sangsues ! Y a-t-il seulement une chose qu'elles ne puissent accomplir ? »

de.title: DENKMAL FÜR EGEL
de.description: Die Inschrift lautet: „Egel! Gibt es etwas, das sie nicht können?“.

es.title: MONUMENTO A LAS SANGUIJUELAS
es.description: La inscripción dice: "¡Sanguijuelas! ¿Hay algo que no puedan hacer?"

it.title: MONUMENTO ALLE SANGUISUGHE
it.description: L'iscrizione dice: "Sanguisughe! C'è qualcosa che non possono fare?"

ja.title: ヒルのモニュメント
ja.description: 碑文の文章：「ヒルよ！君たちにできないことなんてあるのだろうか？」

ko.title: 거머리 기념비
ko.description: "거머리여! 그대들이 못하는 것은 과연 무엇인가?"라고 적혀 있습니다.

zh-Hans.title: 水蛭纪念碑
zh-Hans.description: 上面写着：“水蛭！还有什么是它们做不到的？”

zh-Hant.title: 水蛭紀念碑
zh-Hant.description: 銘文寫道：「水蛭！有它們辦不到的事嗎？」

ru.title: ПАМЯТНИК ПИЯВКАМ
ru.description: Надпись гласит: «Пиявки! Для них нет ничего невозможного!»

pt-BR.title: MONUMENTO ÀS SANGUESSUGAS
pt-BR.description: A observação diz: “Sanguessugas! Elas fazem de tudo!”

nl.title: STANDBEELD VOOR DE BLOEDZUIGERS
nl.description: Het opschrift is: 'Bloedzuigers! Wat kunnen ze niet?'

ar.title: ﻧﺼﺐ ﺗﺬﻛﺎري ﻟﻠﻌﻠﻘﻴﺎت
ar.description: ﻳﺮد ﻓﻲ اﻟﻨﻘﺶ: "أﻳﺘﻬﺎ اﻟﻌﻠﻘﻴﺎت! ﻫﻞ ﻫﻨﺎك أي ﺷﻲء ﻻ ﻳﻤﻜﻨﻚ ﻓﻌﻠﻪ ؟"

tk.title: SÜLÜK ANITI
tk.description: Şöyle yazıyor: "Sülükler! Yapamayacakları bir şey var mı?"

fr-CA.title: MONUMENT AUX SANGSUES
fr-CA.description: On lit : « Les sangsues! Y a-t-il une chose qu'elles ne savent pas faire? »

en-AU.title: MONUMENT TO LEECHES
en-AU.description: Inscription reads: "Leeches! Is there anything they can't do?"

landmarks.title: MONUMENT TO LEECHES
landmarks.description: Inscription reads: "Leeches! Is there anything they can't do?"

landmarks.name: LM_LeechPen

en.title: LEECH-POWERED PEN
en.description: Before humans harnessed the power of steam, they tried to harness the power of leeches. Instead of traditional cartridges, this leech-powered pen used leeches fed on blood-flavored ink.

en-GB.title: LEECH-POWERED PEN
en-GB.description: Before humans harnessed the power of steam, they tried to harness the power of leeches. Instead of traditional cartridges, this leech-powered pen used leeches fed on blood-flavoured ink.

fr.title: STYLO SANGSUE
fr.description: Avant de parvenir à maîtriser le pouvoir de la vapeur, les humains ont tenté d'exploiter celui des sangsues. Au lieu des cartouches traditionnelles, ce stylo alimenté par des sangsues utilisait des spécimens nourris d'encre au goût de sang.

de.title: EGELBETRIEBENER FÜLLER
de.description: Bevor Menschen sich Dampfkraft zunutze machten, versuchten sie die Kraft der Egel zu nutzen. Anstatt herkömmlicher Patronen wurde in diesem egelbetriebenen Füller Tinte mit Blutgeschmack verwendet.

es.title: BOLÍGRAFO IMPULSADO POR SANGUIJUELAS
es.description: Antes de que los humanos utilizaran el poder del vapor, intentaron aprovechar el de las sanguijuelas. En lugar de cartuchos tradicionales, estos bolígrafos impulsados por sanguijuelas se cargaban con tinta con sabor a sangre.

it.title: PENNA SANGUISUGA
it.description: Prima che gli umani sfruttassero il potere del vapore, provarono a sfruttare il potere delle sanguisughe. Invece delle cartucce tradizionali, queste penne sanguisuga usavano sanguisughe alimentate con inchiostro aromatizzato al sangue.

ja.title: ヒル動力のペン
ja.description: 人間たちが蒸気の力を利用し始める前、彼らはヒルの力を利用しようとしていました。伝統的なカートリッジの代わりに、このヒル動力ペンは血味インクを摂取していたヒルを使用していました。

ko.title: 거머리 기술 펜
ko.description: 인간들은 증기의 힘을 발견하기 전까지 거머리의 힘을 이용했습니다. 인간들은 전통적인 카트리지 대신 피맛 잉크를 마신 거머리를 펜으로 사용했습니다.

zh-Hans.title: 水蛭动力钢笔
zh-Hans.description: 在人类利用蒸汽的力量之前，他们曾试图利用水蛭的力量。这支以水蛭为动力的钢笔摒弃了传统的笔芯，使用以血墨为食的水蛭。

zh-Hant.title: 水蛭動力鋼筆
zh-Hant.description: 在人類掌握蒸汽動力技術之前，他們嘗試利用水蛭的動力。這種水蛭動力鋼筆摒棄了傳統的筆芯，使用以血墨為食的水蛭。

ru.title: ПИЯВОЧНАЯ РУЧКА
ru.description: До того, как люди стали использовать паровую тягу, они пытались использовать пиявочную тягу. Вместо обычных баллончиков в пиявочных ручках использовали пиявок, питающихся чернилами со вкусом крови.

pt-BR.title: CANETA A SANGUESSUGA
pt-BR.description: Antes de dominarem a energia a vapor, os humanos tentaram extrair a energia de sanguessugas. Em vez de usar os cartuchos normais, esta caneta a sanguessuga usa sanguessugas que consumiram tinta com sabor de sangue.

nl.title: PEN OP BLOEDZUIGERS
nl.description: Voordat mensen stoomkracht beheersten, hadden ze de kracht van bloedzuigers. In plaats van traditionele inktpatronen, gebruikte deze pen bloedzuigers die werden gevoed met inkt die naar bloed smaakt.

ar.title: ﻗﻠﻢ ﻳﻌﻤﻞ ﺑﺎﻟﻌﻠﻘﻴﺎت
ar.description: ﺣﺎول اﻟﺒﺸﺮ اﺳﺘﻐﻼل ﻗﻮة اﻟﻌﻠﻘﻴﺎت ﻗﺒﻞ اﻻﺳﺘﻔﺎدة ﻣﻦ ﻗﻮة اﻟﺒﺨﺎر. ﻓﺒﺪﻻ ﻣﻦ اﺳﺘﺨﺪام ﺧﺮﻃﻮﺷﺎت اﻟﺤﺒﺮ اﻟﺘﻘﻠﻴﺪﻳﺔ، ﻛﺎﻧﺖ ﺗﺘﻐﺬى اﻟﻌﻠﻘﻴﺎت ﻓﻲ أﻗﻼم اﻟﻌﻠﻘﻴﺎت ﺑﺤﺒﺮ ﻣﺨﻠﻮط ﺑﺪم.

tk.title: SÜLÜKLE ÇALIŞAN KALEM
tk.description: İnsanlar buhar gücünü keşfedene kadar sülüklerin gücünü kullanmayı denedi. Bu sülüklü kalemler, geleneksel kartuşlar yerine kan aromalı mürekkeple beslenen sülükleri kullandı.

fr-CA.title: STYLO SANGSUE
fr-CA.description: Avant de parvenir à maîtriser le pouvoir de la vapeur, les humains ont tenté de s'approprier le pouvoir des sangsues. Au lieu des cartouches traditionnelles, ce stylo alimenté par des sangsues utilisait des spécimens nourris d'encre au goût de sang.

en-AU.title: LEECH-POWERED PEN
en-AU.description: Before humans harnessed the power of steam, they tried to harness the power of leeches. Instead of traditional cartridges, this leech-powered pen used leeches fed on blood-flavoured ink.

landmarks.title: LEECH-POWERED PEN
landmarks.description: Before humans harnessed the power of steam, they tried to harness the power of leeches. Instead of traditional cartridges, this leech-powered pen used leeches fed on blood-flavored ink.

landmarks.name: LM_LeechPrinter

en.title: LEECH-POWERED PRINTER
en.description: The logical extension of the leech-powered pen was the leech-powered printer. Humans would load dye-fed leeches into the printer's ink chamber, then loudly and clearly describe the document to the leeches. The leeches would do their best to recreate the text or image.

en-GB.title: LEECH-POWERED PRINTER
en-GB.description: The logical extension of the leech-powered pen was the leech-powered printer. Humans would load dye-fed leeches into the printer's ink chamber, then loudly and clearly describe the document to the leeches. The leeches would do their best to recreate the text or image.

fr.title: IMPRIMANTE SANGSUE
fr.description: L'extension logique du stylo sangsue n'était autre que l'imprimante sangsue. Les humains chargeaient des spécimens nourris de colorants dans le compartiment à encre de l'imprimante, puis décrivaient clairement et bruyamment le document aux sangsues. Celles-ci s'efforçaient alors de recréer le texte ou l'image en question.

de.title: EGELBETRIEBENER DRUCKER
de.description: Die logische Weiterführung des egelbetriebenen Füllers war der egelbetriebene Drucker. Menschen luden mit Farbe gefütterte Egel in die Tintenkammer des Druckers und beschrieben den Egeln daraufhin laut und deutlich das zu druckende Dokument. Die Egel taten dann ihr Bestes, um den Text oder das Bild nachzubilden.

es.title: IMPRESORA IMPULSADA POR SANGUIJUELAS
es.description: La extensión lógica del bolígrafo impulsado por sanguijuelas era la impresora. Los humanos cargaban sanguijuelas alimentadas con tinta en el cargador de tinta de la impresora y, a continuación, describían el documento a las sanguijuelas de forma alta y clara. Las sanguijuelas hacían todo lo que podían por recrear el texto o la imagen.

it.title: STAMPANTE SANGUISUGA
it.description: La logica evoluzione della penna sanguisuga fu la stampante sanguisuga. Gli umani caricavano le sanguisughe nel vano dell'inchiostro della stampante, poi descrivevano in modo chiaro e preciso il documento alle sanguisughe. Queste ultime facevano del loro meglio per ricreare testi o immagini.

ja.title: ヒル動力のプリンター
ja.description: ヒル動力のペンからの論理的延長として生まれたものが、ヒル動力のプリンターでした。人間たちはインクを摂取したヒルをプリンターのインクボックスへ詰め、大きな声ではっきりと、その書類がどんなものなのかをヒルに向かって説明するのでした。このヒルたちは、できる限りの努力をして、この文字または画像を再現するのでした。

ko.title: 거머리 기술 프린터
ko.description: 거머리 펜을 발전시킨 것이 바로 거머리 프린터입니다. 인간들은 염색약을 먹인 거머리들을 프린터 잉크 통에 넣었고, 거머리들에게 문서의 내용을 크고 분명하게 말로 전달했습니다. 그러면 거머리들은 자신들이 들은 것을 문자 또는 이미지로 열심히 재생산했습니다.

zh-Hans.title: 水蛭动力打印机
zh-Hans.description: 水蛭动力打印机是水蛭动力钢笔的逻辑延伸。人类将以血墨为食的水蛭装入打印机墨盒，然后大声清晰地向水蛭描述文件。这些水蛭会尽其所能输出文本或图像。

zh-Hant.title: 水蛭動力印表機
zh-Hant.description: 水蛭動力印表機是以水蛭動力鋼筆為邏輯基礎而延伸出的裝置。人類會將餵食染劑的水蛭裝入印表機的墨水盒，然後大聲且清楚地向水蛭描述文件。之後，水蛭會盡力輸出文字或圖像。

ru.title: ПИЯВОЧНЫЙ ПРИНТЕР
ru.description: Логическим продолжением пиявочной ручки был пиявочный принтер. Люди загружали объевшихся красителя пиявок в отсек для чернил, а потом громко и четко описывали пиявкам документ. Пиявки прилагали все усилия, чтобы воссоздать текст или изображение.

pt-BR.title: IMPRESSORA A SANGUESSUGA
pt-BR.description: A extensão lógica da caneta a sanguessuga é a impressora a sanguessuga. Os humanos instalavam sanguessugas alimentadas com tinta nas câmaras internas da impressora e descreviam clara e calmamente os documentos que queriam para que as sanguessugas fizessem o melhor que podiam para reproduzi-los.

nl.title: PRINTER OP BLOEDZUIGERS
nl.description: Na de pen op bloedzuigers was de printer op bloedzuigers een logische stap. Mensen gaven de bloedzuigers gekleurde inkt en plaatsten ze in de printer. Daarna beschreven de mensen het document hardop voor de bloedzuigers. De bloedzuigers deden hun best om de tekst of de afbeelding zo goed mogelijk na te maken.

ar.title: ﻃﺎﺑﻌﺔ ﺗﻌﻤﻞ ﺑﺎﻟﻌﻠﻘﻴﺎت
ar.description: ﻛﺎن اﻟﺘﻄﻮر اﻟﻤﻨﻄﻘﻲ ﻟﻘﻠﻢ اﻟﻌﻠﻘﻴﺎت ﻫﻮ ﻃﺎﺑﻌﺔ اﻟﻌﻠﻘﻴﺎت. ﻓﻌﺒﺄ اﻟﺒﺸﺮ ﺣﺠﺮات اﻟﺤﺒﺮ ﻓﻲ اﻟﻄﺎﺑﻌﺔ ﺑﻌﻠﻘﻴﺎت ﺗﺘﻐﺬى ﻋﻠﯽ اﻷﺻﺒﺎغ، ﺛﻢ وﺻﻔﻮا اﻟﻮﺛﻴﻘﺔ ﺑﻮﺿﻮح وﺻﻮت ﻋﺎل ﻟﻠﻌﻠﻘﻴﺎت. وﻣﻦ ﺛﻢ ﺳﺘﺒﺬل اﻟﻌﻠﻘﻴﺎت أﻗﺼﯽ ﺟﻬﺪﻫﺎ ﻹﻋﺎدة ﺗﻜﻮﻳﻦ اﻟﻨﺺ أو اﻟﺼﻮرة.

tk.title: SÜLÜKLE ÇALIŞAN YAZICI
tk.description: Sülüklü kalemin mantıksal uzamı sülüklü yazıcıydı. İnsanlar, boyayla beslenen sülükleri yazıcının mürekkep haznesine koyar, ardından belgeleri yüksek sesle ve açık bir şekilde sülüklere tanımlardı. Sülükler de yazıyı veya resmi tekrar oluşturmak için ellerinden geleni yaparlardı.

fr-CA.title: IMPRIMANTE SANGSUE
fr-CA.description: La suite logique du stylo sangsue était bien sûr l'imprimante sangsue. Les humains chargeaient des spécimens nourris de colorant dans le compartiment à encre de l'imprimante, puis décrivaient clairement et bruyamment le document aux sangsues. Les sangsues s'efforçaient alors de recréer le texte ou l'image en question.

en-AU.title: LEECH-POWERED PRINTER
en-AU.description: The logical extension of the leech-powered pen was the leech-powered printer. Humans would load dye-fed leeches into the printer's ink chamber, then loudly and clearly describe the document to the leeches. The leeches would do their best to recreate the text or image.

landmarks.title: LEECH-POWERED PRINTER
landmarks.description: The logical extension of the leech-powered pen was the leech-powered printer. Humans would load dye-fed leeches into the printer's ink chamber, then loudly and clearly describe the document to the leeches. The leeches would do their best to recreate the text or image.

landmarks.name: LM_LeechSurgicalArm

en.title: LEECH-POWERED SURGEON
en.description: After spending thousands of years in subservient medical roles, leeches began to lobby for the right to perform surgery. With the aid of mechanical arms, leech-powered operations proved safe and effective. However, once initial funding ran out, leeches were unable to secure student loans, and leech surgeons passed into history.

en-GB.title: LEECH-POWERED SURGEON
en-GB.description: After spending thousands of years in subservient medical roles, leeches began to lobby for the right to perform surgery. With the aid of mechanical arms, leech-powered operations proved safe and effective. However, once initial funding ran out, leeches were unable to secure student loans, and leech surgeons passed into history.

fr.title: SANGSUE CHIRURGIENNE
fr.description: Après avoir passé des milliers d'années à servir d'accessoire médical, les sangsues ont commencé à faire pression pour obtenir le droit de pratiquer la chirurgie. Avec l'aide de bras mécaniques, les opérations alimentées par les sangsues se sont avérées sûres et efficaces. Hélas, une fois le financement initial épuisé, les sangsues ne purent obtenir des prêts étudiants et les chirurgiens sangsues retombèrent dans l'oubli.

de.title: EGELBETRIEBENER CHIRURG
de.description: Nachdem sie Tausende von Jahren in unterwürfigen medizinischen Rollen verbringen mussten, begannen Egel sich für das Recht einzusetzen, selbst Operationen durchzuführen. Mit der Hilfe mechanischer Arme haben sich egelbetriebene Operationen als sicher und effektiv herausgestellt. Als jedoch die anfängliche Finanzierung auslief, waren die Egel nicht mehr in der Lage, sich Studienkredite zu sichern, und die Egelchirurgen gingen in die Geschichte ein.

es.title: CIRUGÍAS REALIZADAS POR SANGUIJUELAS
es.description: Tras pasar miles de años a la servidumbre de los médicos, las sanguijuelas comenzaron a luchar por sus derechos para realizar cirugías. Con la ayuda de brazos mecánicos, las cirugías realizadas por sanguijuelas han demostrado ser seguras y efectivas. Sin embargo, una vez agotada la financiación inicial, las sanguijuelas no pudieron obtener préstamos estudiantiles y las sanguijuelas cirujanas pasaron a la historia.

it.title: CHIRURGO SANGUISUGA
it.description: Dopo aver avuto un ruolo subordinato per migliaia di anni, le sanguisughe iniziarono a fare pressione per ottenere il diritto di eseguire operazioni. Con l'aiuto di braccia meccaniche, gli interventi eseguiti dalle sanguisughe si rivelarono sicuri ed efficaci. Tuttavia, quando i fondi iniziali terminarono, le sanguisughe non riuscirono a ottenere prestiti per studenti e la figura del chirurgo sanguisuga passò alla storia.

ja.title: ヒル動力の外科医
ja.description: 従属的な医学的役割として何千年もの時を過ごしてきたヒルは、手術を行う権利を求めて働き掛け始めました。機械的なアームの助けもあり、ヒル動力による手術は安全で効果的であることが証明されました。ですが、初期資金が尽きてしまうと、ヒルが学生奨学金を確保することができなくなり、ヒル外科医は歴史のものとなってしまったのです。

ko.title: 거머리 의사
ko.description: 수천 년 동안 종속적인 의료 행위를 해야 했던 거머리는 드디어 직접 수술을 하기 위한 로비를 시작했습니다. 기계 팔의 도움으로 거머리들은 안전하고 효율적인 수술을 할 수 있었습니다. 하지만 초기 자본이 소진되고 거머리들이 학자금 대출을 받을 수 없게 되면서 거머리 의사들은 역사의 뒤편으로 사라졌습니다.

zh-Hans.title: 水蛭动力手术
zh-Hans.description: 在医疗中扮演顺从角色数千年之后，水蛭开始四处游说进行手术的权力。在机械手臂的协助之下，水蛭动力的手术被证实即安全又高效。不过，在最初的资金用尽之后，水蛭们无法获得助学贷款，水蛭手术也就就此湮灭于历史之中。

zh-Hant.title: 水蛭動力外科醫
zh-Hant.description: 花了數千年充當醫療助手後，水蛭也開始為自己執行外科手術的權利奔走遊說了。有了機械手臂的協助，水蛭動力手術經證明安全有效。但是，當第一筆資金用完後，水蛭們就還不了助學貸款了；於是水蛭外科醫就此走入歷史。

ru.title: ПИЯВОЧНЫЙ ХИРУРГ
ru.description: Пиявки тысячи лет служили вспомогательными инструментами для лечения, и вот наконец они начали добиваться права самостоятельно проводить операции. С помощью механических рук пиявки смогли проводить безопасные и эффективные операции. Но когда благотворительные фонды истощились, пиявки не смогли оплачивать обучение. Так пиявочные хирурги отошли в прошлое.

pt-BR.title: CIRURGIÃO A SANGUESSUGA
pt-BR.description: Depois de passar milhares de anos em funções médicas subservientes, as sanguessugas começaram a fazer lobby pelo direito de realizar cirurgias. Com o auxílio de braços mecânicos, as operações movidas a sanguessuga mostraram-se seguras e eficazes. No entanto, quando o financiamento inicial acabou, as sanguessugas não conseguiram garantir empréstimos estudantis e os cirurgiões sanguessugas viraram história.

nl.title: CHIRURGISCHE BLOEDZUIGERS
nl.description: Na duizenden jaren in ondergeschikte medische rollen te hebben gewerkt, begonnen bloedzuigers te lobbyen voor het recht om operaties uit te voeren. Met behulp van mechanische armen bleken door bloedzuigers aangedreven operaties veilig en effectief. Toen de initiële financiering echter op was, konden bloedzuigers geen studieleningen krijgen en gingen bloedzuigerchirurgen de geschiedenisboeken in.

ar.title: ﺟﺮاﺣﺔ ﺑﺎﻟﻌﻠﻘﻴﺎت
ar.description: ﺑﻌﺪ ﻗﻀﺎء آﻻف اﻟﺴﻨﻴﻦ ﻓﻲ أدوار ﻃﺒﻴﺔ ﻣﺘﺬﻟﻠﺔ، ﺑﺪأت اﻟﻌﻠﻘﺎت ﻓﻲ اﻟﻀﻐﻂ ﻣﻦ أﺟﻞ اﻟﺤﻖ ﻓﻲ إﺟﺮاء اﻟﺠﺮاﺣﺔ. وﻗﺪ أﺛﺒﺘﺖ اﻟﻌﻤﻠﻴﺎت اﻟﺘﻲ ﺗﻌﻤﻞ ﺑﺎﻟﻌﻠﻘﻴﺎت أﻧﻬﺎ آﻣﻨﺔ وﻓﻌﺎﻟﺔ وذﻟﻚ ﺑﺎﻻﺳﺘﻌﺎﻧﺔ ﺑﺎﻷذرع اﻟﻤﻴﻜﺎﻧﻴﻜﻴﺔ. وﻣﻊ ذﻟﻚ، ﺑﻤﺠﺮد ﻧﻔﺎد اﻟﺘﻤﻮﻳﻞ اﻷوﻟﻲ، ﻟﻢ ﺗﺘﻤﻜﻦ اﻟﻌﻠﻘﻴﺎت ﻣﻦ ﺗﺄﻣﻴﻦ ﻗﺮوض اﻟﻄﻼب، واﻧﺪﺛﺮ ﺟﺮاﺣﻮ اﻟﻌﻠﻘﻴﺎت ﻓﻲ ﻏﻴﺎﻫﺐ اﻟﺘﺎرﻳﺦ.

tk.title: SÜLÜKLE ÇALIŞAN CERRAH
tk.description: Sülükler, binlerce yıl önemsiz tıbbi rollerde yer aldıktan sonra cerrahlık hakkı için lobiciliğe başladı. Mekanik kolların yardımıyla sülükle çalışan cerrahi operasyonların güvenli ve etkili olduğu kanıtlandı. Ancak sülüklere sağlanan ilk sermaye tükendiğinde, sülükler öğrenci kredisi alamıyordu ve sülük cerrahlar tarihe karıştı.

fr-CA.title: SANGSUE CHIRURGIENNE
fr-CA.description: Après avoir passé des milliers d'années à servir d'accessoire médical, les sangsues ont commencé à faire pression pour obtenir le droit de pratiquer la chirurgie. Avec l'aide de bras mécaniques, les opérations menées par les sangsues se sont avérées sûres et efficaces. Hélas, une fois le financement initial épuisé, les sangsues ne purent obtenir des prêts étudiants et les chirurgiens sangsues retombèrent dans l'oubli.

en-AU.title: LEECH-POWERED SURGEON
en-AU.description: After spending thousands of years in subservient medical roles, leeches began to lobby for the right to perform surgery. With the aid of mechanical arms, leech-powered operations proved safe and effective. However, once initial funding ran out, leeches were unable to secure student loans, and leech surgeons passed into history.

landmarks.title: LEECH-POWERED SURGEON
landmarks.description: After spending thousands of years in subservient medical roles, leeches began to lobby for the right to perform surgery. With the aid of mechanical arms, leech-powered operations proved safe and effective. However, once initial funding ran out, leeches were unable to secure student loans, and leech surgeons passed into history.

landmarks.name: LM_Legos

en.title: TODDLER WEAPONRY
en.description: A beautifully-designed weapon. Its ability to inflict pain increases with the height and weight of the human subject who steps on it. Unripe humans ("toddlers") can waddle over them happily, while an adult in hot pursuit carrying a bath towel will be incapacitated.

en-GB.title: TODDLER WEAPONRY
en-GB.description: A beautifully-designed weapon. Its ability to inflict pain increases with the height and weight of the human subject who steps on it. Unripe humans ("toddlers") can waddle over them happily, while an adult in hot pursuit carrying a bath towel will be incapacitated.

fr.title: ARME DE BAMBIN
fr.description: Une arme magnifiquement conçue. Sa capacité à infliger de la douleur augmente avec la taille et le poids du sujet humain marchant dessus. Les humains non mûrs (« bambins ») peuvent les piétiner joyeusement, tandis qu'un adulte furieux équipé d'une serviette de bain sera mis hors d'état de nuire.

de.title: KLEINKINDWAFFEN
de.description: Eine wunderschön gefertigte Waffe. Ihre Fähigkeit, Schmerzen zuzufügen erhöht sich mit der Größe und dem Gewicht des menschlichen Opfers, welches darauf tritt. Unreife Menschen („Kleinkinder“) konnten fröhlich über sie hinwegwatscheln, während Erwachsene, die diese mit Handtüchern verfolgten, kampfunfähig gemacht werden konnten.

es.title: ARMAMENTO INFANTIL
es.description: Un arma con un diseño precioso. Su capacidad para infligir dolor aumenta según la altura y el peso del sujeto humano que la pise. Los humanos aún verdes ("niños") pueden andar sobre ellas sin problema, mientras que un adulto en persecución implacable que llevase una toalla de baño quedaría incapacitado.

it.title: ARMA DA BIMBO
it.description: Un'arma progettata in modo divino. La sua capacità di infliggere dolore aumenta in base all'altezza e al peso del soggetto umano che la calpesta. Gli umani acerbi ("bambini") possono camminare dondolandocisi sopra felici mentre un adulto che va di fretta, in asciugamano, verrà messo fuori combattimento.

ja.title: 幼児の武器
ja.description: 美しく設計された武器。この武器が持つ痛みを与える能力は、この武器を踏み潰す対象者の人間の身長や体重の増加とともに増強します。熟していない人間(「幼児」)は何事もなかったかのようにこの武器を上を歩くことができますが、バスタオルを持って激しく追跡をしている大人がこの武器を踏むと、みごとに無力化されてしまいます。

ko.title: 유아용 무기
ko.description: 아름답게 디자인된 무기입니다. 이걸 밟는 인간 대상의 몸무게와 키에 따라 더 큰 고통을 주기도 합니다. 아직 익지 않은 인간(일명 '유아')들은 그 위에서 즐겁게 돌아다닐 수 있지만, 수건을 들고 그 뒤를 쫓는 성인 인간들은 치명적인 피해를 입기도 했습니다.

zh-Hans.title: 幼童武器
zh-Hans.description: 一件精心设计的武器。它造成痛苦的能力随着踩到它的人类对象的身高和体重的增加而增加。未成熟的人类（“幼童”）可以高高兴兴地踩过去，而拿着浴巾紧跟其后的成年人会痛得倒地嗷嗷叫。

zh-Hant.title: 幼童武器
zh-Hant.description: 一個設計精緻的武器。這種武器所造成的疼痛程度，會隨著踩到它的人類對象的高度和重量而提升。未成熟的人類 (「幼童」) 能夠搖搖晃晃，開心地踩過它們，而帶著浴巾緊跟在後的成年人踩到則會痛到無法行動。

ru.title: ОРУЖИЕ МАЛЫШЕЙ
ru.description: Прекрасно оформленное оружие. Степень причиняемой боли повышалась в зависимости от роста и веса наступившего на него человеческого субъекта. Незрелые люди («малыши») могли счастливо ползать вокруг них, пока взрослые были выведены из строя в пылу погони за банным полотенцем.

pt-BR.title: ARMAMENTO INFANTIL
pt-BR.description: Arma de desenho magistral. Sua habilidade de causar dor aumenta proporcionalmente ao tamanho e peso do humano que pisar nela. Filhotes de humanos (“crianças”) são capazes de andar por elas sem problema; os adultos que os perseguem para lhes dar banho, porém, tendem a lesionar-se mais seriamente.

nl.title: PEUTERWAPENS
nl.description: Een prachtig ontworpen wapen. Het vermogen om pijn te veroorzaken neemt toe met de lengte en het gewicht van de mens die erop trapt. Onrijpe mensen ("peuters") kunnen er vrolijk overheen waggelen, terwijl een volwassene met badhanddoek die erachteraan zit, wordt uitgeschakeld.

ar.title: أﺳﻠﺤﺔ اﻷﻃﻔﺎل
ar.description: ﺳﻼح ﻣﺼﻤﻢ ﺗﺼﻤﻴﻤﺎ ﺟﻤﻴﻼ. ﺗﺰداد ﻗﺪرﺗﻪ ﻋﻠﯽ اﻟﺘﺴﺒﺐ ﻓﻲ اﻷﻟﻢ ﺣﺴﺐ وزن اﻟﻜﺎﺋﻦ اﻟﺒﺸﺮي اﻟﺬي ﻳﻀﻐﻂ ﻋﻠﻴﻪ وﻃﻮﻟﻪ. ﻳﻤﻜﻦ ﻟﻠﺒﺸﺮ ﻏﻴﺮ اﻟﻨﺎﺿﺠﻴﻦ )"اﻷﻃﻔﺎل"( اﻟﺴﻴﺮ واﻟﺘﻤﺎﻳﻞ ﺑﻴﻦ ﻫﺬه اﻷﺳﻠﺤﺔ ﺑﺴﻌﺎدة، ﺑﻴﻨﻤﺎ ﻳﻘﻊ اﻟﺒﺎﻟﻐﻮن اﻟﺬﻳﻦ ﻳﻬﺮوﻟﻮن ﺣﺎﻣﻠﻴﻦ ﻣﻨﺸﻔﺔ اﺳﺘﺤﻤﺎم ﻓﻲ ﻫﺬا اﻟﻔﺦ ﺑﺴﺒﺐ ﻋﺪم أﻫﻠﻴﺘﻬﻢ.

tk.title: ÇOCUK SİLAHI
tk.description: Mükemmel bir şekilde tasarlanmış bir silah. Üzerine basan insanın boyuna ve ağırlığına göre acı verme kabiliyeti artıyor. Çiğ insanlar (çocuklar), bunların üzerinde paytak paytak yürüyebilir. Elinde banyo havlusuyla yakın takipte olan yetişkin bir insanı ise etkisiz hâle getirir.

fr-CA.title: ARME DE BAMBIN
fr-CA.description: Une arme magnifiquement conçue. Sa capacité à infliger de la douleur augmente avec la taille et le poids du sujet humain qui marche dessus. Les humains non mûrs (« bambins ») peuvent les piétiner joyeusement, tandis qu'un adulte pressé équipé d'une serviette de bain sera mis hors d'état de nuire.

en-AU.title: TODDLER WEAPONRY
en-AU.description: A beautifully-designed weapon. Its ability to inflict pain increases with the height and weight of the human subject who steps on it. Unripe humans ("toddlers") can waddle over them happily, while an adult in hot pursuit carrying a bath towel will be incapacitated.

landmarks.title: TODDLER WEAPONRY
landmarks.description: A beautifully-designed weapon. Its ability to inflict pain increases with the height and weight of the human subject who steps on it. Unripe humans ("toddlers") can waddle over them happily, while an adult in hot pursuit carrying a bath towel will be incapacitated.

landmarks.name: LM_LettertrapDoor

en.title: LETTER TRAP
en.description: While researching a human postage system, experts installed several experimental front doors with lettertraps in the museum. The traps were expected to snag wandering letters. Unfortunately, this one just seems to collect brightly colored midweek pizza deals.

en-GB.title: LETTER TRAP
en-GB.description: While researching a human postage system, experts installed several experimental front doors with lettertraps in the museum. The traps were expected to snag wandering letters. Unfortunately, this one just seems to collect brightly coloured midweek pizza deals.

fr.title: PIÈGE À LETTRES
fr.description: Lors de leurs recherches sur un système d'affranchissement humain, les experts ont installé plusieurs prototypes de portes d'entrée équipées de pièges à lettres dans le musée. On s'attendait à ce que les pièges attrapent des lettres errantes. Malheureusement, ils semblent se contenter d'accumuler des affiches colorées arborant des pizzas.

de.title: BRIEFFALLE
de.description: Während ihrer Forschung am menschlichen Postsystem bauten Experten mehrere experimentelle Eingangstüren mit Brieffallen im Museum ein. Die Fallen sollten umherwandernde Briefe einfangen. Leider scheint diese hier ausschließlich bunt bedruckte Pizza-Angebote der Woche einzufangen.

es.title: TRAMPA PARA CARTAS
es.description: Mientras investigaban un sistema de franqueo humano, los expertos instalaron diversas puertas frontales con trampas para cartas en el museo. Se esperaba que las trampas captaran las cartas errantes. Por desgracia, esta simplemente parece recoger ofertas de pizza de mitad de semana de colores muy brillantes.

it.title: TRAPPOLA PER LE LETTERE
it.description: Mentre erano alla ricerca di un sistema postale umano, gli esperti hanno montato nel museo diverse porte d'ingresso sperimentali contenenti delle trappole per le lettere. Ci si aspettava che le trappole acchiappassero le lettere vaganti ma purtroppo sembrano solo raccogliere volantini dai colori accesi che contengono offerte infrasettimanali sulla pizza.

ja.title: 手紙の罠
ja.description: 人間の郵便システムを研究する中で、専門家たちは博物館内に「手紙用の罠」が付いた玄関ドアを、実験用に複数設置することにしました。この罠で、さまよう手紙を捕らえることが期待されています。残念ながら、この罠に掛かるのは、明るい色をしたの平日ピザ割引広告だけのようです。

ko.title: 편지 덫
ko.description: 인간들의 우편 시스템을 연구하던 도중, 전문가들은 박물관에 편지 덫을 설치한 실험용 문 여러 개를 설치했습니다. 편지 덫은 돌아다니는 편지들을 붙잡기 위한 용도입니다. 그러나 이 덫에는 화려한 피자 할인 전단지만 걸린 듯합니다.

zh-Hans.title: 信件投递口
zh-Hans.description: 在研究人类邮费系统时，专家们在博物馆安装了几扇有信件投递口的实验性前门。这些投递口是用来接收要寄的信的。遗憾的是，这个投递口似乎只是塞了些花哨的周中披萨优惠传单。

zh-Hant.title: 信件捕捉器
zh-Hant.description: 研究人類郵寄系統的專家們，在博物館安裝了幾道有信件捕捉器的實驗性前門。他們認為，這些陷阱會抓取四處徘徊的信件。可惜的是，這個捕捉器好像只有收集到顏色鮮豔的週中披薩優惠傳單。

ru.title: ЛОВУШКА ДЛЯ ПИСЕМ
ru.description: Исследуя человеческую почтовую систему, эксперты установили в музее несколько экспериментальных входных дверей с ловушками для писем. Предполагалось, что в ловушки будут попадать блуждающие письма. К сожалению, в эту попадаются только цветастые предложения пиццы в середине недели.

pt-BR.title: ARMADILHA PARA CARTAS
pt-BR.description: Para pesquisar o sistema postal humano, especialistas instalaram diversas portas da frente com armadilhas para cartas no museu. Esperava-se que as armadilhas capturassem cartas perdidas mas, infelizmente, esta só capturou propagandas de pizzaria.

nl.title: BRIEVENVAL
nl.description: Experts wilden meer te weten komen over brievenpost en plaatsten als experiment verschillende voordeuren met een brievenval in het museum. Ze dachten dat de brievenvallen rondslingerende brieven zouden vangen. In werkelijkheid lijkt de brievenval enkel kleurrijke reclame met korting op pizza's te verzamelen.

ar.title: ﻓﺘﺤﺔ اﻟﺒﺮﻳﺪ
ar.description: رﻛﺐ اﻟﺨﺒﺮاء ﻓﻲ اﻟﻤﺘﺤﻒ اﻟﻌﺪﻳﺪ ﻣﻦ اﻷﺑﻮاب اﻷﻣﺎﻣﻴﺔ اﻟﺘﺠﺮﻳﺒﻴﺔ اﻟﻤﺰودة ﺑﻔﺘﺤﺎت ﺑﺮﻳﺪ وذﻟﻚ ﻓﻲ أﺛﻨﺎء إﺟﺮاء أﺑﺤﺎث ﺣﻮل ﻧﻈﺎم ﻟﻠﺒﺮﻳﺪ اﻟﺒﺸﺮي. وﻛﺎن ﻣﻦ اﻟﻤﺘﻮﻗﻊ أن ﺗﺠﻤﻊ ﻫﺬه اﻟﻔﺘﺤﺎت اﻟﺮﺳﺎﺋﻞ اﻟﻤﺒﻌﺜﺮة. وﻟﻠﻐﺮاﺑﺔ، ﻳﺒﺪو أن ﻫﺬه اﻟﻔﺘﺤﺔ ﺗﺠﻤﻊ ﻓﻘﻂ ﻋﺮوض اﻟﺒﻴﺘﺰا ﻓﻲ ﻣﻨﺘﺼﻒ اﻷﺳﺒﻮع ﻣﻜﺘﻮﺑﺔ ﻋﻠﯽ ورق ﻻﻣﻊ وﻣﻠﻮن.

tk.title: POSTA TUZAĞI
tk.description: İnsan posta sistemini araştıran uzmanlar müzeye önlerinde posta tuzakları olan birkaç deneysel kapı kurdu. Bu tuzakların, etrafta başıboş dolaşan mektupları kendilerine çekmeleri bekleniyordu. Maalesef bu tuzak sadece renkli hafta ortası pizza fırsatı ilanlarını toplayabilmiş gibi görünüyor.

fr-CA.title: PIÈGE À LETTRES
fr-CA.description: Lors de leurs recherches sur un système de poste humain, les experts ont installé plusieurs prototypes de portes d'entrée équipés de pièges à lettres dans le musée. On s'attendait à ce que les pièges attrapent des lettres errantes. Malheureusement, celle-ci semble seulement accumuler des publicités colorées de restaurants de pizza.

en-AU.title: LETTER TRAP
en-AU.description: While researching a human postage system, experts installed several experimental front doors with lettertraps in the museum. The traps were expected to snag wandering letters. Unfortunately, this one just seems to collect brightly coloured midweek pizza deals.

landmarks.title: LETTER TRAP
landmarks.description: While researching a human postage system, experts installed several experimental front doors with lettertraps in the museum. The traps were expected to snag wandering letters. Unfortunately, this one just seems to collect brightly colored midweek pizza deals.

landmarks.name: LM_Lighthouse

en.title: LIGHTHOUSE
en.description: At first glance this appears to be a lighthouse. In fact, it is the illicium, or "lure," of a gigantic anglerfish. These predators outpaced their subaquatic food supply and learned to prey on human sailors by dangling their pulsing lure above the water.

en-GB.title: LIGHTHOUSE
en-GB.description: At first glance this appears to be a lighthouse. In fact, it is the illicium, or "lure," of a gigantic anglerfish. These predators outpaced their subaquatic food supply and learned to prey on human sailors by dangling their pulsing lure above the water.

fr.title: PHARE
fr.description: À première vue, on pourrait croire à un phare. Mais il s'agit là de l'illicium, ou « leurre », d'une gigantesque baudroie. Ces prédateurs ont diversifié leur source de nourriture subaquatique et appris à s'attaquer aux marins en agitant ce leurre palpitant à la surface de l'eau.

de.title: LEUCHTTURM
de.description: Auf den ersten Blick scheint es ein Leuchtturm zu sein. In der Tat ist es aber das Illicium, oder auch der „Köder“ eines gigantischen Anglerfisches. Diese Raubfische haben ihre Nahrungsquellen unter Wasser hinter sich gelassen und gelernt, menschliche Seeleute zu jagen, indem sie ihren pulsierenden Köder über Wasser baumeln lassen.

es.title: FARO
es.description: A primera vista, esto parece ser un faro. En realidad, es el ilicio (o "señuelo") de un gigantesco rape. Estos depredadores dejaron atrás sus suministros de alimentos subacuáticos y aprendieron a cazar marineros humanos exhibiendo su vibrante señuelo por encima del agua.

it.title: FARO
it.description: A prima vista sembra essere un faro. In realtà è l'illicio, ovvero l'esca di un'enorme rana pescatrice. Questi predatori hanno superato la loro fonte di cibo subacquea e hanno imparato a catturare i marinai umani facendo ciondolare la loro esca pulsante sopra l'acqua.

ja.title: 灯台
ja.description: パッと見は灯台のように見えます。でも実は、これは巨大アンコウの誘引突起、または「ルアー」なのです。これらの捕食者たちは自分たちの水中の食料源を食べ尽くしてしまったため、海面で脈動するルアーをブラブラさせて人間の船乗りを餌食にする術を学んだのです。

ko.title: 등대
ko.description: 얼핏 보면 등대 같습니다. 하지만 이건 사실 거대한 아귀초롱의 '미끼'입니다. 이 포식자들은 해저의 다른 먹잇감을 버리고 수면에 불빛을 드리우고 인간 선원들을 유인하여 잡아먹는 방법을 익혔습니다.

zh-Hans.title: 灯塔
zh-Hans.description: 乍一看，这似乎是一座灯塔。但事实上，它是巨型琵琶鱼的诱饵。水下的小鱼小虾们已经喂不饱这些食肉动物，它们学会了在水面上摆动明晃晃的诱饵，以捕食人类水手。

zh-Hant.title: 燈塔
zh-Hant.description: 乍看之下，這似乎是一座燈塔。事實上，這是巨大鮟鱇魚的吻觸手，也就是「誘餌」。這種獵食者游得比水中獵物快，並且懂得以載浮載沉的誘餌捕獵人類水手。

ru.title: МАЯК
ru.description: На первый взгляд это маяк. На самом деле это иллиций, «удилище» огромного морского чёрта. Потребности этих хищников превысили подводные запасы пищи, и они научились охотиться на людей-моряков, покачивая над водой своей мигающей приманкой.

pt-BR.title: FAROL
pt-BR.description: O que pode parecer um farol é, na verdade, um illicium: a “isca” de um enorme peixe-diabo. Estes predadores esgotaram suas fontes de alimento subaquáticas e aprenderam a atrair humanos, elevando suas iscas luminosas sobre a superfície da água.

nl.title: VUURTOREN
nl.description: Op het eerste gezicht lijkt dit een vuurtoren te zijn. In feite is dit het illicium, of "lokmiddel", van een gigantische zeeduivel. Deze roofdieren zijn hun onderzeese voedselvoorraad voorbij gestreefd en hebben geleerd op menselijke zeelieden te jagen door hun pulserende lokmiddel boven het water te laten hangen.

ar.title: اﻟﻤﻨﺎرة
ar.description: ﻓﻲ ﺑﺎدئ اﻷﻣﺮ، ﻳﺒﺪو ﻫﺬا اﻟﺸﻲء وﻛﺄﻧﻪ ﻣﻨﺎرة، ﻟﻜﻦ ﻓﻲ اﻟﻮاﻗﻊ ﻫﻮ أداة ﺟﺬب ﺳﻤﻜﺔ أﺑﻮ اﻟﺸﺺ اﻟﻌﻤﻼﻗﺔ أو "ﻃﻌﻢ" ﺗﺴﺘﺨﺪﻣﻪ. ﻓﻘﺪ أﺻﺒﺤﺖ ﻫﺬه اﻷﺳﻤﺎك اﻟﻤﻔﺘﺮﺳﺔ أذﻛﯽ ﻣﻦ أن ﺗﺘﻨﺎول ﻣﺨﺰون اﻟﻄﻌﺎم اﻟﺒﺤﺮي ﻟﺪﻳﻬﺎ وﺗﻌﻠﻤﺖ اﺻﻄﻴﺎد اﻟﺒﺤﺎرة اﻟﺒﺸﺮ ﺑﺮﻓﻊ ﻃﻌﻤﻬﺎ ﻓﻮق اﻟﻤﺎء.

tk.title: DENİZ FENERİ
tk.description: İlk bakışta bunun bir deniz feneri olduğunu düşünebilirsiniz. Aslında devasa bir fener balığının yüzgecidir. Bu yırtıcılar, su altı yiyecek tedariklerini geride bırakıp titreşen yüzgeçlerini su üzerinden sarkıtarak insan denizcileri avlamayı öğrendi.

fr-CA.title: PHARE
fr-CA.description: À première vue, on pourrait croire à un phare. Mais il s'agit bien là de l'illicium, ou « leurre », d'une gigantesque baudroie. Ces prédateurs ont épuisé leur source de nourriture subaquatique et ont appris à s'attaquer aux marins en agitant ce leurre palpitant à la surface de l'eau.

en-AU.title: LIGHTHOUSE
en-AU.description: At first glance this appears to be a lighthouse. In fact, it is the illicium, or "lure," of a gigantic anglerfish. These predators outpaced their subaquatic food supply and learned to prey on human sailors by dangling their pulsing lure above the water.

landmarks.title: LIGHTHOUSE
landmarks.description: At first glance this appears to be a lighthouse. In fact, it is the illicium, or "lure," of a gigantic anglerfish. These predators outpaced their subaquatic food supply and learned to prey on human sailors by dangling their pulsing lure above the water.

landmarks.name: LM_Lipstick

en.title: CRAYONS
en.description: These human crayons were apparently useful for drawing on skin, but left greasy smudges when applied to walls, paper, clothes, and teeth. In this way they appear vastly inferior to monster crayons. They also taste bland.

en-GB.title: CRAYONS
en-GB.description: These human crayons were apparently useful for drawing on skin, but left greasy smudges when applied to walls, paper, clothes, and teeth. In this way they appear vastly inferior to monster crayons. They also taste bland.

fr.title: CRAYONS
fr.description: Ces crayons humains étaient vraisemblablement efficaces pour dessiner sur la peau, mais laissaient des taches graisseuses lorsqu'ils étaient appliqués sur les murs, le papier, les vêtements et les dents. Ils semblent ainsi nettement inférieurs aux crayons monstres. Enfin, leur goût est fade.

de.title: BUNTSTIFTE
de.description: Diese menschlichen Buntstifte waren anscheinend nützlich, um auf Haut zu malen, hinterließen aber bloß fettige Flecken auf Wänden, Papier, Kleidung und Zähnen. Dadurch sind sie Monster-Buntstiften weit unterlegen. Außerdem schmecken sie nach nichts.

es.title: CRAYONES
es.description: Estos crayones humanos eran aparentemente útiles para dibujar sobre la piel, pero dejaban borrones grasientos al aplicarse sobre paredes, papel, ropa y dientes. En este sentido, parecen bastante inferiores a los crayones de monstruos. También saben sosos.

it.title: PASTELLI
it.description: Questi pastelli umani erano usati, a quanto pare, per disegnare sulla pelle, ma lasciavano macchie untuose se usati su muri, carta, vestiti e denti. Per questo, sono di molto inferiori ai pastelli dei mostri. In più, sono insipidi.

ja.title: クレヨン
ja.description: この人間のクレヨンは、肌の上に絵を描く際は役に立つようですが、壁、紙、洋服や歯に色を付けると脂っこい跡を残してしまうのでした。こういった点では、人間のクレヨンはモンスターのクレヨンに比べて大幅に劣っているようです。それに、味気もないので退屈です。

ko.title: 크레용
ko.description: 인간용 크레용은 원래 피부 위에 그림을 그릴 때 가장 최적이며, 벽, 종이, 옷, 이빨에 칠하면 기름 얼룩을 남깁니다. 그래서 몬스터용 크레용에 비하면 품질이 많이 떨어집니다. 또한 맛도 평범합니다.

zh-Hans.title: 蜡笔
zh-Hans.description: 这些人类蜡笔显然可以用来在皮肤上画画，但如果涂在墙壁、纸、衣服或者牙齿上，就会留下油腻的污迹。这样看来，它们比怪兽蜡笔要逊色得多。它们尝起来也没什么味道。

zh-Hant.title: 蠟筆
zh-Hant.description: 這些人造蠟筆很適合在皮膚上塗畫，但是畫在牆壁、紙和牙齒上時會留下油漬。在這方面，它們遠遠不如怪獸用的蠟筆。此外，它們的味道也很平淡。

ru.title: ЦВЕТНЫЕ КАРАНДАШИ
ru.description: По-видимому, эти человеческие цветные карандаши были полезны для рисования на коже, но при взаимодействии со стенами, бумагой, одеждой и зубами оставляли жирные пятна. Так что они оказались значительно хуже цветных карандашей монстров. А еще они безвкусные.

pt-BR.title: GIZES DE CERA
pt-BR.description: Estes gizes de cera humanos desenhavam na pele com eficácia, mas deixavam apenas manchas borradas em paredes, papeis, roupas e dentes, sendo assim consideravelmente inferiores aos gizes de cera dos monstros. Sem falar que eles não têm gosto de nada.

nl.title: WASKRIJT
nl.description: Dit mensenkrijt was blijkbaar handig om op je huid te tekenen, maar liet vettige vlekken achter op muren, papier, kleren en tanden. Ze zijn duidelijk minder goed dan monsterkrijt. Ze zijn ook nog eens smaakloos.

ar.title: أﻗﻼم اﻟﺘﻠﻮﻳﻦ
ar.description: ﻳﺒﺪو أن أﻗﻼم اﻟﺘﻠﻮﻳﻦ ﻫﺬه اﻟﺨﺎﺻﺔ ﺑﺎﻟﺒﺸﺮ ﻛﺎﻧﺖ ﻣﻔﻴﺪة ﻟﺘﻠﻮﻳﻦ اﻟﺒﺸﺮة، ﻟﻜﻨﻬﺎ ﺗﺘﺮك ﺑﻘﻌﺎ دﻫﻨﻴﺔ ﻋﻨﺪ اﺳﺘﺨﺪاﻣﻬﺎ ﻋﻠﯽ اﻟﺠﺪران واﻟﻮرق واﻟﻤﻼﺑﺲ واﻷﺳﻨﺎن. ﻟﺬا ﻓﻬﻲ أﻗﻞ ﺟﻮدة ﻣﻦ أﻗﻼم اﻟﺘﻠﻮﻳﻦ اﻟﺨﺎﺻﺔ ﺑﺎﻟﻮﺣﻮش. وأﺣﺪ ﻋﻴﻮﺑﻬﺎ ﻫﻮ ﻃﻌﻤﻬﺎ اﻟﻤﺎﺳﺦ.

tk.title: MUM BOYALAR
tk.description: İnsanların bu mum boyalarının ciltte çizim yaparken epey kullanışlı olduğu anlaşılsa da duvarlara, kağıtlara, kıyafetlere ve dişe uygulandığında yağlı lekeler bırakıyor. Bu açıdan canavar mum boyaları kadar kaliteli olmadığını söyleyebiliriz. Tadı da çok kötü.

fr-CA.title: CRAYONS DE GRAS
fr-CA.description: Ces crayons humains étaient vraisemblablement efficaces pour dessiner sur la peau, mais laissaient des taches graisseuses lorsqu'appliqués sur les murs, le papier, les vêtements et les dents. Ils semblent ainsi nettement inférieurs aux crayons monstres. Aussi, leur goût est fade.

en-AU.title: CRAYONS
en-AU.description: These human crayons were apparently useful for drawing on skin, but left greasy smudges when applied to walls, paper, clothes, and teeth. In this way they appear vastly inferior to monster crayons. They also taste bland.

landmarks.title: CRAYONS
landmarks.description: These human crayons were apparently useful for drawing on skin, but left greasy smudges when applied to walls, paper, clothes, and teeth. In this way they appear vastly inferior to monster crayons. They also taste bland.

landmarks.name: LM_LooseChange

en.title: LOOSE CHANGE
en.description: This trove of cash was excavated from the velvety nooks and crannies of the seating at the Phoenix Movie Palace when the theatre was refurbished in 2042. The total value of the coins at that time was just enough to cover the cost of two standard off-peak cinema tickets and a small popcorn.

en-GB.title: LOOSE CHANGE
en-GB.description: This trove of cash was excavated from the velvety nooks and crannies of the seating at the Phoenix Movie Palace when the theatre was refurbished in 2042. The total value of the coins at that time was just enough to cover the cost of two standard off-peak cinema tickets and a small popcorn.

fr.title: MONNAIE ÉGARÉE
fr.description: Ce trésor financier a été déterré des coins et recoins veloutés des sièges du Phoenix Movie Palace, lors de la rénovation du cinéma en 2042. La valeur totale des pièces à cette époque était juste suffisante pour couvrir le coût de deux billets de cinéma en heures creuses et d'une petite portion de pop-corn.

de.title: KLEINGELD
de.description: Dieser Bargeldfund wurde aus den samtigen Ecken und Winkeln der Sitzgelegenheiten im Phoenix-Filmpalast ausgegraben, als das Theater im Jahr 2042 renoviert wurde. Der Gesamtwert der Münzen war zu dieser Zeit gerade genug, um die Kosten für zwei normale Kinokarten und eine kleine Portion Popcorn zu decken.

es.title: DINERO SUELTO
es.description: Este tesoro en efectivo se recuperó excavando en las grietas y rincones aterciopelados de los asientos del Phoenix Movie Palace cuando el teatro se reformó en 2042. El valor total de las monedas en aquella época solo daba para cubrir los gastos de dos entradas de cine de tarifa reducida y palomitas de tamaño pequeño.

it.title: SPICCIOLI
it.description: Questa collezione di spiccioli venne scovata tra le pieghe vellutate e le fessure delle poltroncine del Phoenix Movie Palace quando il cinema fu ristrutturato nel 2042. Il valore totale delle monete era sufficiente da coprire il costo di due biglietti standard in orario pomeridiano e una confezione piccola di popcorn.

ja.title: 小銭
ja.description: この現金の山は、フェニックス映画館が2042年にリフォームされた際、柔らかで人目に付かない座席の隙間から掘り出されたものです。この小銭の当時の価値は、混雑していない時間帯の通常の映画チケットを2枚とポップコーンを購入できるくらいのものでした。

ko.title: 떨어진 동전
ko.description: 피닉스 무비 팰러스가 2042년 재단장했을 때, 어느 벨벳 의자의 숨은 구석에서 현금 한 무더기가 발굴되었습니다. 당시 발견된 동전은 평일 낮 영화 티켓 두 장과 스몰 사이즈 팝콘을 살 수 있을 정도의 금액에 이르렀다고 합니다.

zh-Hans.title: 零钱
zh-Hans.description: 这些现金是在 2042 年凤凰电影艺术宫翻新时从座位柔软的凹处和缝隙中掏出来的。当时硬币的总价值仅够买两张非高峰时段的标准电影票和一小份爆米花。

zh-Hant.title: 零錢
zh-Hant.description: 這堆現金是在鳳凰電影院於 2042 年重新翻修時，在絲絨座椅區四周挖出來的。這些硬幣在當時的總價值，只能購買兩張普通的離峰電影票和一小份爆米花。

ru.title: МЕЛОЧЬ
ru.description: Эту кучу денег откопали в бархатных закромах сидений кинотеатра «Феникс», когда его ремонтировали в 2042 году. На тот момент итоговой суммы хватило бы на пару обычных билетов в непиковый период и маленький попкорн.

pt-BR.title: TROCADOS ESQUECIDOS
pt-BR.description: Este montante de dinheiro foi escavado das quinas e frestas dos assentos de um cinema quando ele foi reformado em 2042. O valor total das moedas, na época, era o suficiente para comprar duas entradas para um filme alternativo e uma pipoca pequena.

nl.title: KLEINGELD
nl.description: Deze geldschat werd opgegraven uit de fluweelachtige hoekjes van de stoelen van het Phoenix Movie Palace toen het theater in 2042 werd opgeknapt. De totale waarde van de munten was in die tijd net genoeg voor twee standaard bioscoopkaartjes tijdens daluren en een kleine popcorn.

ar.title: ﻧﻘﻮد ﻓﻜﺔ
ar.description: ﺗﻢ اﺳﺘﺨﺮاج ﻫﺬا اﻟﻜﻨﺰ اﻟﺪﻓﻴﻦ ﻣﻦ اﻟﻤﺎل ﻣﻦ اﻟﺰواﻳﺎ واﻟﺸﻘﻮق اﻟﻤﺨﻤﻠﻴﺔ ﻟﻠﻤﻘﺎﻋﺪ ﻓﻲ ﻗﺎﻋﺔ ﺳﻴﻨﻤﺎ ﻓﻮﻧﻴﻜﺲ ﻣﻮﻓﻲ ﺑﺎﻻس ﻋﻨﺪﻣﺎ ﺗﻢ ﺗﺠﺪﻳﺪﻫﺎ ﻋﺎم 2402. واﻟﻘﻴﻤﺔ اﻹﺟﻤﺎﻟﻴﺔ ﻟﻠﻌﻤﻼت اﻟﻨﻘﺪﻳﺔ ﻓﻲ ﻫﺬا اﻟﻮﻗﺖ ﻛﺎﻧﺖ ﺗﻜﻔﻲ ﻟﻘﻴﻤﺔ ﺗﺬﻛﺮﺗﻲ ﺳﻴﻨﻤﺎ ﻋﺎدﻳﺘﻴﻦ ﻣﻦ اﻟﻨﻮع اﻟﺮﺧﻴﺺ وﻋﻠﺒﺔ ﻓﺸﺎر ﺻﻐﻴﺮة.

tk.title: BOZUK PARA
tk.description: Bu nakit para gömüsü, 2042 yılında yenilendiği sırada Phoenix Sinema Salonu'nda koltuğun kadifemsi köşelerinden çıkarıldı. Bozuk paraların o zamandaki toplam değeri, yoğun olmayan saatlerde iki kişilik standart sinema bileti ve küçük boy patlamış mısıra anca yetiyordu.

fr-CA.title: MONNAIE ÉGARÉE
fr-CA.description: Cette montagne d'argent a été extraite des craques de sièges veloutés du Phoenix Movie Palace, lors de la rénovation du cinéma en 2042. La valeur totale des pièces à cette époque couvrait tout juste le coût de deux billets de cinéma en heures creuses et d'une petite portion de pop-corn.

en-AU.title: LOOSE CHANGE
en-AU.description: This trove of cash was excavated from the velvety nooks and crannies of the seating at the Phoenix Movie Palace when the theatre was refurbished in 2042. The total value of the coins at that time was just enough to cover the cost of two standard off-peak cinema tickets and a small popcorn.

landmarks.title: LOOSE CHANGE
landmarks.description: This trove of cash was excavated from the velvety nooks and crannies of the seating at the Phoenix Movie Palace when the theatre was refurbished in 2042. The total value of the coins at that time was just enough to cover the cost of two standard off-peak cinema tickets and a small popcorn.

landmarks.name: LM_MagicBeans

en.title: MAGIC BEANS
en.description: In human legends, the seeds of the giant beanstalk were apparently small enough to fit into a child's palm. In reality, the seeds of giant beanstalks are also giant. These examples measure approximately 2.7m in length, and can kill if not harvested appropriately.

en-GB.title: MAGIC BEANS
en-GB.description: In human legends, the seeds of the giant beanstalk were apparently small enough to fit into a child's palm. In reality, the seeds of giant beanstalks are also giant. These examples measure approximately 2.7m in length, and can kill if not harvested appropriately.

fr.title: HARICOTS MAGIQUES
fr.description: Les légendes humaines racontent que les graines du haricot géant étaient assez petites pour tenir dans la paume d'un enfant. Mais en réalité, les graines de haricots géants sont tout aussi géantes. Ces spécimens mesurent environ 2,7 m de long et peuvent tuer s'ils ne sont pas récoltés correctement.

de.title: MAGISCHE BOHNEN
de.description: In den Legenden der Menschen waren die Samen einer riesigen Bohnenranke anscheinend klein genug, um in eine Kinderhand zu passen. In Wirklichkeit sind die Samen einer riesigen Bohnenranke natürlich ebenfalls riesig. Diese Exemplare sind etwa 2,7 m lang und können bei unsachgerechten Erntemethoden tödlich sein.

es.title: HABICHUELAS MÁGICAS
es.description: En las leyendas humanas, las semillas de un tallo de judías gigante eran aparentemente tan pequeñas como para caber en la palma de la mano de un niño. En realidad, las semillas de los tallos de judías gigantes también son gigantes. Estos ejemplares miden alrededor de 2,7 m de longitud y pueden matar si no se los cosecha adecuadamente.

it.title: FAGIOLI MAGICI
it.description: Nelle leggende umane, i semi di una pianta di fagioli gigante erano abbastanza piccoli da stare nel palmo della mano di un bambino. In realtà, i semi delle piante di fagioli giganti sono anche loro giganti. Questi misurano 2,7 metri di lunghezza e potrebbero uccidere se non coltivati in modo corretto.

ja.title: 魔法の豆
ja.description: 人間の伝説によると、この巨大な豆の木の種は、子供の手のひらに収まるほど小さなものだったようです。現実世界では、この巨大な豆の木の種も巨大なのです。これらの例は、約2.7メートルほどの長さであり、正しく収穫しなければ人が死んでしまうほどの殺傷能力を持ち合わせているようです。

ko.title: 마법의 콩
ko.description: 인간 전설에 등장하는 거대한 콩나무 씨앗은 어린애가 손으로 쥘 수 있을 만큼 작았다고 표현합니다. 하지만 실제로 거대 콩나무는 씨앗도 컸습니다. 여기 이 샘플은 길이가 약 2.7m에 달하며 제대로 수확하지 않으면 수확자가 사망할 수도 있습니다.

zh-Hans.title: 魔法豆
zh-Hans.description: 在人类传说中，这种巨型豆茎的种子似乎小到可以放进一个孩子的手掌里。实际上，巨型豆茎的种子也是很大的。这些样品大约 2.7 米长，如果收割不当，可能会致死。

zh-Hant.title: 魔豆
zh-Hant.description: 在人類傳說中，巨大豌豆的種子似乎小到足以讓小孩拿在手中。實際上，巨大豌豆的種子也同樣巨大。這些樣本的長度大約是2.7公尺，如果沒有以正確的方式採收，很可能會有生命危險。

ru.title: ВОЛШЕБНЫЕ БОБЫ
ru.description: По всей видимости, в человеческих легендах семена огромного бобового стебля были достаточно маленькими, чтобы поместиться у ребенка на ладони. На самом деле семена огромного бобового стебля тоже огромны. Длина этих образцов приблизительно 2,7 м, они могут и убить, если их не собрать должным образом.

pt-BR.title: FEIJÕES MÁGICOS
pt-BR.description: Dizem as lendas humanas que as sementes de um pé de feijão gigante eram pequenas o suficiente para caber na palma da mão de uma criança. Na verdade, as sementes de um pé de feijão gigante também são gigantes: estes exemplares medem aproximadamente 2,7 m de largura e podem matar caso não sejam colhidos da maneira correta.

nl.title: MAGISCHE BONEN
nl.description: In menselijke legenden waren de zaden van de reuzenbonenstaak blijkbaar klein genoeg om in de handpalm van een kind te passen. In werkelijkheid zijn de zaden van de reuzenbonenstelen ook reusachtig. Deze voorbeelden zijn ongeveer 2,7 m lang en kunnen dodelijk zijn als ze niet op de juiste manier worden geoogst.

ar.title: اﻟﺤﺒﻮب اﻟﺴﺤﺮﻳﺔ
ar.description: ﻓﻲ أﺳﺎﻃﻴﺮ اﻟﺒﺸﺮ، ﻛﺎﻧﺖ ﺑﺬور ﺷﺠﺮ اﻟﻔﺎﺻﻮﻟﻴﺎ اﻟﻌﻤﻼق ﺻﻐﻴﺮة ﺑﺪرﺟﺔ ﺗﺠﻌﻠﻬﺎ ﻣﻼﺋﻤﺔ ﻟﻴﺤﻤﻠﻬﺎ اﻟﻄﻔﻞ ﻓﻲ ﻳﺪه. وﻓﻲ اﻟﻮاﻗﻊ، ﻛﺎﻧﺖ ﺑﺬور ﺷﺠﺮ اﻟﻔﺎﺻﻮﻟﻴﺎ اﻟﻌﻤﻼق ﺿﺨﻤﺔ أﻳﻀﺎ. وﻳﺒﻠﻎ ﻣﻘﺎس ﻫﺬه اﻟﻨﻤﺎذج ﻧﺤﻮ 7.2 ﻣﺘﺮ ﻃﻮﻻ، وﻳﻤﻜﻦ أن ﺗﻘﺘﻞ إذا ﻟﻢ ﺗﺤﺼﺪ ﺑﺸﻜﻞ ﻣﻼﺋﻢ.

tk.title: SİHİRLİ FASULYELER
tk.description: İnsan efsanelerinde devasa fasulye sırığının tohumları, bir çocuğun avcuna sığacak kadar küçüktü. Gerçekte ise devasa fasulye sırıklarının tohumları da devasadır. Bu örneklerin boyu yaklaşık olarak 2,7 metre uzunluğunda ve düzgün şekilde hasat edilmezse ölümcül olabilir.

fr-CA.title: HARICOTS MAGIQUES
fr-CA.description: Les légendes humaines racontent que les graines du haricot géant étaient assez petites pour tenir dans la paume d'un enfant. Mais en réalité, les graines de haricots géants sont tout aussi géantes. Ces spécimens mesurent environ 2,7 m de long et peuvent tuer s'ils ne sont pas récoltés correctement.

en-AU.title: MAGIC BEANS
en-AU.description: In human legends, the seeds of the giant beanstalk were apparently small enough to fit into a child's palm. In reality, the seeds of giant beanstalks are also giant. These examples measure approximately 2.7m in length, and can kill if not harvested appropriately.

landmarks.title: MAGIC BEANS
landmarks.description: In human legends, the seeds of the giant beanstalk were apparently small enough to fit into a child's palm. In reality, the seeds of giant beanstalks are also giant. These examples measure approximately 2.7m in length, and can kill if not harvested appropriately.

landmarks.name: LM_MagicHatAndWand

en.title: RABBIT HUTCH
en.description: This cost-effective rabbit habitat is capable of housing up to three medium-sized creatures at a time. Unfortunately, when humans reached inside to check on their rabbits, they would often pull out knotted handkerchiefs, bunches of flowers, and unfeasibly long ladders instead of their pets.

en-GB.title: RABBIT HUTCH
en-GB.description: This cost-effective rabbit habitat is capable of housing up to three medium-sized creatures at a time. Unfortunately, when humans reached inside to check on their rabbits, they would often pull out knotted handkerchiefs, bunches of flowers, and unfeasibly long ladders instead of their pets.

fr.title: CLAPIER À LAPINS
fr.description: Cet habitat économique pour lapins peut accueillir jusqu'à trois créatures de taille moyenne en même temps. Malheureusement, lorsque les humains mettaient la main à l'intérieur pour vérifier comment allaient leurs lapins, ils en sortaient souvent des mouchoirs noués, des bouquets de fleurs et des échelles incroyablement longues à la place de leurs animaux.

de.title: KANINCHENHÜTTE
de.description: Dieses kostengünstige Kaninchenhabitat ist in der Lage, bis zu drei mittelgroße Tiere auf einmal unterzubringen. Leider zogen die Menschen, wenn sie nach ihren Kaninchen sahen, oft verknotete Taschentücher, Blumensträuße und unfassbar lange Leitern anstelle ihrer Haustiere heraus.

es.title: CASA PARA CONEJOS
es.description: En este rentable hábitat para conejos se pueden alojar hasta tres criaturas de tamaño medio a la vez. Por desgracia, cuando los humanos meten la mano en su interior para sacar a los conejos, normalmente sacan pañuelos atados, ramos de flores y unas escaleras larguísimas en lugar de las mascotas.

it.title: CONIGLIERA
it.description: Questo efficiente habitat per conigli può ospitare fino a tre creature di medie dimensioni alla volta. Purtroppo, quando gli umani cercavano di tirare fuori i conigli, invece degli animali trovavano spesso fazzoletti con nodi, mazzi di fiori e scale dalle dimensioni irrealistiche.

ja.title: ウサギ小屋
ja.description: このコスト効率の高いウサギの住処は、一度に最高で3匹までの中型動物を収容することができます。残念ながら、人間がこの中に腕を伸ばしてウサギの様子を見ようとする時、そこから引っ張り出されるのは結び目の付いたハンカチ、花束や、不可能なほど長いハシゴなどであり、肝心のペットの姿は見られないのです。

ko.title: 토끼장
ko.description: 이 가성비 좋은 토끼의 집은 한 번에 최대 3마리의 보통 크기 토끼를 수용할 수 있습니다. 하지만 인간들이 안에 있는 토끼를 확인하기 위해서는 매듭을 묶은 기나긴 손수건과 수많은 꽃, 그리고 말도 안 되는 길이의 사다리를 우선 꺼내야 했습니다.

zh-Hans.title: 兔子笼
zh-Hans.description: 这款成本低廉的兔子栖息地能够一次性容纳最多三只中等体型生物。可惜的是，人类去检查自己的兔子的时候，他们总是会拉出来打结的手帕、成捆的鲜花，还有不可能存在的长梯子，就是找不到自己的宠物。

zh-Hant.title: 兔子窩
zh-Hant.description: 這個兔子棲息地，一次可以容納最多三隻中型生物，很划算。可惜的是，當人類入內查看他們的兔子時，他們掏出來的往往不是他們的寵物，而是一些打結的手帕、一束束的鮮花，還有很不實用的長梯子。

ru.title: ВОЛЬЕР ДЛЯ КРОЛИКОВ
ru.description: В этом недорогом домике может одновременно обитать до трех кроликов среднего размера. К сожалению, когда люди пытались вытащить кроликов из этого обиталища, происходили осечки: вместо кроликов они доставали связанные вместе платки, букеты цветов и бессмысленно длинные лестницы.

pt-BR.title: CAIXA DE COELHO
pt-BR.description: Esta moradia de coelho barata é capaz de abrigar até três criaturas de tamanho médio por vez. Infelizmente, quando os humanos chegavam para verificar seus coelhos, muitas vezes puxavam lenços amarrados, ramos de flores e escadas inviavelmente longas em vez de seus animais de estimação.

nl.title: KONIJNENHOK
nl.description: Dit kosteneffectieve konijnenonderkomen kan maximaal drie middelgrote wezens tegelijk herbergen. Wanneer mensen echter naar binnen reikten om hun konijnen te controleren, haalden ze vaak geknoopte zakdoeken, bossen bloemen en onmogelijk lange ladders tevoorschijn in plaats van hun dieren.

ar.title: ﻗﻔﺺ اﻷرﻧﺐ
ar.description: إن ﻣﺴﺎﻛﻦ اﻷراﻧﺐ اﻟﺘﻲ ﺗﺘﺴﻢ ﺑﻔﻌﺎﻟﻴﺔ اﻟﺘﻜﻠﻔﺔ ﻳﻤﻜﻨﻬﺎ إﻳﻮاء ﻣﺎ ﻳﺼﻞ إﻟﯽ ﺛﻼﺛﺔ ﻛﺎﺋﻨﺎت ﻣﺘﻮﺳﻄﺔ اﻟﺤﺠﻢ ﻓﻲ وﻗﺖ واﺣﺪ. ﻟﺴﻮء اﻟﺤﻆ، ﻋﻨﺪﻣﺎ ﻳﻤﺪ اﻟﺒﺸﺮ أﻳﺪﻳﻬﻢ إﻟﯽ اﻟﺪاﺧﻞ ﻟﻼﻃﻤﺌﻨﺎن ﻋﻠﯽ أراﻧﺒﻬﻢ، ﻓﺈﻧﻬﻢ ﻏﺎﻟﺒﺎ ﻣﺎ ﻳﺴﺤﺒﻮن ﻣﻨﺎدﻳﻞ ﻣﻌﻘﻮدة وﺑﺎﻗﺎت ﻣﻦ اﻟﺰﻫﻮر وﺳﻼﻟﻢ ﻃﻮﻳﻠﺔ ﻏﻴﺮ ﻣﺠﺪﻳﺔ ﺑﺪﻻ ﻣﻦ ﺣﻴﻮاﻧﺎﺗﻬﻢ اﻷﻟﻴﻔﺔ.

tk.title: TAVŞAN KAFESİ
tk.description: Uygun maliyetli bu tavşan habitatı, aynı anda üç orta boy canlıyı barındırabilir. Ne yazık ki, tavşanlarının durumunu kontrol etmek için içeri giren insanlar çoğu zaman düğümlü mendilleri, çiçek demetlerini ve son derece uzun merdivenleri çekip çıkarmak zorunda kalıyorlardı.

fr-CA.title: CLAPIER À LAPINS
fr-CA.description: Cet habitat économique pour lapins peut accueillir jusqu'à trois créatures de taille moyenne en même temps. Malheureusement, lorsque les humains mettaient la main à l'intérieur pour vérifier comment allaient leurs lapins, ils en sortaient souvent des mouchoirs noués, des bouquets de fleurs et des échelles incroyablement longues à la place de leurs animaux.

en-AU.title: RABBIT HUTCH
en-AU.description: This cost-effective rabbit habitat is capable of housing up to three medium-sized creatures at a time. Unfortunately, when humans reached inside to check on their rabbits, they would often pull out knotted handkerchiefs, bunches of flowers, and unfeasibly long ladders instead of their pets.

landmarks.title: RABBIT HUTCH
landmarks.description: This cost-effective rabbit habitat is capable of housing up to three medium-sized creatures at a time. Unfortunately, when humans reached inside to check on their rabbits, they would often pull out knotted handkerchiefs, bunches of flowers, and unfeasibly long ladders instead of their pets.

landmarks.name: LM_MessageInABottleInAShark

en.title: MESSAGE IN A BOTTLE IN A SHARK
en.description:
This shark contains a clear bottle which, in turn, contains a rolled-up sheet of paper. Scanning the document with in-shark photography reveals the message, "Anthony, I bet you a million billion pounds that no shark will ever eat this." 
Congratulations, Anthony.

en-GB.title: MESSAGE IN A BOTTLE IN A SHARK
en-GB.description:
This shark contains a clear bottle which, in turn, contains a rolled-up sheet of paper. Scanning the document with in-shark photography reveals the message, "Anthony, I bet you a million billion pounds that no shark will ever eat this." 
Congratulations, Anthony.

fr.title: MESSAGE EN BOUTEILLE EN REQUIN
fr.description:
Ce requin contient une bouteille transparente qui, elle, contient une feuille de papier enroulée. La numérisation du document via des photographies intra-requin révèle le message suivant : « Anthony, je te parie un million de milliards de livres qu'aucun requin ne mangera ça. » 
Félicitations, Anthony.

de.title: FLASCHENPOST IM HAI
de.description:
Dieser Hai enthält eine durchsichtige Flasche, die ihrerseits ein zusammengerolltes Blatt Papier enthält. Das Dokument wurde mit In-Hai-Fotografie gescannt und enthält folgende Botschaft: „Anthony, ich wette eine Million Milliarden Pfund, dass das hier niemals von einem Hai gefressen wird.“ 
Glückwunsch, Anthony.

es.title: MENSAJE EN UNA BOTELLA EN UN TIBURÓN
es.description:
Este tiburón contiene una botella transparente en la que, a su vez, hay una hoja de papel enrollada. El escaneo del documento gracias a una instantánea del interior del tiburón revela un mensaje: "Anthony, me apuesto un millón de billones de libras a que ningún tiburón se comerá esto jamás". 
Enhorabuena, Anthony.

it.title: MESSAGGIO IN UNA BOTTIGLIA IN UNO SQUALO
it.description: Questo squalo contiene una bottiglia trasparente che, a sua volta, contiene un foglio arrotolato. Scansionando il documento con una fotografia intra-squalo si legge il messaggio: "Anthony, scommetto un milione di miliardi di sterline che nessuno squalo mangerà questa bottiglia". Congratulazioni, Anthony.

ja.title: サメの中の瓶のメッセージ
ja.description:
このサメの中には透明のボトルが入っており、そのボトルの中には、丸められた紙が入っています。サメ内写真でこの紙をスキャンしたところ、このメッセージには「アンソニー、サメがこれを食べないことに何百万も、何十億ポンドも賭けてやるよ。」
おめでとう、アンソニー。

ko.title: 상어 속 병 속에 든 메시지
ko.description:
이 상어에는 투명한 병이 들어있으며, 그 안에는 돌돌 말린 편지가 들어있습니다. 상어 내부 촬영을 통해 문서를 스캔하자 거기에는 "앤서니, 이건 절대 상어한테 먹히지 않을 거라는데 오조오억 파운드 건다."라고 적혀 있었습니다. 
앤서니, 축하합니다.

zh-Hans.title: 鲨鱼瓶中信
zh-Hans.description:
这条鲨鱼的体内有一个透明的瓶子，里面装着一张卷起来的纸。通过鲨鱼体内摄影扫描文件，会发现一段话：“安东尼，我跟你赌一千万亿英镑，绝对不会有鲨鱼会吃这个的。”
恭喜，安东尼。

zh-Hant.title: 鯊魚瓶中信
zh-Hant.description:
這隻鯊魚的體內有一個透明的瓶子，裡頭裝著一張捲起來的紙。仔細看過鯊魚體內文件的照片，會發現一段話：「安東尼，我跟你賭一萬兆英鎊，絕對不會有鯊魚會吃這個的。」
祝好運，安東尼。

ru.title: ПОСЛАНИЕ В БУТЫЛКЕ В АКУЛЕ
ru.description:
В этой акуле находится прозрачная бутылка, в которой, в свою очередь, лежит свернутый лист бумаги. При изучении документа с помощью снимков внутри акулы было обнаружено послание: «Энтони, спорю на миллион фунтов, что ни одна акула никогда это не съест». 
Энтони, примите поздравления.

pt-BR.title: MENSAGEM NA GARRAFA... NO TUBARÃO
pt-BR.description:
Dentro deste tubarão há uma garrafa, dentro da qual, por sua vez, há uma folha de papel enrolada. Com o uso de uma tecnologia especial de escaneamento intratubarão, é possível ler a seguinte mensagem escrita nela: “Antônio, aposto um milhão que nenhum tubarão vai comer essa mensagem”. 
Parabéns, Antônio

nl.title: BRIEF IN EEN FLES IN EEN HAAI
nl.description:
Deze haai bevat een doorzichtige fles die op zijn beurt een opgerold vel papier bevat. Een scan van het document met in-haai fotografie onthult de boodschap: "Antonie, ik wed om een miljoen euro dat geen haai dit ooit opeet." 
Gefeliciteerd, Antonie.

ar.title: رﺳﺎﻟﺔ ﻓﻲ زﺟﺎﺟﺔ داﺧﻞ ﺳﻤﻜﺔ ﻗﺮش
ar.description: ﺗﻮﺟﺪ ﻓﻲ أﺣﺸﺎء ﺳﻤﻜﺔ اﻟﻘﺮش ﻫﺬه زﺟﺎﺟﺔ ﺷﻔﺎﻓﺔ ﺗﺤﺘﻮي ﺑﺪورﻫﺎ ﻋﻠﯽ ورﻗﺔ ﻣﻠﻔﻮﻓﺔ. وﺑﻤﺴﺢ ﻫﺬه اﻟﻮرﻗﺔ ﺑﺎﻟﺘﺼﻮﻳﺮ داﺧﻞ ﺳﻤﻜﺔ اﻟﻘﺮش، ﺗﻈﻬﺮ رﺳﺎﻟﺔ ﻣﺤﺘﻮاﻫﺎ "أﻧﺘﻮﻧﻲ، أراﻫﻨﻚ ﺑﻤﻠﻴﻮن ﻣﻠﻴﺎر ﺟﻨﻴﻪ ﻋﻠﯽ أﻻ ﺗﺄﻛﻞ ﺳﻤﻜﺔ ﻗﺮش ﻫﺬه اﻟﺮﺳﺎﻟﺔ". ﺗﻬﺎﻧﻴﻨﺎ ﻳﺎ أﻧﺘﻮﻧﻲ.

tk.title: KÖPEK BALIĞININ MİDESİNDEKİ ŞİŞENİN İÇİNDEKİ MESAJ
tk.description:
Bu köpek balığının midesinde, içinde rulo şeklinde bir kağıt parçası olan şeffaf bir şişe var. Köpek balığı içi görüntüleme cihazıyla belgeyi taradığımızda mesajın içeriğine ulaştık: "Anthony, bir milyar sterline bahse varım, bu şişeyi hiçbir köpek balığı yemeyecek." 
Tebrikler Anthony.

fr-CA.title: MESSAGE DANS UNE BOUTEILLE DANS UN REQUIN
fr-CA.description:
Ce requin contient une bouteille transparente qui, elle, contient une feuille de papier enroulée. La numérisation du document via des photographies intra-requin révèle le message suivant : « Anthony, je te parie un million de milliards de livres qu'aucun requin ne mangera ça. » 
Félicitations, Anthony.

en-AU.title: MESSAGE IN A BOTTLE IN A SHARK
en-AU.description:
This shark contains a clear bottle which, in turn, contains a rolled-up sheet of paper. Scanning the document with in-shark photography reveals the message, "Anthony, I bet you a million billion pounds that no shark will ever eat this." 
Congratulations, Anthony.

landmarks.title: MESSAGE IN A BOTTLE IN A SHARK
landmarks.description:
This shark contains a clear bottle which, in turn, contains a rolled-up sheet of paper. Scanning the document with in-shark photography reveals the message, "Anthony, I bet you a million billion pounds that no shark will ever eat this." 
Congratulations, Anthony.

landmarks.name: LM_Microscope

en.title: MICROSCOPE
en.description: Humans used the microscope as a way of spying on bacteria and other tiny people. Unbeknownst to humans, bacteria were well aware of the massive eyes staring down at them and would play tricks on scientists, altering their behavior for the duration of the surveillance.

en-GB.title: MICROSCOPE
en-GB.description: Humans used the microscope as a way of spying on bacteria and other tiny people. Unbeknownst to humans, bacteria were well aware of the massive eyes staring down at them and would play tricks on scientists, altering their behaviour for the duration of the surveillance.

fr.title: MICROSCOPE
fr.description: Les humains utilisaient le microscope pour espionner les bactéries et autres personnes de petite taille. Mais les bactéries étaient parfaitement conscientes des énormes yeux qui les fixaient et jouaient des tours aux scientifiques en modifiant leur comportement pendant la durée de la surveillance.

de.title: MIKROSKOP
de.description: Menschen benutzten Mikroskope, um Bakterien und andere kleine Leute auszuspionieren. Was den Menschen allerdings nicht bewusst war, ist die Tatsache dass Bakterien sehr wohl wussten, dass sie von gigantischen Augen beobachtet wurden. Sie spielten den Wissenschaftlern gern Streiche und änderten für die Dauer der Beobachtung ihr Verhalten.

es.title: MICROSCOPIO
es.description: Los humanos usaban el microscopio para espiar a las bacterias y a otros seres diminutos. Sin que los humanos lo supieran, las bacterias estaban al tanto de los enormes ojos que las observaban y gastaban bromas a los científicos alterando su comportamiento mientras las vigilaban.

it.title: MICROSCOPIO
it.description: Gli umani usavano il microscopio in modo da spiare i batteri e altri piccoli esseri. All'insaputa degli umani, i batteri erano consapevoli degli occhi che li osservavano e facevano scherzetti agli scienziati, alterando il loro comportamento per la durata dell'osservazione.

ja.title: 顕微鏡
ja.description: 人間たちは顕微鏡を使い、バクテリアやその他の小さな人間をスパイする方法として使用していました。人間たちは知らなかったようですが、バクテリアは巨大な目玉に見つめられていることに気付いており、監視されている間に行動パターンを変更して科学者を騙していたのです。

ko.title: 현미경
ko.description: 인간들은 현미경으로 박테리아나 다른 작은 인간들을 감시했습니다. 인간들은 모르겠지만, 박테리아들 역시 거대한 눈이 자신들을 내려다보고 있다는 걸 알아서 과학자들을 속이기 위해 관찰 기간 동안 자신의 행동 패턴을 바꾸곤 했습니다.

zh-Hans.title: 显微镜
zh-Hans.description: 人类将显微镜作为侦查细菌和其他微型人的方式。人类所不知道的是，细菌很清楚地意识到这些巨大的眼睛正盯着它们，它们会捉弄科学家，在监视期间改变它们的行为。

zh-Hant.title: 顯微鏡
zh-Hant.description: 人類用顯微鏡來觀測細菌和其他小型人類。人類不知道的是，細菌很清楚有巨大的眼睛在盯著它們，因此會捉弄科學家，在監視期間故意改變它們的行為。

ru.title: МИКРОСКОП
ru.description: Люди использовали микроскоп, чтобы шпионить за бактериями и другими крошечными существами. Люди не знали, что бактерии прекрасно осведомлены о том, что на них смотрят огромные глаза, и подшучивали над учеными, меняя свое поведение во время наблюдения.

pt-BR.title: MICROSCÓPIO
pt-BR.description: Os humanos usavam o microscópio como forma de espiar as bactérias e pessoas minúsculas. O que eles não sabiam é que as bactérias estavam cientes dos enormes olhos que as observavam e, sendo assim, enganavam os cientistas, fingindo comportamentos diferentes quando estava sendo vistas.

nl.title: MICROSCOOP
nl.description: Mensen gebruikten de microscoop als een manier om bacteriën en andere kleine mensen te bespioneren. Wat de mensen niet wisten, was dat bacteriën zich terdege bewust waren van de enorme ogen die naar hen keken en misleidden wetenschappers door hun gedrag aan te passen gedurende de observatie.

ar.title: اﻟﻤﺠﻬﺮ
