ar.description: ﻛﺎن اﻟﺒﺸﺮ ﻳﺴﺘﺨﺪﻣﻮن اﻟﻤﺠﻬﺮ ﻛﻮﺳﻴﻠﺔ ﻟﻠﺘﺠﺴﺲ ﻋﻠﯽ اﻟﺒﻜﺘﻴﺮﻳﺎ وﻏﻴﺮﻫﺎ ﻣﻦ اﻷﺷﺨﺎص ﺻﻐﺎر اﻟﺤﺠﻢ. ﻣﺎ ﻟﻢ ﻳﻌﺮﻓﻪ اﻟﺒﺸﺮ ﻫﻮ أن اﻟﺒﻜﺘﻴﺮﻳﺎ ﻛﺎﻧﺖ ﻋﻠﯽ ﻋﻠﻢ ﺑﺎﻟﻌﻴﻮن اﻟﻀﺨﻤﺔ اﻟﺘﻲ ﺗﺤﺪق ﻓﻴﻬﺎ وﻛﺎﻧﺖ ﺗﺨﺪع اﻟﻌﻠﻤﺎء وﺗﻐﻴﺮ ﺳﻠﻮﻛﻬﺎ ﺧﻼل ﻓﺘﺮة اﻟﻤﺮاﻗﺒﺔ.

tk.title: MİKROSKOP
tk.description: İnsanlar, bakterileri ve diğer minik insanları gizlice gözetlemek için mikroskop kullanırdı. İnsanların haberi yoktu ama bakteriler kendilerine dikilen dev gözlerin farkındalardı ve gözlem sırasında davranışlarını değiştirerek bilim insanlarına oyunlar oynarlardı.

fr-CA.title: MICROSCOPE
fr-CA.description: Les humains utilisaient le microscope pour espionner les bactéries et autres personnes de très petite taille. Mais les bactéries étaient parfaitement conscientes des énormes yeux qui les fixaient et jouaient des tours aux scientifiques en modifiant leur comportement pendant la durée de la surveillance.

en-AU.title: MICROSCOPE
en-AU.description: Humans used the microscope as a way of spying on bacteria and other tiny people. Unbeknownst to humans, bacteria were well aware of the massive eyes staring down at them and would play tricks on scientists, altering their behaviour for the duration of the surveillance.

landmarks.title: MICROSCOPE
landmarks.description: Humans used the microscope as a way of spying on bacteria and other tiny people. Unbeknownst to humans, bacteria were well aware of the massive eyes staring down at them and would play tricks on scientists, altering their behavior for the duration of the surveillance.

landmarks.name: LM_NailPolish

en.title: CLAW PAINT
en.description: Humans used this sticky paint to decorate their adorably stubby little claws. Applying at least four layers reinforced the claws, making them stronger, and helped humans to scrabble their way into ring-pull food tins. After seventeen layers, the paint provided enough extra fortification to allow the human to scale mildly inclined surfaces.

en-GB.title: CLAW PAINT
en-GB.description: Humans used this sticky paint to decorate their adorably stubby little claws. Applying at least four layers reinforced the claws, making them stronger, and helped humans to scrabble their way into ring-pull food tins. After seventeen layers, the paint provided enough extra fortification to allow the human to scale mildly inclined surfaces.

fr.title: PEINTURE DE GRIFFES
fr.description: Les humains utilisaient cette peinture collante pour décorer leurs adorables petites griffes. L'application d'au moins quatre couches permettait de renforcer les griffes, ce qui permettait aux humains de découper les boîtes de conserve eux-mêmes. Avec dix-sept couches, la peinture fournissait suffisamment de force supplémentaire pour permettre à un humain d'escalader des surfaces légèrement inclinées.

de.title: KRALLENFARBE
de.description: Menschen haben diese klebrige Farbe verwendet, um ihre niedlich kurzen und abgerundeten Krallen zu dekorieren. Das Auftragen von mindesten vier Schichten hat die Krallen verstärkt, wodurch die Menschen mit ihren Krallen viel leichter unter den Zieh-Ring einer Futterdose quetschen konnten. Nach siebzehn Schichten bot die Farbe genug zusätzliche Verstärkung, um dem Menschen zu ermöglichen, leicht geneigte Oberflächen zu erklimmen.

es.title: PINTURA DE GARRAS
es.description: Los humanos usaban esta pintura pegajosa para decorar sus pequeñas y adorables garras. La aplicación de al menos cuatro capas reforzaba las garras, haciendo que fueran más fuertes, ayudando así a los humanos a poder rascar con sus pezuñas las latas de comida con anillas. Tras 17 capas, la pintura proporcionaba refuerzo suficiente para que los humanos pudieran escalar superficies ligeramente inclinadas.

it.title: VERNICE PER ARTIGLI
it.description: Gli umani usavano queste vernici appiccicose per decorare i loro adorabili artigli tozzi. L'applicazione di almeno quattro strati rinforzava i loro artigli, rendendoli più forti, e aiutava gli umani a tirare la linguetta delle lattine. Dopo diciassette applicazioni, la vernice forniva un rafforzamento tale da permettere all'umano di scalare superfici moderatamente inclinate.

ja.title: 鉤爪ペンキ
ja.description: 人間たちはこのベタベタなペンキを使い、可愛らしくずんぐりした小さな爪を飾っていました。最低でも4回重ね塗りをすることで鉤爪を強化することができ、人間が輪っかで引っ張る食べ物の缶を引っ掻くのに役立たせていました。17回重ね塗りをするとさらに強化されるため、人間がやや傾斜のある地表をよじ登るのに使うことができました。

ko.title: 발톱 페인트
ko.description: 인간들은 끈적한 페인트로 자신들의 작고 귀여운 발톱을 칠했습니다. 최소 4겹 이상을 발라 발톱을 더욱 강하고 튼튼하게 만들었으며, 이는 고리가 달린 깡통을 깔 때 특히 유리했습니다. 17겹을 바르면 발톱이 매우 단단해져서 약간 경사가 진 길도 올라갈 수 있었다고 합니다.

zh-Hans.title: 指爪颜料
zh-Hans.description: 人类用这种黏糊糊的颜料装饰自己又短又光秃秃的小爪子。施加至少四层来为爪子实施补强，让指爪更加强大，帮助他们抓挠那些用环拉的食物罐子。在施加十七层之后，这种颜料能够提供足够的额外强化，让人类可以攀爬中度倾斜的表面。

zh-Hant.title: 美爪油
zh-Hant.description: 人類用這種黏黏的顏料美化他們那些可愛又粗短的爪子。至少塗四層才能強化這些爪子，讓爪子更強壯，幫助人類翻找他們的易開罐食品。塗上十七層後，美爪油即可提供額外的防禦力，讓人類攀爬有點傾斜的表面。

ru.title: КРАСКА ДЛЯ КОГТЕЙ
ru.description: Люди использовали эту липкую краску, чтобы раскрасить свои очаровательные коротенькие маленькие коготки. На коготки нужно было наложить как минимум четыре слоя краски, чтобы укрепить их и позволить людям вскрывать консервы с кольцом на крышке. После семнадцати слоев когти так укреплялись, что с их помощью люди могли карабкаться на поверхности со средним уклоном.

pt-BR.title: PINTURA DE GARRAS
pt-BR.description: Os humanos usavam uma tinta peguenta para decorar suas adoráveis garrinhas. A aplicação de quatro camadas ou mais reforçava as garras e as fortalecia, o que ajudava os humanos a puxar os anéis das comidas enlatadas. Após dezessete camadas, a tinta chegava a fortalecer a ponto de permitir que os humanos escalassem superfícies de inclinação moderada.

nl.title: KLAUWVERF
nl.description: Mensen gebruikten deze plakkerige verf om hun schattige stompe klauwtjes te versieren. Het aanbrengen van ten minste vier lagen versterkte de klauwen, maakte ze sterker en hielp mensen om lastige blikjes met etenswaren open te trekken. Na zeventien lagen gaf de verf mensen voldoende extra versterking om licht hellende oppervlakken te beklimmen.

ar.title: ﻃﻼء اﻟﺤﻮاﻓﺮ
ar.description: اﺳﺘﺨﺪم اﻟﺒﺸﺮ ﻫﺬا اﻟﻄﻼء اﻟﻠﺰج ﻟﺘﺰﻳﻴﻦ أﻇﺎﻓﺮﻫﻢ اﻟﺼﻐﻴﺮة اﻟﺮاﺋﻌﺔ. ﻳﻌﺰز ﻃﻼء أرﺑﻊ ﻃﺒﻘﺎت ﻋﻠﯽ اﻷﻗﻞ ﻣﻦ ﻗﻮة اﻟﺤﻮاﻓﺮ، ﻣﺎ ﺟﻌﻠﻬﺎ أﻛﺜﺮ ﻗﻮة، وﺳﺎﻋﺪ اﻟﺒﺸﺮ ﻋﻠﯽ ﺧﺮﺑﺸﺔ ﻋﻠﺐ اﻟﻄﻌﺎم ذات اﻟﺴﺤﺐ اﻟﺪاﺋﺮي. وﺑﻌﺪ ﻃﻼء ﺳﺒﻌﺔ ﻋﺸﺮ ﻃﺒﻘﺔ، ﻳﻮﻓﺮ اﻟﻄﻼء دﻋﻤﺎ إﺿﺎﻓﻴﺎ ﻛﺎﻓﻴﺎ ﻟﻠﺴﻤﺎح ﻟﻺﻧﺴﺎن ﺑﻘﻴﺎس اﻷﺳﻄﺢ اﻟﻤﺎﺋﻠﺔ ﺑﺸﻜﻞ ﻣﻌﺘﺪل.

tk.title: PENÇE BOYASI
tk.description: İnsanlar bu yapışkan boyayı, sevimli küçük pençelerini süslemek için kullanıyorlardı. Boyayı en az dört katman uygulamak pençelerini sağlamlaştırıyor, onları daha kuvvetli hâle getiriyor ve insanların çek aç kapaklı yiyecek konservelerine ulaşmalarına yardımcı oluyordu. On yedi katmandan sonra boya, insanların hafif eğimli yüzeylere tırmanabilmesine olanak verecek fazladan takviyeyi sağlıyordu.

fr-CA.title: PEINTURE À GRIFFES
fr-CA.description: Les humains utilisaient cette peinture collante pour décorer leurs adorables petites griffes. L'application d'au moins quatre couches permettait de renforcer les griffes, ce qui permettait aux humains de découper les boîtes de conserve eux-mêmes. Avec dix-sept couches, la peinture fournissait suffisamment de force supplémentaire pour permettre à un humain d'escalader des surfaces légèrement inclinées.

en-AU.title: CLAW PAINT
en-AU.description: Humans used this sticky paint to decorate their adorably stubby little claws. Applying at least four layers reinforced the claws, making them stronger, and helped humans to scrabble their way into ring-pull food tins. After seventeen layers, the paint provided enough extra fortification to allow the human to scale mildly inclined surfaces.

landmarks.title: CLAW PAINT
landmarks.description: Humans used this sticky paint to decorate their adorably stubby little claws. Applying at least four layers reinforced the claws, making them stronger, and helped humans to scrabble their way into ring-pull food tins. After seventeen layers, the paint provided enough extra fortification to allow the human to scale mildly inclined surfaces.

landmarks.name: LM_Oar

en.title: BIG SPOON
en.description: Water in rivers moved easily from mountain to sea, but it was far harder to push in the other direction. Teams of muscular humans would thus take to the water in little boats and give the river a thorough stirring using sets of these specially-designed spoons.

en-GB.title: BIG SPOON
en-GB.description: Water in rivers moved easily from mountain to sea, but it was far harder to push in the other direction. Teams of muscular humans would thus take to the water in little boats and give the river a thorough stirring using sets of these specially-designed spoons.

fr.title: GROSSE CUILLÈRE
fr.description: L'eau des rivières se déplaçait facilement de la montagne à la mer, mais l'inverse était plus compliqué. Des équipes d'humains musclés se jetaient ainsi à l'eau dans de petites embarcations pour remuer le fleuve énergiquement à l'aide de ces cuillères dédiées.

de.title: GROSSER LÖFFEL
de.description: Das Wasser in Flüssen bewegte sich von ganz allein von den Bergen ins Meer, aber es war viel schwieriger, es in die entgegengesetzte Richtung zu bewegen. Teams von muskulösen Menschen begaben sich daher in kleinen Booten ins Wasser und rührten den Fluss mit diesen speziell entwickelten Löffeln gründlich um.

es.title: CUCHARA GRANDE
es.description: El agua de los ríos se desplazaba fácilmente desde la montaña al mar, pero era mucho más difícil desplazarla en dirección contraria. Así pues, equipos de humanos musculados se metían en el agua en pequeñas barcas y agitaban el río a conciencia usando sets de estas cucharas diseñadas específicamente para este uso.

it.title: CUCCHIAIO GRANDE
it.description: L'acqua dei fiumi si spostava facilmente dalla montagna al mare ma era parecchio difficile spingerla nella dimensione opposta. Squadre di umani muscolosi, perciò, si avventuravano in acqua con piccole barche e risalivano il fiume usando questi cucchiai appositamente progettati.

ja.title: 大きなスプーン
ja.description: 川の水は、山から海へと簡単に移動しましたが、それを逆方向に動かすのは非常に困難でした。このため、ムキムキの人間たちの集まりが小さな船に乗って水へ入り、この特別に設計されたスプーンで川を徹底的にかき混ぜるのでした。

ko.title: 커다란 숟가락
ko.description: 산에서 바다로 가는 강물은 쉽게 움직이지만, 방향을 바꾸는 것은 매우 어려웠습니다. 그래서 근육질의 남성들이 작은 배를 타고 물로 나아가 이 특별한 숟가락으로 강을 충분히 저어줘야 했습니다.

zh-Hans.title: 桨
zh-Hans.description: 河流中的水很容易从山流入海，但往相反的方向推进就难多了。因此，肌肉发达的人类组成的队伍会乘小船下水，用一套套这种特别设计的勺子彻底搅动河水。

zh-Hant.title: 大勺子
zh-Hant.description: 河裡的水能輕鬆地從山上流入海中，但要往反方向流動卻是十分困難。因此，好幾隊健壯的人類會搭乘小船到水邊，並使用這種特製的勺子在河流中賣力地攪拌。

ru.title: БОЛЬШАЯ ЛОЖКА
ru.description: Вода в реках легко стекает от гор к морю, но гораздо сложнее заставить ее поменять направление. Для этого команда мускулистых людей сплавляется по воде в маленьких лодках и тщательно взбалтывает реку специально разработанными ложками.

pt-BR.title: COLHERÃO
pt-BR.description: As águas dos rios fluíam facilmente das montanhas para o oceano. Já para a direção oposta, nem tanto. Equipes inteiras de humanos sarados embarcavam em barcos e mexiam no rio com estas colheres projetadas especificamente para isso.

nl.title: GROTE LEPEL
nl.description: Het water in de rivier stroomt van de berg naar de zee, maar als mensen de andere kant op moesten, was het veel moeilijker. Daarom gingen mensen in groepen het water op met kleine bootjes en gebruikten deze speciaal ontworpen lepels om het water in de rivier goed te roeren.

ar.title: ﻣﺠﺮﻓﺔ ﻛﺒﻴﺮة
ar.description: ﺗﺤﺮﻛﺖ ﻣﻴﺎه اﻷﻧﻬﺎر ﺑﺴﻬﻮﻟﺔ ﻣﺘﺠﻬﺔ ﻣﻦ اﻟﺠﺒﺎل إﻟﯽ اﻟﺒﺤﺎر، ﻟﻜﻦ ﻛﺎن ﻣﻦ اﻟﺼﻌﺐ ﺟﺪا ﺗﺤﺮﻛﻬﺎ ﻓﻲ اﻻﺗﺠﺎه اﻟﻤﻌﺎﻛﺲ. ﻟﺬا ﻛﺎﻧﺖ ﻓﺮق ﻣﻦ اﻟﺒﺸﺮ ﻣﻔﺘﻮﻟﻲ اﻟﻌﻀﻼت ﺗﻨﺰل اﻟﻤﻴﺎه ﻓﻲ ﻗﻮارﺑﻬﺎ اﻟﺼﻐﻴﺮة وﺗﺤﺮك ﻣﻴﺎه اﻟﻨﻬﺮ ﻛﺜﻴﺮا ﻓﻲ ﻫﺬا اﻻﺗﺠﺎه اﻟﻤﻌﺎﻛﺲ ﻣﺴﺘﺨﺪﻣﻴﻦ ﺑﻌﻀﺎ ﻣﻦ ﻫﺬه اﻟﻤﺠﺎرف اﻟﻤﺼﻤﻤﺔ ﺧﺼﻮﺻﺎ ﻟﻬﺬا اﻟﻐﺮض.

tk.title: KOCAMAN KAŞIK
tk.description: Nehir suyu dağdan denize kolayca akarken diğer yönde ilerlemesi epey zordur. Kaslı insanlar gruplar hâlinde suyu küçük teknelere doldurur, özel olarak tasarlanmış bu kaşıklarla nehri güzelce karıştırırdı.

fr-CA.title: GROSSE CUILLÈRE
fr-CA.description: L'eau des rivières se déplaçait facilement de la montagne à la mer, mais l'inverse était plus compliqué. Des équipes d'humains musclés se jetaient ainsi à l'eau dans de petites embarcations pour remuer le fleuve énergiquement à l'aide de ces cuillères spécialement conçues.

en-AU.title: BIG SPOON
en-AU.description: Water in rivers moved easily from mountain to sea, but it was far harder to push in the other direction. Teams of muscular humans would thus take to the water in little boats and give the river a thorough stirring using sets of these specially-designed spoons.

landmarks.title: BIG SPOON
landmarks.description: Water in rivers moved easily from mountain to sea, but it was far harder to push in the other direction. Teams of muscular humans would thus take to the water in little boats and give the river a thorough stirring using sets of these specially-designed spoons.

landmarks.name: LM_Orrery

en.title: ORRERY
en.description: This human model of the solar system has divided monster opinion since its discovery. Either it was a simplified model aimed at young humans, or they just... never discovered half the objects?? Where's Neptune II? Or the Moon of Soft Cheeses? Or Voorple????

en-GB.title: ORRERY
en-GB.description: This human model of the solar system has divided monster opinion since its discovery. Either it was a simplified model aimed at young humans, or they just... never discovered half the objects?? Where's Neptune II? Or the Moon of Soft Cheeses? Or Voorple????

fr.title: PLANÉTAIRE
fr.description: Ce modèle humain du système solaire a divisé l'opinion des monstres depuis sa découverte. Il s'agissait soit d'un modèle simplifié destiné aux jeunes humains, ou peut-être... n'ont-ils jamais découvert la moitié des éléments ?? Où est Neptune II ? Et la lune de fromages à pâte molle ? Et Voorple ????

de.title: MODELL DES SONNENSYSTEMS
de.description: Dieses menschliche Modell des Sonnensystems spaltet die Meinungen von Monstern seit seiner Entdeckung. Entweder war es ein vereinfachtes Modell für jungen Menschen oder sie … haben die Hälfte der Objekte einfach nie entdeckt?? Wo ist Neptun II? Oder der Weichkäsemond? Oder Voorple????

es.title: PLANETARIO
es.description: Esta maqueta humana del sistema solar ha dividido a la opinión monstruosa desde su descubrimiento. Puede que fuera un modelo simplificado dirigido a humanos jóvenes, o sencillamente... nunca descubrieron la mitad de los objetos. ¿Dónde está Neptuno II? ¿Y la Luna de Quesos Suaves? ¿Y Voorple?

it.title: PLANETARIO
it.description: Questo modello umano del sistema solare ha diviso le opinioni dei mostri sin dalla sua scoperta. O era un modello semplificato per giovani umani oppure... non avevano mai scoperto metà degli oggetti?? Dov'è Nettuno II? O la Luna dei formaggi molli? O Voorple????

ja.title: 太陽系儀
ja.description: この人間の太陽系モデルは、発見当時からモンスターたちの意見が真っ二つに分かれていました。これは子供向けの簡素化されたモデルだったのでしょうか、それとも…この物体のもう半分が欠けているのでしょうか？？海王星IIはどこでしょう？柔らかチーズの月は？あるいは、ヴープルはどこなのでしょう？？？？

ko.title: 태양계
ko.description: 이 인간들이 만든 태양계 모델로 인해 몬스터들의 의견은 여러 갈래로 갈라졌습니다. 어린 인간들을 위해 제작한 단순화 모델인지, 아니면 나머지 절반은 발견하지 못한 것인지? 목성 II는 어디에 있는 것인지? 부드러운 치즈 달은 어디에 있는 것인지? 그리고 부어플은 어디에 있는지????

zh-Hans.title: 太阳系仪
zh-Hans.description: 这个太阳系人类模型自从被发现以来就引起了巨大的争议。它是面向年轻人类的简化模型吗，还是... 还有一半的天体，他们从来都没有发现吗？？海王星二世在哪儿？软芝士月亮呢？浮波星呢？？？？

zh-Hant.title: 太陽系儀
zh-Hant.description: 怪獸們發現這個人造太陽系模型後，使牠們產生了不同的見解。這究竟是為了年幼人類而簡化的模型，還是人類從未...發現另一半的星系？海王星二號在哪裡？鬆軟乳酪月球呢？浮波星呢？

ru.title: МОДЕЛЬ ПЛАНЕТНОЙ СИСТЕМЫ
ru.description: Мнения монстров в отношении этой модели солнечной системы расходились с момента ее открытия. Либо это была упрощенная модель специально для юных людей, либо они просто... не открыли половину объектов? Где Нептун-2? Где Луна из мягкого сыра? Или Вурпл???

pt-BR.title: MODELO ESPACIAL
pt-BR.description: Esta maquete humana do sistema solar gerou debates entre os monstros desde sua descoberta: pode-se tratar de um modelo simplificado para humanos infantes ou... eles não descobriram a outra metade dos corpos celestes. Cadê Netuno II? E a Lua de Requeijão? E Voorple???

nl.title: MODEL VAN HET ZONNESTELSEL
nl.description: Al sinds dit menselijke model van het zonnestelsel werd ontdekt, zaait het verdeling bij monsters. Misschien gebruikten alleen jonge mensen dit eenvoudige model of misschien... hebben ze de helft van de hemellichamen nooit ontdekt? Waar is Neptunus II? En de Zachtekaasmaan? En Voorple?

ar.title: اﻟﻤﺒﻴﺎن اﻟﺸﻤﺴﻲ
ar.description: ﻣﻨﺬ اﻛﺘﺸﺎف ﻫﺬا اﻟﻨﻤﻮذج اﻟﺒﺸﺮي اﻟﺬي ﻳﻤﺜﻞ اﻟﻨﻈﺎم اﻟﺸﻤﺴﻲ واﺧﺘﻠﻔﺖ اﻟﻮﺣﻮش ﻓﻲ اﻟﺮأي. ﻓﻬﻨﺎك ﻣﻦ ﻳﻘﻮل إن ﻫﺬا ﻧﻤﻮذج ﻣﺒﺴﻂ ﺑﻬﺪف ﺗﻌﻠﻴﻢ ﺻﻐﺎر اﻟﺒﺸﺮ، واﻟﺮأي اﻵﺧﺮ ﻳﻘﻮل إﻧﻬﻢ ﻟﻢ ﻳﻜﺘﺸﻔﻮا ﻧﺼﻒ اﻷﺟﺮام!! ﻓﻬﻮ ﻻ ﻳﻈﻬﺮ ﻣﺜﻼ ﻧﺒﺘﻮن II وﻻ ﻗﻤﺮ اﻟﺠﺒﻦ اﻟﻨﺎﻋﻢ وﻻ ﺣﺘﯽ ﻓﻮرﺑﻞ؟؟؟؟

tk.title: GÜNEŞ SİSTEMİ MODELİ
tk.description: İnsanların bu güneş sistemi modeli, keşfinden beri canavarlar arasında fikir ayrılığına yol açtı. Genç insanlar için basitleştirilen bir model miydi yoksa acaba... Nesnelerin yarısını hiç keşfetmemişler miydi? Neptün II nerede? Ya da Yumuşak Peynir Ayı? Peki ya Voorple?

fr-CA.title: SYSTÈME SOLAIRE
fr-CA.description: Ce modèle humain du système solaire a divisé l'opinion des monstres depuis sa découverte. Il s'agissait soit d'un modèle simplifié destiné aux jeunes humains, ou peut-être... n'ont-ils jamais découvert la moitié des objets?? Où est Neptune II? Et la lune des fromages à pâte molle? Et Voorple????

en-AU.title: ORRERY
en-AU.description: This human model of the solar system has divided monster opinion since its discovery. Either it was a simplified model aimed at young humans, or they just... never discovered half the objects?? Where's Neptune II? Or the Moon of Soft Cheeses? Or Voorple????

landmarks.title: ORRERY
landmarks.description: This human model of the solar system has divided monster opinion since its discovery. Either it was a simplified model aimed at young humans, or they just... never discovered half the objects?? Where's Neptune II? Or the Moon of Soft Cheeses? Or Voorple????

landmarks.name: LM_OverdueLibraryBook

en.title: OVERDUE LIBRARY BOOK
en.description: At first, experts tried to reunite this book with its human library. Then we calculated the late fee and, quite honestly, we do not have that much human money in the museum. We have decided to keep the book and risk the wrath of a creature called a "librarian".

en-GB.title: OVERDUE LIBRARY BOOK
en-GB.description: At first, experts tried to reunite this book with its human library. Then we calculated the late fee and, quite honestly, we do not have that much human money in the museum. We have decided to keep the book and risk the wrath of a creature called a "librarian".

fr.title: LIVRE À RENDRE
fr.description: Au début, les experts ont voulu ramener ce livre à sa bibliothèque humaine. Puis nous avons calculé les frais de retard et, pour être honnête, nous ne possédons pas beaucoup d'argent humain dans le musée. Nous avons donc décidé de garder le livre, quitte à risquer la colère d'une créature appelée « bibliothécaire ».

de.title: ÜBERFÄLLIGES BÜCHEREIBUCH
de.description: Zunächst haben Experten versucht, dieses Buch mit seiner menschlichen Bibliothek zusammenzubringen. Dann haben wir die Verzugsgebühren berechnet und festgestellt, dass wir ehrlich gesagt nicht genügend menschliches Geld im Museum haben. Wir haben beschlossen, das Buch zu behalten und den Zorn eines Wesens namens „Bibliothekar“ zu riskieren.

es.title: LIBRO DE BIBLIOTECA ATRASADO
es.description: Al principio, los expertos intentaron devolver este libro a su biblioteca humana. No obstante, calculamos el recargo por retraso y, sinceramente, no tenemos tanto dinero humano en el museo. Hemos decidido conservar el libro y arriesgarnos a la ira de una criatura llamada "bibliotecaria".

it.title: LIBRO DELLA BIBLIOTECA IN RITARDO
it.description: All'inizio, gli esperti hanno provato a riportare questo libro nella sua biblioteca umana. Poi abbiamo calcolato la multa per il ritardo e, onestamente, non abbiamo così tanto denaro umano a disposizione nel museo. Abbiamo deciso di tenere il libro e di rischiare l'ira della creatura chiamata "bibliotecario".

ja.title: 返却期限切れの本
ja.description: 最初、専門家たちはこの本を、その本が元々あった人間の図書館へ返してあげようと考えたのですが、まずは遅延料金を計算してみたのです。正直に言って、この博物館にはそこまでの額の人間の貨幣がなかったのです。そのため、この本はこのまま博物館で預かることにして、「図書館司書」と呼ばれる生き物の報復に怯えながら過ごすことに決定しました。

ko.title: 반납일이 지난 도서관 책
ko.description: 처음에 전문가들은 이 책을 인간 도서관에 반납해보려 했습니다. 그러나 연체 수수료를 계산해보니... 솔직히 우리 박물관에 그런 많은 인간 돈은 없습니다. 그래서 '사서'라는 생물의 분노를 무릅쓰고 이 책을 이곳에 보관하기로 했습니다.

zh-Hans.title: 逾期未还的图书
zh-Hans.description: 起初，专家们试图让这本书重回人类图书馆。然后我们计算了滞纳金，说实话，我们博物馆没有那么多钱。我们决定冒着激怒一种称之为“图书管理员”的生物的风险，留着这本书。

zh-Hant.title: 逾期的圖書
zh-Hant.description: 起初，專家們試圖將這本書歸還給人類圖書館。後來，我們計算了逾期費用，坦白說，我們的博物館沒有那麼多的人類貨幣。因此，我們決定冒著激怒一種叫「圖書管理員」的生物的風險，把書留下來。

ru.title: ЗАДЕРЖАННАЯ БИБЛИОТЕЧНАЯ КНИГА
ru.description: Поначалу эксперты пытались воссоединить книгу с человеческой библиотекой. Но потом мы посчитали штраф за просрочку, и, честно говоря, у нас в музее нет такого количества человеческих денег. Мы решили оставить книгу, рискнув навлечь на себя гнев существа под названием «библиотекарь».

pt-BR.title: LIVRO DA BIBLIOTECA ATRASADO
pt-BR.description: Especialistas tentaram devolver este livro para uma biblioteca humana, mas, depois de calcular as multas, averiguou-se que não há dinheiro humano suficiente neste museu para pagá-las. Foi assim que decidimos ficar com o livro e correr o risco de despertar a ira de uma criatura chamada “bibliotecária”.

nl.title: ACHTERSTALLIG BIBLIOTHEEKBOEK
nl.description: Eerst probeerden we het boek te verenigen met zijn bibliotheek, maar we hebben niet genoeg mensengeld in het museum om de boete te betalen. Daarom hebben we besloten om het boek zelf te houden en de woede van de zogenaamde bibliothecaris te riskeren.

ar.title: ﻛﺘﺎب اﻟﻤﻜﺘﺒﺔ ذو اﻟﻤﺴﺘﺤﻘﺎت اﻟﻤﺘﺄﺧﺮة
ar.description: ﻓﻲ اﻟﺒﺪاﻳﺔ ﺣﺎول اﻟﺨﺒﺮاء إﻋﺎدة ﻫﺬ اﻟﻜﺘﺎب إﻟﯽ اﻟﻤﻜﺘﺒﺔ اﻟﺒﺸﺮﻳﺔ اﻟﺘﻲ ﺗﻤﺘﻠﻜﻪ. ﺛﻢ ﺣﺴﺒﻨﺎ اﻟﺮﺳﻮم اﻟﻤﺘﺄﺧﺮة، وﺑﺼﺮاﺣﺔ ﻻ ﻧﻤﻠﻚ ﻫﺬا اﻟﻘﺪر ﻣﻦ اﻟﻤﺎل اﻟﺒﺸﺮي ﻓﻲ اﻟﻤﺘﺤﻒ. ﻟﺬا ﻗﺮرﻧﺎ اﻻﺣﺘﻔﺎظ ﺑﺎﻟﻜﺘﺎب واﻟﻤﺨﺎﻃﺮة ﺑﺈﻏﻀﺎب ﻛﺎﺋﻦ ﻳﺪﻋﯽ "أﻣﻴﻦ اﻟﻤﻜﺘﺒﺔ" .

tk.title: SÜRESİ DOLMUŞ KÜTÜPHANE KİTABI
tk.description: Başlangıçta uzmanlar bu kitap insan kütüphanesiyle tekrar bir araya getirmeyi denedi. Sonra gecikme ücretini hesapladık ve açıkça söylemek gerekirse müzede o kadar fazla insan paramız yok. Kitabı vermemeye ve "kütüphaneci" denen bir canlının gazabının riskini almaya karar verdik.

fr-CA.title: LIVRE EN RETARD
fr-CA.description: Au départ, les experts ont voulu ramener ce livre à sa bibliothèque humaine. Puis nous avons calculé les frais de retard et, pour être honnêtes, nous ne possédons pas autant d'argent humain dans le musée. Nous avons donc décidé de garder le livre, quitte à risquer la colère d'une créature appelée « bibliothécaire ».

en-AU.title: OVERDUE LIBRARY BOOK
en-AU.description: At first, experts tried to reunite this book with its human library. Then we calculated the late fee and, quite honestly, we do not have that much human money in the museum. We have decided to keep the book and risk the wrath of a creature called a "librarian".

landmarks.title: OVERDUE LIBRARY BOOK
landmarks.description: At first, experts tried to reunite this book with its human library. Then we calculated the late fee and, quite honestly, we do not have that much human money in the museum. We have decided to keep the book and risk the wrath of a creature called a "librarian".

landmarks.name: LM_Peacock

en.title: ADVERTISING BILL-BIRD
en.description: Human marketing departments occasionally experimented with advertising to animals. These peacocks had promotional images bred into their tail feathers and thus could advertise products to other peafowl each time they fanned out their plumage.

en-GB.title: ADVERTISING BILL-BIRD
en-GB.description: Human marketing departments occasionally experimented with advertising to animals. These peacocks had promotional images bred into their tail feathers and thus could advertise products to other peafowl each time they fanned out their plumage.

fr.title: OISEAU PUBLICITAIRE
fr.description: Les services de marketing humains s'adonnaient parfois à de la publicité sur les animaux. Ces paons arboraient des images promotionnelles dans les plumes de leur queue et pouvaient ainsi promouvoir des produits auprès d'autres paons chaque fois qu'ils déployaient leur plumage.

de.title: WERBEPFAU
de.description: Menschliche Marketingabteilungen experimentierten manchmal mit Werbung für Tiere. Diese Pfaue waren so gezüchtet, dass sie Werbematerial auf ihren Schwanzfedern trugen und konnten so jedes Mal Produkte an andere Pfaue bewerben, wenn sie ihre Schwanzfedern auffächerten.

es.title: PLUMÓN DE ANUNCIOS
es.description: Los departamentos de marketing humanos experimentaban de vez en cuando con la publicidad para animales. Estos pavos reales tenían imágenes promocionales integradas en las plumas de la cola y, así, podían promocionar productos a otros pavos cada vez que desplegaban su plumaje.

it.title: UCCELLO PUBBLICITARIO
it.description: I dipartimenti di marketing umani a volte sperimentavano le pubblicità sugli animali. Questi pavoni mostravano immagini promozionali sulle piume delle loro code e ciò permetteva di pubblicizzare prodotti ad altri pavoni ogni volta che mostravano il loro piumaggio.

ja.title: 広告ビル-バード
ja.description: 人間マーケティング部署は時折、動物向けの広告を実験的に実施していました。このクジャクたちの尻尾の羽には広告イメージが埋め込まれていたため、その羽が広がる度に他のクジャクへ商品の宣伝をすることができたのです。

ko.title: 광고새
ko.description: 인간들의 마케팅 부서에서는 다양한 동물 광고를 연구했습니다. 이 공작새들은 꼬리 깃털에 광고용 이미지를 심을 수 있었으며, 다른 공작새들과 마주칠 때마다 꼬리 깃털을 펼치며 상품 광고를 했습니다.

zh-Hans.title: 孔雀广告牌
zh-Hans.description: 人类营销部门偶尔也会尝试对动物做广告。这些孔雀的尾羽上植入了宣传图片，这样每当它们开屏时，就可以向其他孔雀宣传产品了。

zh-Hant.title: 廣告鳥
zh-Hant.description: 人類行銷部門有時候會做實驗，培育出能宣傳廣告的動物。這些孔雀的尾部羽毛長出宣傳性圖像，因此每次展開羽毛時，可以向其他孔雀推銷商品。

ru.title: РЕКЛАМНЫЙ ПТАХ
ru.description: Человеческие отделы маркетинга иногда экспериментировали с рекламой на животных. На хвостах этих павлинов расположены рекламные изображения, таким образом они могли рекламировать товары другим павлинам каждый раз, когда распускали свое оперенье.

pt-BR.title: PAVÃO DE PROPAGANDA
pt-BR.description: Os departamentos de marketing humanos chegaram ao ponto de usar animais de propaganda. Estes pavões eram geneticamente modificados para terem imagens promocionais em suas penas, anunciando os produtos toda vez que tentavam impressionar outras aves com sua plumagem aberta.

nl.title: RECLAMEBORDVOGEL
nl.description: Soms experimenteerden marketingafdelingen met advertenties voor dieren. Deze pauwen hadden reclame op hun staartveren en konden dus producten adverteren voor andere pauwen wanneer hij zijn staart openzet.

ar.title: ﻃﺎﺋﺮ اﻹﻋﻼﻧﺎت
ar.description: ﺟﺮﺑﺖ أﻗﺴﺎم اﻟﺘﺴﻮﻳﻖ اﻟﺒﺸﺮﻳﺔ اﺳﺘﺨﺪام اﻟﺤﻴﻮاﻧﺎت ﻛﻮﺳﻴﻠﺔ ﻟﻌﺮض إﻋﻼﻧﺎﺗﻬﻢ. ﻓﻜﺎﻧﺖ ﺗﻀﻊ ﺻﻮرا ﺗﺮوﻳﺠﻴﺔ ﻋﻠﯽ رﻳﺶ اﻟﻄﺎووس وﻣﻦ ﺛﻢ ﺑﺈﻣﻜﺎﻧﻪ اﻹﻋﻼن ﻋﻦ اﻟﻤﻨﺘﺠﺎت ﻟﻐﻴﺮه ﻣﻦ اﻟﻄﻮاوﻳﺲ ﻓﻲ ﻛﻞ ﻣﺮة ﻳﻔﺮد رﻳﺸﻪ.

tk.title: PANOS KUŞU
tk.description: İnsanların pazarlama departmanları zaman zaman hayvanlara yönelik pazarlama faaliyetleri yürütmeyi denedi. Kuyruklarında resim gösterecek şekilde üretilen bu tavus kuşları, kuyruğunu her açtığında diğer tavus kuşlarına ürün reklamları gösteriyordu.

fr-CA.title: OISEAU PUBLICITAIRE
fr-CA.description: Les départements de marketing humains ont tenté à quelques reprises de mettre de la publicité sur les animaux. Ces paons arboraient des images promotionnelles dans les plumes de leur queue et pouvaient ainsi promouvoir des produits auprès d'autres paons chaque fois qu'ils déployaient leur plumage.

en-AU.title: ADVERTISING BILL-BIRD
en-AU.description: Human marketing departments occasionally experimented with advertising to animals. These peacocks had promotional images bred into their tail feathers and thus could advertise products to other peafowl each time they fanned out their plumage.

landmarks.title: ADVERTISING BILL-BIRD
landmarks.description: Human marketing departments occasionally experimented with advertising to animals. These peacocks had promotional images bred into their tail feathers and thus could advertise products to other peafowl each time they fanned out their plumage.

landmarks.name: LM_PennyFarthing

en.title: HUMAN BICYCLE
en.description: An interesting evolution of the human mobile laundry rack saw the device became a mode of transportation in its own right. Without layers of wet clothing flapping in the generated breeze, humans found they could zoom hither and yon with ease!

en-GB.title: HUMAN BICYCLE
en-GB.description: An interesting evolution of the human mobile laundry rack saw the device became a mode of transportation in its own right. Without layers of wet clothing flapping in the generated breeze, humans found they could zoom hither and yon with ease!

fr.title: BICYCLETTE HUMAINE
fr.description: Une évolution intéressante du séchoir mobile humain, qui a su devenir un moyen de transport à part entière. Sans couches de vêtements mouillés flottant dans la brise générée, les humains ont découvert qu'ils pouvaient facilement gagner en vitesse!

de.title: MENSCHLICHES FAHRRAD
de.description: Durch eine interessante Entwicklung des mobilen Wäscheständers der Menschen wurde das Gerät zu einem eigenständigen Fortbewegungsmittel. Menschen fanden heraus, dass sie ohne die Schichten von feuchter Kleidung, die in der erzeugten Brise wehten, mit Leichtigkeit hin- und herrasen konnten!

es.title: BICICLETA HUMANA
es.description: Una interesante evolución del estante para ropa sucia móvil humano que hizo que el dispositivo se convirtiera en un modo de transporte por derecho propio. Sin capas de ropa mojada batiéndose con la brisa generada, ¡los humanos descubrieron que podían ir de aquí para allá con facilidad!

it.title: BICICLETTA UMANA
it.description: Un'evoluzione interessante dell'appendibiancheria mobile fece sì che lo strumento diventasse un mezzo di trasporto a sé stante. Senza strati di vestiti bagnati che svolazzavano nella brezza che si generava, gli umani scoprirono di potersi spostare qua e là con facilità!

ja.title: 人間の自転車
ja.description: 人間の携帯用の洗濯ラックが進化を果たし、面白いことにその装置自体で移動する形態へと変化を遂げました。走行することで発生する風によって濡れた洗濯物がバタバタすることなくなったため、人間たちは簡単に高速で自転車を乗り回すことができたのです！

ko.title: 인간 자전거
ko.description: 인간들의 이동식 빨래걸이는 계속 진화를 거듭하여 결국 탈 것이 되기에 이르렀습니다. 펄럭이며 바람을 일으킬 수 있는 빨래를 모두 제거하자, 인간들은 더욱 쉽게 다리를 움직일 수 있게 되었습니다.

zh-Hans.title: 人类自行车
zh-Hans.description: 人类移动晾衣架发生了有趣的进化，这个装置本身竟然成为了一种运输方式。没有一层层的湿衣服在形成的微风中飘动，人类发现他们可以轻松地骑向四面八方！

zh-Hant.title: 人類腳踏車
zh-Hant.description: 這個裝置歷經有趣的演變，從人類行動曬衣架，變成獨特的運輸方式。在沒有形成風力吹打的層層潮濕衣物之下，人類發現自己可以輕鬆地騎往各處。

ru.title: ЧЕЛОВЕЧЕСКИЙ ВЕЛОСИПЕД
ru.description: Занимательная эволюция человеческой передвижной вешалки для белья привела к тому, что устройство стало самостоятельным средством передвижения. Люди обнаружили, что без слоев влажной одежды, развевающейся на сгенерированном ветру, они легко могут кататься туда и обратно!

pt-BR.title: BICICLETA HUMANA
pt-BR.description: Uma evolução interessante do varal móvel é o dispositivo que veio a se tornar um meio de transporte. Sem as camadas de roupa molhada penduradas para secar ao vento gerado, os humanos descobriram que podiam andar a toda velocidade sem dificuldades!

nl.title: MENSENFIETS
nl.description: Het mobiele wasrek evolueerde naar een vervoersmiddel voor mensen. Zonder meerdere lagen natte kleding die zelfs bij het lichtste zuchtje wind heen en weer wapperden, konden mensen veel eenvoudiger van plaats A naar plaats B gaan!

ar.title: دراﺟﺔ ﺑﺸﺮﻳﺔ
ar.description: ﺗﻄﻮر رف اﻟﻐﺴﻴﻞ اﻟﻤﺘﻨﻘﻞ ﻟﺪى اﻟﺒﺸﺮ ﺗﻄﻮرا ﻣﺜﻴﺮا ﻟﻼﻫﺘﻤﺎم ﺣﻴﺚ أﺻﺒﺢ وﺳﻴﻠﺔ ﻧﻘﻞ ﻓﻲ ﺣﺪ ذاﺗﻪ. ﻓﻤﻦ دون وﺿﻊ ﻃﺒﻘﺎت ﻣﻦ اﻟﻤﻼﺑﺲ اﻟﻤﺒﻠﻠﺔ اﻟﺘﻲ ﺗﺮﻓﺮف ﻓﻲ اﻟﻬﻮاء اﻟﻨﺎﺗﺞ ﻋﻦ اﻟﺤﺮﻛﺔ، اﻛﺘﺸﻒ اﻟﺒﺸﺮ إﻣﻜﺎﻧﻴﺔ اﺳﺘﺨﺪام ﻫﺬا اﻟﺮف ﻟﻠﺘﻨﻘﻞ ﺑﺴﺮﻋﺔ وﺳﻬﻮﻟﺔ ﻫﻨﺎ وﻫﻨﺎك!

tk.title: İNSAN BİSİKLETİ
tk.description: İnsanların taşınabilir çamaşır askısı, geçirdiği ilginç evrimle kendi başına bir ulaşım aracı hâline geldi. Kat kat ıslak kumaşlar ortadan kalkınca insanlar bu aleti her yere gitmek için kullanabileceklerini fark ettiler!

fr-CA.title: BICYCLETTE HUMAINE
fr-CA.description: Une évolution intéressante du séchoir à linge mobile humain, qui a su devenir un moyen de transport à part entière. Sans couches de vêtements mouillés flottant dans la brise générée, les humains ont découvert qu'ils pouvaient facilement aller beaucoup plus vite!

en-AU.title: HUMAN BICYCLE
en-AU.description: An interesting evolution of the human mobile laundry rack saw the device became a mode of transportation in its own right. Without layers of wet clothing flapping in the generated breeze, humans found they could zoom hither and yon with ease!

landmarks.title: HUMAN BICYCLE
landmarks.description: An interesting evolution of the human mobile laundry rack saw the device became a mode of transportation in its own right. Without layers of wet clothing flapping in the generated breeze, humans found they could zoom hither and yon with ease!

landmarks.name: LM_PerfectChameleon

en.title: PERFECT CHAMELEON
en.description: Human experts famously pooh-poohed the idea of a perfectly-camouflaged chameleon. In fact, one species was easily capable of such transformations, but it was simply not detectable by humans. These creatures flourished inside human homes, secretly becoming the most common human pet of all time.

en-GB.title: PERFECT CHAMELEON
en-GB.description: Human experts famously pooh-poohed the idea of a perfectly-camouflaged chameleon. In fact, one species was easily capable of such transformations, but it was simply not detectable by humans. These creatures flourished inside human homes, secretly becoming the most common human pet of all time.

fr.title: CAMÉLÉON PARFAIT
fr.description: Les experts humains ont rapidement rejeté l'idée qu'un caméléon parfaitement camouflé puisse exister. En réalité, une espèce était bel et bien capable de telles transformations, mais elle n'était simplement pas détectable par les humains. Ces créatures se sont multipliées dans les habitations humaines, devenant secrètement l'animal de compagnie humain le plus répandu.

de.title: PERFEKTES CHAMÄLEON
de.description: Menschliche Experten verneinten bekanntermaßen die Vorstellung eines perfekt getarnten Chamäleons. Tatsächlich gab es eine Gattung, die zu solchen Transformationen in der Lage war, die aber von Menschen einfach nie gefunden wurde. Diese Wesen gediehen in menschlichen Wohnungen und wurden im Geheimen zum häufigsten menschlichen Haustier aller Zeiten.

es.title: CAMALEÓN PERFECTO
es.description: Como se sabe, los expertos humanos desdeñaron la idea de un camaleón perfectamente camuflado. De hecho, una especie era muy capaz de tales transformaciones, pero sencillamente no era detectable para los humanos. Estas criaturas prosperaron en el interior de los hogares humanos, convirtiéndose en secreto en la mascota humana más común de todos los tiempos.

it.title: CAMALEONTE PERFETTO
it.description: Gli esperti umani deridevano l'idea di un camaleonte perfettamente mimetico. Una specie era davvero capace di una simile trasformazione, ma gli umani non erano in grado di rilevarla. Queste creature prosperarono nelle case degli umani diventando, in segreto, l'animale domestico più comune di sempre.

ja.title: 完璧なカメレオン
ja.description: 人間の専門家たちは、完璧にカモフラージュできるカメレオンなどいないと一笑にふしたのですが、実際、カメレオンの中にはそのような変身を易々とやってのける種が存在していたのです。人間にはこのカメレオンを見つけることができなかったのですが、彼らは人間の住宅内で繁殖し、誰にも知られることなく最も一般的な人間のペットとなっていたのです。

ko.title: 완벽한 카멜레온
ko.description: 인간 전문가들은 완벽하게 위장한 카멜레온이라는 것은 없다고 주장했습니다. 하지만 사실은 이런 존재가 있었으며, 인간들은 그걸 발견하지 못한 것일 뿐이었습니다. 인간의 집 안에서 잘 자라난 이 생물들은 아무도 모르게 인간들이 가장 아끼는 반려동물이 되었습니다.

zh-Hans.title: 完美变色龙
zh-Hans.description: 人类专家对变色龙完美伪装的想法嗤之以鼻，这是人尽皆知的。事实上，有一个物种很容易就能实现这种转变，而人类根本无法察觉。这些生物在人类的家中繁衍生息，秘密地成为了人类有史以来最常见的宠物。

zh-Hant.title: 完美變色龍
zh-Hant.description: 人類專家對能夠完美偽裝的變色龍的觀點不屑一顧，這點人盡皆知。事實上，有一種生物能夠輕鬆地轉換顏色，只是人類無法察覺到。這種生物在人類家中大肆繁衍，秘密地成為人類最常見的寵物。

ru.title: БЕЗУПРЕЧНЫЙ ХАМЕЛЕОН
ru.description: Как известно, человеческие эксперты высмеивали идею безупречно маскирующегося хамелеона. Фактически же один вид был способен на такие перевоплощения, но люди просто его не обнаружили. Эти существа жили припеваючи в человеческих домах, тайно становясь самыми распространенными домашними питомцами в истории.

pt-BR.title: CAMALEÃO PERFEITO
pt-BR.description: Especialistas humanos sempre ignoraram a possibilidade da existência de um camaleão perfeitamente camuflado e, por isso, a espécie que tinha esta capacidade de transformação nunca foi detectada por eles. Estes animais prosperavam nos lares humanos e se tornaram os animais de estimação mais comuns de todos os tempos.

nl.title: PERFECTE KAMELEON
nl.description: Menselijke experts hebben het idee van een perfect gecamoufleerde kameleon bewonderd. In feite was één soort eenvoudig in staat tot dergelijke transformaties, maar deze was gewoonweg niet detecteerbaar door de mens. Deze wezens bloeiden in de huizen van de mensen en werden in het geheim het meest voorkomende huisdier van de mensen aller tijden.

ar.title: اﻟﺤﺮﺑﺎء اﻟﻤﺜﺎﻟﻴﺔ
ar.description: ﻟﻢ ﻳﺴﺘﺤﺴﻦ ﺧﺒﺮاء اﻟﺒﺸﺮ ﻓﻜﺮة وﺟﻮد ﺣﺮﺑﺎء ﻗﺎدرة ﻋﻠﯽ اﻟﺘﺨﻔﻲ ﺑﺼﻮرة ﻣﺜﺎﻟﻴﺔ، ﻟﻜﻦ ﻓﻲ اﻟﻮاﻗﻊ، ﻛﺎن ﻫﻨﺎك ﻧﻮع ﻗﺎدر ﻋﻠﯽ اﻟﺘﺤﻮل ﺑﻬﺬا اﻟﺸﻜﻞ ﺑﺴﻬﻮﻟﺔ، وﻟﻜﻨﻪ ﺑﺒﺴﺎﻃﺔ ﻏﻴﺮ ﻣﺮﺋﻲ ﻟﻠﺒﺸﺮ. وﻗﺪ ﻋﺎﺷﺖ ﻫﺬه اﻟﻜﺎﺋﻨﺎت ﻓﻲ ﻣﻨﺎزل اﻟﺒﺸﺮ، وأﺻﺒﺤﺖ ﺳﺮا أﻛﺜﺮ اﻟﺤﻴﻮاﻧﺎت اﻷﻟﻴﻔﺔ ﺷﻴﻮﻋﺎ ﻟﺪى اﻟﺒﺸﺮ ﻓﻲ ﺟﻤﻴﻊ اﻷوﻗﺎت.

tk.title: KUSURSUZ BUKALEMUN
tk.description: İnsan uzmanlar, kusursuz bir şekilde kamufle olan bukalemun fikrine burun kıvırdı. Aslında böyle dönüşümleri gerçekleştirebilen bir tür var ama doğal olarak insanlar tarafından tespit edilemedi. Bu canlılar, insanların evlerinde yaşadı, fark edilmeden tüm zamanların en yaygın evcil hayvanı hâline geldi.

fr-CA.title: CAMÉLÉON PARFAIT
fr-CA.description: Les experts humains ont rapidement rejeté l'idée qu'un caméléon parfaitement camouflé puisse exister. Pourtant, une espèce était bel et bien capable de telles transformations, mais elle n'était simplement pas détectable par les humains. Ces créatures se sont multipliées dans les habitations humaines, devenant secrètement l'animal de compagnie humain le plus répandu.

en-AU.title: PERFECT CHAMELEON
en-AU.description: Human experts famously pooh-poohed the idea of a perfectly-camouflaged chameleon. In fact, one species was easily capable of such transformations, but it was simply not detectable by humans. These creatures flourished inside human homes, secretly becoming the most common human pet of all time.

landmarks.title: PERFECT CHAMELEON
landmarks.description: Human experts famously pooh-poohed the idea of a perfectly-camouflaged chameleon. In fact, one species was easily capable of such transformations, but it was simply not detectable by humans. These creatures flourished inside human homes, secretly becoming the most common human pet of all time.

landmarks.name: LM_PetCloud

en.title: PET CLOUD
en.description: After years spent attempting to control the weather, humans successfully domesticated clouds. These fluffy pets are still around today. They require a damp cupboard in which to nest, regular steam feeds, and a saucepan in which they can rain. Check yearly for cases of rainbow worm.

en-GB.title: PET CLOUD
en-GB.description: After years spent attempting to control the weather, humans successfully domesticated clouds. These fluffy pets are still around today. They require a damp cupboard in which to nest, regular steam feeds, and a saucepan in which they can rain. Check yearly for cases of rainbow worm.

fr.title: NUAGE DE COMPAGNIE
fr.description: Après des années passées à essayer de contrôler la météo, les humains sont parvenus à domestiquer les nuages. Ces animaux duveteux sont toujours là aujourd'hui. Ils ont besoin d'une armoire humide dans laquelle se nicher, de doses de vapeur régulières et d'une casserole dans laquelle pleuvoir. Les cas de vers arc-en-ciel sont à vérifier annuellement.

de.title: HAUSTIERWOLKE
de.description: Nach vielen Jahren der Versuche, das Wetter zu kontrollieren, schafften Menschen es endlich, Wolken zu domestizieren. Diese flauschigen Haustiere gibt es bis heute. Sie benötigen einen feuchten Schrank zum Nisten, regelmäßige Fütterungen mit Dampf und einen Topf, in den sie regnen können. Man sollte sie jedes Jahr auf Regenbogenwürmer untersuchen.

es.title: NUBE MASCOTA
es.description: Tras años empleados en intentar controlar la climatología, los humanos consiguieron domesticar a las nubes. Estas mascotas esponjosas siguen existiendo hoy en día. Necesitan una alacena húmeda en la que anidar, pienso de vapor a diario y una sartén en la que puedan verter lluvia. Hay que hacer una revisión anual por si le salen gusanos arcoíris.

it.title: NUVOLA DOMESTICA
it.description: Dopo anni trascorsi a tentare di controllare il meteo, gli umani riuscirono ad addomesticare con successo le nuvole. Questi soffici animaletti domestici sono ancora qui al giorno d'oggi. Richiedono solo una credenza bagnata in cui vivere, vapore costante per alimentarsi e una casseruola in cui far piovere. Da controllare ogni anno in cerca di vermi arcobaleno.

ja.title: ペットの雲
ja.description: 長年に渡って天気を操作しようと試みた人間たちは、雲を家庭内へ持ち込むことに成功しました。このフワフワのペットは、今日もまだここにいます。このペットは巣として湿った戸棚を必要とし、通常の蒸気を餌として、片手鍋の中で雨を降らせます。虹色の虫がわいていないかは、年に一度確認をしてください。

ko.title: 반려 구름
ko.description: 날씨를 통제하기 위해 몇 년을 애쓰던 인간들은 결국 구름을 길들이는 데 성공했습니다. 이 폭신한 반려 구름은 오늘 날에도 남아있습니다. 둥지로 쓸 축축한 선반, 주기적인 증기 식사, 그리고 비를 내릴 후라이팬만 있으면 됩니다. 매년 무지개 벌레가 생기지 않았는지 확인하는 게 좋습니다.

zh-Hans.title: 宠物云
zh-Hans.description: 经过多年尝试控制天气的努力，人类成功地驯化了云。这些毛茸茸的宠物现在还在。它们需要用来筑巢的潮湿橱柜，定期的蒸汽喂养，以及一口可以接雨的平底锅。每年检查一下是否有彩虹虫。

zh-Hant.title: 寵物雲
zh-Hant.description: 經過多年嘗試控制天氣後，人類成功地馴服雲朵。這種蓬鬆的寵物至今還存在。它們需要潮濕的櫥櫃來築巢，固定的蒸汽飼料，以及可讓它們降下雨水的鍋子。人類每年會檢查它們是否有出現彩虹蟲。

ru.title: ДОМАШНЕЕ ЖИВОТНОЕ ОБЛАКО
ru.description: После многолетних попыток контролировать погоду люди благополучно одомашнили облака. Эти пухлые домашние животные всё еще рядом. Им требуется сырой чуланчик, где они могут угнездиться, регулярная подкормка паром и кастрюля, в которую они могут проливаться дождем. И ежегодная проверка на наличие радужного червя.

pt-BR.title: NUVEM DE ESTIMAÇÃO
pt-BR.description: Depois de anos tentando controlar o clima, os humanos finalmente conseguiram domesticar as nuvens. As mascotes felpudas existem até hoje e precisam de um lugar úmido para descansar, se alimentam de vapor e necessitam de um recipiente para no qual chover. Leve anualmente ao veterinário para conferir se não há nenhum arco-íris parasita.

nl.title: HUISDIERWOLK
nl.description: Nadat ze jaren hadden geprobeerd om het weer te beheersen, waren mensen erin geslaagd om wolken te domesticeren. Deze pluizige huisdiertjes bestaan nog steeds. Ze hebben een vochtige kast nodig waarin ze een nest kunnen maken, stoom als voedsel en een pan waarin ze kunnen regenen. Jaarlijks moeten ze worden gecontroleerd op regenboogwormen.

ar.title: اﻟﺴﺤﺐ اﻷﻟﻴﻔﺔ
ar.description: ﺑﻌﺪ ﺳﻨﻮات ﻣﻦ ﻣﺤﺎوﻟﺔ اﻟﺘﺤﻜﻢ ﻓﻲ اﻟﻄﻘﺲ، ﻧﺠﺢ اﻟﺒﺸﺮ ﻓﻲ ﺗﺮوﻳﺾ اﻟﺴﺤﺐ. ﻣﺎ ﺗﺰال ﻫﺬه اﻟﺤﻴﻮاﻧﺎت اﻷﻟﻴﻔﺔ اﻟﺰﻏﺒﻴﺔ ﻣﻮﺟﻮدة ﺣﺘﯽ ﻳﻮﻣﻨﺎ ﻫﺬا. وﺗﺤﺘﺎج إﻟﯽ دوﻻب رﻃﺐ ﻟﺘﻌﺸﺶ ﻓﻴﻪ وﺗﻐﺬﻳﺔ ﻣﻨﺘﻈﻤﺔ ﺑﺎﻟﺒﺨﺎر وﻣﻘﻼة ﻟﺘﻤﻄﺮ ﻓﻴﻬﺎ. واﻟﺘﺤﻘﻖ ﺳﻨﻮﻳﺎ ﻣﻦ ﺣﺎﻻت اﻹﺻﺎﺑﺔ ﺑﺪودة ﻗﻮس ﻗﺰح.

tk.title: EVCİL BULUT
tk.description: Yıllarca hava koşullarını kontrol etmeye çalışan insanlar bulutları evcilleştirmeyi nihayet başarmıştı. Bu pofuduk evcil canlılarla hâlâ karşılaşabilirsiniz. Dinlenmeleri için bir mutfak dolabı, yem olarak biraz buhar ve yağmurlarını boşaltabilecekleri bir tencere gerekir. Yılda bir de gökkuşağı kurdu kontrolü yapılmalıdır.

fr-CA.title: NUAGE DE COMPAGNIE
fr-CA.description: Après des années passées à essayer de contrôler la météo, les humains sont parvenus à domestiquer les nuages. Ces animaux duveteux sont toujours là aujourd'hui. Ils ont besoin d'une armoire humide dans laquelle se nicher, de doses de vapeur régulières et d'une casserole dans laquelle pleuvoir. L'examen annuel est recommandé pour éviter les vers arc-en-ciel.

en-AU.title: PET CLOUD
en-AU.description: After years spent attempting to control the weather, humans successfully domesticated clouds. These fluffy pets are still around today. They require a damp cupboard in which to nest, regular steam feeds, and a saucepan in which they can rain. Check yearly for cases of rainbow worm.

landmarks.title: PET CLOUD
landmarks.description: After years spent attempting to control the weather, humans successfully domesticated clouds. These fluffy pets are still around today. They require a damp cupboard in which to nest, regular steam feeds, and a saucepan in which they can rain. Check yearly for cases of rainbow worm.

landmarks.name: LM_PetDoor

en.title: CAT FLAP
en.description: Although billed as a "cat" flap, expert monster physicists have discovered that these hatches could actually be used by any small beast. In fact, pet cats were the creatures least likely to operate a cat flap, preferring instead to yell until an Englandlander opened the larger human door.

en-GB.title: CAT FLAP
en-GB.description: Although billed as a "cat" flap, expert monster physicists have discovered that these hatches could actually be used by any small beast. In fact, pet cats were the creatures least likely to operate a cat flap, preferring instead to yell until an Englandlander opened the larger human door.

fr.title: TRAPPE À CHAT
fr.description: Bien que présentés comme des trappes à « chat », des physiciens monstres experts ont découvert que ces dispositifs pouvaient en réalité être utilisés par n'importe quelle bête de petite taille. Les chats de compagnie étaient même les créatures les moins susceptibles d'emprunter ces trappes, préférant plutôt crier jusqu'à ce qu'un Angleterrien leur ouvre sa grande porte.

de.title: KATZENKLAPPE
de.description: Obwohl diese Luken offiziell „Katzenklappen“ genannt wurden, haben Monsterphysiker herausgefunden, dass sie tatsächlich von allen möglichen Kleintieren verwendet werden konnten. Tatsächlich waren Katzen die Tiere, die sie am seltensten benutzten, da sie lieber so lange riefen, bis ein Englandländer ihnen die größere, menschliche Tür öffnete.

es.title: GATERA
es.description: Aunque anunciada como una "gatera", los físicos monstruos expertos han descubierto que estas escotillas podían en realidad ser usadas por cualquier bestia pequeña. De hecho, los gatos mascota eran las criaturas con menor probabilidad de usar una gatera, pues preferían en su lugar gritar hasta que un habitante de Inglaterralandia abriese una puerta humana más grande.

it.title: GATTAIOLA
it.description: Anche se definita "gattaiola", i fisici mostri hanno scoperto che questi portelli potevano essere usati da qualsiasi bestia di piccole dimensioni. Infatti, i gatti domestici erano le creature che meno di frequente usavano le gattaiole, preferendo miagolare fino al punto da farsi aprire la porta umana più grande usata dagli inglesesi.

ja.title: 猫の出入り口
ja.description: これは「猫の」出入り口として宣伝されていますが、モンスター専門の物理学者たちは、これらの蓋は小さな獣ならば、誰だって使うことができたのだとわかりました。実際、ペットの猫がこの出入口を使うことはほとんどなく、イングランドランド人が大きな人間のドアを開けてくれるまで叫んでいたようです。

ko.title: 고양이 문
ko.description: 고양이' 문이라고 적혀 있지만 몬스터 물리학자들은 모든 작은 짐승들이 이 작은 문을 사용할 수 있다는 걸 발견했습니다. 특히 반려 고양이들은 고양이 문을 직접 여는 것보다는 인간들에게 거대한 인간 문을 열라며 소리를 지르는 걸 더 선호했습니다.

zh-Hans.title: 猫门
zh-Hans.description: 尽管被标榜为“猫”门，但专业的怪兽物理学家们发现，实际上任何体型小的野兽都可以从这儿过。事实上，宠物猫是最不可能打开猫门的动物，它们更喜欢大叫，直到一个英格兰大陆人打开更大的供人进出的门。

zh-Hant.title: 貓門
zh-Hant.description: 雖然標示為「貓」門，但是專業的怪獸物理學家發現，這些艙門其實可以讓任何小型動物使用。事實上，寵物貓是最不可能使用貓門的生物，因為牠們喜歡叫喚英格蘭大陸的人打開更大扇的人門。

ru.title: ДВЕРЦА ДЛЯ КОШКИ
ru.description: Эксперты монстров по физике обнаружили, что эти дверцы могут использовать любые маленькие животные, хотя они и называются «дверцами для кошек». На самом деле, кошки очень редко использовали эти дверцы, предпочитая вопить до тех пор, пока англоземец не открывал большую человеческую дверь.

pt-BR.title: ABA DE GATO
pt-BR.description: Apesar de ser chamada de “aba de gato”, físicos monstros especialistas descobriram que ela podia ser usada por qualquer fera pequena. Na verdade, gatos de estimação estavam entre as criaturas que menos operavam a aba de gato, pois optavam por gritar até um humano abrir a porta maior, feita para humanos.

nl.title: KATTENLUIK
nl.description: Hoewel dit voorwerp een 'kattenluik' werd genoemd, ontdekten monsterfysici dat elk klein dier ze kon gebruiken. Het was zelfs ongewoon dat katten het kattenluik gebruiken: in plaats daarvan schreeuwden ze tot een Engelandlander de grotere deur voor mensen opende.

ar.title: ﺑﺎب اﻟﻘﻄﻂ
ar.description: ﻋﻠﯽ اﻟﺮﻏﻢ ﻣﻦ أن اﻻﺳﻢ اﻟﻤﺘﺪاول ﻟﻬﺬه اﻟﻔﺘﺤﺎت ﻫﻮ ﺑﺎب "اﻟﻘﻄﻂ"، اﻛﺘﺸﻒ ﺧﺒﺮاء اﻟﻔﻴﺰﻳﺎء ﻣﻦ اﻟﻮﺣﻮش أﻧﻪ ﻛﺎن ﺑﺈﻣﻜﺎن اﻟﻮﺣﻮش اﻟﺼﻐﻴﺮة اﻷﺧﺮى اﺳﺘﺨﺪاﻣﻬﺎ ﻛﺬﻟﻚ. ﻓﻲ اﻟﺤﻘﻴﻘﺔ، ﻛﺎﻧﺖ اﻟﻘﻄﻂ أﻗﻞ ﻣﻦ ﻳﺴﺘﺨﺪم ﻫﺬه اﻷﺑﻮاب ﺣﻴﺚ ﻛﺎﻧﺖ ﺗﻤﻮء ﺑﺼﻮت ﻋﺎل ﺣﺘﯽ ﻳﻔﺘﺢ ﻟﻬﺎ أﺣﺪ اﻹﻧﺠﻠﻴﺰ اﻟﺒﺎب اﻟﻜﺒﻴﺮ اﻟﺨﺎص ﺑﺪﺧﻮل اﻟﺒﺸﺮ.

tk.title: KEDİ KAPISI
tk.description: "Kedi" kapısı olarak bilinse de uzman canavar fizikçiler bu ağızların bütün küçük yaratıklar tarafından kullanılabildiğini keşfetti. Hatta evcil kediler, kedi kapısını kullanma olasılığı en düşük olan canlılardı. Bunun yerine durmadan miyavlamayı ve bir İngilterelinin gelip insan kapısını açmasını beklemeyi tercih ediyorlardı.

fr-CA.title: TRAPPE À CHAT
fr-CA.description: Bien que présentées comme des trappes à « chat », des physiciens monstres experts ont découvert que ces dispositifs pouvaient en réalité être utilisés par n'importe quelle bête de petite taille. Les chats de compagnie étaient même les créatures les moins susceptibles d'emprunter ces trappes, préférant plutôt hurler jusqu'à ce qu'un Angleterrien ouvre sa grande porte humaine.

en-AU.title: CAT FLAP
en-AU.description: Although billed as a "cat" flap, expert monster physicists have discovered that these hatches could actually be used by any small beast. In fact, pet cats were the creatures least likely to operate a cat flap, preferring instead to yell until an Englandlander opened the larger human door.

landmarks.title: CAT FLAP
landmarks.description: Although billed as a "cat" flap, expert monster physicists have discovered that these hatches could actually be used by any small beast. In fact, pet cats were the creatures least likely to operate a cat flap, preferring instead to yell until an Englandlander opened the larger human door.

landmarks.name: LM_PhoneBooth

en.title: TELEPHONE BOX
en.description: Human legends tell us that there was a special type of dedicated blue telephone box that managed to be bigger on the inside (kind of like monster backpacks). Alas, we can only find red ones where the inside is very small and smells… concerning.

en-GB.title: TELEPHONE BOX
en-GB.description: Human legends tell us that there was a special type of dedicated blue telephone box that managed to be bigger on the inside (kind of like monster backpacks). Alas, we can only find red ones where the inside is very small and smells… concerning.

fr.title: CABINE TÉLÉPHONIQUE
fr.description: Les légendes humaines font mention d'un type particulier de cabine téléphonique bleu qui parvenait à être plus spacieux de l'intérieur (un peu comme les sacs à dos monstres). Hélas, on n'en trouve plus que des rouges dont l'intérieur est très étroit et dégage une odeur... inquiétante.

de.title: TELEFONZELLE
de.description: Menschlichen Legenden zufolge gab es eine besondere Art von blauen Telefonzellen, die innen größer waren als außen (in etwa wie Monster-Rucksäcke). Leider konnten wir nur rote Exemplare finden, die innen sehr klein sind und in denen es … beunruhigend riecht.

es.title: CAJA TELEFÓNICA
es.description: Las leyendas humanas nos cuentan que existía un tipo especial de caja telefónica azul exclusiva que era más grande en el interior (algo parecido a las mochilas de monstruos). Por desgracia, solo podemos encontrar unas rojas cuyo interior es muy pequeño y huele... sospechoso.

it.title: CABINA TELEFONICA
it.description: Le leggende umane dicono che c'era uno speciale tipo di cabina telefonica blu che poteva essere più grande all'interno (un po' come gli zaini dei mostri). In realtà, siamo riusciti a trovare solamente le cabine rosse, il cui interno è molto piccolo e odora in modo... preoccupante.

ja.title: 電話ボックス
ja.description: 人間の伝説によると、何故か中の方が大きい(まるでモンスターのリュックのように)、専用の青い電話ボックスが存在していたそうです。悲しいかな、私たちに見つけられるのは、中身が非常に小さくて臭い赤の電話ボックスのみなのです…心配です。

ko.title: 전화 상자
ko.description: 인간 전설에 의하면 파란색 전화 상자는 안에 들어가면 더 큰 공간이 있다고 합니다(몬스터 배낭처럼 말이죠). 안타깝게도 우리가 찾은 건 붉은색 전화 상자뿐이고, 내부는 매우 좁고 냄새가 심합니다... 좀 많이 심합니다...

zh-Hans.title: 电话亭
zh-Hans.description: 根据人类传说，有一种特别的专用蓝色电话亭，里面都比较大（有点像怪物背包）。唉，我们只能找到红色的，里面很小，而且很臭... 令人担忧。

zh-Hant.title: 電話亭
zh-Hant.description: 我們從人類的傳說得知，有一種特殊的專用藍色電話亭，其內部空間更大 (類似怪獸背包)。可惜的是，我們只有發現紅色電話亭，不僅內部非常狹小，還有一股...異味。

ru.title: ТЕЛЕФОННАЯ БУДКА
ru.description: Человеческие легенды гласят, что есть особый вид синих телефонных будок, которые внутри больше, чем снаружи (что-то вроде рюкзаков монстров). Увы, мы смогли отыскать только красные, у них внутри тесно, и запах... вызывает беспокойство.

pt-BR.title: CABINE TELEFÔNICA
pt-BR.description: Dizem as lendas humanas que havia uma cabine telefônica azul que era maior do lado de dentro (mais ou menos como as mochilas dos monstros). Apesar destes relatos, nós só conseguimos encontrar cabines vermelhas que são muito apertadas e têm um cheiro... alarmante.

nl.title: TELEFOONCEL
nl.description: Er is een legende over een speciaal soort telefooncel, die blauw was en groter vanbinnen dan vanbuiten was (vergelijkbaar met monsterrugtassen). Helaas hebben we alleen rode telefooncellen gevonden. Deze zijn erg klein vanbinnen en ruiken... bedenkelijk.

ar.title: ﻛﺎﺑﻴﻨﺔ اﻟﻬﺎﺗﻒ
ar.description: ﺗﺨﺒﺮﻧﺎ اﻷﺳﺎﻃﻴﺮ اﻟﺒﺸﺮﻳﺔ ﺑﻮﺟﻮد ﻧﻮع ﻣﻤﻴﺰ وﻣﺨﺼﺺ ﻣﻦ ﻛﺒﺎﺋﻦ اﻟﻬﺎﺗﻒ ﻟﻮﻧﻬﺎ أزرق وأوﺳﻊ ﻣﻦ اﻟﺪاﺧﻞ )ﺗﺸﺒﻪ ﺣﻘﺎﺋﺐ اﻟﻈﻬﺮ اﻟﺨﺎﺻﺔ ﺑﺎﻟﻮﺣﻮش(. ﻟﻜﻦ ﻣﻊ اﻷﺳﻒ، ﻟﻢ ﻧﻌﺜﺮ إﻻ ﻋﻠﯽ اﻟﻜﺒﺎﺋﻦ اﻟﺤﻤﺮاء ذات اﻟﻤﺴﺎﺣﺔ اﻟﺼﻐﻴﺮة ﻣﻦ اﻟﺪاﺧﻞ واﻟﺮاﺋﺤﺔ... اﻟﻤﺜﻴﺮة ﻟﻠﻘﻠﻖ.

tk.title: TELEFON KABİNİ
tk.description: İnsan efsanelerine göre telefon kabinlerinin, içi dışından daha büyük olan (canavarların sırt çantaları gibi) özel mavi türleri vardı. Bulduğumuz kabinlerin rengi maalesef kırmızı, içleri küçücük ve tuhaf kokuyor.

fr-CA.title: CABINE TÉLÉPHONIQUE
fr-CA.description: Les légendes humaines font mention d'un type particulier de cabine téléphonique bleu qui était plus grand à l'intérieur (un peu comme les sacs à dos monstres). Hélas, nous n'avons trouvé que des rouges, dont l'intérieur est très étroit et dégage une odeur... inquiétante.

en-AU.title: TELEPHONE BOX
en-AU.description: Human legends tell us that there was a special type of dedicated blue telephone box that managed to be bigger on the inside (kind of like monster backpacks). Alas, we can only find red ones where the inside is very small and smells… concerning.

landmarks.title: TELEPHONE BOX
landmarks.description: Human legends tell us that there was a special type of dedicated blue telephone box that managed to be bigger on the inside (kind of like monster backpacks). Alas, we can only find red ones where the inside is very small and smells… concerning.

landmarks.name: LM_Plums

en.title: PLUMS (FROM HUMAN ICEBOX)
en.description: We have exhibited the plums that were in some kind of human icebox and which were labeled "Philippa's breakfast". Apologies to Philippa, but they looked delicious and filled a gap in our collection.

en-GB.title: PLUMS (FROM HUMAN ICEBOX)
en-GB.description: We have exhibited the plums that were in some kind of human icebox and which were labelled "Philippa's breakfast". Apologies to Philippa, but they looked delicious and filled a gap in our collection.

fr.title: PRUNES (DE GLACIÈRE HUMAINE)
fr.description: Nous avons exposé les prunes qui se trouvaient dans une sorte de glacière humaine, étiquetée « petit déjeuner de Philippa ». Toutes nos excuses à Philippa, mais elles avaient l'air délicieuses en plus de combler un vide dans notre collection.

de.title: PFLAUMEN (AUS EINER MENSCHLICHEN KÜHLTRUHE)
de.description: Wir haben die Pflaumen ausgestellt, die sich in einer Art menschlicher Kühltruhe befanden, und an denen sich ein Schild mit der Aufschrift „Philippas Frühstück“ befand. Wir entschuldigen uns bei Philippa; sie sahen köstlich aus und füllten eine Lücke in unserer Sammlung.

es.title: CIRUELAS (DE UN CONGELADOR HUMANO)
es.description: Hemos expuesto las ciruelas que estaban en algún tipo de congelador humano y que estaban etiquetadas como "desayuno de Philippa". Nuestras disculpas a Philippa, pero tenían muy buena pinta y llenaban un hueco en nuestra colección.

it.title: PRUGNE (PRESE DA UNA GHIACCIAIA UMANA)
it.description: Abbiamo incluso nella mostra le prugne che si trovavano in una sorta di ghiacciaia umana, e che erano etichettate come "la colazione di Filippa". Scusa Filippa, ma sembravano deliziose e completavano la nostra collezione.

ja.title: 干しブドウ(人間のアイスボックスより)
ja.description: 「フィリッパの朝ごはん」というラベルが付いた、人間のアイスボックスのようなものに入った干しブドウを展示したことがありました。フィリッパには申し訳ありませんが、これは非常においしそうに見えた上に、コレクションの隙間を埋めることができたのです。

ko.title: 자두(인간의 아이스 박스에서 발굴)
ko.description: 필리파의 아침'이라고 적힌 인간의 아이스 박스에서 발굴한 자두를 전시했습니다. 필리파에게는 미안하지만, 이 자두는 맛있어 보일 뿐 아니라 우리 컬렉션에 난 구멍을 메워주는 역할도 하고 있습니다.

zh-Hans.title: 李子（来自人类冰箱）
zh-Hans.description: 我们展出了放在人类冰箱里的李子，标签上写着“菲利帕的早餐”。对不起，菲利帕，它们看起来太诱人，而且我们刚好没吃的了。

zh-Hant.title: 李子 (來自人類冰箱)
zh-Hant.description: 我們展示了某種人類冰箱裡的李子，上面標示著「菲利帕的早餐」。菲利帕，對不起，但它們看起來很美味而且彌補了我們的收藏品空缺。

ru.title: СЛИВЫ (ИЗ ЧЕЛОВЕЧЕСКОГО МОРОЗИЛЬНИКА)
ru.description: Мы выставили для показа сливы, подписанные «завтрак Филиппы», которые были в каком-то человеческом ящике со льдом. Приносим свои извинения Филиппе, но они выглядели очень вкусными и заполнили пробел в нашей коллекции.

pt-BR.title: AMEIXAS (DE UMA GELADEIRA HUMANA)
pt-BR.description: Em exposição, temos as ameixas encontradas numa espécie de geladeira humana, rotuladas como “café da manhã da Filomena”. Pedimos desculpas à Filomena mas, além de parecerem deliciosas, as ameixas preenchiam uma parte que faltava de nossa coleção.

nl.title: PRUIMEN (VAN MENSELIJKE IJSKAST)
nl.description: We hebben de pruimen tentoongesteld die in een soort menselijke ijskast zaten en die het label "Filippa's ontbijt" kregen. Sorry Filippa, maar ze zagen er heerlijk uit en vulden een gat in onze collectie.

ar.title: اﻟﺒﺮﻗﻮق )ﻣﺄﺧﻮذ ﻣﻦ ﺛﻼﺟﺔ اﻟﺒﺸﺮ(
ar.description: ﻟﻘﺪ ﻋﺮﺿﻨﺎ اﻟﺒﺮﻗﻮق اﻟﻤﻌﺜﻮر ﻋﻠﻴﻪ ﻓﻲ أﺣﺪ أﻧﻮاع ﺛﻼﺟﺎت اﻟﺒﺸﺮ اﻟﺘﻲ ﺣﻤﻠﺖ ﻣﻠﺼﻘﺎ ﻣﻜﺘﻮﺑﺎ ﻓﻴﻪ" إﻓﻄﺎر ﻓﻴﻠﻴﺒﺎ". ﻧﻌﺘﺬر ﻟﻔﻴﻠﻴﺒﺎ، ﻟﻜﻦ ﻛﺎن اﻟﺒﺮﻗﻮق ﻛﺎن ﻳﺒﺪو ﻟﺬﻳﺬا ﻛﻤﺎ أﻧﻪ ﺳﺪ إﺣﺪى اﻟﻔﺠﻮات ﻓﻲ ﻣﺠﻤﻮﻋﺘﻨﺎ.

tk.title: ERİK (İNSAN BUZLUĞUNDAN)
tk.description: Bir çeşit insan buzluğundan alınan erikleri sergiye çıkardık ve etiketine "Philippa'nın kahvaltısı" yazdık. Philippa bizi affetsin, erikler çok leziz görünüyordu ve koleksiyonumuzdaki boşluğu doldurdular.

fr-CA.title: PRUNES (DE GLACIÈRE HUMAINE)
fr-CA.description: Nous avons exposé les prunes qui se trouvaient dans une sorte de glacière humaine, étiquetée « déjeuner de Philippa ». Toutes nos excuses à Philippa, mais elles avaient l'air délicieuses et ont comblé un trou dans notre collection.

en-AU.title: PLUMS (FROM HUMAN ICEBOX)
en-AU.description: We have exhibited the plums that were in some kind of human icebox and which were labelled "Philippa's breakfast". Apologies to Philippa, but they looked delicious and filled a gap in our collection.

landmarks.title: PLUMS (FROM HUMAN ICEBOX)
landmarks.description: We have exhibited the plums that were in some kind of human icebox and which were labeled "Philippa's breakfast". Apologies to Philippa, but they looked delicious and filled a gap in our collection.

landmarks.name: LM_PocketWatch

en.title: POCKET WATCH
en.description: These portable slices of time made it easier for humans to "spare a moment" for each other. We aren't exactly sure how these transactions worked, but clearly the time contained in a pocket watch was valuable, as it was often chained to the wearer's coat.

en-GB.title: POCKET WATCH
en-GB.description: These portable slices of time made it easier for humans to "spare a moment" for each other. We aren't exactly sure how these transactions worked, but clearly the time contained in a pocket watch was valuable, as it was often chained to the wearer's coat.

fr.title: MONTRE DE POCHE
fr.description: Ces tranches de temps portatives permettaient aux humains de « passer un moment » ensemble plus facilement. Nous ne savons pas exactement comment ces transactions fonctionnaient, mais il est clair que le temps contenu dans une montre de poche était précieux, car souvent enchaîné au manteau du porteur.

de.title: TASCHENUHR
de.description: Diese tragbaren Zeitstücke machten es Menschen leichter, füreinander „einen Moment Zeit übrig zu haben“. Wir sind nicht ganz sicher, wie diese Transaktionen vor sich gingen, aber die in der Taschenuhr enthaltene Zeit war zweifellos wertvoll, da sie oft an den Mantel ihres Besitzers gekettet wurde.

es.title: RELOJ DE BOLSILLO
es.description: Estos fragmentos portátiles de tiempo hacían que fuera más fácil para los humanos "dedicar un momento" a otros. No estamos seguros exactamente de cómo funcionaban estas transacciones, pero sin duda el tiempo que había en un reloj de bolsillo era valioso, puesto que solía encontrarse encadenado a la chaqueta del portador.

it.title: OROLOGIO DA TASCA
it.description: Questi frammenti di tempo portatili rendevano più semplice per gli umani "prendersi del tempo" per gli altri. Non siamo certi di come funzionassero gli scambi, ma certamente il tempo contenuto nell'orologio era prezioso, perché quest'ultimo era spesso attaccato con una catenella alla giacca di chi lo indossava.

ja.title: 懐中時計
ja.description: この携帯用の時間スライスを使うことで、人間たちがお互いのために「時間を割く」ことが前よりも簡単になりました。このやりとりがどのようにして働いたのかは謎ですが、懐中時計に収まっている時間は貴重なものであり、その証拠に時計は常に持ち主のコートに鎖で繋がっていました。

ko.title: 주머니 시계
ko.description: 이 휴대용 시간 조각 덕분에 인간들은 서로 '시간을 좀 낼 수' 있었습니다. 이 거래가 어떻게 이루어졌는지는 모르겠지만, 주머니 시계에 든 시간은 매우 귀중했던 모양인지 사용자들은 시계를 자신의 코트에 체인으로 연결했습니다.

zh-Hans.title: 怀表
zh-Hans.description: 这些便携式怀表更容易让人类为彼此“腾出时间”。我们不太清楚这些交易是如何运作的，但很明显怀表里的时间很有价值，因为它经常系在佩戴者的外套上。

zh-Hant.title: 懷錶
zh-Hant.description: 這種可攜式的片段時間，讓人類能更方便為彼此「空出時間」。我們並不清楚這是如何處理的，但很明顯的是，存在懷錶裡的時間很珍貴，因為配戴者的外套通常會用鎖鏈串住懷錶。

ru.title: КАРМАННЫЕ ЧАСЫ
ru.description: Эти переносные отрезки времени помогали людям «уделить момент» друг другу. Мы не совсем уверены, как работали эти соглашения, но ясно, что время в карманных часах было ценным, поскольку они были зачастую прикреплены цепочкой к пальто владельца.

pt-BR.title: RELÓGIO DE BOLSO
pt-BR.description: As fatias portáteis de tempo permitiram que os humanos compartilhassem mais “momentos” entre si. Não sabemos como tais transações funcionavam, mas o tempo contido no relógio de bolso era claramente valioso, visto que ele costumava ser preso no paletó do dono por uma corrente.

nl.title: ZAKHORLOGE
nl.description: Deze draagbare tijdsapparaten maakten het eenvoudiger voor mensen om 'tijd te maken' voor elkaar. We weten niet echt hoe ze dit maakten, maar we weten wel dat het zakhorloge er iets mee te maken had. Ze maakten hun zakhorloge dan ook vast aan hun kleding om dit niet te verliezen.

ar.title: ﺳﺎﻋﺔ ﺟﻴﺐ
ar.description: ﻛﺎن اﻟﺒﺸﺮ ﻳﺴﺘﺨﺪﻣﻮن ﺳﺎﻋﺔ اﻟﺠﻴﺐ ﻷﻧﻬﺎ ﺗﺤﺘﻮي ﻋﻠﯽ ﺷﺮاﺋﺢ زﻣﻨﻴﺔ ﻣﺤﻤﻮﻟﺔ ﻳﺴﺮت ﻋﻠﻴﻬﻢ ﻋﻤﻠﻴﺔ "ﻣﻨﺢ دﻗﻴﻘﺔ" ﻟﺒﻌﻀﻬﻢ. ﻧﺤﻦ ﻻ ﻧﻌﻠﻢ ﻋﻠﯽ وﺟﻪ اﻟﺘﺤﺪﻳﺪ ﻛﻴﻔﻴﺔ إﻋﻄﺎء ﻫﺬه اﻟﺪﻗﺎﺋﻖ ﻓﻴﻤﺎ ﺑﻴﻨﻬﻢ، ﻟﻜﻦ ﻣﻦ اﻟﻮاﺿﺢ أن ﻟﻠﺸﺮاﺋﺢ اﻟﺰﻣﻨﻴﺔ اﻟﻤﺤﻔﻮﻇﺔ ﻓﻲ ﻫﺬه اﻟﺴﺎﻋﺔ ﻗﻴﻤﺔ، ﺣﻴﺚ ﻛﺎن اﻟﺸﺨﺺ ﻳﺜﺒﺘﻬﺎ ﻓﻲ ﻣﻌﻄﻔﻪ ﺑﺴﻠﺴﻠﺔ.

tk.title: CEP SAATİ
tk.description: Bu taşınabilir zaman dilimleri insanların birbirlerine "zaman harcayabilmelerini" kolaylaştırmak için tasarlanmış. Bu alım satım işlemlerinin nasıl yapıldığından pek emin değiliz ama belli ki bir cep saatinin içindeki zaman çok değerliymiş, çünkü genellikle giyen kişinin ceketine zincirlenirmiş.

fr-CA.title: MONTRE DE POCHE
fr-CA.description: Ces morceaux de temps portables permettaient aux humains de « trouver du temps pour quelqu'un » plus facilement. Nous ne savons pas exactement comment cette recherche de temps fonctionnait, mais il est clair que le temps contenu dans une montre de poche était précieux, car elle était souvent enchaînée au manteau du porteur.

en-AU.title: POCKET WATCH
en-AU.description: These portable slices of time made it easier for humans to "spare a moment" for each other. We aren't exactly sure how these transactions worked, but clearly the time contained in a pocket watch was valuable, as it was often chained to the wearer's coat.

landmarks.title: POCKET WATCH
landmarks.description: These portable slices of time made it easier for humans to "spare a moment" for each other. We aren't exactly sure how these transactions worked, but clearly the time contained in a pocket watch was valuable, as it was often chained to the wearer's coat.

landmarks.name: LM_PoisonedApple

en.title: POISONED APPLE
en.description:
Described by a door-to-door salesperson as, "Just a lovely apple, dearie. Nothing suspicious about it. Definitely not dipped in poison by an angry step-parent! Absolutely not a choking hazard! Perfectly safe. Healthy, even! One of your five a day." 
N.B. Exceeds the monster RDA of arsenic.

en-GB.title: POISONED APPLE
en-GB.description:
Described by a door-to-door salesperson as, "Just a lovely apple, dearie. Nothing suspicious about it. Definitely not dipped in poison by an angry step-parent! Absolutely not a choking hazard! Perfectly safe. Healthy, even! One of your five a day." 
N.B. Exceeds the monster RDA of arsenic.

fr.title: POMME EMPOISONNÉE
fr.description:
Décrite par une vendeuse itinérante comme suit : « C'est juste une jolie pomme, mon enfant. Rien de suspect à l'horizon. Aucun beau-parent aigri ne l'a trempée dans du poison ! Aucun risque d'étouffement ! Tout est son contrôle. Elle est même on ne peut plus saine ! Une de tes cinq doses quotidiennes. » 
N.B. Contient plus que l'AJR d'arsenic.

de.title: VERGIFTETER APFEL
de.description:
Von einem Haustürverkäufer folgendermaßen beschrieben: „Nur ein hübscher Apfel, mein Schätzchen. Nichts Verdächtiges daran. Ganz bestimmt nicht von einem wütenden Stiefelternteil in Gift getaucht! Absolut keine Erstickungsgefahr! Absolut sicher. Sogar gesund! Eine deiner fünf Portionen Obst am Tag.“ 
Anmerkung: Übersteigt die empfohlene Tagesdosis für Monster an Arsen.

es.title: MANZANA ENVENENADA
es.description:
Descrita por una vendedora a domicilio como "Simplemente una manzana encantadora, cariño. No tiene nada sospechoso. ¡Sin duda, ningún padrastro o madrastra enfadado la ha sumergido en veneno! ¡Sin riesgo de asfixia en absoluto! Perfectamente segura. ¡Sana, incluso! Una de tus cinco piezas al día". 
 N. B. Excede la cantidad diaria recomendada de arsénico para monstruos.

it.title: MELA AVVELENATA
it.description: Descritta da un venditore ambulante come "semplicemente una mela deliziosa, cara. Non ha nulla di sospetto. Di certo non è stata immersa nel veleno da una matrigna arrabbiata! Non si corre assolutamente il rischio di soffocare! È perfettamente sicura, persino sana! Una delle tue cinque porzioni di frutta e verdura da consumare ogni giorno". N.B. Supera il fabbisogno giornaliero di arsenico consentito nei mostri.

ja.title: 毒入りリンゴ
ja.description:
訪問販売員の売り文句には、「これはただの美しいリンゴなのです。怒り狂った継母が毒に浸けたりしていません！絶対に喉に詰まったりはしませんから！すごく安全です。しかも健康的なんです！1日5種類の野菜や果物の摂取がこれで1つ完了です。」
注意：モンスターの1日あたりのヒ素推奨摂取量を越してしまいます。

ko.title: 독사과
ko.description:
방문 판매원은 이 제품을 이렇게 설명했다고 합니다. "정말 예쁜 사과죠, 아가씨? 전혀 수상하지 않은 사과예요. 절대 화가 난 계모가 독을 바른 사과가 아니랍니다! 먹어도 목에 걸리지 않아요! 매우 안전하죠. 심지어 건강하기까지 하고요! 하루에 다섯 개도 괜찮아요." 
주의: 몬스터 일일 권장량을 초과하는 비소가 함유되었음

zh-Hans.title: 毒苹果
zh-Hans.description: 一位上门推销的人是这么说的：“亲爱的，这只是一个可爱的苹果，没有什么好怀疑的，绝对没有被气愤的继母下毒！吃了绝对不会噎住！完全无毒无害。还有益于健康呢！是每天应该摄取的五蔬果之一。”注意。超过了怪兽的砷日摄取量。

zh-Hant.title: 毒蘋果
zh-Hant.description:
推銷員這麼說道：「親愛的，這只是一顆美味的蘋果，沒有什麼好可疑的，絕對沒有被氣憤的後母下毒！吃了絕對不會噎住昏倒！完全無毒無害，還能鞏固身體健康！是每天要攝取的五蔬果之一。」
注意：超出怪獸的砷建議攝取量。

ru.title: ОТРАВЛЕННОЕ ЯБЛОКО
ru.description:
Со слов коммивояжёра: «Просто прекрасное яблоко, дорогуша. В нем нет ничего подозрительного. Точно не отравлено мачехой! Никакой опасности подавиться! Совершенно безопасно. Даже полезно для здоровья! Одна пятая ежедневных витаминов». 
Внимание! Превышает рекомендуемую дневную норму потребления мышьяка для монстров.

pt-BR.title: MAÇÃ ENVENENADA
pt-BR.description:
Descrita por vendedores ambulantes como uma “maçã normal, nada demais, nada suspeito; definitivamente não foi enfeitiçada por uma madrasta rancorosa; nem dá pra engasgar com ela, é completamente segura e faz bem, basta comer uma por dia”. 
N.B. Excede a dose diária recomendada de arsênico para monstros.

nl.title: VERGIFTIGDE APPEL
nl.description:
Beschreven door een huis-aan-huisverkoper als: "Gewoon een mooie appel, lieverd. Niets verdachts aan. Zeker niet in gif gedompeld door een boze stiefouder! Absoluut geen verstikkingsgevaar! Volkomen veilig. Gezond zelfs! Van de schijf van vijf." 
N.B. overtreft het monster-RDA van arsenicum.

ar.title: اﻟﺘﻔﺎﺣﺔ اﻟﻤﺴﻤﻮﻣﺔ
ar.description: ﻳﺼﻔﻬﺎ اﻟﺒﺎﺋﻊ اﻟﻤﺘﺠﻮل ﺑﻤﺎ ﻳﺄﺗﻲ: "ﻣﺠﺮد ﺗﻔﺎﺣﺔ ﺟﻤﻴﻠﺔ ﻳﺎ ﻋﺰﻳﺰي. ﻻ ﻳﻮﺟﺪ ﻣﺎ ﻳﺪﻋﻮ إﻟﯽ اﻟﺸﻚ. ﺑﺎﻟﻄﺒﻊ ﻟﻢ ﻳﻐﻤﺴﻬﺎ زوج أم أو زوﺟﺔ أب ﻏﺎﺿﺒﺔ ﻓﻲ اﻟﺴﻢ ﻣﺜﻼ! ﺑﺎﻟﺘﺄﻛﻴﺪ ﻻ ﺗﻌﺮﺿﻚ ﻟﺨﻄﺮ اﻻﺧﺘﻨﺎق! آﻣﻨﺔ وﻣﺜﺎﻟﻴﺔ، ﺑﻞ ﺻﺤﻴﺔ أﻳﻀﺎ! أﺣﺪ اﻷﻃﻌﻤﺔ اﻟﺘﻲ ﻳﻨﺼﺢ ﺑﺘﻨﺎوﻟﻬﺎ ﺧﻤﺲ ﻣﺮات ﻓﻲ اﻟﻴﻮم". ﻣﻠﺤﻮﻇﺔ: ﻳﺘﺠﺎوز ﻣﺤﺘﻮاﻫﺎ اﻟﻜﻤﻴﺔ اﻟﻤﻮﺻﯽ ﺑﻬﺎ ﻟﻠﻮﺣﻮش ﻣﻦ اﻟﺰرﻧﻴﺦ.

tk.title: ZEHİRLİ ELMA
tk.description:
Kapıya gelen pazarlamacının, "Leziz bir elma, tatlım. Şüphe duyulacak hiçbir şey yok. Öfkeli bir üvey anne veya baba tarafından zehre batırılmış falan değil! Boğulma tehlikesi kesinlikle yok! Gönül rahatlığıyla yenebilir. Hatta sağlıklıdır!"
Not: Canavarların günlük arsenik alım miktarını aşıyor.

fr-CA.title: POMME EMPOISONNÉE
fr-CA.description:
Décrite par une vendeuse itinérante comme suit : « C'est juste une belle pomme, mon enfant. Rien de suspect. Aucun beau-parent irritable ne l'a trempée dans le poison! Aucun risque d'étouffement! Parfaitement bonne. Je dirais même excellente pour la santé! Une de tes cinq portions de fruit quotidiennes. » 
N.B. Contient plus que l'ANR d'arsenic.

en-AU.title: POISONED APPLE
en-AU.description:
Described by a door-to-door salesperson as, "Just a lovely apple, dearie. Nothing suspicious about it. Definitely not dipped in poison by an angry step-parent! Absolutely not a choking hazard! Perfectly safe. Healthy, even! One of your five a day." 
N.B. Exceeds the monster RDA of arsenic.

landmarks.title: POISONED APPLE
landmarks.description:
Described by a door-to-door salesperson as, "Just a lovely apple, dearie. Nothing suspicious about it. Definitely not dipped in poison by an angry step-parent! Absolutely not a choking hazard! Perfectly safe. Healthy, even! One of your five a day." 
N.B. Exceeds the monster RDA of arsenic.

landmarks.name: LM_Popcorn

en.title: POPCORN
en.description: In a stunning example of convergent evolution, this land-based cereal grain developed the same protective mechanism as the ocean-faring pufferfish! When in the presence of predators, such as microwaves, these organisms rapidly expand in self-defense. Delicious, buttery self-defense. Try it yourself at one of our handy booths!

en-GB.title: POPCORN
en-GB.description: In a stunning example of convergent evolution, this land-based cereal grain developed the same protective mechanism as the ocean-faring pufferfish! When in the presence of predators, such as microwaves, these organisms rapidly expand in self-defence. Delicious, buttery self-defence. Try it yourself at one of our handy booths!

fr.title: POPCORN
fr.description: Dans un exemple étonnant d'évolution convergente, cette céréale terrestre a développé le même mécanisme de protection que le poisson-globe vivant dans l'océan ! Lorsqu'ils sont en présence de prédateurs, comme les micro-ondes, ces organismes gonflent rapidement pour se défendre. Une délicieuse autodéfense beurrée. Goûtez-les par vous-même à l'un de nos stands !

de.title: POPCORN
de.description: In einem verblüffenden Beispiel konvergenter Evolution entwickelte dieses auf dem Land wachsende Getreidekorn den gleichen Schutzmechanismus wie der Kugelfisch im Meer! In Gegenwart von Fressfeinden, wie z. B. Mikrowellen, breiten sich diese Organismen zur Selbstverteidigung schnell aus. Leckere, buttrige Selbstverteidigung. Probier es an einem unserer nützlichen Stände selbst!

es.title: PALOMITAS
es.description: En un ejemplo increíble de evolución convergente, ¡este cereal terrestre ha desarrollado el mismo mecanismo de protección que los peces globo del océano! Cuando detecta la presencia de depredadores, como los microondas, estos organismos se expanden rápidamente en defensa propia. Una defensa propia deliciosa y mantecosa. ¡Puedes probarlas tú mismo en uno de nuestros útiles puestos!

it.title: POPCORN
it.description: Con uno straordinario esempio di evoluzione convergente, questo cereale della terra ha sviluppato lo stesso meccanismo di protezione del pesce palla dell'oceano! Quando sono in presenza di predatori, come le microonde, questi organismi si espandono rapidamente per autodifesa. Un'autodifesa deliziosa e burrosa. Provala in uno dei nostri pratici stand!

ja.title: ポップコーン
ja.description: 収斂進化の見事な例であるこの土ベースの穀物は、海洋性フグと同じ保護機能を発達させました！電子レンジなどと言った捕食者の存在に気付くと、これらの有機体が自己防衛のために急速に拡大を遂げるのです。おいしくて、バター風味な自己防衛です。最寄りのブースで試食してみてください！

ko.title: 팝콘
ko.description: 수렴진화의 놀라운 예시 중 하나로, 육지에서 자란 곡물이 바다를 헤매는 복어와 똑같은 자기 보호 기제를 가지게 된 경우입니다! 전자렌지 같은 상위 포식자가 나타나면 이 생물은 빠르게 자기 보호 모드로 전환합니다. 맛있고 버터향이 가득한 자기 보호 모드 말이죠. 저희 부스에서 직접 시험해보세요!

zh-Hans.title: 爆米花
zh-Hans.description: 在趋同进化的惊人范例中，这种陆上谷物发展出了与海洋生物河豚鱼相同的防御性机制！在掠食者出现时 – 例如微波炉 – 这种机制会生效，快速扩张，进行自我防御。美味的黄油味自我防御。在我们的方便展位上亲自试试吧！

zh-Hant.title: 爆米花
zh-Hant.description: 這是趨同演化最令人拍案叫絕的典範，這種陸生穀物發展出跟遠洋河豚一模一樣的保護機制！當掠食者出現時，好比說微波爐，這些有機體立馬就會膨脹起來保護自己。美味又奶香四溢的自我防衛機制。到我們一應俱全的攤位上親自試試吧！

ru.title: ПОПКОРН
ru.description: Потрясающий пример параллельной эволюции! Этот злак выработал тот же защитный механизм, что и океанский иглобрюх! Оказавшись рядом с хищником, например микроволновкой, этот организм мгновенно увеличивается в размерах, чтобы защитить себя. Мир еще не видывал такой вкусной самозащиты! Попробуйте сами, заглянув в один из наших киосков!

pt-BR.title: PIPOCA
pt-BR.description: Num exemplo impressionante de evolução convergente, este grão de cereal terrestre desenvolveu o mesmo mecanismo de proteção do baiacu! Na presença de predadores como o micro-ondas, estes organismos rapidamente expandiam como forma de autodefesa. Aliás, uma autodefesa deliciosa e amanteigada. Experimente você mesmo numa dos nossos convenientes estandes!

nl.title: POPCORN
nl.description: In een verbluffend voorbeeld van convergente evolutie ontwikkelde deze graankorrel op het land hetzelfde beschermende mechanisme als de in zee levende kogelvis! In aanwezigheid van roofdieren, zoals magnetrons, zetten deze organismen snel uit ter zelfverdediging. Heerlijke, boterachtige zelfverdediging. Proef ze zelf bij een van onze handige kiosken!

ar.title: اﻟﻔﺸﺎر
ar.description: ﻓﻲ ﻣﺜﺎل ﻣﺬﻫﻞ ﻟﻠﺘﻄﻮر اﻟﻤﺘﻘﺎرب، ﻃﻮرت ﻫﺬه اﻟﺤﺒﻮب اﻟﻐﺬاﺋﻴﺔ اﻟﺒﺮﻳﺔ آﻟﻴﺔ اﻟﺤﻤﺎﻳﺔ ﻧﻔﺴﻬﺎ ﻣﺜﻞ اﻟﺴﻤﻜﺔ اﻟﻤﻨﺘﻔﺨﺔ اﻟﺘﻲ ﺗﺮﺗﺎد اﻟﻤﺤﻴﻂ! ﻋﻨﺪ وﺟﻮد اﻟﻜﺎﺋﻨﺎت اﻟﻤﻔﺘﺮﺳﺔ ﻣﺜﻞ اﻟﻤﻮﺟﺎت اﻟﺪﻗﻴﻘﺔ، ﺗﺘﻮﺳﻊ ﻫﺬه اﻟﻜﺎﺋﻨﺎت ﺑﺴﺮﻋﺔ ﻟﻠﺪﻓﺎع ﻋﻦ اﻟﻨﻔﺲ. ﻳﺎﻟﻪ ﻣﻦ دﻓﺎع ﻋﻦ اﻟﻨﻔﺲ ﻟﺬﻳﺬ وﻣﻠﻲء ﺑﺎﻟﺰﺑﺪة. ﺟﺮﺑﻬﺎ ﺑﻨﻔﺴﻚ ﻓﻲ أﺣﺪ اﻷﻛﺸﺎك ﻓﻲ ﻣﺘﻨﺎول ﻳﺪﻳﻚ!

tk.title: PATLAMIŞ MISIR
tk.description: Yakınsak evrimin çarpıcı bir örneği olarak bu kara kökenli tahıl tanesi, okyanusta seyahat eden kirpi balığı ile aynı koruyucu mekanizmayı geliştirdi! Bu organizmalar mikrodalgalar gibi yırtıcılarla karşılaştığında kendini savunmak için hızla genişler. Lezzetli ve tereyağlı bir öz savunma tarzı. Kullanışlı kabinlerimizden birinde sen de dene!

fr-CA.title: POPCORN
fr-CA.description: Dans un exemple étonnant d'évolution convergente, cette céréale terrestre a développé le même mécanisme de protection que le poisson-globe vivant dans l'océan! Lorsqu'ils sont en présence de prédateurs, comme les micro-ondes, ces organismes gonflent rapidement pour se défendre. Une délicieuse autodéfense beurrée. Goûtez-les par vous-même à l'un de nos kiosques!

en-AU.title: POPCORN
en-AU.description: In a stunning example of convergent evolution, this land-based cereal grain developed the same protective mechanism as the ocean-faring pufferfish! When in the presence of predators, such as microwaves, these organisms rapidly expand in self-defence. Delicious, buttery self-defence. Try it yourself at one of our handy booths!

landmarks.title: POPCORN
landmarks.description: In a stunning example of convergent evolution, this land-based cereal grain developed the same protective mechanism as the ocean-faring pufferfish! When in the presence of predators, such as microwaves, these organisms rapidly expand in self-defense. Delicious, buttery self-defense. Try it yourself at one of our handy booths!

landmarks.name: LM_PortableNap

en.title: PORTABLE NAP
en.description: The portable nap was a heavily-padded, conical metal frame that provided a venue for short-term sleep. Worn in the manner of a ballgown, the device's rigid skeleton supported and swaddled the wearer while they adopted the nap position.

en-GB.title: PORTABLE NAP
en-GB.description: The portable nap was a heavily-padded, conical metal frame that provided a venue for short-term sleep. Worn in the manner of a ballgown, the device's rigid skeleton supported and swaddled the wearer while they adopted the nap position.

fr.title: SIESTE PORTATIVE
fr.description: La sieste portative consistait en un cadre métallique conique très rembourré pouvant offrir un lieu de sommeil à court terme. Porté à la manière d'une robe de bal, le squelette rigide de l'appareil soutenait et emmaillotait le porteur alors qu'il adoptait la position de sieste.

de.title: TRAGBARES NICKERCHEN
de.description: Das tragbare Nickerchen war ein stark ausgekleideter, kegelförmiger Metallrahmen, der eine Möglichkeit für Kurzzeitschlaf bot. Das Gerät wurde wie ein Ballkleid getragen und sein festes Innenskelett stützte den Träger und wickelte ihn ein, während er seine Schlafposition einnahm.

es.title: SIESTA PORTÁTIL
es.description: La siesta portátil era una estructura cónica de metal fuertemente acolchada que proporcionaba un lugar para el sueño a corto plazo. Vestida cual traje de fiesta, la estructura rígida del dispositivo sujetaba y envolvía al portador mientras adoptaba la posición de siesta.

it.title: SOSTEGNO PER RIPOSINO PORTATILE
it.description: Il sostegno per riposino portatile era composto da una struttura di metallo conica molto imbottita che consentiva di schiacciare brevi pisolini. Indossato come un abito da ballo, l'ossatura rigida di questo oggetto supportava e avvolgeva coloro che lo utilizzavano durante la posizione di riposo.

ja.title: 携帯用お昼寝
ja.description: この携帯用お昼寝は、たくさんのパッドが詰めてあり、円錐形の金属フレームが短期間の睡眠を可能にする場所を作り出すことができます。夜会服のように着用するこのデバイスの頑強な骨組みは、仮眠姿勢をとっている着用者をしかりと支えて包み込むこんでくれます。

ko.title: 휴대용 낮잠
ko.description: 휴대용 낮잠은 두터운 패딩이 되어있는 금속 원뿔 프레임으로, 잠깐 잠을 잘 공간을 마련해줍니다. 야회복처럼 걸치면 딱딱한 프레임이 착용자가 낮잠을 잘 수 있는 자세를 유지하도록 해주며, 동시에 몸을 감싸줍니다.

zh-Hans.title: 便携式小憩架
zh-Hans.description: 便携式小憩架是一个填充式圆锥形金属架，可供小憩。可以像舞会礼服一样穿着它，坚硬的骨架支撑并包裹着穿戴人，然后他们就可以选择午睡的姿势了。

zh-Hant.title: 攜帶式補眠裝置
zh-Hant.description: 攜帶式補眠裝置是一種有厚墊的圓錐金屬架，可供短暫的睡眠。要以穿舞會禮服的方式穿戴，穿戴者選擇補眠的姿勢後，它的堅固支架會支撐並包裹住他們。

ru.title: ПЕРЕНОСНОЕ УСТРОЙСТВО ДНЕВНОГО СНА
ru.description: Переносное устройство дневного сна — это щедро обитая ватой коническая металлическая рамка, предоставляющая место для кратковременного сна. Жесткий каркас устройства, носимый на манер бального платья, поддерживал и окутывал владельца, находящегося в позе для дневного сна.

pt-BR.title: SONECA PORTÁTIL
pt-BR.description: Estrutura metálica acolchoada que fornecia um substrato para uma sonequinha. Quando vestida como um traje de baile, o esqueleto rígido do dispositivo dava apoio e balanço ao usuário, permitindo que ele adotasse uma posição confortável para o sono.

nl.title: DRAAGBAAR DUTJE
nl.description: Het draagbare dutje was een zwaar gepolsterd, kegelvormig metalen frame dat plek bood voor kortstondige slaap. Gedragen op de manier van een baljurk, ondersteunde het stijve skelet van het toestel de drager en omhulde deze, terwijl deze de dutpositie aannam.

ar.title: ﻟﺒﺎس اﻟﻘﻴﻠﻮﻟﺔ اﻟﻤﺘﻨﻘﻞ
ar.description: ﻛﺎن ﻟﺒﺎس اﻟﻘﻴﻠﻮﻟﺔ اﻟﻤﺘﻨﻘﻞ ﻋﺒﺎرة ﻋﻦ إﻃﺎر ﻣﻌﺪﻧﻲ ﻣﺨﺮوﻃﻲ ﻣﺒﻄﻦ ﺑﻜﺜﺎﻓﺔ ﻳﻮﻓﺮ ﻣﺴﺎﺣﺔ ﻟﻠﻨﻮم ﻟﻔﺘﺮات ﻗﺼﻴﺮة. ﻳﺮﺗﺪﻳﻪ اﻟﺸﺨﺺ ﻛﻔﺴﺎﺗﻴﻦ اﻟﺤﻔﻼت وﻳﻠﺘﻒ ﻫﻴﻜﻠﻪ اﻟﺼﻠﺐ ﺣﻮل اﻟﺸﺨﺺ اﻟﺬي ﻳﺮﺗﺪﻳﻪ ﻣﻮﻓﺮا اﻟﺪﻋﻢ ﻟﻪ ﺑﻴﻨﻤﺎ ﻳﺘﺨﺬ وﺿﻊ اﻟﻘﻴﻠﻮﻟﺔ.

tk.title: TAŞINABİLİR ŞEKERLEME
