tk.description: Taşınabilir şekerleme, kısa süreli kestirmeler için alan sağlayacak bolca pamukla doldurulmuş konik bir metal çerçeveydi. Balo giysisi gibi giyilen cihazın sabit iskeleti, uyku pozisyonu aldığında giyen kişiye destek sağlar ve onu sarmalar.

fr-CA.title: SIESTE PORTATIVE
fr-CA.description: La sieste portative consistait en un cadre métallique conique très rembourré pouvant offrir un lieu de sommeil de courte durée. Porté à la manière d'une robe de bal, le squelette rigide de l'appareil soutenait et emmaillotait le porteur alors qu'il prenait sa position de sieste.

en-AU.title: PORTABLE NAP
en-AU.description: The portable nap was a heavily-padded, conical metal frame that provided a venue for short-term sleep. Worn in the manner of a ballgown, the device's rigid skeleton supported and swaddled the wearer while they adopted the nap position.

landmarks.title: PORTABLE NAP
landmarks.description: The portable nap was a heavily-padded, conical metal frame that provided a venue for short-term sleep. Worn in the manner of a ballgown, the device's rigid skeleton supported and swaddled the wearer while they adopted the nap position.

landmarks.name: LM_PostageStamps

en.title: POSTAGE STICKERS
en.description: As far as our experts can tell, these were collectible stickers for adult humans. They were most commonly used to add excitement to plain envelopes, and to brighten postal workers' days.

en-GB.title: POSTAGE STICKERS
en-GB.description: As far as our experts can tell, these were collectible stickers for adult humans. They were most commonly used to add excitement to plain envelopes, and to brighten postal workers' days.

fr.title: AUTOCOLLANTS D'ENVELOPPE
fr.description: D'après nos experts, il s'agissait là d'autocollants à collectionner pour les humains adultes. Ils étaient le plus souvent utilisés pour ajouter un style aux enveloppes simples et égayer les journées des postiers.

de.title: POSTAUFKLEBER
de.description: Soweit unsere Experten wissen, waren diese Aufkleber zum Sammeln für erwachsene Menschen. Sie wurden meist benutzt, um langweilige Briefumschläge interessanter zu gestalten und den Mitarbeitern der Post den Tag zu verschönern.

es.title: PEGATINAS POSTALES
es.description: Hasta donde nuestros expertos saben, estas eran pegatinas coleccionables para humanos adultos. Se usaban más comúnmente para darles emoción a los sobres sencillos y para alegrarles el día a los carteros.

it.title: ADESIVI POSTALI
it.description: Per quanto ne sanno i nostri esperti, questi erano adesivi collezionati dagli umani adulti. Venivano usati perlopiù per donare un po' di brio alle buste più semplici e per ravvivare le giornate dei dipendenti delle poste.

ja.title: 送料ステッカー
ja.description: 専門家の予想では、これらは大人の人間にとっての収集ステッカーだったのではないかということです。これは無地の封筒に楽しさをプラスするために使用されたのが一般的で、おかげで郵便作業員の気分が上がりました。

ko.title: 우편 스티커
ko.description: 전문가들은 이것이 성인을 위한 수집용 스티커라고 결론을 내렸습니다. 평범한 우편 봉투에 개성을 주기 위해, 그리고 지루한 우체부의 일상에 생동감을 주기 위해 사용했던 것이죠.

zh-Hans.title: 邮票
zh-Hans.description: 据我们的专家所知，这些是具有收藏价值的人类邮票。它们最常用来给平平无奇的信封增添刺激感，让邮差们的日子更加丰富多彩。

zh-Hant.title: 郵票貼紙
zh-Hant.description: 就我們專家的理解，這些是成年人類收藏的貼紙。這些貼紙最常用來為平淡無奇的信封增添一絲驚喜，讓郵務工作者的日子更多彩多姿。

ru.title: ПОЧТОВЫЕ НАКЛЕЙКИ
ru.description: Насколько могут судить наши эксперты, взрослые люди коллекционировали эти почтовые наклейки. Обычно их использовали, чтобы добавить живости простым конвертам и сделать будни почтовых работников ярче.

pt-BR.title: ADESIVOS POSTAIS
pt-BR.description: Até onde sabem nossos especialistas, estes adesivos eram colecionáveis para adultos, normalmente usados para dar personalidade a envelopes brancos comuns e melhorar o dia do carteiro.

nl.title: POSTSTICKERS
nl.description: Onze experts denken dat deze stickers door volwassen mensen werden verzameld. Ze werden meestal gebruikt op saaie enveloppen, zodat ze er postbodes blij mee maakten.

ar.title: ﻣﻠﺼﻘﺎت اﻟﺒﺮﻳﺪ
ar.description: ﻋﻠﯽ ﺣﺪ ﻋﻠﻢ ﺧﺒﺮاﺋﻨﺎ، ﻛﺎﻧﺖ ﻫﺬه اﻟﻤﻠﺼﻘﺎت ﺟﺪﻳﺮة ﺑﺎﻟﺠﻤﻊ ﻣﻦ ﺟﺎﻧﺐ اﻟﺒﺎﻟﻐﻴﻦ ﻣﻦ اﻟﺒﺸﺮ. وﻛﺎن اﻻﺳﺘﺨﺪام اﻟﺸﺎﺋﻊ ﻟﻬﺎ ﻏﺎﻟﺒﺎ ﻫﻮ ﺗﺰﻳﻴﻦ اﻷﻇﺮف ذات اﻟﺘﺼﻤﻴﻢ اﻟﺒﺴﻴﻂ وأﻳﻀﺎ إدﺧﺎل اﻟﺒﻬﺠﺔ ﻋﻠﯽ ﻋﻤﺎل اﻟﺒﺮﻳﺪ ﻓﻲ أﻳﺎم ﻋﻤﻠﻬﻢ.

tk.title: POSTA ÇIKARTMALARI
tk.description: Uzmanlarımızın çıkarımlarına göre bu çıkartmalar yetişkin insanlara yönelik koleksiyon eşyalarıydı. Postacıları neşelendirmek için boş zarfların üstünde süsleme olarak kullanımı yaygındı.

fr-CA.title: AUTOCOLLANTS D'ENVELOPPE
fr-CA.description: D'après nos experts, il s'agissait là d'autocollants à collectionner pour les humains adultes. Ils étaient le plus souvent utilisés pour donner du style aux enveloppes blanches et égayer les journées des facteurs.

en-AU.title: POSTAGE STICKERS
en-AU.description: As far as our experts can tell, these were collectible stickers for adult humans. They were most commonly used to add excitement to plain envelopes, and to brighten postal workers' days.

landmarks.title: POSTAGE STICKERS
landmarks.description: As far as our experts can tell, these were collectible stickers for adult humans. They were most commonly used to add excitement to plain envelopes, and to brighten postal workers' days.

landmarks.name: LM_Postcard

en.title: HOLIDAY LIES
en.description:
Holidaying humans liked to send pictures they didn't take to people they didn't like, claiming that they wished those other humans were present. 
N.B. Please do not put this exhibit in the Monster Post. Replica Holiday Lies are available in the gift shop.

en-GB.title: HOLIDAY LIES
en-GB.description:
Holidaying humans liked to send pictures they didn't take to people they didn't like, claiming that they wished those other humans were present. 
N.B. Please do not put this exhibit in the Monster Post. Replica Holiday Lies are available in the gift shop.

fr.title: FAUSSES VACANCES
fr.description:
Les humains en vacances aimaient envoyer des photos qui ne leur appartenaient pas à des personnes qu'ils méprisaient, affirmant souhaiter que ces autres humains soient présents. 
N.B. Ne pas exposer à la Poste monstre. Des répliques de fausses vacances sont disponibles à la boutique de souvenirs.

de.title: URLAUBSLÜGEN
de.description:
Urlaub machende Menschen schickten gerne Fotos, die sie nicht gemacht hatten, an Menschen, die sie nicht mochten und behaupteten, dass sie wünschten, die anderen Menschen wären ebenfalls anwesend. 
Anmerkung: Dieses Ausstellungsstück bitte nicht in die Monsterpost werfen. Nachgebildete Urlaubslügen sind im Geschenkeshop erhältlich.

es.title: MENTIRAS VACACIONALES
es.description:
A los humanos de vacaciones les gustaba enviar fotos que no habían hecho a gente que no les gustaba, afirmando que les gustaría que esos otros humanos estuvieran presentes. 
N.B. Por favor, no meta este objeto expuesto en el correo de monstruos. Hay una réplica de Mentiras vacacionales disponible en la tienda de regalos.

it.title: BUGIE VACANZIERE
it.description: Gli umani in vacanza amavano spedire foto che non avevano fatto a persone che non gli piacevano, scrivendo che speravano che quegli umani fossero lì con loro. N.B. Si prega di non collocare questo reperto nel Mostro-Express. Una riproduzione di Bugie vacanziere si può trovare nel negozio di souvenir.

ja.title: 休暇の嘘
ja.description:
休暇中の人間たちは、自分たちが撮ったわけではない写真を、あまり好きではない人たちへ送り、その人たちが一緒に休暇に来れたらよかったのにと言うのでした。
注記：この展示品をモンスターポストに入れないでください。休暇の嘘のレプリカはギフトショップで購入可能です。

ko.title: 휴가철 거짓말
ko.description:
휴가철이 되면 인간들은 자신이 찍지 않은 사진을 자신이 좋아하지 않는 사람에게 보내며 같이 왔으면 얼마나 좋았겠냐는 거짓말을 하는 걸 즐겼습니다. 
참고: 몬스터 포스트에 이 전시물을 게시하지 마세요. 휴가철 거짓말 복제품은 기념품 가게에서 구매할 수 있습니다.

zh-Hans.title: 假日谎言
zh-Hans.description:
度假的人类喜欢把不是他们拍的照片发给他们不喜欢的人，并声称如果这些人在那该多好。
注意。请勿将此展品放在怪兽邮政。礼品店有假日谎言复制品。

zh-Hant.title: 假日謊言
zh-Hant.description:
休假的人類喜歡寄送沒有拍過的照片給不喜歡的人，聲稱他們希望收到的人類也能在場陪伴。
注意：請勿將此展品放到怪獸郵局。禮品店有販售假日謊言複製品。

ru.title: ПРАЗДНИЧНАЯ ЛОЖЬ
ru.description:
Празднующие люди любили посылать фотографии, которые сделали не они, людям, которые им не нравились, утверждая, что хотели бы, чтобы те другие были рядом. 
Примечание. Не отправляйте этот экспонат по почте монстров. Репродукция «Праздничной лжи» доступна в сувенирном магазине.

pt-BR.title: MENTIRAS FESTIVAS
pt-BR.description:
Os humanos, em épocas festivas, costumavam mandar fotografias que eles não tiraram para pessoas de quem eles não gostavam, dizendo que estavam com saudades. 
N.B. Não publique este material. Réplicas das mentiras festivas estão disponíveis na loja de presentes.

nl.title: VAKANTIELEUGENS
nl.description:
Vakantie vierende mensen stuurden graag foto's die ze niet hadden genomen naar mensen die ze niet aardig vonden en beweerden dat ze wensten dat die andere mensen erbij waren. 
N.B. Stuur dit tentoongestelde stuk niet met de Monsterpost. Replica's van vakantieleugens zijn verkrijgbaar in de souvenirwinkel.

ar.title: أﻛﺎذﻳﺐ اﻹﺟﺎزة
ar.description: ﻓﻲ اﻹﺟﺎزات ﻳﺤﺐ اﻟﺒﺸﺮ إرﺳﺎل ﺻﻮر ﻟﻢ ﻳﻠﺘﻘﻄﻮﻫﺎ إﻟﯽ أﺷﺨﺎص ﻻ ﻳﺤﺒﻮﻧﻬﻢ، ﻣﺪﻋﻴﻦ أﻧﻬﻢ ﻳﺘﻤﻨﻮن وﺟﻮد ﻫﺆﻻء اﻷﺷﺨﺎص اﻵﺧﺮﻳﻦ ﻣﻌﻬﻢ. ﻣﻠﺤﻮﻇﺔ: ﻳﺮﺟﯽ ﻋﺪم إرﺳﺎل ﻋﻨﺼﺮ اﻟﻌﺮض ﻫﺬا ﻓﻲ ﺑﺮﻳﺪ اﻟﻮﺣﻮش. ﺗﺘﻮﻓﺮ ﻧﺴﺦ ﻃﺒﻖ اﻷﺻﻞ ﻣﻦ أﻛﺎذﻳﺐ اﻹﺟﺎزة ﻓﻲ ﻣﺘﺠﺮ اﻟﻬﺪاﻳﺎ.

tk.title: TATİL YALANLARI
tk.description:
Tatil yapan insanlar, kendilerinin çekmedikleri fotoğrafları hoşlanmadıkları insanlara göndermekten hoşlanır, fotoğrafı gönderdikleri kişilerin de yanlarında olmalarını istediklerini iddia ederlerdi.
Not: Bunu lütfen Canavar Postasında sergiye koymayın. Replika Tatil Yalanları, hediyelik eşya dükkanında mevcut.

fr-CA.title: MENSONGES DE VACANCES
fr-CA.description:
Les humains en vacances aimaient envoyer des photos qu'ils n'avaient pas prises à des personnes qu'ils n'aimaient pas tellement, affirmant souhaiter que ces autres humains soient présents. 
N.B. Ne pas envoyer cette pièce d'exposition à la Poste monstre. Des répliques de mensonges de vacances sont disponibles dans la boutique de souvenirs.

en-AU.title: HOLIDAY LIES
en-AU.description:
Holidaying humans liked to send pictures they didn't take to people they didn't like, claiming that they wished those other humans were present. 
N.B. Please do not put this exhibit in the Monster Post. Replica Holiday Lies are available in the gift shop.

landmarks.title: HOLIDAY LIES
landmarks.description:
Holidaying humans liked to send pictures they didn't take to people they didn't like, claiming that they wished those other humans were present. 
N.B. Please do not put this exhibit in the Monster Post. Replica Holiday Lies are available in the gift shop.

landmarks.name: LM_PressedCar

en.title: A PRESSED CAR
en.description: With space at a premium in some human cities, car collectors who had been forced to give up their garage space began pressing their cars instead. These flattened motors could then be stored in oversized photo albums.

en-GB.title: A PRESSED CAR
en-GB.description: With space at a premium in some human cities, car collectors who had been forced to give up their garage space began pressing their cars instead. These flattened motors could then be stored in oversized photo albums.

fr.title: VOITURE COMPRESSÉE
fr.description: L'espace étant limité dans certaines agglomérations humaines, les collectionneurs de voitures contraints de renoncer à leur garage ont commencé à compresser leurs véhicules pour pallier ce problème. Les moteurs aplatis pouvaient alors être stockés dans des albums photo géants.

de.title: EIN GEPRESSTES AUTO
de.description: Als in einigen Menschenstädten der Platz knapp wurde, sahen sich Autosammler gezwungen, ihren Garagenplatz aufzugeben und ihre Autos stattdessen zu pressen. Diese flachgedrückten Motoren konnten dann in übergroße Fotoalben eingeklebt werden.

es.title: COCHE APLASTADO
es.description: Puesto que el espacio escaseaba en algunas ciudades humanas, los coleccionistas de coches que se habían visto obligados a renunciar a su plaza de garaje empezaron a aplastar sus coches. Estos vehículos aplanados podían así almacenarse en un álbum de fotos de gran tamaño.

it.title: MACCHINA PRESSATA
it.description: A causa della mancanza di spazio in alcune città umane, i collezionisti d'auto che furono costretti a rinunciare allo spazio nei propri garage cominciarono a pressare le loro auto. Questi motori schiacciati possono essere raccolti in album fotografici giganti.

ja.title: 押し潰された車
ja.description: 一部の人間の都市ではスペースが限られているため、ガレージに広いスペースを取ることができない車のコレクターは、代わりに車を押し潰し始めました。このぺちゃんこになったモーターは、代わりに特大の写真アルバムに保管することができます。

ko.title: 눌린 차
ko.description: 공간이 귀중한 인간 도시에서는 차고가 부족하여 차 수집가들이 어쩔 수 없이 차를 눌러 보관하는 경우가 있었습니다. 그리고 납작하게 만든 자동차는 대형 사진 앨범에 보관했습니다.

zh-Hans.title: 挤压汽车
zh-Hans.description: 在一些人类城市，空间非常宝贵，那些被迫放弃车库空间的汽车收藏家开始挤压他们的汽车。这样，这些压扁的汽车就可以存放在超大号的相册中。

zh-Hant.title: 壓製車
zh-Hant.description: 有些人類城市的空間有限，於是被迫放棄車庫空間的汽車收藏家，開始壓製自己的汽車。因此，這些壓扁的汽車就可以放在特大號相簿裡收藏。

ru.title: СПРЕССОВАННЫЙ АВТОМОБИЛЬ
ru.description: Пространство в человеческих городах становилось все более востребованным, и коллекционеры автомобилей, которым пришлось отказаться от гаражей, вместо этого начали прессовать свои автомобили. Теперь этот сплющенный транспорт можно было хранить в огромном фотоальбоме.

pt-BR.title: UM CARRO ACHATADO
pt-BR.description: Enquanto o espaço físico se tornava cada vez mais exclusivo em algumas cidades humanas, colecionadores de carro que foram forçados a liberar espaço na garagem passaram a espremer seus veículos. Estes carros achatados podiam ser estacionados em enormes álbuns de fotografia.

nl.title: EEN SAMENGEDRUKTE AUTO
nl.description: Omdat er steeds minder plaats was in de mensensteden, waren autoverzamelaars soms verplicht om hun garageruimte te verkopen en hun auto's samen te drukken. Deze platte voertuigen konden dan worden bewaard in grote fotoboeken.

ar.title: ﺳﻴﺎرة ﻣﻀﻐﻮﻃﺔ
ar.description: ﻣﻊ ارﺗﻔﺎع ﺛﻤﻦ اﻟﻤﺴﺎﺣﺎت ﻓﻲ ﺑﻌﺾ اﻟﻤﺪن اﻟﺒﺸﺮﻳﺔ، ﺷﺮع ﻣﺤﺒﻮ ﺟﻤﻊ اﻟﺴﻴﺎرات، اﻟﺬﻳﻦ أﺟﺒﺮوا ﻋﻠﯽ ﺗﺮك ﻣﺮآﺑﻬﻢ، ﻓﻲ ﺿﻐﻂ ﺳﻴﺎراﺗﻬﻢ. وﻣﻦ ﺛﻢ ﻳﻤﻜﻦ ﺗﺨﺰﻳﻦ اﻟﻤﺤﺮﻛﺎت اﻟﻤﺴﻄﺤﺔ ﻓﻲ أﻟﺒﻮﻣﺎت ﺻﻮر ﻛﺒﻴﺮة اﻟﺤﺠﻢ ﺑﺪﻻ ﻣﻦ اﻟﻤﺮآب.

tk.title: EZİLMİŞ ARABA
tk.description: Bazı insan şehirlerinde geniş alan bir lüks hâline gelince otomobil koleksiyoncuları garajlarındaki alandan vazgeçmek zorunda kaldı ve otomobillerini ezmeye başladı. Dümdüz hâle getirilen bu otomobilleri büyük fotoğraf albümlerinde saklayabiliyorlardı.

fr-CA.title: VOITURE COMPRESSÉE
fr-CA.description: L'espace se faisant rare dans certaines villes humaines, les collectionneurs de voitures contraints de renoncer à leur garage ont commencé à compresser leurs véhicules pour pouvoir les conserver. Ces véhicules aplatis pouvaient alors être stockés dans des albums photo géants.

en-AU.title: A PRESSED CAR
en-AU.description: With space at a premium in some human cities, car collectors who had been forced to give up their garage space began pressing their cars instead. These flattened motors could then be stored in oversized photo albums.

landmarks.title: A PRESSED CAR
landmarks.description: With space at a premium in some human cities, car collectors who had been forced to give up their garage space began pressing their cars instead. These flattened motors could then be stored in oversized photo albums.

landmarks.name: LM_Pricklepig

en.title: "HEDGEHOG" EFFIGY
en.description: Constructed using mild cheese cubes and pineapple parts, these pricklepig figurines were a common offering at parties for young Englandlanders. The precise symbolism of the pricklepig is unclear, but some parents liked to add a glacé cherry nose.

en-GB.title: "HEDGEHOG" EFFIGY
en-GB.description: Constructed using mild cheese cubes and pineapple parts, these pricklepig figurines were a common offering at parties for young Englandlanders. The precise symbolism of the pricklepig is unclear, but some parents liked to add a glacé cherry nose.

fr.title: FIGURINE DE « HÉRISSON »
fr.description: Construites à partir de cubes de fromage doux et de pièces d'ananas, ces figurines de porc-épines étaient courantes lors des fêtes pour les jeunes Angleterriens. Le symbolisme précis du porc-épines n'est pas clair, mais certains parents aimaient y ajouter un nez en cerise glacée.

de.title: „IGEL“-NACHBILDUNG
de.description: Diese Figuren von stacheligen Schweinen mit Würfeln aus mildem Käse und Ananas waren eine beliebte Gabe bei Partys für junge Englandländer. Der genaue Symbolismus des stacheligen Tiers ist unklar, aber manche Eltern fügten ihm zusätzlich eine Nase aus einer Cocktailkirsche hinzu.

es.title: EFIGIE DE "ERIZO"
es.description: Construidas usando cubos de queso suave y trozos de piña, estas figuritas recubiertas de espinas eran un regalo común en las fiestas de jóvenes de Inglaterralandia. El simbolismo preciso de la espina no está claro, pero a algunos padres les gustaba añadir una nariz de cereza glaseada.

it.title: EFFIGIE "RICCIO"
it.description: Costruita usando cubetti di formaggio e pezzi di ananas, era comune farsela offrire alle feste dei giovani inglesesi. L'esatto simbolismo di questa effigie non è chiaro, ma alcuni genitori amavano aggiungere un naso fatto con una ciliegia candita.

ja.title: 「ハリネズミ」の彫像
ja.description: 柔らかいチーズのキューブとパイナップルを使って作られたこのハリネズミの人形は、若いイングランドランド人向けパーティーでは一般的とされていました。正確にハリネズミを象徴しているかどうか別として、鼻部分に砂糖漬けチェリーを付けたがる親がいたことは確認されています。

ko.title: 고슴도치' 모형
ko.description: 부드러운 치즈 큐브와 파인애플로 만든 이 고슴도치 인형은 어린 영국나라 인간들의 파티에서 자주 모습을 보였습니다. 무엇을 상징하는지는 불분명한데, 어떤 부모들은 여기에 윤기 나는 체리 코를 얹기도 했습니다.

zh-Hans.title: “刺猬”雕像
zh-Hans.description: 这些刺猬雕像采用清淡的奶酪块和菠萝块制作而成，是年轻英格兰大陆人派对中常见的供应品。刺猬的确切象征意义尚不清楚，但有些家长喜欢在其中添加糖渍樱桃。

zh-Hant.title: 「刺蝟」雕像
zh-Hant.description: 這些刺蝟雕像使用清淡的塊狀乳酪和鳳梨製作而成，是年輕英格蘭大陸人聚會中常見的獻禮。刺蝟的明確象徵意義不明，但有些人類父母喜歡加上一顆糖漬櫻桃。

ru.title: ЧУЧЕЛО «ЁЖИКА»
ru.description: Эти фигурки колючей свиньи, изготовленные из кубиков неострого сыра и кусочков ананаса, были обычным делом на вечеринках юных англоземцев. Точное символическое значение колючей свиньи остается неясным, но некоторые родители любили добавлять нос из вишни в сахаре.

pt-BR.title: EFÍGIE DE OURIÇO
pt-BR.description: Construída com cubos de queijo macios e pedaços de abacaxi, estas estatuetas de porcos-espinhos eram uma oferenda comum em festas infantis para jovens habitantes da Terra da Inglaterra. O simbolismo por trás do porco-espinho é desconhecido, mas alguns genitores adicionavam um nariz feito de cereja em conserva.

nl.title: EGELFIGUURTJE
nl.description: Deze figuurtjes met stukjes kaas en ananas werden vaak gegeten op feestjes voor jonge Engelandlanders. De precieze betekenis van het stekelige beest is onbekend, maar sommige ouders voegden graag een geglazuurde kersenneus aan de creatie toe.

ar.title: ﺗﻤﺜﺎل "اﻟﻘﻨﻔﺬ"
ar.description: ﻳﺘﻢ ﺑﻨﺎء ﻫﺬه اﻟﺘﻤﺎﺛﻴﻞ ﺑﻮﺿﻊ ﻣﻜﻌﺒﺎت اﻟﺠﺒﻦ اﻟﻄﺮي وﻗﻄﻊ اﻷﻧﺎﻧﺎس ﻓﻲ أﺷﻜﺎل ﺻﻐﻴﺮة وﺟﻤﻌﻬﺎ ﻋﻠﯽ ﺷﻜﻞ ﺧﻨﺰﻳﺮ ﻟﻪ أﺷﻮاك ﻣﺎ ﻳﻌﻄﻴﻪ ﺷﻜﻞ اﻟﻘﻨﻔﺬ وﻏﺎﻟﺒﺎ ﻣﺎ ﻛﺎﻧﺖ ﺗﻘﺪم إﻟﯽ اﻹﻧﺠﻠﻴﺰ ﺻﻐﺎر اﻟﺴﻦ ﻓﻲ اﻟﺤﻔﻼت. ﻟﻢ ﻳﺘﻀﺢ ﻟﻨﺎ ﻣﺎ ﻳﺮﻣﺰ إﻟﻴﻪ ﻫﺬا اﻟﺸﻜﻞ ﺗﺤﺪﻳﺪا، ﻟﻜﻦ ﺑﻌﺾ أوﻟﻴﺎء اﻷﻣﻮر أﺣﺒﻮا إﺿﺎﻓﺔ أﻧﻒ أﺣﻤﺮ ﻣﻦ اﻟﺠﻠﻴﺪ إﻟﻴﻪ.

tk.title: "KİRPİ" BÜSTÜ
tk.description: Genç İngilterelilerin verdiği partilerde, orta aromalı peynir küpleri ve dilimlenmiş ananaslarla inşa edilen bu kirpi heykelciklerine sıkça rastlanırdı. Kirpinin neyi simgelediği henüz belirlenememiş olsa da bazı ebeveynler kiraz şekerlemesinden burun da ekliyordu.

fr-CA.title: FIGURINE DE « HÉRISSON »
fr-CA.description: Construites à partir de cubes de fromage doux et de pièces d'ananas, ces figurines de porc-à-épines étaient courantes lors des fêtes pour les jeunes Angleterriens. Le symbolisme précis du porc-à-épines n'est pas clair, mais certains parents aimaient y ajouter un nez de cerise glacée.

en-AU.title: "HEDGEHOG" EFFIGY
en-AU.description: Constructed using mild cheese cubes and pineapple parts, these pricklepig figurines were a common offering at parties for young Englandlanders. The precise symbolism of the pricklepig is unclear, but some parents liked to add a glacé cherry nose.

landmarks.title: "HEDGEHOG" EFFIGY
landmarks.description: Constructed using mild cheese cubes and pineapple parts, these pricklepig figurines were a common offering at parties for young Englandlanders. The precise symbolism of the pricklepig is unclear, but some parents liked to add a glacé cherry nose.

landmarks.name: LM_ProtectedTree

en.title: THIS TREE
en.description: This tree is not technically part of the museum experience, but there's a cool bird nesting in it, so you aren't allowed to cut it down. Not even a little bit. Not even with the "undo" or "reset" options. Leave the cool bird alone, alright?

en-GB.title: THIS TREE
en-GB.description: This tree is not technically part of the museum experience, but there's a cool bird nesting in it, so you aren't allowed to cut it down. Not even a little bit. Not even with the "undo" or "reset" options. Leave the cool bird alone, alright?

fr.title: CET ARBRE
fr.description: Cet arbre ne fait techniquement pas partie de l'expérience du musée, mais comme un oiseau y a fait son nid, il est interdit de le couper. Pas même d’en couper une branche. Pas même avec les options « annuler » ou « réinitialiser ». Laissez cet oiseau tranquille, d'accord ?

de.title: DIESER BAUM
de.description: Dieser Baum ist eigentlich kein Teil des Museumserlebnisses, aber es nistet ein cooler Vogel darin, also darf er nicht gefällt werden. Nicht mal ein Bisschen. Nicht mal mit den Optionen „Rückgängig“ oder „Zurücksetzen“. Lass den coolen Vogel einfach in Ruhe, okay?

es.title: ESTE ÁRBOL
es.description: Este árbol no forma parte técnicamente de la experiencia del museo, pero hay un pájaro muy chulo anidando en él, así que no se permite talarlo. Ni siquiera un poquito. Ni con las opciones de "deshacer" o "reiniciar". Deja tranquilo al pájaro chulo, ¿vale?

it.title: QUESTO ALBERO
it.description: Questo albero, tecnicamente, non fa parte dell'esperienza museale, ma c'è un bell'uccello che ci ha fatto il nido, quindi non si può abbattere. Nemmeno un pezzetto. Nemmeno con le opzioni "annulla" o "ripristina". Lasciate in pace l'uccello, okay?

ja.title: この木
ja.description: この木は厳密に言うとこの博物館体験の一部ではないのですが、とてもクールな鳥が住み着いているので、この木を切り倒すことは許可されていません。ほんのちょっと切ることだって禁止されています。「元に戻す」や「リセット」も選択してはいけません。このクールな鳥は放っておいてください、いいですね？

ko.title: 이 나무
ko.description: 이 나무는 박물관의 일부는 아닙니다만, 그래도 멋진 새가 살고 있기 때문에 자르면 안 됩니다. 절대 안 됩니다. '되돌리기'나 '초기화'를 써도 안 됩니다. 그냥 멋진 새가 즐겁게 지낼 수 있게 내버려 두세요.

zh-Hans.title: 这棵树
zh-Hans.description: 从技术上讲，这棵树并不是博物馆体验的一部分，但有一只很酷的鸟在里面筑巢，所以没办法把它砍掉。完全没办法。即使用“撤销”或“重置”选项也不行。别管这只酷鸟，好吗？

zh-Hant.title: 這棵樹
zh-Hant.description: 嚴格來說，這棵樹不算是博物館體驗的一部分，但是有隻冷靜的鳥在樹上築巢，所以你不能將樹砍倒，一點點也不行，也不能使用「取消」或「重設」選項。別打擾這隻冷靜的鳥，好嗎？

ru.title: ЭТО ДЕРЕВО
ru.description: Технически это дерево не является частью музейной экспозиции, но здесь гнездится такая первоклассная птица, что вам запрещено его срубать. Даже немножко. Даже с функциями «отменить действие» и «сбросить». Оставьте первоклассную птицу в покое, хорошо?

pt-BR.title: ESTA ÁRVORE
pt-BR.description: Esta árvore não faz parte da exposição do museu, mas tem um ninho de passarinho legal nela, por isso é proibido cortá-la. Nem de leve. Nem com as opções de “desfazer” ou “reiniciar”. Deixe o passarinho maneiro em paz, beleza?

nl.title: DEZE BOOM
nl.description: Deze boom maakt technisch gezien geen deel uit van de museumervaring, maar er nestelt een coole vogel in, dus je mag hem niet omhakken. Zelfs niet een klein beetje. Zelfs niet met de "herstel"- of "reset"-optie. Laat de coole vogel met rust, oké?

ar.title: ﻫﺬه اﻟﺸﺠﺮة
ar.description: ﻳﻔﺘﺮض أن ﻫﺬه اﻟﺸﺠﺮة ﻻ ﺗﻌﺪ ﺟﺰءا ﻣﻦ ﺗﺠﺮﺑﺔ اﻟﻤﺘﺤﻒ ﻣﻦ اﻟﻨﺎﺣﻴﺔ اﻟﻔﻨﻴﺔ، ﻟﻜﻦ ﺛﻤﺔ ﻃﺎﺋﺮ ﻇﺮﻳﻒ ﻳﻌﻴﺶ ﻋﻠﻴﻬﺎ، ﻟﺬا ﻏﻴﺮ ﻣﺴﻤﻮح ﺑﻘﻄﻌﻬﺎ. وﻻ ﺣﺘﯽ ﻗﺼﻬﺎ ﻗﻠﻴﻼ. ﺣﺘﯽ ﺑﺎﺳﺘﺨﺪام ﺧﻴﺎرات "اﻟﺘﺮاﺟﻊ" أو "إﻋﺎدة اﻟﻀﺒﻂ". ﻻ ﺗﺰﻋﺞ اﻟﻄﺎﺋﺮ اﻟﻈﺮﻳﻒ، ﺣﺴﻨﺎ؟

tk.title: BU AĞAÇ
tk.description: Bu ağaç teknik olarak müze deneyiminin bir parçası değil fakat bu ağaçta yuvalayan havalı bir kuş olduğu için ağacı kesmek yasak. Azıcık bile kesemezsin. "Geri al" veya "sıfırla" seçenekleriyle bile. Havalı kuşun yakasından düş, oldu mu?

fr-CA.title: CET ARBRE
fr-CA.description: Cet arbre ne fait techniquement pas partie de l'expérience du musée, mais comme un oiseau y a fait son nid, il est interdit de le couper. Pas même une branche. Pas même avec les options « annuler » ou « réinitialiser ». Laissez cet oiseau tranquille, d'accord?

en-AU.title: THIS TREE
en-AU.description: This tree is not technically part of the museum experience, but there's a cool bird nesting in it, so you aren't allowed to cut it down. Not even a little bit. Not even with the "undo" or "reset" options. Leave the cool bird alone, alright?

landmarks.title: THIS TREE
landmarks.description: This tree is not technically part of the museum experience, but there's a cool bird nesting in it, so you aren't allowed to cut it down. Not even a little bit. Not even with the "undo" or "reset" options. Leave the cool bird alone, alright?

landmarks.name: LM_PuzzlePieces

en.title: A CAT BED
en.description: Cat beds were originally designed by humans to offer the maximum amount of comfort to cats. That is not how cats work. Eventually humans realized that cats prefer to pick an area of maximum discomfort and pour themselves onto it. (This bed contains 1,000 pieces of a picture of a field.)

en-GB.title: A CAT BED
en-GB.description: Cat beds were originally designed by humans to offer the maximum amount of comfort to cats. That is not how cats work. Eventually humans realised that cats prefer to pick an area of maximum discomfort and pour themselves onto it. (This bed contains 1,000 pieces of a picture of a field.)

fr.title: LIT POUR CHAT
fr.description: Les lits pour chats ont été conçus à l'origine par les humains pour offrir le maximum de confort aux félins. Mais les chats ne fonctionnent pas ainsi. Finalement, les humains ont réalisé que leurs animaux préféraient se prélasser dans les zones à l'inconfort maximal. (Ce lit contient 1 000 pièces d'une image de champ.)

de.title: EIN KATZENBETT
de.description: Katzenbetten wurden ursprünglich von Menschen geschaffen, um Katzen ein Maximum an Bequemlichkeit zu bieten. Allerdings funktionieren Katzen so nicht. Irgendwann wurde den Menschen klar, dass Katzen lieber einen Bereich maximaler Unbequemlichkeit aussuchen und sich dann hineinstürzen. (Dieses Bett enthält 1.000 Teile eines Bildes von einem Feld.)

es.title: UNA CAMA PARA GATOS
es.description: Las camas para gatos fueron originalmente diseñadas por los humanos para ofrecer el máximo confort a los gatos. Así no es como funcionan los gatos. Al final, los humanos se dieron cuenta de que los gatos preferían elegir una zona de máxima incomodidad y echarse ahí. (Esta cama contiene 1000 piezas de un dibujo de un campo).

it.title: LETTO DEL GATTO
it.description: I letti dei gatti, in origine, furono progettati dagli umani per offrire il massimo del comfort ai gatti. Ma non è così che funziona con questi felini. Alla fine, gli umani hanno capito che i gatti preferiscono scegliere un'area di massima scomodità e buttarcisi sopra. (Questo esempio contiene 1.000 pezzi di una foto di un campo.)

ja.title: 猫のベッド
ja.description: 猫のベッドは元々人間により、猫に最大限の快適さを提供するという目的で設計されたものの、猫が本当に気に入るかどうかはまた別問題なのです最終的には、猫は最も居心地の悪い場所を選び、そこにわざわざ入り浸るということに人間たちが気付いたのです(このベッドには、草原の写真が1,000枚入っています)。

ko.title: 고양이 침대
ko.description: 고양이 침대는 인간들이 고양이에게 최대한 안락한 환경을 제공하기 위해 설계되었습니다. 하지만 고양이는 그 의도에 순응하지 않았습니다. 결국 인간들은 고양이란 가장 불편한 장소를 굳이 찾아서 거기로 꾸역꾸역 들어가는 존재라는 걸 깨달았습니다. (이 침대에는 현장에서 촬영한 천 장의 사진이 포함되어 있습니다.)

zh-Hans.title: 猫床
zh-Hans.description: 最初，人类设计猫床是为了给猫提供最大限度的舒适度。但猫可不这么想。最终，人类意识到猫喜欢选择最不舒服的地方，然后摊在上面。（这张床有一张风景照的 1000 张碎片。）

zh-Hant.title: 貓床
zh-Hant.description: 人類原先設計貓床的用意，是要提供貓最大的舒適度，但是對貓來說行不通。人類後來才意識到，貓喜歡選擇極度不舒適的地方並躺在上面。(這張床有一張原野照片的一千塊碎片。)

ru.title: КОШАЧЬЯ ЛЕЖАНКА
ru.description: Первоначально люди создавали кошачьи лежанки, чтобы обеспечить кошкам максимальный комфорт. С кошками это не сработало. В конце концов люди осознали, что кошки выбирают максимально неудобную зону и укладываются туда. (Эта лежанка содержит 1000 кусочков изображения поля.)

pt-BR.title: CAMA DE GATO
pt-BR.description: Camas de gato eram projetadas por humanos para oferecer o máximo de conforto para os animais, mas não é assim que gatos funcionam. Com o tempo, os humanos perceberam que os felinos preferiam escolher uma área completamente desconfortável para na qual se acomodarem. (Esta cama contém 1.000 partes de uma imagem campestre.)

nl.title: EEN KATTENBED
nl.description: Kattenbedden werden oorspronkelijk door mensen ontworpen om hun katten het grootste comfort te bieden. Dat is echter niet hoe katten werken. Mensen kwamen later te weten dat katten een erg oncomfortabele oppervlak verkiezen om te zitten of te liggen. (Dit bed bevat 1000 stukjes van een afbeelding van een veld.)

ar.title: ﺳﺮﻳﺮ ﻗﻄﻂ
ar.description:
ﺻﻤﻢ اﻟﺒﺸﺮ أﺳﺮة اﻟﻘﻄﻂ ﻟﺘﻮﻓﻴﺮ أﻛﺒﺮ ﻗﺪر ﻣﻦ اﻟﺮاﺣﺔ ﻟﻬﺎ. وﻟﻜﻦ ذﻟﻚ ﻋﻜﺲ ﻃﺒﻴﻌﺔ اﻟﻘﻄﻂ. وﻓﻲ اﻟﻨﻬﺎﻳﺔ أدرك اﻟﺒﺸﺮ أن اﻟﻘﻄﻂ ﺗﻔﻀﻞ اﺧﺘﻴﺎر ﻣﻨﻄﻘﺔ ﻏﻴﺮ ﻣﺮﻳﺤﺔ ﻋﻠﯽ اﻹﻃﻼق وﺗﺘﻤﻮﺿﻊ ﻓﻴﻬﺎ. 
)ﺗﻀﻢ ﻫﺬه اﻟﻤﻨﻄﻘﺔ 0001 ﻗﻄﻌﺔ ﻣﻔﻜﻜﺔ ﻟﺼﻮرة أﺣﺪ اﻟﺤﻘﻮل( .

tk.title: KEDİ YATAĞI
tk.description: Kedi yatağı ilk olarak insanlar tarafından kedilere olabildiğince fazla konfor sunmak amacıyla tasarlanmıştı. Ancak bu durum kedilerin tabiatına biraz terstir. İnsanlar kedilerin en rahatsız olan yeri seçip içine girmeyi tercih ettiğini zamanla fark etti. (Bu yatağın içinde 1.000 parçaya bölünmüş bir tarla resmi var.)

fr-CA.title: LIT POUR CHAT
fr-CA.description: Les lits pour chats ont été conçus à l'origine par des humains pour offrir le maximum de confort aux félins. Mais les chats ne fonctionnent pas comme ça. Éventuellement, les humains ont réalisé que leurs animaux préféraient s'affaler dans les zones à l'inconfort maximal. (Ce lit contient 1 000 pièces d'une image d'un champ.)

en-AU.title: A CAT BED
en-AU.description: Cat beds were originally designed by humans to offer the maximum amount of comfort to cats. That is not how cats work. Eventually humans realised that cats prefer to pick an area of maximum discomfort and pour themselves onto it. (This bed contains 1,000 pieces of a picture of a field.)

landmarks.title: A CAT BED
landmarks.description: Cat beds were originally designed by humans to offer the maximum amount of comfort to cats. That is not how cats work. Eventually humans realized that cats prefer to pick an area of maximum discomfort and pour themselves onto it. (This bed contains 1,000 pieces of a picture of a field.)

landmarks.name: LM_QueueSign

en.title: QUEUE HERE SIGN
en.description: Humans from Englandland loved to queue! We don't know exactly why, but expert monsters speculate that standing outside for long periods of time is why these humans developed such a close interest in what the weather was doing.

en-GB.title: QUEUE HERE SIGN
en-GB.description: Humans from Englandland loved to queue! We don't know exactly why, but expert monsters speculate that standing outside for long periods of time is why these humans developed such a close interest in what the weather was doing.

fr.title: PANCARTE DE QUEUE
fr.description: Les Angleterriens adoraient faire la queue ! Nous ne savons pas exactement pourquoi, mais des experts monstres pensent que rester dehors pendant de longues périodes est ce qui a amené ces humains à développer un intérêt si prononcé pour la météo.

de.title: „HIER ANSTELLEN“-SCHILD
de.description: Die Menschen aus Englandland liebten es, Schlange zu stehen! Wir wissen nicht genau, warum, aber Monsterexperten vermuten, dass das andauernde Stehen im Freien der Grund dafür war, warum diese Menschen ein solch großes Interesse für das Wetter entwickelten.

es.title: SEÑAL DE HACER COLA
es.description: ¡A los humanos de Inglaterralandia les encantaba hacer cola! No sabemos exactamente por qué, pero los expertos monstruos especulan con que estar de pie en el exterior durante largos períodos de tiempo fuera el motivo por el cual estos humanos desarrollaron un interés tan profundo en hablar sobre el tiempo que hacía.

it.title: CARTELLO "METTERSI IN FILA QUI"
it.description: Gli umani in Inghilterraterra amavano fare la coda! Non sappiamo esattamente perché, ma gli esperti mostri pensano che stare in piedi all'aperto per lunghi periodi di tempo sia il motivo per cui gli umani hanno sviluppato tanto interesse nel meteo.

ja.title: こちらにお並びくださいの看板
ja.description: イングランドランドの人間たちは一列に並ぶのが大好きでした！その理由は全く分かりませんが、モンスター専門家の予想では、これだけ長い時間外で立っていたことが、天気に関する異常な関心を生んだとされています。

ko.title: 줄 서는 곳 간판
ko.description: 영국나라 인간들은 줄 서는 걸 좋아했습니다! 왜인지 모르겠지만, 전문 몬스터들은 인간들이 날씨에 그렇게 깊은 관심을 가지게 된 이유는 아마 장시간 밖에 서있어야 했기 때문이 아닌가 생각하고 있습니다.

zh-Hans.title: 排队指示牌
zh-Hans.description: 英格兰大陆的人类喜欢排队！我们也不知道具体原因，但专家怪兽们推测，长时间在外面站着是这些人类对天气变化变得如此感兴趣的原因。

zh-Hant.title: 排隊標示牌
zh-Hant.description: 英格蘭大陸的人類很喜歡排隊！我們不曉得具體原因，但是怪獸專家推測，長時間站在外頭的關係，使這些人類培養出熱愛討論天氣的興趣。

ru.title: ЗНАК «ОЧЕРЕДЬ»
ru.description: Англоземские люди любили стоять в очередях! Мы не знаем точную причину, но эксперты монстров предполагают, что нахождение на улице в течение долгого периода времени тесно связано с ярой заинтересованностью в текущей погоде.

pt-BR.title: PLACA DE FILA
pt-BR.description: Os humanos da Terra da Inglaterra adoravam fazer fila! Ninguém sabe ao certo o motivo, mas especialistas monstros especulam que os longos períodos que eles passavam em ambientes externos fez com que os humanos desenvolvessem um grande interesse em testemunhar o clima.

nl.title: WACHTRIJBORD
nl.description: Mensen in Engelandland stonden graag in de rij! We weten niet precies waarom, maar deskundige monsters speculeren dat langdurig buiten staan de reden is dat deze mensen zo'n grote belangstelling ontwikkelden voor wat het weer deed.

ar.title: ﻻﻓﺘﺔ اﻻﺻﻄﻔﺎف ﻫﻨﺎ
ar.description: ﻛﺎن اﻟﺒﺸﺮ ﻓﻲ إﻧﺠﻠﺘﺮا ﻳﺤﺒﻮن ﺻﻔﻮف اﻻﻧﺘﻈﺎر! ﻻ ﻧﻌﺮف ﺳﺒﺒﺎ ﻣﺤﺪدا ﻟﻬﺬا، ﻟﻜﻦ ﻳﺘﻮﻗﻊ ﺧﺒﺮاء اﻟﻮﺣﻮش أن اﻟﻮﻗﻮف ﻓﻲ اﻟﺨﺎرج ﻟﻔﺘﺮات ﻃﻮﻳﻠﺔ ﻫﻮ اﻟﺴﺒﺐ وراء اﻫﺘﻤﺎم اﻟﺒﺸﺮ ﺑﺤﺎﻟﺔ اﻟﻄﻘﺲ.

tk.title: BURADA KUYRUK OLUŞTURUN TABELASI
tk.description: İngiltere'nin insanları kuyruğa girmeye bayılırdı! Nedenini tam olarak bilmiyoruz ama uzman canavarlar, bu insanların havanın nasıl olduğuyla bu kadar ilgilenmesinin nedeninin dışarıda bu kadar uzun süre beklemek olduğunu düşünüyor.

fr-CA.title: PANCARTE DE FILE
fr-CA.description: Les humains d'Angleterre adoraient faire la file! Nous ne savons pas exactement pourquoi, mais des experts monstres pensent que rester dehors pendant de si longues périodes est la raison pour laquelle ces humains ont développé un intérêt si grand pour la météo.

en-AU.title: QUEUE HERE SIGN
en-AU.description: Humans from Englandland loved to queue! We don't know exactly why, but expert monsters speculate that standing outside for long periods of time is why these humans developed such a close interest in what the weather was doing.

landmarks.title: QUEUE HERE SIGN
landmarks.description: Humans from Englandland loved to queue! We don't know exactly why, but expert monsters speculate that standing outside for long periods of time is why these humans developed such a close interest in what the weather was doing.

landmarks.name: LM_RainbowBrittle

en.title: RAINBOW BRITTLE
en.description: Humans used prisms to separate white light into rainbows for many years. Physically capturing rainbows came later, when optical scientists discovered "in-prisming" technology. Solid rainbows have a minty flavor and were often sold as sweets.

en-GB.title: RAINBOW BRITTLE
en-GB.description: Humans used prisms to separate white light into rainbows for many years. Physically capturing rainbows came later, when optical scientists discovered "in-prisming" technology. Solid rainbows have a minty flavour and were often sold as sweets.

fr.title: NOUGATINE IRISÉE
fr.description: Les humains utilisaient des prismes pour transformer la lumière blanche en arcs-en-ciel pendant de nombreuses années. La capture physique des arcs-en-ciel est arrivée plus tard, lorsque les scientifiques ont découvert la technologie « emprismante ». Les arcs-en-ciel solides ont une saveur mentholée et étaient souvent vendus comme des bonbons.

de.title: REGENBOGENKROKANT
de.description: Menschen benutzten schon jahrelang Prismen, um weißes Licht in Regenbögen aufzuspalten. Das tatsächliche Einfangen von Regenbögen kam später, als optische Physiker die Technologie der „Inprismierung“ entdeckten. Feste Regenbögen besitzen einen Minzgeschmack und wurden oft als Süßwaren verkauft.

es.title: GUIRLACHE ARCOÍRIS
es.description: Los humanos usaron prismas para separar la luz blanca y convertirla en arcoíris durante muchos años. Lo de capturar físicamente arcoíris llegó más tarde, cuando los científicos ópticos descubrieron la tecnología "prismoniana". Los arcoíris sólidos tienen un sabor mentolado y solían venderse como caramelos.

it.title: DOLCE ARCOBALENO
it.description: Gli umani usarono i prismi di luce per scomporre la luce bianca in arcobaleno per molti anni. In seguito divenne possibile catturare gli arcobaleni grazie alla scoperta della tecnologia "in-prisma" da parte degli scienziati ottici. Gli arcobaleni hanno un sapore di menta ed erano spesso venduti come dolcetti.

ja.title: 虹色のデコレーション菓子
ja.description: 人間たちは長い間、プリズムを使って白い光を虹へと分けていました。その後、光学科学者が「プリズム収容」技術を発見した際、虹を物理的に捕獲することに成功したのです。固い虹はミント味で、しばしばお菓子として販売されていました。

ko.title: 부서진 무지개
ko.description: 인간들은 오랜 세월 프리즘으로 백광을 여러 무지개 색으로 분리해왔습니다. 그리고 훗날 광학 과학자들이 '빛 가두기' 기술을 개발한 뒤 무지개를 물리적 형체로 만드는 데에도 성공했습니다. 고체 무지개는 민트 맛이 나며, 간식으로 많이 팔렸습니다.

zh-Hans.title: 彩虹糖果
zh-Hans.description: 多年来，人类一直使用棱镜将白光分解成彩虹。后来光学科学家发现了“棱镜现实化”技术，从而能够真正地获取彩虹。实体彩虹有薄荷味，经常作为糖果出售。

zh-Hant.title: 彩虹脆糖
zh-Hant.description: 人類使用稜鏡將白光分成彩虹的做法，行之有年。當光學科學家發現了「關光」技術後，才以物理方式捕捉彩虹。固體彩虹有薄荷味，通常作為糖果販賣。

ru.title: ЛЕДЕНЦЫ ИЗ РАДУГИ
ru.description: В течение многих лет люди использовали призмы для разделения белого света на радугу. Физический захват радуги появился позже, когда ученые-оптики открыли технологию «призмования». Твердые радуги мятные на вкус и часто продаются как сладости.

pt-BR.title: AGREGADO DE ARCO-ÍRIS
pt-BR.description: Os humanos eram capazes de gerar um arco-íris com o uso de um prisma para separar a luz branca. A captura de arco-íris surgiu muito mais tarde, quando cientistas ópticos descobriram a tecnologia intraprisma. Arco-íris sólidos têm gosto refrescante e eram vendidos como guloseimas.

nl.title: REGENBOOGSNOEPJES
nl.description: Mensen gebruikten prisma's om wit licht te breken en af te buigen naar een regenboog. Het vangen van regenbogen kon later pas, toen wetenschappers 'inprisma's' ontdekten. Vaste regenbogen hadden een muntsmaak en werden vaak als snoep verkocht.

ar.title: ﻗﻮس ﻗﺰح اﻟﻬﺶ
ar.description: اﺳﺘﺨﺪم اﻟﺒﺸﺮ اﻟﻤﻨﺸﻮرات ﻟﺘﺤﻠﻴﻞ اﻟﻀﻮء اﻷﺑﻴﺾ إﻟﯽ ﻗﻮس ﻗﺰح ﻟﺴﻨﻮات ﻋﺪﻳﺪة. وﻋﻨﺪﻣﺎ اﻛﺘﺸﻒ ﻋﻠﻤﺎء اﻟﺒﺼﺮﻳﺎت ﺗﻘﻨﻴﺔ "ﺳﺠﻦ اﻟﻀﻮء"، اﺳﺘﻄﺎﻋﻮا اﻻﺣﺘﻔﺎظ ﺑﻘﻮس ﻗﺰح ﻓﻲ ﺻﻮرة ﻣﺎدﻳﺔ. وﻛﺎﻧﺖ ﻫﺬه اﻷﻗﻮاس اﻟﻤﺠﺴﻤﺔ ﺑﻨﻜﻬﺔ اﻟﻨﻌﻨﺎع، ﻟﺬا ﻏﺎﻟﺒﺎ ﻣﺎ ﻛﺎن ﻳﺘﻢ ﺑﻴﻌﻬﺎ ﺑﻮﺻﻔﻬﺎ ﺣﻠﻮى.

tk.title: GÖKKUŞAĞI ŞEKERLEMESİ
tk.description: İnsanlar prizma yardımıyla uzun yıllardır beyaz ışığı gökkuşağına dönüştürebiliyordu. Işık bilimcilerin yıllar sonra "iç prizmalama" yöntemini keşfetmesiyle birlikte gökkuşağını katı hâle getirmeyi başardılar. Şekerleme olarak satılan katı gökkuşağının tadı naneyi andırır.

fr-CA.title: NOUGATINE ARC-EN-CIEL
fr-CA.description: Les humains ont longtemps utilisé des prismes pour transformer la lumière blanche en arcs-en-ciel. La capture physique des arcs-en-ciel est arrivée plus tard, lorsque les scientifiques de l'optique ont découvert la technologie « emprismante ». Les arcs-en-ciel solides goûtaient la menthe et étaient souvent vendus comme bonbons.

en-AU.title: RAINBOW BRITTLE
en-AU.description: Humans used prisms to separate white light into rainbows for many years. Physically capturing rainbows came later, when optical scientists discovered "in-prisming" technology. Solid rainbows have a minty flavour and were often sold as sweets.

landmarks.title: RAINBOW BRITTLE
landmarks.description: Humans used prisms to separate white light into rainbows for many years. Physically capturing rainbows came later, when optical scientists discovered "in-prisming" technology. Solid rainbows have a minty flavor and were often sold as sweets.

landmarks.name: LM_Remote

en.title: TELEVISION WAND
en.description: These ornate sticks were used to summon (or banish) entertainment from an electrical box. Possession of the stick allowed the human user to choose what the entire group must watch, so the stick was the focus of much conflict.

en-GB.title: TELEVISION WAND
en-GB.description: These ornate sticks were used to summon (or banish) entertainment from an electrical box. Possession of the stick allowed the human user to choose what the entire group must watch, so the stick was the focus of much conflict.

fr.title: BAGUETTE DE TÉLÉVISION
fr.description: Ces bâtons ornés étaient utilisés pour invoquer (ou bannir) le divertissement d'une boîte électrique. Brandir le bâton permettait à l'utilisateur humain de choisir ce que tout le groupe devait regarder, mettant l'objet au centre de nombreux conflits.

de.title: FERNSEH-ZAUBERSTAB
de.description: Diese kunstvoll gearbeiteten Stöcke wurden verwendet, um Unterhaltung aus einer elektrischen Kiste zu beschwören (und wieder zu verbannen). Der Besitz des Stocks erlaubte es dem menschlichen Benutzer, zu bestimmen, was die gesamte Gruppe ansehen musste, war also der Mittelpunkt zahlreicher Konflikte.

es.title: VARITA DE TELEVISIÓN
es.description: Estos palos ornamentados se usaban para invocar (o desterrar) entretenimiento de una caja eléctrica. La posesión del palo permitía al usuario humano elegir lo que todo el grupo debía ver, de manera que el palo suponía el centro de numerosos conflictos.

it.title: BACCHETTA TELEVISIVA
it.description: Queste bacchette decorate erano usate per evocare (o bandire) contenuti di intrattenimento in una scatola elettrica. La bacchetta permetteva all'utilizzatore umano di scegliere cosa dovesse vedere l'intero gruppo, risultando la causa di molti diverbi.

ja.title: テレビの杖
ja.description: この華美な棒は、電子ボックスから娯楽を召喚(または消し去る)ために使用されていました。この棒を持つ人間は、そこにいる全員が何を視聴するのかを決定する権限を持つため、この棒を争って常に衝突が起こっていました。

ko.title: 텔레비전 막대
ko.description: 아 장식용 막대는 전기 상자에서 즐길 거리를 불러오거나 없앨 때 사용했습니다. 이 막대를 가진 사람이 그룹 전체가 무엇을 봐야 하는지 결정할 수 있었기 때문에 막대의 소유권이 종종 분쟁의 씨앗이 되곤 했습니다.

zh-Hans.title: 电视魔杖
zh-Hans.description: 这些华丽的魔杖用来召唤（或驱逐）电视里的娱乐节目。有了这根魔杖，人类就可以选择所有人都必须观看的节目，因此，这根魔杖成为了许多冲突的焦点。

zh-Hant.title: 電視魔杖
zh-Hant.description: 這種華麗的魔杖以前是用來召喚 (或驅逐) 電箱的餘興節目。持有這根魔杖的人類使用者，可以選擇整群人必須觀看的節目，因此這根魔杖成為了許多紛爭的焦點。

ru.title: ПАЛОЧКА ОТ ТЕЛЕВИЗОРА
ru.description: Эти затейливые палки использовались для вызова (или изгнания) зрелищ из электрической коробки. Владение палкой позволяло человеку-пользователю выбирать, что будет смотреть вся группа, поэтому палка была причиной многих конфликтов.

pt-BR.title: VARINHA TELEVISIVA
pt-BR.description: Estas varinhas ornamentadas era usadas para evocar ou banir entretenimento de uma caixa eletrônica. Aquele que possuía a varinha tinha o controle de o que todo o grupo de humanos assistiria, por isso o objeto se tornou o centro de muitos conflitos.

nl.title: TELEVISIESTOK
nl.description: Deze sierlijke stokken werden gebruikt om vermaak op te roepen (of verbannen) uit een elektriciteitskast. Door het bezit van de stok kon de menselijke gebruiker kiezen waar de hele groep naar moest kijken, dus de stok was het middelpunt van vele conflicten.

ar.title: ﻋﺼﺎ اﻟﺘﻠﻔﺎز اﻟﺴﺤﺮﻳﺔ
ar.description: ﻛﺎﻧﺖ ﺗﺴﺘﺨﺪم ﻫﺬه اﻟﻌﺼﻲ اﻟﻤﺰﺧﺮﻓﺔ ﻻﺳﺘﺪﻋﺎء وﺳﺎﺋﻞ اﻟﺘﺮﻓﻴﻪ )أو ﺻﺮﻓﻬﺎ( ﻣﻦ ﺻﻨﺪوق ﻛﻬﺮﺑﺎﺋﻲ. وﺑﺎﻣﺘﻼك ﻫﺬه اﻟﻌﺼﺎ، ﻳﺴﻤﺢ ﻟﻠﻤﺴﺘﺨﺪم اﻟﺒﺸﺮي ﺑﺎﺧﺘﻴﺎر ﻣﺎ ﻳﺠﺐ أن ﺗﺸﺎﻫﺪه اﻟﻤﺠﻤﻮﻋﺔ ﻛﻠﻬﺎ، ﻟﺬا ﻛﺎﻧﺖ ﻫﺬه اﻟﻌﺼﺎ ﻣﺤﻞ اﻟﻜﺜﻴﺮ ﻣﻦ اﻟﻨﺰاﻋﺎت.

tk.title: TELEVİZYON DEĞNEĞİ
tk.description: Bu süslü çubuklar, elektrikli bir kutudan eğlenceyi çağırmak (veya kovmak) için kullanılırdı. Bu çubuğu ele geçiren insan kullanıcı, tüm grubun izleyeceği şeyi seçebilirdi. Bu nedenle çubuk her zaman tartışmaların odağı olurdu.

fr-CA.title: BAGUETTE DE TÉLÉVISION
fr-CA.description: Ces bâtons ornés étaient utilisés pour invoquer (ou bannir) le divertissement d'une boîte électrique. Brandir le bâton permettait à l'utilisateur humain de choisir ce que tout le groupe devait regarder, mettant l'objet au centre de nombreux conflits.

en-AU.title: TELEVISION WAND
en-AU.description: These ornate sticks were used to summon (or banish) entertainment from an electrical box. Possession of the stick allowed the human user to choose what the entire group must watch, so the stick was the focus of much conflict.

landmarks.title: TELEVISION WAND
landmarks.description: These ornate sticks were used to summon (or banish) entertainment from an electrical box. Possession of the stick allowed the human user to choose what the entire group must watch, so the stick was the focus of much conflict.

landmarks.name: LM_ReverseMermaid

en.title: REVERSE MERMAID
en.description: Reverse mermaids, with their fishy upper body and head atop two human legs, found it harder to attract the attention of sailors than their fish-tailed counterparts. Unable to sing seductively, they had to make their presence known through extreme kicking and dancing.

en-GB.title: REVERSE MERMAID
en-GB.description: Reverse mermaids, with their fishy upper body and head atop two human legs, found it harder to attract the attention of sailors than their fish-tailed counterparts. Unable to sing seductively, they had to make their presence known through extreme kicking and dancing.

fr.title: SIRÈNE INVERSÉE
fr.description: Les sirènes inversées, avec leur buste et leur tête de poisson vissés sur deux jambes humaines, avaient plus de mal à attirer l'attention des marins que leurs homologues à queue. Incapables de séduire en chantant, elles ont dû affirmer leur présence à grands coups de pied et autres danses extrêmes.

de.title: UMGEKEHRTE MEERJUNGFRAU
de.description: Umgekehrte Meerjungfrauen, mit dem Oberkörper eines Fischs und zwei menschlichen Beinen, hatten es schwerer, die Aufmerksamkeit von Seeleuten zu erregen, als ihre fischschwänzigen Gegenstücke. Sie konnten keine verführerischen Lieder singen, also mussten sie durch extremes Strampeln und Tanzen auf sich aufmerksam machen.

es.title: SIRENA INVERTIDA
es.description: A las sirenas invertidas, con su cabeza y parte superior del cuerpo tipo pez sobre dos piernas humanas, les resultaba más difícil que a sus homólogas con cola de pez atraer la atención de los marineros. Incapaces de cantar de forma seductora, tuvieron que hacerse notar mediante patadas y bailes extremos.

it.title: SIRENA AL CONTRARIO
it.description: Le sirene al contrario, con la parte superiore del corpo e la testa di pesce e le gambe umane, avevano più difficoltà ad attrarre i marinai umani rispetto alle loro controparti con la coda di pesce. Non essendo capaci di cantare in modo sensuale, impararono a farsi notare grazie a danze e calci estremi.

ja.title: 逆さま人魚
ja.description: 逆さま人魚は上半身が魚で下半身に人間の脚2本が生えており、魚の尻尾を持って上半身が人間である人魚のように船乗りを魅惑するのに苦戦していました。魅惑的に歌うことができなかったため、彼らは激しい蹴りとダンスでその存在を知らしめるしかなくなったのです。

ko.title: 어인
ko.description: 몸통과 머리는 물고기, 다리는 인간인 어인은 인어보다는 선원을 유인하는 능력이 떨어집니다. 이목을 끌 아름다운 목소리가 없기 때문에, 오직 무지막지한 발차기와 춤으로만 자신의 존재를 알릴 수밖에 없었습니다.

zh-Hans.title: 颠倒美人鱼
zh-Hans.description: 颠倒美人鱼拥有鱼的脑袋和身子，以及人的脚，他们发现，相比鱼尾美人鱼，要吸引水手的注意更难。由于唱得不够诱人，他们不得不通过夸张的踢腿和舞姿来展现自己的风采。

zh-Hant.title: 顛倒人魚
zh-Hant.description: 顛倒人魚的上半身為魚身魚頭，下半身為人腳，牠們發覺自己比起長著魚尾的人魚，更難吸引水手的注意。牠們沒有誘人的歌聲，只能透過誇張的踢腿和舞姿來引人注目。

ru.title: ПЕРЕВЕРНУТАЯ РУСАЛКА
ru.description: Перевернутым русалкам с их рыбьими туловищем и головой и двумя человеческими ногами сложнее привлечь внимание моряков, чем их подругам с рыбьим хвостом. Поскольку они не умеют соблазнительно петь, им приходится сильно пинаться и танцевать, чтобы заявить о себе.

pt-BR.title: SEREIA REVERSA
pt-BR.description: As sereias reversas, de pernas humanas e torso de peixe, sempre tiveram mais dificuldade para atrair os marinheiros que suas primas de corpo humano e cauda. Incapazes de cantar de forma sedutora, elas chamavam a atenção com muito jogo de cintura e sapateado.

nl.title: OMGEKEERDE ZEEMEERMIN
nl.description: Omgekeerde zeemeerminnen, met hun visachtige bovenlichaam en hoofd op twee menselijke benen, vonden het moeilijker om de aandacht van zeelieden te vangen dan hun tegenhangers met vissenstaart. Doordat ze niet verleidelijk kunnen zingen, moesten ze hun aanwezigheid bekendmaken door extreem te trappen en dansen.

ar.title: ﺣﻮرﻳﺔ اﻟﺒﺤﺮ اﻟﻤﻘﻠﻮﺑﺔ
ar.description: ﻛﺎن ﻳﺼﻌﺐ ﻋﻠﯽ ﺣﻮرﻳﺎت اﻟﺒﺤﺮ اﻟﻤﻘﻠﻮﺑﺔ ﺟﺬب اﻧﺘﺒﺎه اﻟﺒﺤﺎرة ﻣﻘﺎرﻧﺔ ﺑﻨﻈﺎﺋﺮﻫﺎ اﻟﺘﻲ ﺗﺘﻤﺘﻊ ﺑﺬﻳﻞ ﺳﻤﻜﺔ. ﻓﺎﻟﺠﺰء اﻟﻌﻠﻮي ﻣﻦ ﺟﺴﻢ ﻫﺬه اﻟﺤﻮرﻳﺎت ﻳﺸﺒﻪ اﻟﺴﻤﻚ وﻟﻜﻨﻪ ﻣﺤﻤﻮل ﻋﻠﯽ ﺳﺎﻗﻴﻦ ﺑﺸﺮﻳﺘﻴﻦ. وﻧﻈﺮا إﻟﯽ ﻋﺪم ﻗﺪرة ﻫﺬه اﻟﺤﻮرﻳﺎت ﻋﻠﯽ اﻟﻐﻨﺎء ﺑﺼﻮت ﺟﺬاب، ﻓﺈﻧﻬﺎ ﺗﺠﺬب اﻻﻧﺘﺒﺎه ﺑﺎﻟﺮﻗﺺ واﻟﺮﻛﻞ اﻟﻌﻨﻴﻒ.

tk.title: TERS DENİZ KIZI
tk.description: Balık kuyruklu benzerlerinin aksine üst bedenleri balığa benzeyen ve iki insan bacağına sahip olan ters deniz kızları, denizcilerin dikkatini çekmede epey zorluk yaşadılar. Baştan çıkarıcı bir biçimde şarkı söyleyemedikleri için abartılı tekme ve dans hareketleriyle dikkat çekmek zorunda kaldılar.

fr-CA.title: SIRÈNE INVERSÉE
fr-CA.description: Les sirènes inversées, avec leur buste et leur tête de poisson vissés sur deux jambes humaines, avaient plus de mal à attirer l'attention des marins que leurs homologues à queue. Incapables de séduire en chantant, elles ont dû affirmer leur présence à grands coups de pied et autres danses extrêmes.

en-AU.title: REVERSE MERMAID
en-AU.description: Reverse mermaids, with their fishy upper body and head atop two human legs, found it harder to attract the attention of sailors than their fish-tailed counterparts. Unable to sing seductively, they had to make their presence known through extreme kicking and dancing.

landmarks.title: REVERSE MERMAID
landmarks.description: Reverse mermaids, with their fishy upper body and head atop two human legs, found it harder to attract the attention of sailors than their fish-tailed counterparts. Unable to sing seductively, they had to make their presence known through extreme kicking and dancing.

landmarks.name: LM_Rollercoaster_1

en.title: Scream if you want to go faster!
en.description: Englandland's rollercoastees were told to "Scream if you want to go faster!" Perhaps the coaster organism was hard of hearing and needed loud instructions so it knew when to speed up?

en-GB.title: Scream if you want to go faster!
en-GB.description: Englandland's rollercoastees were told to "Scream if you want to go faster!" Perhaps the coaster organism was hard of hearing and needed loud instructions so it knew when to speed up?

fr.title: Je ne vous entends pas !
fr.description: On disait aux amateurs angleterriens de sensations fortes de « crier pour aller plus vite ». L'organisme grand huit était peut-être malentendant et avait besoin d'instructions amplifiées pour savoir quand accélérer ?

de.title: Schreit, wenn ihr schneller fahren wollt!
de.description: Den Fahrern in Achterbahnen in Englandland wurde gesagt, dass sie schreien sollten, wenn sie schneller fahren wollten. Vielleicht waren die Achterbahnen schwerhörig und brauchten laute Anweisungen, um zu wissen, wann sie beschleunigen sollten?

es.title: ¡Grita si quieres ir más rápido!
es.description: A los tripulantes de las montañas rusas de Inglaterralandia se les decía "¡Grita si quieres ir más rápido!". Quizá el organismo de la montaña rusa era duro de oído y necesitaba escuchar las instrucciones muy alto para saber cuándo acelerar.

it.title: Urla se vuoi andare più veloce!
it.description: A coloro che andavano sulle montagne russe dell'Inghilterraterra veniva detto: "Urla se vuoi andare più veloce!". Forse l'organismo delle montagne russe era duro d'orecchi e aveva bisogno di istruzioni ad alta voce per sapere quando accelerare?

ja.title: 叫べば速くなる！
ja.description: イングランドランドでジェットコースターに乗る人たちのあいだでは、「叫べば速くなる！」という言葉が知られています。おそらく、コースター型生命体は耳が悪く、大声で指示しなければ、いつ加速すればいいのか分からなかったのではないでしょうか？

ko.title: 더 빨리 가고 싶으면 소리 지르세요!
ko.description: 영국나라 롤러코스터 탑승자들은 "더 빨리 가고 싶으면 소리 지르세요!"라는 말을 들어야 했습니다. 롤러코스터의 귀가 잘 안 들려서 소리를 높여야 할 때 더 큰 소리로 외쳐야 했던 걸까요?

zh-Hans.title: 如果你想跑得更快，就尖叫！
zh-Hans.description: 有人告诉英格兰大陆的过山车乘客，“如果你想跑得更快，就尖叫！”也许过山车机体的听力不好，需要大声的指令才能知道什么时候加速？

zh-Hant.title: 想更快就尖叫！
zh-Hant.description: 在英格蘭大陸乘坐雲霄飛車的人會被告知「想更快就尖叫！」這麼一句話。是雲霄飛車生物的聽力不佳，所以需要大聲指示才知道什麼時候加速嗎？

ru.title: Кричи, если хочешь ехать быстрее!
ru.description: Американским горкам Англоземья говорили: «Кричи, если хочешь ехать быстрее!». Возможно, у аттракциона были проблемы со слухом и нужно было громко проговаривать инструкции, чтобы он знал, когда ускоряться?

pt-BR.title: Grite se quiser ir mais rápido!
pt-BR.description: Era costume dizer para os usuários das montanhas-russas da Terra da Inglaterra gritarem se quisessem ir mais rápido. Deduz-se que o organismo da montanha era um pouco surdo e precisava de instruções mais projetadas para acelerar.

nl.title: Schreeuw als je sneller wilt gaan!
nl.description: Engelandlandse achtbaanfanaten moesten luid schreeuwen als ze sneller wilden gaan. Misschien was de bestuurder van de achtbaan hardhorig en konden ze de instructies om sneller te gaan anders niet horen?

ar.title: إذا أردﺗﻢ زﻳﺎدة اﻟﺴﺮﻋﺔ، ﻓﺎﺻﺮﺧﻮا!
ar.description: ﻗﻴﻞ ﻟﺮاﻛﺒﻲ اﻷﻓﻌﻮاﻧﻴﺔ ﻓﻲ إﻧﺠﻠﺘﺮا "إذا أردﺗﻢ زﻳﺎدة ﺳﺮﻋﺔ اﻷﻓﻌﻮاﻧﻴﺔ، ﻓﺎﺻﺮﺧﻮا!" أﻛﺎﻧﺖ أﺟﻬﺰة اﻷﻓﻌﻮاﻧﻴﺔ ﺗﻌﺎﻧﻲ ﻣﻦ ﺿﻌﻒ اﻟﺴﻤﻊ ﻟﺬا وﺟﺐ رﻓﻊ اﻟﺼﻮت ﻋﻨﺪ إﺧﺒﺎرﻫﺎ ﺑﺰﻳﺎدة اﻟﺴﺮﻋﺔ؟

tk.title: Daha hızlı gitmek isteyen çığlık atsın!
tk.description: "Daha hızlı gitmek isteyen çığlık atsın!" cümlesi Lunapark trenine binmeyi seven İngilterelilere söylenirdi. Belki de tren organizması işitme güçlüğü çekiyor ve ne zaman hızlanması gerektiğini anlaması için yüksek sesle talimatlara ihtiyaç duyuyordu. Kim bilir?

fr-CA.title: Je ne vous entends pas!
fr-CA.description: On disait aux amateurs de montagnes russes angleterriens de « crier pour aller plus vite ». L'organisme responsable du parc d'attractions était peut-être malentendant et avait besoin d'instructions claires pour savoir quand accélérer?

en-AU.title: Scream if you want to go faster!
en-AU.description: Englandland's rollercoastees were told to "Scream if you want to go faster!" Perhaps the coaster organism was hard of hearing and needed loud instructions so it knew when to speed up?

landmarks.title: Scream if you want to go faster!
landmarks.description: Englandland's rollercoastees were told to "Scream if you want to go faster!" Perhaps the coaster organism was hard of hearing and needed loud instructions so it knew when to speed up?

landmarks.name: LM_Rollercoaster_2

en.title: Keep your arms and legs inside the ride at all times
en.description: Humans were instructed to keep limbs inside the coaster at all times. Presumably, this was to prevent other fairground humans from mistaking the coaster for a terrifying, gigantic multi-limbed creature.

en-GB.title: Keep your arms and legs inside the ride at all times
en-GB.description: Humans were instructed to keep limbs inside the coaster at all times. Presumably, this was to prevent other fairground humans from mistaking the coaster for a terrifying, gigantic multi-limbed creature.

fr.title: Gardez bras et jambes à l'intérieur
fr.description: Les humains recevaient pour instruction de garder leurs membres à l'intérieur de la voiture. Vraisemblablement pour empêcher d'autres humains forains de confondre les montagnes russes avec une créature gigantesque à plusieurs membres.

de.title: Arme und Beine sind jederzeit im Fahrzeug zu behalten
de.description: Den Menschen wurde vorgeschrieben, sie sollten ihre Gliedmaßen jederzeit im Wagen der Achterbahn behalten. Der Grund dafür war vermutlich, dass verhindert werden sollte, dass andere Menschen auf dem Jahrmarkt die Achterbahn als furchterregende, riesige Kreatur mit vielen Gliedmaßen hielten.

es.title: Mantén brazos y piernas dentro en todo momento
es.description: A los humanos se les ordenaba mantener las extremidades en el interior de la montaña rusa en todo momento. Probablemente, esto se hacía para evitar que otros humanos feriantes confundieran la montaña rusa con una criatura de múltiples extremidades gigantesca y terrorífica.

it.title: Tieni sempre braccia e gambe dentro l'ottovolante
it.description: Agli umani veniva detto di tenere sempre tutti gli arti all'interno dell'ottovolante, presumibilmente per evitare che altri umani del luna park scambiassero la montagna russa per una creatura dai molti arti, terrificante e gigantesca.

ja.title: 乗車中は腕や脚を外に出さないでください
ja.description: 人間たちは、コースター乗車時は常に手足を内側に置いておくように指示されていました。これはおそらく、他のお祭り会場の人間がこのコースターをみて、これが恐ろしく巨大な多肢生物だと間違えるのを防ぐためだったのでしょう。

ko.title: 팔과 다리를 밖으로 내밀지 마세요
ko.description: 인간들은 팔다리를 항상 롤러코스터 안에 둬야 했습니다. 이것은 지상에 있는 인간들이 롤러코스터를 엄청나게 많은 팔다리가 달린 지네로 착각하지 않게 하기 위함이었던 게 아닐까요?

zh-Hans.title: 始终把你的胳膊和腿放在过山车内
zh-Hans.description: 人类必须始终保持双手双脚在过山车内。据推测，这是为了防止其他游乐场的人类误认为过山车是一个可怕的巨型多肢生物。

zh-Hant.title: 請勿任意將手腳伸出外部
zh-Hant.description: 人類被告知不要隨意將四肢伸出飛車外。據推測，這是要避免其他遊樂場的人類，誤以為雲霄飛車是長滿肢臂、恐怖巨大的生物。

ru.title: Во время поездки не высовывайте руки и ноги
ru.description: Людям запрещали высовывать конечности из кабины во время поездки. Предположительно, делалось это для того, чтобы другие люди на ярмарке не приняли аттракцион за огромную ужасную многоножку.

pt-BR.title: Mantenha os braços e pernas dentro do carrinho!
pt-BR.description: Os humanos eram instruídos a manterem os membros dentro do veículo, provavelmente para evitar que outros humanos, vendo de fora, pensassem que a montanha-russa era, na verdade, um enorme monstro de vários braços e pernas.

nl.title: Verboden armen en benen uit de achtbaan te steken
nl.description: Mensen moesten hun ledematen op elk moment in de achtbaan houden. Dit was waarschijnlijk om te vermijden dat mensen die zich op de grond bevonden de achtbaan verwarden met een angstaanjagend wezen met meerdere poten.

ar.title: أﺑﻘﻮا أذرﻋﻜﻢ وأرﺟﻠﻜﻢ داﺧﻞ اﻷﻓﻌﻮاﻧﻴﺔ ﻃﻮال اﻟﻮﻗﺖ
ar.description: ﻃﻠﺐ ﻣﻦ اﻟﺒﺸﺮ اﻹﺑﻘﺎء ﻋﻠﯽ أﻃﺮاﻓﻬﻢ داﺧﻞ اﻷﻓﻌﻮاﻧﻴﺔ ﻃﻮال اﻟﻮﻗﺖ. وﻣﻦ اﻟﻤﺤﺘﻤﻞ أن ﺳﺒﺐ ذﻟﻚ ﻫﻮ أﻻ ﻳﺨﺘﻠﻂ اﻷﻣﺮ ﻋﻠﯽ اﻟﺒﺸﺮ ﻓﻲ اﻟﻤﻼﻫﻲ ﺑﺄن اﻷﻓﻌﻮاﻧﻴﺔ ﻛﺎﺋﻦ ﻣﺨﻴﻒ ﻋﻤﻼق ﻣﺘﻌﺪد اﻷﻃﺮاف.

tk.title: Kollarınızı ve bacaklarınızı sarkıtmayın
tk.description: Lunapark trenindeki yolculukları süresince insanlardan kollarını ve bacaklarını trenin içinde tutması istenirdi. Lunaparktaki diğer insanların treni çok uzuvlu ürkütücü devasa bir canavar sanıp korkmalarını engellemeye yönelik bir uygulama olduğunu tahmin ediyoruz.

fr-CA.title: Gardez bras et jambes à l'intérieur
fr-CA.description: Les humains recevaient pour instruction de garder leurs membres à l'intérieur de la voiture. Vraisemblablement pour empêcher d'autres humains forains de confondre les montagnes russes avec une créature gigantesque à plusieurs membres.

en-AU.title: Keep your arms and legs inside the ride at all times
en-AU.description: Humans were instructed to keep limbs inside the coaster at all times. Presumably, this was to prevent other fairground humans from mistaking the coaster for a terrifying, gigantic multi-limbed creature.

landmarks.title: Keep your arms and legs inside the ride at all times
landmarks.description: Humans were instructed to keep limbs inside the coaster at all times. Presumably, this was to prevent other fairground humans from mistaking the coaster for a terrifying, gigantic multi-limbed creature.

landmarks.name: LM_Rollercoaster_3

en.title: You must be this tall to ride the coaster!
en.description: The coaster refused to waste its time on interactions with very small humans. This may have been related to force, mass, and acceleration; larger humans weighed more, and thus helped the coaster gain an exciting amount of momentum.

en-GB.title: You must be this tall to ride the coaster!
en-GB.description: The coaster refused to waste its time on interactions with very small humans. This may have been related to force, mass, and acceleration; larger humans weighed more, and thus helped the coaster gain an exciting amount of momentum.

fr.title: Personne ne monte en dessous de la taille réglementaire !
fr.description: La montagne russe refusait de perdre son temps avec des humains trop petits. Sans doute une histoire de force, de masse et d'accélération, le poids des plus gros humains l'aidant certainement à prendre un meilleur élan.

de.title: Mindestgröße zum Mitfahren in der Achterbahn!
de.description: Die Achterbahn weigerte sich, ihre Zeit mit kleinen Menschen zu vergeuden. Dies hängt möglicherweise mit Kraft, Masse und Beschleunigung zusammen: Größere Menschen waren schwerer und verliehen der Achterbahn somit eine aufregende Menge an Schwung.

es.title: ¡Debes medir esto para subir a la montaña rusa!
es.description: La montaña rusa se negaba a malgastar su tiempo en interacciones con humanos muy pequeños. Puede que esto tuviera que ver con la fuerza, la masa y la aceleración: los humanos más grandes pesaban más y, así, ayudaban a la montaña rusa a ganar un impulso de lo más emocionante.

it.title: Devi essere alto così per salire sulle montagne russe!
it.description: Le montagne russe si rifiutavano di perdere tempo a interagire con gli umani molto piccoli. Forse questo è dovuto alla massa, alla forza e all'accelerazione: gli umani più grandi pesavano di più e questo aiutava le montagne russe a ottenere spinte maggiori straordinarie.

ja.title: コースター乗車時の身長制限！
ja.description: このコースターは、小さすぎる人間とのやりとりに時間を無駄にすることを断固拒否していました。これは、力、質量、加速度に関連している可能性があるのかもしれません。大きな人間のうほうがより重くなり、それによりコースターが刺激的なまでの運動量を獲得することになります。

ko.title: 롤러코스터에 타려면 이 키 이상이어야 합니다!
ko.description: 롤러코스터는 매우 작은 인간들과의 교류를 거부했습니다. 이것은 아마 힘, 부피, 가속과 관계가 있었을 것입니다. 더 큰 인간들은 무게가 많이 나가고, 따라서 롤러코스터가 더 빠른 가속도를 얻을 수 있었을 테니까요.

zh-Hans.title: 你必须这么高，才能坐过山车！
zh-Hans.description: 过山车拒绝浪费时间与体型很小的人类互动。这可能与力、质量和加速度有关；体型较大的人类更重，从而可以帮助过山车获得更足的劲头。

zh-Hant.title: 必須符合一定高度才能乘坐雲霄飛車！
zh-Hant.description: 雲霄飛車拒絕浪費時間跟非常矮小的人類互動。這可能跟力量、質量和加速度有關；體型越大的人類，重量越重，因此有助於雲霄飛車獲得大幅度的衝力。

ru.title: Чтобы кататься на аттракционе, нужно быть настолько высоким!
ru.description: Аттракцион отказывался тратить свое время на общение с низкорослыми людьми. Это может быть связано с силой, массой и ускорением: длинные люди весят больше и таким образом обеспечивают аттракциону захватывающее количество кинетической энергии.

pt-BR.title: Altura mínima para entrar!
pt-BR.description: A montanha se recusava a perder seu tempo com interações com humaninhos. Pode ser algo relativo a força, massa e aceleração: humanos maiores pesavam mais e, por isso, auxiliavam a montanha-russa a ganhar impulso.

nl.title: Je moet zo groot zijn om op deze achtbaan te mogen!
nl.description: De achtbaan wou geen tijd verspillen met erg kleine mensen. Misschien had dit te maken met kracht, massa en versnelling: grote mensen wogen meer en dus kon de achtbaan een grotere snelheid bereiken, wat natuurlijk heel wat leuker was.

ar.title: ﻳﺠﺐ أن ﺗﻜﻮن ﺑﻬﺬا اﻟﻄﻮل ﻟﺘﺮﻛﺐ اﻷﻓﻌﻮاﻧﻴﺔ!
ar.description: أﺑﺖ اﻷﻓﻌﻮاﻧﻴﺔ أن ﺗﻀﻴﻊ وﻗﺘﻬﺎ ﻓﻲ اﻟﺘﻌﺎﻣﻞ ﻣﻊ ﻗﺼﺎر اﻟﻘﺎﻣﺔ ﻣﻦ اﻟﺒﺸﺮ. وﻗﺪ ﻳﺘﻌﻠﻖ ذﻟﻚ ﺑﺎﻟﻘﻮة واﻟﻜﺘﻠﺔ واﻟﻌﺠﻠﺔ؛ ﻓﻜﻠﻤﺎ زاد ﻃﻮل اﻟﺒﺸﺮ، زاد وزﻧﻬﻢ، ﻣﺎ ﻳﺴﺎﻋﺪ ﻋﻠﯽ إﻛﺴﺎب اﻷﻓﻌﻮاﻧﻴﺔ ﻗﺪرا ﻣﻦ اﻟﺰﺧﻢ واﻹﺛﺎرة.

tk.title: Binmek için bu boyda olmak gerekir!
tk.description: Lunapark treni çok küçük insanlarla zaman kaybetmek istemiyordu. Bunun nedeni kuvvet, kütle ve ivmeyle ilgili olabilir. Büyük insanlar daha ağır olduğu için trenin daha büyük ivme ve dolayısıyla daha fazla heyecan kazanmasını sağlayabilir.

fr-CA.title: Personne ne monte en dessous de la taille réglementaire!
fr-CA.description: La montagne russe refusait de perdre son temps avec des humains trop petits. Sans doute une histoire de force, de masse et d'accélération, le poids des plus gros humains l'aidant certainement à atteindre une vitesse plus excitante.

en-AU.title: You must be this tall to ride the coaster!
en-AU.description: The coaster refused to waste its time on interactions with very small humans. This may have been related to force, mass, and acceleration; larger humans weighed more, and thus helped the coaster gain an exciting amount of momentum.

landmarks.title: You must be this tall to ride the coaster!
landmarks.description: The coaster refused to waste its time on interactions with very small humans. This may have been related to force, mass, and acceleration; larger humans weighed more, and thus helped the coaster gain an exciting amount of momentum.

landmarks.name: LM_RubberDuck

en.title: INFLATABLE CHICK
en.description: This charming creature must be the juvenile form of the inflatable flamingo. After hatching from the inflatable egg, it takes to the water, bobbing about until it reaches maturity. If squeezed it lets out a squeaky cry, presumably alerting parent birds to the danger.

en-GB.title: INFLATABLE CHICK
en-GB.description: This charming creature must be the juvenile form of the inflatable flamingo. After hatching from the inflatable egg, it takes to the water, bobbing about until it reaches maturity. If squeezed it lets out a squeaky cry, presumably alerting parent birds to the danger.

fr.title: POUSSIN GONFLABLE
fr.description: Cette charmante créature doit être la forme juvénile du flamant rose gonflable. Il se jette à l'eau après éclosion de l'œuf gonflable, oscillant alors jusqu'à atteindre sa maturité. Compressé, il laisse échapper un cri grinçant alertant vraisemblablement ses parents du danger.

de.title: AUFBLASBARES KÜKEN
de.description: Dieses entzückende Wesen muss die kindliche Form des aufblasbaren Flamingos sein. Nachdem es aus dem aufblasbaren Ei geschlüpft ist, begibt es sich ins Wasser und tanzt dort auf den Wellen, bis es ausgewachsen ist. Wenn es gedrückt wird, gibt es einen quietschenden Schrei von sich – vermutlich, um die Elterntiere auf Gefahr aufmerksam zu machen.

es.title: POLLUELO INFLABLE
es.description: Esta encantadora criatura debe ser la forma juvenil del flamenco inflable. Tras salir del huevo inflable, llega al agua, donde flota hasta alcanzar la madurez. Si se estruja emite un chillido, seguramente para alertar a sus progenitores del peligro.

it.title: PULCINO GONFIABILE
it.description: Quest'affascinante creatura dev'essere la versione giovane del fenicottero gonfiabile. Dopo la schiusa dell'uovo gonfiabile va in acqua, galleggiando fino a raggiungere l'età adulta. Se schiacciato fa rumore, presumibilmente per allertare i genitori del pericolo.

ja.title: 浮き輪のヒヨコ
ja.description: この可愛い生き物は、浮き輪のフラミンゴの幼少期の姿であるに違いありません。浮き輪の卵から孵化した後、水へ入り、成熟期に到達するまでプカプカと浮かんでいるのです。これをギュッと絞ると甲高い鳴き声をあげるため、この声は親鳥へ危険を知らせるものであると予想しています。

ko.title: 부유형 새끼 새
ko.description: 이 매력적인 생물은 아마 부유형 플라밍고의 어릴 때 모습인 것 같습니다. 이들은 부유형 알에서 태어난 뒤 성인이 될 때까지 물 위를 떠다닙니다. 손으로 꽉 쥐면 꽤액 소리를 내는데 부모에게 위험을 알리는 신호로 추정됩니다.

zh-Hans.title: 充气小鸟
zh-Hans.description: 这个可爱的生物一定是充气火烈鸟年幼的时候。从充气蛋孵化出来后，它就入水上下浮动，直到成年。如果受到挤压，它就会发出吱吱的叫声，想必是在提醒它们的爸爸妈妈有危险。

zh-Hant.title: 充氣幼鳥
zh-Hant.description: 這隻迷人的生物一定是充氣紅鶴的幼年模樣。從充氣蛋孵化出來之後，牠喜歡到水邊上下擺動直到成年。擠壓牠的話會吱吱作響，很可能是要警告鳥類父母有危險。

ru.title: НАДУВНОЙ ПТЕНЕЦ
ru.description: Скорее всего, это очаровательное существо — молодая особь надувного фламинго. Вылупившись из надувного яйца, оно покачивается на воде, пока не достигнет зрелости. Пронзительный крик, который издает существо при сжатии, предупреждает птиц-родителей об опасности.

pt-BR.title: FILHOTE INFLÁVEL
pt-BR.description: Esta adorável criatura deve ser a forma jovem de um flamingo inflável. Ele já sabe nadar assim que sai do ovo inflável e tende a boiar até atingir a maturidade. Ele emite um chiado fino quando apertado, provavelmente para alertar os pais do perigo.

nl.title: OPBLAASBAAR KUIKEN
nl.description: Dit schattige wezentje moet de jongere versie zijn van de opblaasbare flamingo. Nadat het opblaasbare ei uitkomt, waggelt het kuiken naar het water en drijft het rond totdat het volwassen is. Als je het kuiken knijpt, laat het een piepende kreet horen, dat de ouders waarschijnlijk waarschuwt voor gevaar.

ar.title: اﻟﻜﺘﻜﻮت اﻟﻤﻨﺘﻔﺦ
ar.description: ﻻ ﺑﺪ أن ﻫﺬا اﻟﻜﺎﺋﻦ اﻟﻈﺮﻳﻒ ﻫﻮ ﺻﻐﻴﺮ اﻟﻔﻼﻣﻨﺠﻮ اﻟﻤﻨﺘﻔﺦ. ﻓﺒﻌﺪ أن ﻳﻔﻘﺲ ﻣﻦ اﻟﺒﻴﻀﺔ اﻟﻤﻨﺘﻔﺨﺔ، ﻳﺘﺤﺮك إﻟﯽ أن ﻳﺼﻞ إﻟﯽ اﻟﻤﺎء ﺛﻢ ﻳﻄﻔﻮ ﻓﻴﻬﺎ ﺣﺘﯽ ﻳﻨﻀﺞ. وإذا ﺗﻢ اﻟﻀﻐﻂ ﻋﻠﻴﻪ، ﻳﺼﺪر ﺻﺮﺧﺔ ﺣﺎدة ﻳﻔﺘﺮض أن ﺗﻨﺒﻪ اﻟﻮاﻟﺪﻳﻦ ﺑﻮﺟﻮد ﺧﻄﺮ.

tk.title: ŞİŞME CİVCİV
tk.description: Bu sevimli yaratık, şişme flamingonun genç hâli olmalı. Şişme yumurtadan çıktıktan sonra suya giriyor ve erişkinliğe ulaşana kadar ileri geri yüzüp duruyor. Sıktığınızda tiz bir ses çıkarıyor. Ebeveyn kuşları tehlikeye karşı uyarıyor olsa gerek.

fr-CA.title: POUSSIN GONFLABLE
fr-CA.description: Cette charmante créature doit être la forme juvénile du flamant rose gonflable. Il se jette à l'eau après éclosion de l'œuf gonflable, oscillant alors jusqu'à atteindre sa maturité. S'il est serré, il laisse échapper un cri grinçant alertant vraisemblablement ses parents du danger.

en-AU.title: INFLATABLE CHICK
en-AU.description: This charming creature must be the juvenile form of the inflatable flamingo. After hatching from the inflatable egg, it takes to the water, bobbing about until it reaches maturity. If squeezed it lets out a squeaky cry, presumably alerting parent birds to the danger.

landmarks.title: INFLATABLE CHICK
landmarks.description: This charming creature must be the juvenile form of the inflatable flamingo. After hatching from the inflatable egg, it takes to the water, bobbing about until it reaches maturity. If squeezed it lets out a squeaky cry, presumably alerting parent birds to the danger.

landmarks.name: LM_SandCastle

en.title: SANDCASTLE
en.description: Although easy to construct, these palatial buildings were generally ignored by the property market due to their small size. As sand became scarce, sandcastle construction workers began to experiment with different building materials. This example is made from dehydrated rice pudding.

en-GB.title: SANDCASTLE
en-GB.description: Although easy to construct, these palatial buildings were generally ignored by the property market due to their small size. As sand became scarce, sandcastle construction workers began to experiment with different building materials. This example is made from dehydrated rice pudding.

fr.title: CHÂTEAU DE SABLE
fr.description: Certes faciles à ériger, ces bâtiments somptueux étaient souvent boudés par le marché immobilier en raison de leur petite taille. À mesure que le sable se raréfiait, les ouvriers spécialisés en châteaux de sable ont commencé à expérimenter différents matériaux de construction. Cet exemple-ci est fait de riz au lait déshydraté.

de.title: SANDBURG
de.description: Diese prunkvollen Bauten waren zwar einfach zu errichten, wurden jedoch aufgrund ihrer geringen Größe vom Immobilienmarkt im Allgemeinen ignoriert. Als der Sand knapp wurde, begannen die Erbauer von Sandburgen mit anderen Baumaterialien zu experimentieren. Dieses Exemplar wurde aus dehydriertem Reispudding gebaut.

es.title: CASTILLO DE ARENA
es.description: Aunque resultaban fáciles de construir, estos edificios palaciegos eran generalmente ignorados por el mercado inmobiliario debido a su pequeño tamaño. Puesto que la arena comenzó a escasear, los obreros de la construcción de castillos de arena empezaron a experimentar con distintos materiales. Este ejemplo está hecho de arroz con leche deshidratado.

it.title: CASTELLO DI SABBIA
it.description: Nonostante fossero semplici da costruire, questi edifici sontuosi venivano di solito trascurati dal mercato degli immobili perché di dimensioni troppo piccole. Quando la sabbia iniziò a scarseggiare, i costruttori di castelli di sabbia iniziarono a sperimentare l'utilizzo di nuovi materiali. L'esempio qui mostrato deriva da un risolatte disidratato.

ja.title: 砂の城
ja.description: 非常に簡単に建築できるものの、これらの宮殿型建造物は、その小ささのせいで不動産市場から見向きもされていませんでした。砂が珍しいものになるにつれ、砂の城の建設員たちは異なる建設素材を試し始めるようになりました。この一例は、乾燥させたライスプディングで作られています。

ko.title: 모래성
ko.description: 이 대궐 같은 건물은 짓기는 쉽지만 크기가 작아 부동산 시장에서는 대체로 무시 당하는 분위기였습니다. 모래가 귀해지면서 모래성 공사 전문가들은 다른 건설 재료를 활용하기 시작했습니다. 여기 이 샘플은 말린 쌀 푸딩으로 만든 것입니다.

zh-Hans.title: 沙堡
zh-Hans.description: 这些富丽堂皇的建筑虽然容易建造，但由于尺寸小，一般被房地产市场所忽视。由于沙子越来越少，沙堡建筑工人开始尝试采用不同的建筑材料。这个样品是由脱水大米布丁制成的。

zh-Hant.title: 沙堡
zh-Hant.description: 雖然這種宮殿式建築容易建造，卻因為體積小而不受房地產青睞。隨著沙子變得稀少，沙堡建築工人開始嘗試不同的建材。這個樣本是以脫水的米布丁製造而成。

ru.title: ЗАМОК ИЗ ПЕСКА
ru.description: Рынок недвижимости игнорировал эти роскошные здания из-за небольшого размера, даже несмотря на простоту строительства. По мере того, как запасы песка оскудевали, строители замков из песка стали экспериментировать со строительными материалами. Этот образец сделан из обезвоженного рисового пудинга.

pt-BR.title: CASTELO DE AREIA
pt-BR.description: Apesar de fáceis de construir, estes palácios eram ignorados pelo mercado imobiliário por serem pequenos demais. Quando a areia se tornou um material escasso, os castelos passaram a ser construídos com outros materiais experimentais, como este exemplo, feito de pudim de arroz desidratado.

nl.title: ZANDKASTEEL
nl.description: Hoewel eenvoudig te bouwen, werden deze paleizen gewoonlijk genegeerd door de vastgoedmarkt vanwege hun kleine omvang. Toen zand schaars werd, begonnen zandkastelenbouwers te experimenteren met verschillende bouwmaterialen. Dit voorbeeld is gemaakt van gedehydrateerde rijstpudding.

ar.title: اﻟﻘﻠﻌﺔ اﻟﺮﻣﻠﻴﺔ
ar.description: ﻋﻠﯽ اﻟﺮﻏﻢ ﻣﻦ ﺳﻬﻮﻟﺔ ﺗﺸﻴﻴﺪ ﻫﺬه اﻟﻤﺒﺎﻧﻲ اﻟﻔﺨﻤﺔ، ﻛﺎﻧﺖ ﻋﺎدة ﻣﺤﻞ ﺗﺠﺎﻫﻞ ﻣﻦ ﺟﺎﻧﺐ اﻟﺴﻮق اﻟﻌﻘﺎرﻳﺔ ﺑﺴﺒﺐ ﺻﻐﺮ ﺣﺠﻤﻬﺎ. وﺑﻴﻨﻤﺎ أﺻﺒﺢ اﻟﺮﻣﻞ ﻧﺎدرا، ﺑﺪأ ﻋﻤﺎل ﺑﻨﺎء اﻟﻘﻼع اﻟﺮﻣﻠﻴﺔ ﻓﻲ ﺗﺠﺮﺑﺔ ﻣﻮاد ﺑﻨﺎء ﻣﺨﺘﻠﻔﺔ. وﻫﺬا اﻟﻨﻤﻮذج ﻣﺼﻨﻮع ﻣﻦ ﺑﻮدﻧﺞ اﻷرز اﻟﻤﺠﻔﻒ.

tk.title: KUMDAN KALE
tk.description: İnşa edilmeleri çok kolay olmasına rağmen bu saray yavrusu yapılar sadece ve sadece küçük oldukları için emlak piyasası tarafından görmezden geliniyor. Kum miktarı azaldıkça kumdan kale ustaları da farklı inşaat malzemeleri denemeye başladı. Örneğin bu, kurumuş sütlaçtan yapıldı.

fr-CA.title: CHÂTEAU DE SABLE
fr-CA.description: Bien que faciles à construire, ces bâtiments somptueux étaient souvent ignorés par le marché immobilier en raison de leur petite taille. À mesure que le sable se raréfiait, les ouvriers spécialisés en châteaux de sable ont commencé à tester différents matériaux de construction. Cet exemple-ci est fait de pouding au riz déshydraté.

en-AU.title: SANDCASTLE
en-AU.description: Although easy to construct, these palatial buildings were generally ignored by the property market due to their small size. As sand became scarce, sandcastle construction workers began to experiment with different building materials. This example is made from dehydrated rice pudding.

landmarks.title: SANDCASTLE
landmarks.description: Although easy to construct, these palatial buildings were generally ignored by the property market due to their small size. As sand became scarce, sandcastle construction workers began to experiment with different building materials. This example is made from dehydrated rice pudding.

landmarks.name: LM_SantaBeard

en.title: REGULATION SANTA BEARD
en.description: In the Age of Santas, human families often sent their second child to Santa School to learn the commercial craft of Santa-ing. All students were required to wear a Festive Chin Wig in Friendly Ghost White at all times to ensure visual consistency. This one is a size 3.

en-GB.title: REGULATION SANTA BEARD
en-GB.description: In the Age of Santas, human families often sent their second child to Santa School to learn the commercial craft of Santa-ing. All students were required to wear a Festive Chin Wig in Friendly Ghost White at all times to ensure visual consistency. This one is a size 3.

fr.title: BARBE DE PÈRE NOËL
fr.description: Du temps des pères Noël, les familles humaines envoyaient souvent leur deuxième enfant à l'école Père Noël où ils apprenaient l'art d'être un père Noël. Tous les étudiants devaient porter une perruque de menton blanche en permanence pour assurer la cohérence visuelle. Celle-ci est de taille L.

de.title: VORSCHRIFTSMÄSSIGER WEIHNACHTSMANNBART
de.description: Im Zeitalter der Weihnachtsmänner schickten menschliche Familien ihr zweitgeborenes Kind oft zur Weihnachtsmannschule, wo sie das Handwerk des Weihnachtsmannens erlernen sollten. Alle Schüler mussten jederzeit eine festliche, weiße Kinnperücke tragen, um optische Einheitlichkeit zu gewährleisten. Dieser hier ist in Größe 3.

es.title: BARBA DE PAPÁ NOEL ESTÁNDAR
es.description: En la Era de los Papás Noeles, las familias humanas enviaban a su segundo retoño al Colegio Noel para aprender la profesión de Papá Noel. Todos los estudiantes tenían que llevar en todo momento una peluca de mentón festiva totalmente blanca para garantizar la consistencia visual. Esta es una talla 3.

it.title: BARBA DI BABBO NATALE OBBLIGATORIA
it.description: Nell'Era dei Babbi Natali, le famiglie umane mandavano spesso i propri secondogeniti alla scuola dei Babbi Natali cosicché imparassero l'arte del babbeggio. Tutti gli studenti dovevano indossare una parrucca da mento natalizia di un simpatico colore bianco fantasma per tutto il tempo al fine di garantire uniformità. Questa è una misura n°3.

ja.title: 標準的なサンタの髭
ja.description: サンタ時代、人間の家族は二番目の子供をサンタ学校へ送り出し、サンタイングの商業用工作を学ばせていました。生徒全員は、常に見た目の統一性を取るために、楽しい幽霊みたいな白色の、陽気なあごカツラを被ることが義務付けられていました。これのサイズは3です。

ko.title: 표준 산타 수염
ko.description: 산타의 시대 동안 인간 가족들은 두 번째 아이를 산타 학교로 보내 산타 업무를 익히게 했습니다. 모든 학생들은 시각적 통일성을 위해 축제용 친근한 유령 흰색 턱 가발을 착용해야 했습니다. 이 가발은 사이즈 3입니다.

zh-Hans.title: 必戴的圣诞老人胡子
zh-Hans.description: 在圣诞老人的时代，人类家庭经常把他们的第二个孩子送到圣诞学校学习圣诞老人的商业手艺。所有的学生都必须一直戴着极具氛围的幽灵白假胡子，以确保视觉上的一致性。这件是 3 号的。

zh-Hant.title: 必戴的聖誕老人鬍子
zh-Hant.description: 在聖誕老人時代，人類家庭經常送他們第二個孩子到聖誕老人學校，學習聖誕老人的商業行銷手法。所有學生需要隨時戴上潔白無瑕的慶祝用假鬍子，以確保符合一致的視覺形象。這個是 3 號尺寸。

ru.title: БОРОДА САНТЫ УСТАНОВЛЕННОГО ОБРАЗЦА
ru.description: В эпоху Сант человеческие семьи часто посылали второго ребенка в школу Сант изучать прибыльное ремесло Сантообличия. Все ученики должны были постоянно носить праздничную накладную бороду псевдо-дружелюбного белого цвета, чтобы обеспечить видимость единства. Эта борода третьего размера.

pt-BR.title: BARBA PADRÃO DE PAPAI NOEL
pt-BR.description: Na era dos Papais Noéis, as famílias humanas costumavam enviar seus filhos do meio para a Escola Natalina para que eles aprendessem a arte de noelizar. Lá, era obrigatório o uso de uma peruca de queixo festiva, da cor branco fantasma, com o intuito de manter a coerência visual. Esta é tamanho 3.

nl.title: REGLEMENTAIRE KERSTMANNENBAARD
nl.description: In het tijdperk van kerstmannen stuurden menselijke families vaak hun tweede kind naar de Kerstmanschool om het commerciële kerstmanvak te leren. Alle leerlingen waren verplicht om te allen tijde een "feestelijke kinpruik in vriendelijk spookwit" te dragen om de visuele consistentie te waarborgen. Deze is een maatje 3.

ar.title: ﻟﺤﻴﺔ ﺑﺎﺑﺎ ﻧﻮﻳﻞ اﻟﻤﺼﻔﻔﺔ
ar.description: ﻓﻲ ﻋﺼﺮ ﺑﺎﺑﺎ ﻧﻮﻳﻞ، اﻋﺘﺎدت ﻋﺎﺋﻼت اﻟﺒﺸﺮ إرﺳﺎل ﺛﺎﻧﻲ أﺑﻨﺎﺋﻬﺎ إﻟﯽ ﻣﺪرﺳﺔ ﺑﺎﺑﺎ ﻧﻮﻳﻞ ﻟﺘﻌﻠﻢ ﺣﺮﻓﺔ ﺑﺎﺑﺎ ﻧﻮﻳﻞ اﻟﺘﺠﺎرﻳﺔ. وﻛﺎن ﻳﻄﻠﺐ ﻣﻦ ﻛﻞ اﻟﻄﻼب ارﺗﺪاء ﻟﺤﻴﺔ ﻣﺴﺘﻌﺎرة ﻣﺒﻬﺠﺔ ﺑﻠﻮن ﻟﻄﻴﻒ أﺑﻴﺾ ﻛﺎﻷﺷﺒﺎح ﻃﻮال اﻟﻮﻗﺖ ﻟﻀﻤﺎن ﺗﻮﺣﻴﺪ اﻟﻤﻈﻬﺮ. ﻫﺬا اﻟﻨﻤﻮذج ﻣﻘﺎس 3.

tk.title: GELENEKSEL NOEL BABA SAKALI
tk.description: Noel Babaların Çağı'nda insan aileleri genellikle ikinci çocuklarını ticari Noel Babalık mesleğini öğrenmeleri için Noel Baba Okulu'na gönderirdi. Görsel olarak bir düzen sağlamak için tüm öğrencilerin Dost Hayalet Beyaz'da Festival Çene Peruğu takmaları gerekiyordu. Bunun bedeni 3.

fr-CA.title: BARBE DE PÈRE NOËL OFFICIELLE
fr-CA.description: Du temps des pères Noël, les familles humaines envoyaient souvent leur deuxième enfant à l'école Père Noël où ils apprenaient l'art d'être un père Noël. Tous les étudiants devaient porter une perruque de menton festive blanche en permanence pour assurer une cohérence visuelle. Celle-ci est de taille L.

en-AU.title: REGULATION SANTA BEARD
en-AU.description: In the Age of Santas, human families often sent their second child to Santa School to learn the commercial craft of Santa-ing. All students were required to wear a Festive Chin Wig in Friendly Ghost White at all times to ensure visual consistency. This one is a size 3.

landmarks.title: REGULATION SANTA BEARD
landmarks.description: In the Age of Santas, human families often sent their second child to Santa School to learn the commercial craft of Santa-ing. All students were required to wear a Festive Chin Wig in Friendly Ghost White at all times to ensure visual consistency. This one is a size 3.

landmarks.name: LM_Scarecrow

en.title: BIRD COMPANION
en.description: We think this strangely haggard field doll was designed as a companion for the area's bird population.
