The birds would get lonely when the human farmer was absent, so this doll wore the farmer's clothes and stayed in the field all year long, keeping the birds company as they feasted on crops.

en-GB.title: BIRD COMPANION
en-GB.description: We think this strangely haggard field doll was designed as a companion for the area's bird population. The birds would get lonely when the human farmer was absent, so this doll wore the farmer's clothes and stayed in the field all year long, keeping the birds company as they feasted on crops.

fr.title: COMPAGNON DES OISEAUX
fr.description: Nous pensons que cette poupée campagnarde bizarrement attifée a été conçue pour tenir compagnie à la population d'oiseaux de la région. Comme les oiseaux se sentaient seuls en l'absence du fermier humain, cette poupée portant les vêtements du fermier restait dans le champ toute l'année, tenant compagnie aux oiseaux pendant qu'ils se régalaient des récoltes.

de.title: VOGELBEGLEITER
de.description: Wir denken, dass diese seltsam ausgemergelte Feldpuppe als Begleiter für die Vogelpopulation der Gegend entworfen wurde. Die Vögel waren einsam, wenn der menschliche Bauer nicht da war. Deshalb trug diese Puppe die Kleidung des Bauern und blieb das ganze Jahr über auf dem Feld, um den Vögeln Gesellschaft zu leisten, während sie sich an den Feldfrüchten labten.

es.title: COMPAÑERO PARA AVES
es.description: Creemos que esta extraña muñeca demacrada se creó para servir como compañía para la población aviar de la zona. Los pájaros echaban de menos al granjero humano cuando se ausentaba, así que a esta muñeca se le ponía la ropa del granjero humano y se quedaba en el campo todo el año para hacer compañía a las aves mientras estas devoraban las cosechas.

it.title: AMICO DEGLI UCCELLI
it.description: Riteniamo che questa strana bambola da campo lacera sia stata progettata per fare compagnia alla popolazione di uccelli dell'area. Gli uccelli soffrivano di solitudine quando il contadino umano non c'era, quindi questa bambola indossava i vestiti del contadino e restava sul campo tutto l'anno facendo compagnia agli uccelli mentre banchettavano con il raccolto.

ja.title: 鳥の仲間
ja.description: この奇妙なほど痩せ衰えた畑の人形は、このエリアに住む鳥たちの仲間として設計されたものだと考えられています。人間の農家が不在になると鳥たちが寂しい思いをするため、この人形が農家の洋服を身に纏い、一年中畑に留まって、作物を大食いする鳥たちの傍にいてあげていたのでしょう。

ko.title: 새의 친구
ko.description: 이 이상한 들판 인형은 해당 지역에 거주하는 새들의 동반자로 설계된 것으로 보입니다. 인간 농부가 없으면 새들이 외로움을 느낄까 봐, 인형에게 농부의 옷을 입혀주고 일 년 내내 들판에 머물며 곡물로 배를 불리는 새들이 함께 즐겁게 지낼 수 있게 해주려는 것입니다.

zh-Hans.title: 鸟儿伴侣
zh-Hans.description: 我们认为这个干瘦的田野娃娃是专门用来给这片地区的鸟儿作伴用的。人类农夫不在的时候，鸟儿们可能会觉得孤单；这样一来，这个娃娃穿上农夫的衣服，全年都待在田地里，让鸟儿在大快朵颐作物的时候也有个陪伴。

zh-Hant.title: 鳥伴
zh-Hant.description: 我們覺得這隻奇怪的野鷹田野玩偶，是設計用來當做該區域鳥類的玩伴的。人類農夫不在田裡時，鳥類就寂寞了；所以這只玩偶穿上農夫裝，終年都站在農田裡，讓鳥類享用莊稼大餐時不孤單。

ru.title: КОМПАНЬОН ДЛЯ ПТИЦ
ru.description: Мы считаем, что эта потрепанная полевая кукла была создана, чтобы составлять компанию местным птицам. Когда фермер бывал в отъезде, птицам становилось одиноко, поэтому на полях ставили вот таких кукол, облаченных в одежду фермеров. Птицы видели куклу, и им веселее было поедать урожай.

pt-BR.title: COMPANHIA PARA PÁSSAROS
pt-BR.description: Achamos que este boneco rural estranhamente abatido servia de companhia para a população de pássaros da região. Os pássaros ficavam sozinhos na ausência do fazendeiro humano e, por isso, este boneco usava as roupas do fazendeiro e ficava nos campos o ano todo, fazendo companhia aos pássaros que se banqueteavam nas plantações.

nl.title: VOGELGEZEL
nl.description: We denken dat deze vreemd verwilderde veldpop werd ontworpen als een metgezel voor de vogelpopulatie in het gebied. De vogels werden eenzaam als de menselijke boer afwezig was, dus droeg deze pop de kleren van de boer en bleef deze het hele jaar op het veld om de vogels gezelschap te houden terwijl ze zich tegoed deden aan gewassen.

ar.title: رﻓﻴﻖ اﻟﻄﻴﻮر
ar.description: ﻧﻌﺘﻘﺪ أن ﻫﺬه اﻟﺪﻣﻴﺔ اﻟﻤﻴﺪاﻧﻴﺔ اﻟﺸﺎﺣﺒﺔ اﻟﻐﺮﻳﺒﺔ ﺻﻤﻤﺖ ﻟﺘﻜﻮن رﻓﻴﻘﺔ ﻟﻤﺠﻤﻮﻋﺔ اﻟﻄﻴﻮر ﻓﻲ اﻟﻤﻨﻄﻘﺔ. ﺣﻴﺚ ﻛﺎﻧﺖ اﻟﻄﻴﻮر ﺗﺸﻌﺮ ﺑﺎﻟﻮﺣﺪة ﻋﻨﺪﻣﺎ ﻳﻜﻮن اﻟﻤﺰارع ﻏﺎﺋﺒﺎ، ﻟﺬﻟﻚ ارﺗﺪت ﻫﺬه اﻟﺪﻣﻴﺔ ﻣﻼﺑﺲ اﻟﻤﺰارع وﺑﻘﻴﺖ ﻓﻲ اﻟﺤﻘﻞ ﻃﻮال اﻟﻌﺎم، ﻣﻊ اﻟﺤﻔﺎظ ﻋﻠﯽ ﻣﺮاﻓﻘﺔ اﻟﻄﻴﻮر ﻷﻧﻬﺎ ﺗﺘﻐﺬى ﻋﻠﯽ اﻟﻤﺤﺎﺻﻴﻞ.

tk.title: REFAKATÇİ KUŞ
tk.description: Garip biçimde bezgin bu tarla bebeğinin bölgenin kuş popülasyonu için bir refakatçi olarak tasarlandığını düşünüyoruz. İnsan çiftçilerin yokluğunda kuşlar yapayalnız kalmasın diye bu bebek, çiftçinin kıyafetlerini kuşandı ve yıl boyunca tarlada kalarak ekinlerle ziyafet çekip kuşlara eşlik etti.

fr-CA.title: COMPAGNE DES OISEAUX
fr-CA.description: Nous pensons que cette poupée campagnarde bizarrement épuisée a été conçue pour tenir compagnie à la population d'oiseaux de la région. Comme les oiseaux se sentaient seuls en l'absence du fermier humain, cette poupée portant les vêtements du fermier restait dans le champ toute l'année, tenant compagnie aux oiseaux pendant qu'ils se régalaient des récoltes.

en-AU.title: BIRD COMPANION
en-AU.description: We think this strangely haggard field doll was designed as a companion for the area's bird population. The birds would get lonely when the human farmer was absent, so this doll wore the farmer's clothes and stayed in the field all year long, keeping the birds company as they feasted on crops.

landmarks.title: BIRD COMPANION
landmarks.description: We think this strangely haggard field doll was designed as a companion for the area's bird population. The birds would get lonely when the human farmer was absent, so this doll wore the farmer's clothes and stayed in the field all year long, keeping the birds company as they feasted on crops.

landmarks.name: LM_ScentedCandle

en.title: SCENTED CANDLE ("PIECE OF CAKE")
en.description: In an effort to standardize scented candle descriptions, waxologists adopted a taxonomic structure for smells. Almost immediately, factions developed—especially around how to separate bakery and confectionary aromas. Indeed, the scent "Piece of Cake" ignited a debate so intense it led to the Great Schism of Wax. Cake was subsequently banned as a fragrance.

en-GB.title: SCENTED CANDLE ("PIECE OF CAKE")
en-GB.description: In an effort to standardise scented candle descriptions, waxologists adopted a taxonomic structure for smells. Almost immediately, factions developed—especially around how to separate bakery and confectionary aromas. Indeed, the scent "Piece of Cake" ignited a debate so intense it led to the Great Schism of Wax. Cake was subsequently banned as a fragrance.

fr.title: BOUGIE PARFUMÉE (« PART DE GÂTEAU »)
fr.description: Dans un souci d'uniformiser les descriptions des bougies parfumées, les cirologues ont adopté une structure taxonomique pour les odeurs. Des factions se sont très vite développées, en particulier sur la manière de séparer les arômes de boulangerie et de confiserie. En effet, le parfum « part de gâteau » a suscité une telle polémique qu'il a conduit au Grand Schisme de la cire. Le gâteau a ensuite été banni du monde de la parfumerie.

de.title: DUFTKERZE („KUCHENSTÜCK“)
de.description: In dem Bemühen, die Beschreibungen von Duftkerzen zu standardisieren, führten Wachsologen eine taxonomische Struktur für Düfte ein. Fast unmittelbar entwickelten sich Fraktionen – insbesondere aufgrund der Frage, wie Backwaren- und Süßwarenaromen zu trennen seien. Tatsächlich entzündete der Duft „Kuchenstück“ eine derart intensive Debatte, dass er zur „großen Wachs-Schisma“ führte. Kuchen wurde daraufhin als Duft verboten.

es.title: VELA AROMÁTICA ("TROZO DE TARTA")
es.description: En un intento por estandarizar las descripciones de las velas aromáticas, los cerólogos adoptaron una estructura taxonómica para los aromas. Casi de inmediato aparecieron facciones, especialmente en torno a cómo separar los aromas de repostería y panadería. De hecho, el olor "Trozo de tarta" hizo surgir un debate tan intenso que provocó el Gran Cisma de la Cera. Posteriormente, se prohibió la tarta como fragancia.

it.title: CANDELA PROFUMATA ("FETTA DI TORTA")
it.description: Per omologare le descrizioni delle candele profumate, gli esperti di cere adottarono una struttura tassonomica per gli odori. Si svilupparono quasi subito diverse correnti di pensiero, specialmente su come suddividere le fragranze al profumo di panetteria e quelle di pasticceria. Alla fine, l'aroma "Fetta di Torta" suscitò un dibattito così intenso da portare al Grande Scisma della Cera. La fragranza Torta fu poi bandita dal mercato.

ja.title: 香り付きキャンドル(ピース・オブ・ケーキ)
ja.description: 香り付きキャンドルの説明を規格化するため、ワックス専門家は匂いの分類構造を導入しました。導入と同時に派閥ができてしまいます。これらの派閥は主に、パン屋と焼き菓子屋の香りをどう分けるのかという部分で意見を大きく異にしていました。当然ながら、この「ピース・オブ・ケーキ」の香りは白熱した議論を引き起こし、ワックスの大分裂を発生させることになったのです。その後、ケーキはキャンドルの香りとしての使用を禁じられることになりました。

ko.title: 향초("케이크 조각")
ko.description: 향초 설명을 하나로 통일하기 위해 왁스 학자들은 향기에 분류학적 구조를 부여했습니다. 거의 즉시 각 빵집과 과자 회사별 향기를 어떻게 구분할지를 놓고 파벌이 생겨났습니다. '케이크 조각' 향을 놓고 벌어진 격렬한 논쟁은 결국 '위대한 왁스의 독립'으로 이어졌습니다. 이후 케이크는 향수로서의 지위를 박탈당했습니다.

zh-Hans.title: 香味蜡烛（“蛋糕块”）
zh-Hans.description: 为了让香味蜡烛的描述标准化，蜡学家采用了香味分类结构。几乎是在同一时间，不同的派系出现了 – 尤其是在如何区分烘焙和糖果香味方面。事实上，“蛋糕块”的香味引发了一场激烈的争论，导致了“蜡烛大分裂”。蛋糕随后被禁止作为香料。

zh-Hant.title: 香氛蠟燭 (「蛋糕塊」)
zh-Hant.description: 為了統一香氛蠟燭的性質，蠟學家制定了香味分類結構。不久之後，形成了多個派系，尤其是針對如何區分麵包和甜點的香味。事實上，「蛋糕塊」香味引發激烈爭論，導致蠟燭大分裂事件。後來，蛋糕禁止當作香味使用。

ru.title: АРОМАТИЧЕСКАЯ СВЕЧА («КУСОК ПИРОГА»)
ru.description: В попытках стандартизировать описания ароматических свечей специалисты по воску выбрали описательную структуру запахов. Почти сразу же возникли распри, особенно о том, как разделить хлебобулочные и кондитерские ароматы. Вокруг запаха «Кусок пирога» разгорелись настолько жаркие споры, что это привело к Великому Восковому Расколу. Впоследствии в качестве аромата пирог был запрещен.

pt-BR.title: VELA AROMÁTICA (“VAI DAR BOLO”)
pt-BR.description: Na tentativa de padronizar as descrições das velas aromáticas, os cerologistas adotaram uma estrutura taxonômica para os perfumes. A divisão de opiniões foi imediata, especialmente no que dizia respeito à separação de aromas de padaria e confeitaria: a essência “vai dar bolo” gerou um debate tão intenso que ocasionou a Grande Cisão da Cera. Por causa disso, os aromas de bolo foram proibidos.

nl.title: GEURKAARS ("STUKJE CAKE")
nl.description: In een poging om de beschrijvingen van geurkaarsen te standaardiseren, namen wassologen een taxonomische structuur aan voor geuren. Vrijwel onmiddellijk ontwikkelden zich facties, met name rondom het scheiden van bak- en zoetwarenaroma's. Voorwaar, de geur "Stukje Cake" ontstak een debat dat zo intens was dat het leidde tot het Grote Wasschisma. Cake werd vervolgens verboden als geurstof.

ar.title: اﻟﺸﻤﻊ اﻟﻤﻌﻄﺮ )"راﺋﺤﺔ اﻟﻜﻌﻚ" (
ar.description: ﺑﻬﺪف ﺗﻮﺣﻴﺪ أوﺻﺎف اﻟﺸﻤﻊ اﻟﻤﻌﻄﺮ، ﺗﺒﻨﯽ ﻋﻠﻤﺎء اﻟﺸﻤﻊ ﻫﻴﻜﻼ ﺗﺼﻨﻴﻔﻴﺎ ﻟﻠﺮواﺋﺢ. وﺳﺮﻋﺎن ﻣﺎ ﻇﻬﺮت اﻻﻧﻘﺴﺎﻣﺎت - ﺧﺎﺻﺔ ﺣﻮل ﻛﻴﻔﻴﺔ اﻟﻔﺼﻞ ﺑﻴﻦ رواﺋﺢ اﻟﻤﺨﺒﻮزات واﻟﺤﻠﻮﻳﺎت. وﺑﺎﻟﻄﺒﻊ، أﺛﺎرت "راﺋﺤﺔ اﻟﻜﻌﻚ" ﺟﺪﻻ ﻛﺒﻴﺮا أدى إﻟﯽ اﻻﻧﺸﻘﺎق اﻟﻜﺒﻴﺮ ﻟﻠﺸﻤﻊ. وﺑﻌﺪﻫﺎ ﻣﻨﻊ اﺳﺘﺨﺪام ﻋﻄﺮ اﻟﻜﻌﻚ ﻣﺠﺪدا.

tk.title: KOKULU MUM ("BİR DİLİM KEK")
tk.description: Kokulu mum tanımlarını standartlaştırma çabasına giren mumbilimciler, kokular için taksonomik bir yapı benimsedi. Çok geçmeden fırın ve şekerleme aromalarının nasıl ayrılacağıyla ilgili ihtilaflar baş gösterdi. Hatta ve hatta "Bir Dilim Kek" kokusu öyle yoğun bir tartışma alevlendi ki Mum Skizmasına yol açtı. Ardından kekin kokusunun kullanılması yasaklandı.

fr-CA.title: BOUGIE PARFUMÉE (« MORCEAU DE GÂTEAU »)
fr-CA.description: Dans un souci d'uniformiser les descriptions des bougies parfumées, les cirologues ont adopté une structure taxonomique pour les odeurs. Des groupes se sont très vite formés, en particulier sur la manière de séparer les arômes de boulangerie et de confiserie. Pour sa part, le parfum « morceau de gâteau » a suscité une telle polémique qu'il a conduit au Grand Schisme de cire. Le gâteau a ensuite été banni du monde de la parfumerie.

en-AU.title: SCENTED CANDLE ("PIECE OF CAKE")
en-AU.description: In an effort to standardise scented candle descriptions, waxologists adopted a taxonomic structure for smells. Almost immediately, factions developed—especially around how to separate bakery and confectionary aromas. Indeed, the scent "Piece of Cake" ignited a debate so intense it led to the Great Schism of Wax. Cake was subsequently banned as a fragrance.

landmarks.title: SCENTED CANDLE ("PIECE OF CAKE")
landmarks.description: In an effort to standardize scented candle descriptions, waxologists adopted a taxonomic structure for smells. Almost immediately, factions developed—especially around how to separate bakery and confectionary aromas. Indeed, the scent "Piece of Cake" ignited a debate so intense it led to the Great Schism of Wax. Cake was subsequently banned as a fragrance.

landmarks.name: LM_SchroedingersBox

en.title: SCHRÖDINGER'S BOX
en.description: This storage device comes from the Oxford attic of the physicist Erwin Schrödinger. The box has proven impossible to open, but may or may not contain a cat. A previous caretaker has poked air holes in the top "to be on the safe side".

en-GB.title: SCHRÖDINGER'S BOX
en-GB.description: This storage device comes from the Oxford attic of the physicist Erwin Schrödinger. The box has proven impossible to open, but may or may not contain a cat. A previous caretaker has poked air holes in the top "to be on the safe side".

fr.title: BOÎTE DE SCHRÖDINGER
fr.description: Ce dispositif de stockage provient du grenier oxonien du physicien Erwin Schrödinger. Personne n'a jamais réussi à ouvrir la boîte, mais elle pourrait contenir ou non un chat. Un ancien gardien a percé des trous d'air sur le haut « pour rester du bon côté ».

de.title: SCHRÖDINGERS KISTE
de.description: Dieses Aufbewahrungsgerät stammt aus dem Dachboden des Physikers Erwin Schrödinger in Oxford. Die Kiste lässt sich nicht öffnen, aber sie enthält entweder eine Katze oder keine Katze. Ein vorheriger Besitzer hat Löcher in die Oberseite gebohrt, „um auf der sicheren Seite zu sein“.

es.title: LA CAJA DE SCHRÖDINGER
es.description: Este dispositivo de almacenamiento procede del ático del físico Erwin Schrödinger en Oxford. Ha resultado imposible abrir la caja, pero puede que contenga o no un gato. Una cuidadora anterior ha hecho orificios de ventilación en la parte de arriba "por si acaso".

it.title: SCATOLA DI SCHRÖDINGER
it.description: Questo strumento arriva dal sottotetto di Oxford del fisico Erwin Schrödinger. La scatola è impossibile da aprire, ma potrebbe contenere o meno un gatto. Una persona che se ne occupava in precedenza ha praticato dei fori per l'aria in cima alla scatola "per andare sul sicuro".

ja.title: シュレーディンガーの箱
ja.description: この収容デバイスは、物理学者エルヴィン・シュレーディンガーのオックスフォードの屋根裏から来たものです。この箱を開くことは不可能であると証明されており、猫が入っているかどうかは謎のままです。前の世話人が、「念のために」と空気穴を開けておきました。

ko.title: 슈뢰딩거의 상자
ko.description: 이 저장 용기는 옥스포드 다락방의 물리학자 어윈 슈뢰딩거의 물건입니다. 이 상자는 열 수가 없으며, 안에는 고양이가 있을 수도 있고 없을 수도 있습니다. 이전 상자 관리자는 만일을 대비해 구멍을 뚫어놓았습니다.

zh-Hans.title: 薛定谔的盒子
zh-Hans.description: 该存储装置来自物理学家埃尔温·薛定谔的牛津阁楼。这个盒子已经证明是打不开的，但里面可能有或没有猫。之前的保管者“为了保险起见”，在顶部戳了几个通气孔。

zh-Hant.title: 薛丁格之箱
zh-Hant.description: 這個儲存裝置來自物理學家埃爾溫‧薛丁格位在牛津的閣樓。這個箱子無法打開，但裡面可能有或沒有貓。之前的保管者為了「以防萬一」，在箱子上面戳了幾個通氣孔。

ru.title: КОРОБКА ШРЁДИНГЕРА
ru.description: Идея этого устройства для хранения родилась в голове Эрвина Шрёдингера, физика из Оксфорда. Доказано, что коробку невозможно открыть, но она может содержать или не содержать кошку. Предыдущий сторож наделал в верхней части отверстий, «от греха подальше».

pt-BR.title: CAIXA DE SCHRÖDINGER
pt-BR.description: Este dispositivo de armazenagem foi encontrado num sótão de Oxford que pertenceu ao físico Erwin Schrödinger. É uma caixa impossível de abrir e pode ou não conter um gato. O antigo dono fez alguns furos na parte de cima só por garantia.

nl.title: SCHRÖDINGERS KIST
nl.description: Dit opslagmiddel is afkomstig van de Oxford-zolder van de natuurkundige Erwin Schrödinger. De kist is onmogelijk te openen gebleken, maar kan al dan niet een kat bevatten. Een vorige conciërge heeft bovenin "voor de zekerheid" luchtgaten geprikt.

ar.title: ﺻﻨﺪوق ﺷﺮودﻧﻐﺮ
ar.description: ﻛﺎن ﺟﻬﺎز اﻟﺘﺨﺰﻳﻦ ﻫﺬا ﺿﻤﻦ ﻣﻘﺘﻨﻴﺎت ﻋﻠﻴﺔ أوﻛﺴﻔﻮرد اﻟﺘﺎﺑﻌﺔ ﻟﻌﺎﻟﻢ اﻟﻔﻴﺰﻳﺎء إرﻓﻴﻦ ﺷﺮودﻧﻐﺮ وﻗﺪ ﺛﺒﺖ أﻧﻪ ﻳﺴﺘﺤﻴﻞ ﻓﺘﺢ اﻟﺼﻨﺪوق، ﻟﻜﻨﻪ ﻗﺪ ﻳﺤﺘﻮي ﻋﻠﯽ ﻗﻄﺔ أو ﻗﺪ ﻻ ﻳﺤﺘﻮي ﻋﻠﻴﻬﺎ. ﻓﻘﺪ ﺛﻘﺐ أﺣﺪ اﻟﻘﺎﺋﻤﻴﻦ اﻟﺴﺎﺑﻘﻴﻦ ﻋﻠﯽ اﻟﺮﻋﺎﻳﺔ ﻓﺘﺤﺎت ﺗﻬﻮﻳﺔ أﻋﻠﯽ اﻟﺼﻨﺪوق "ﻟﻠﺘﺄﻛﺪ ﻣﻦ ﺳﻼﻣﺔ اﻟﻮﺿﻊ" .

tk.title: SCHRÖDINGER'İN KUTUSU
tk.description: Bu depolama cihazı, fizikçi Erwin Schrödinger'in Oxford'daki tavan arasından geliyor. Kutunun açılmasının mümkün olmadığı kanıtlanmıştır ancak içinde kedi olabilir veya olmayabilir. Kutunun bir önceki sahibi, işi garantiye almak için kutunun üstüne hava delikleri açmış.

fr-CA.title: BOÎTE DE SCHRÖDINGER
fr-CA.description: Ce dispositif de stockage provient du grenier de la résidence d'Oxford du physicien Erwin Schrödinger. La boîte n'a jamais pu être ouverte, mais elle pourrait contenir ou non un chat. Un ancien gardien a percé des trous d'air sur le haut « pour ne pas prendre de risque ».

en-AU.title: SCHRÖDINGER'S BOX
en-AU.description: This storage device comes from the Oxford attic of the physicist Erwin Schrödinger. The box has proven impossible to open, but may or may not contain a cat. A previous caretaker has poked air holes in the top "to be on the safe side".

landmarks.name: LM_SemiColon

en.title: WINK EMOJI DOTS
en.description: Disgruntled human grammar prescriptivists became so outraged over "mistreatment" of the semicolon that they attempted a punctuation coup. Their main goal was to stop other humans from referring to it as "those wink emoji dots".

en-GB.title: WINK EMOJI DOTS
en-GB.description: Disgruntled human grammar prescriptivists became so outraged over "mistreatment" of the semicolon that they attempted a punctuation coup. Their main goal was to stop other humans from referring to it as "those wink emoji dots".

fr.title: POINTS EMOJI CLIN D'ŒIL
fr.description: Les normativistes de la grammaire humaine ont été si indignés par le « mauvais traitement » infligé au point-virgule qu'ils ont lancé un mouvement ponctuationniste. Leur objectif principal étant d'empêcher les autres humains de s'y référer comme ces « points emoji clin d'œil ».

de.title: ZWINKER-EMOJI-PUNKTE
de.description: Verdrossene menschliche Grammatik-Präskriptivisten waren über die „Misshandlung“ des Semikolon derart verärgert, dass sie einen Zeichensetzungs-Coup versuchten. Ihr Hauptziel war es, der Bezeichnung des Semikolons als „diese Zwinker-Emoji-Punkte“ ein Ende zu setzen.

es.title: PUNTOS DEL EMOJI DEL GUIÑO
es.description: Los gramáticos prescriptivistas humanos se pusieron tan furiosos por el "mal uso" del punto y coma que intentaron dar un golpe de estado en el mundo de la puntuación. Su principal objetivo era impedir que otros humanos se refiriesen al punto y coma como "los puntos esos del emoji del guiño".

it.title: PUNTI DELL'EMOJI OCCHIOLINO
it.description: I prospettivisti della grammatica umana di cattivo umore si arrabbiarono talmente tanto riguardo al "maltrattamento" del punto e virgola che tentarono un colpo di stato della punteggiatura. Il loro obiettivo principale era far sì che gli umani smettessero di riferirsi al punto e virgola come ai "punti dell'emoji occhiolino".

ja.title: ウインクの絵文字のドット
ja.description: 不満を抱いた人間の文法規範論者は、セミコロンの「虐待」に激怒し、句読点のクーデターを試みました。彼らの主な狙いは、他の人間たちがセミコロンのことを「あのウインクの絵文字のドット」と呼ぶのをやめさせることでした。

ko.title: 윙크 이모티콘 점
ko.description: 분노한 인간 문법 근본주의자들은 세미콜론의 '남용'에 크게 분노하며 구두법 쿠데타를 일으켰습니다. 이들의 목표는 인간들이 세미콜론을 '윙크 이모티콘 점'이라고 부르지 못하게 하는 것이었습니다.

zh-Hans.title: 眨眼表情点
zh-Hans.description: 不满的人类语法规范主义者对分号的“滥用”感到愤怒，他们试图发动一场标点革命。他们的主要目的是阻止其他人将其称为“那些眨眼表情点”。

zh-Hant.title: 眨眼表情符號點
zh-Hant.description: 不滿的人類文法規範家對分號的「誤用」感到氣憤，因而發起一場標點符號抗爭活動。他們的主要目標是要制止其他人類把分號當成「眨眼表情符號點」使用。

ru.title: СИМВОЛЫ ПОДМИГИВАЮЩЕГО ЭМОДЗИ
ru.description: Рассерженные человеческие приверженцы грамматики были в такой ярости из-за «плохого обращения» с точкой с запятой, что затеяли пунктуационный переворот. Основной целью было запретить другим людям называть их «те символы подмигивающего эмодзи».

pt-BR.title: OLHOS DO EMOJI DE PISCADA
pt-BR.description: Prescritivistas gramaticais humanos, ultrajados com a forma com a qual o ponto-e-vírgula estava sendo tratado, tentaram dar um golpe pontuacional. Seu principal objetivo era impedir que outros humanos se referissem à esta pontuação como “os olhos do emoji de piscada”.

nl.title: KNIPOOGEMOJI'S
nl.description: Mensentaalkundigen waren zo boos over het verkeerde gebruik van de puntkomma dat ze een interpunctierevolutie probeerden te organiseren. Hun voornaamste doel was om te voorkomen dat mensen de puntkomma de 'emoji voor een knipoog' noemden.

ar.title: ﻧﻘﺎط ﺗﺸﻜﻞ رﻣﺰا ﺗﻌﺒﻴﺮﻳﺎ ﻳﻐﻤﺰ ﺑﻌﻴﻨﻪ
ar.description: اﺳﺘﺸﺎط ﻏﻀﺒﺎ ﻣﺪﻗﻘﻮ اﻟﻘﻮاﻋﺪ اﻟﻠﻐﻮﻳﺔ ﻣﻦ اﻟﺒﺸﺮ، اﻟﻤﺴﺘﺎؤون ﺑﺴﺒﺐ "ﺳﻮء ﻣﻌﺎﻣﻠﺔ" اﻟﻔﺎﺻﻠﺔ اﻟﻤﻨﻘﻮﻃﺔ ﻟﺪرﺟﺔ أﻧﻬﻢ ﻗﺎﻣﻮا ﺑﻤﺤﺎوﻟﺔ اﻧﻘﻼب ﺗﺮﻗﻴﻤﻲ. وﻛﺎن ﻫﺪﻓﻬﻢ اﻟﺮﺋﻴﺲ ﻫﻮ إﻳﻘﺎف اﻟﺒﺸﺮ ﻋﻦ اﻹﺷﺎرة إﻟﯽ اﻟﻔﺎﺻﻠﺔ اﻟﻤﻨﻘﻮﻃﺔ ﺑﻮﺻﻔﻬﺎ "ﻧﻘﺎﻃﺎ ﺗﺸﻜﻞ رﻣﺰا ﺗﻌﺒﻴﺮﻳﺎ ﻳﻐﻤﺰ ﺑﻌﻴﻨﻪ" .

tk.title: GÖZ KIRPMA EMOJİSİ NOKTALARI
tk.description: Gramer kurallarının daima uygulanması gerektiğini düşünen insanlar noktalı virgüle yapılan "kötü muamele" karşısında o kadar öfkelenmişti ki noktalama darbesi yapmaya teşebbüs ettiler. Diğer insanların noktalı virgül için "göz kırpma emojisindeki nokta" ifadesini kullanmalarını önlemeyi amaçlıyorlardı.

fr-CA.title: ÉMOJI CLIN D'ŒIL
fr-CA.description: Les prescriptivistes de la grammaire humaine ont été si indignés par le « mauvais traitement » réservé au point-virgule qu'ils ont lancé un mouvement ponctuationniste. Leur objectif principal était que les autres humains cessent d'en parler comme étant cet « émoji clin d'œil ».

en-AU.title: WINK EMOJI DOTS
en-AU.description: Disgruntled human grammar prescriptivists became so outraged over "mistreatment" of the semicolon that they attempted a punctuation coup. Their main goal was to stop other humans from referring to it as "those wink emoji dots".

landmarks.title: WINK EMOJI DOTS
landmarks.description: Disgruntled human grammar prescriptivists became so outraged over "mistreatment" of the semicolon that they attempted a punctuation coup. Their main goal was to stop other humans from referring to it as "those wink emoji dots".

landmarks.name: LM_ShoppingCart

en.title: JUVENILE BASKET
en.description: Despite its large size, this wire creature has been identified as the larval form of a shopping basket. Monster scientists came to this conclusion after observing it under test conditions and noting many examples of traditional toddler behavior. These included heading in a different direction than expected, continual squeaking, and a love of running downhill fast.

en-GB.title: JUVENILE BASKET
en-GB.description: Despite its large size, this wire creature has been identified as the larval form of a shopping basket. Monster scientists came to this conclusion after observing it under test conditions and noting many examples of traditional toddler behaviour. These included heading in a different direction than expected, continual squeaking, and a love of running downhill fast.

fr.title: PANIER JUVÉNILE
fr.description: Malgré sa grande taille, cette créature en fil de fer a été identifiée comme étant la forme larvaire d'un panier de courses. Les scientifiques monstres sont arrivés à cette conclusion après avoir observé, lors de nombreux tests, de nombreux exemples de comportement traditionnel des bambins. Par exemple, elles se dirigent souvent dans une direction différente à celle prévue, elles poussent des couinements en permanence et elles aiment dévaler des pentes.

de.title: JUGENDLICHER KORB
de.description: Trotz seiner Größe wurde diese Drahtkreatur als Larvenform des Einkaufskorbs identifiziert. Monsterforscher kamen zu diesem Schluss, nachdem sie ihn unter Testbedingungen beobachtet und viele Beispiele für das traditionelle Kleinkinderverhalten von Körben notiert hatten. Dazu gehörten in eine andere Richtung zu fahren als erwartet, ständiges Quietschen und die Vorliebe, schnell bergab zu fahren.

es.title: CESTA JUVENIL
es.description: A pesar de su enorme tamaño, se ha identificado a esta criatura como la forma larval de un carrito de la compra. Los monstruos científicos llegaron a esta conclusión tras observarla en un entorno de prueba y constatar el mismo patrón de comportamiento habitual entre crías. Entre estos comportamientos se encuentra dirigirse a una dirección diferente a la esperada, llantos constantes y tendencia a correr cuesta abajo a toda velocidad.

it.title: CESTINO GIOVANE
it.description: Nonostante le sue grandi dimensioni, questa creatura di ferro è stata identificata come la forma larvale di un cestino per la spesa. Gli scienziati mostri sono arrivati a questa conclusione dopo averlo osservato in condizioni di prova e aver osservato molti esempi dei comportamenti tipici dei bambini. Questi includevano: il dirigersi in una direzione diversa rispetto a quella prevista, uno stridio continuo e la passione per le discese rapide.

ja.title: 未熟なバスケット
ja.description: サイズは大きいのですが、この針金状の生物は買い物かごの幼虫であると認定されました。モンスター科学者たちがこれを試験的状況下で観察した際、伝統的な幼児の振る舞いを多く目撃することになったため、このような結論に至ったのです。その振る舞いの例には、予測していない方向へ向かう、断続的にキーキー声を出している、そして下り坂を高速で降りて行くことをこよなく愛している、などが含まれています。

ko.title: 어린 쇼핑 카트
ko.description: 크기는 제법 크지만, 이 철사로 된 생명체는 사실 쇼핑 카트의 유아 버전입니다. 몬스터 과학자들은 전통적인 어린이들의 행동 사례와 통제된 실험을 진행한 끝에 이러한 결론에 도달했습니다. 이 실험에는 가야 하는 방향으로 이동할 수 있는지 여부, 계속 끼익끼익 소리를 내는지 여부, 내리막길에서 기뻐하며 마구 질주하는지 여부가 포함되어 있습니다.

zh-Hans.title: 幼年篮子
zh-Hans.description: 虽然尺寸巨大，这个用金属丝制作的生物被认为是购物篮的幼年形态。在测试条件下深入观察后，怪兽科学家们发现其具有众多传统幼儿行为，于是才作出这一结论。这些行为包括会往预期之外方向行动、持续发出响声和喜欢快速冲下坡道。

zh-Hant.title: 青春購物籃
zh-Hant.description: 儘管它的體型龐大，這款金屬絲生物已被認明為未成年的購物籃。怪獸科學家在測試條件下觀察這籃子，同時發現到許多傳統幼兒行為的例子後，得出了這個結論。這些行為包括：不按預期的朝不同方向前進、不斷發出嘎吱聲，還有熱愛疾速俯衝下坡。

ru.title: ДЕТЕНЫШ ТЕЛЕЖКИ
ru.description: Несмотря на большой размер, это проволочное существо, несомненно, является личинкой тележки для покупок. Ученые монстры пришли к такому выводу после того, как понаблюдали за существом в условиях эксперимента и отметили множество примеров поведения, свойственного детенышам. Эти примеры включают в себя движение в непредсказуемых направлениях, постоянный писк и любовь к внезапному быстрому бегу под горку.

pt-BR.title: CESTO JUVENIL
pt-BR.description: Apesar de ser grande, esta criatura de arame era identificada como a forma larval de um cesto de compras. Os cientistas monstros chegaram a essa conclusão depois de observá-lo sob condições de testes e notar muitos exemplos do comportamento tradicional das crianças humanas. Dentre eles, temos a mudança inesperada de direção, os guinchos contínuos e a tendência a correr em declives.

nl.title: JEUGDIGE MAND
nl.description: Ondanks zijn grote formaat is dit draadwezen geïdentificeerd als de larvenvorm van een winkelmandje. Monsterwetenschappers kwamen tot deze conclusie nadat ze het onder testomstandigheden hadden geobserveerd en veel voorbeelden van traditioneel peutergedrag hadden opgemerkt. Deze omvatten in een andere richting gaan dan verwacht, voortdurend piepen en een liefde voor snel bergafwaarts rennen.

ar.title: ﺳﻠﺔ اﻷﻃﻔﺎل
ar.description: ﻋﻠﯽ اﻟﺮﻏﻢ ﻣﻦ ﺣﺠﻤﻪ اﻟﻜﺒﻴﺮ، ﻳﻌﺮف ﻫﺬا اﻟﻤﺨﻠﻮق اﻟﺴﻠﻜﻲ ﺑﺎﻋﺘﺒﺎره اﻟﻄﻮر اﻟﻴﺮﻗﻲ ﻟﺴﻠﺔ اﻟﺘﺴﻮق. ﺗﻮﺻﻞ ﻋﻠﻤﺎء retsnoM إﻟﯽ ﻫﺬا اﻻﺳﺘﻨﺘﺎج ﺑﻌﺪ ﻣﻼﺣﻈﺘﻪ ﻓﻲ ﻇﻞ ﻇﺮوف اﻻﺧﺘﺒﺎر وﻣﻼﺣﻈﺔ اﻟﻌﺪﻳﺪ ﻣﻦ اﻷﻣﺜﻠﺔ ﻋﻠﯽ اﻟﺴﻠﻮك اﻟﺘﻘﻠﻴﺪي ﻟﻸﻃﻔﺎل اﻟﺼﻐﺎر. وﺷﻤﻞ ذﻟﻚ اﻟﺘﻮﺟﻪ ﻧﺤﻮ اﺗﺠﺎه ﻣﺨﺘﻠﻒ ﻋﻤﺎ ﻛﺎن ﻣﺘﻮﻗﻌﺎ، واﻟﺼﺮﻳﺮ اﻟﻤﺴﺘﻤﺮ، وﺣﺐ اﻟﺮﻛﺾ ﺑﺴﺮﻋﺔ ﻷﺳﻔﻞ اﻟﻤﻨﺤﺪرات.

tk.title: GENÇ SEPETİ
tk.description: Büyük boyutuna rağmen bu tel yaratık, bir alışveriş sepetinin larvamsı formu olarak tanımlanmıştır. Canavar bilim insanları, deney koşulları altında yaptıkları gözlemlerden ve yürümeye başlayan çocukların davranışına dair geleneksel birçok örneği kaydettikten sonra bu sonuca vardılar. Beklenenden farklı bir yöne gitmek, sürekli ağlamak ve yokuş aşağı hızla koşma sevgisi bulgular arasındaydı.

fr-CA.title: PANIER JUVÉNILE
fr-CA.description: Malgré sa grande taille, cette créature en fil de fer a été identifiée comme étant la forme larvaire d'un panier d'épicerie. Les scientifiques monstres sont arrivés à cette conclusion après avoir observé, lors de nombreux tests, de nombreux exemples de comportement traditionnel des bambins. Par exemple, elles se dirigent souvent dans une direction différente à celle prévue, elles poussent des couinements en permanence et elles aiment dévaler des pentes.

en-AU.title: JUVENILE BASKET
en-AU.description: Despite its large size, this wire creature has been identified as the larval form of a shopping basket. Monster scientists came to this conclusion after observing it under test conditions and noting many examples of traditional toddler behaviour. These included heading in a different direction than expected, continual squeaking, and a love of running downhill fast.

landmarks.title: JUVENILE BASKET
landmarks.description: Despite its large size, this wire creature has been identified as the larval form of a shopping basket. Monster scientists came to this conclusion after observing it under test conditions and noting many examples of traditional toddler behavior. These included heading in a different direction than expected, continual squeaking, and a love of running downhill fast.

landmarks.name: LM_ShowerInACan

en.title: BATH IN A CAN!
en.description: True baths were warm puddles in which humans marinated, simmering gently for up to an hour (or until they smelt "fresh"). Bath-In-A-Can! offered a shortcut whereby the human spritzed themself liberally with perfume, using the faux-fresh smell to conceal older ones.

en-GB.title: BATH IN A CAN!
en-GB.description: True baths were warm puddles in which humans marinated, simmering gently for up to an hour (or until they smelt "fresh"). Bath-In-A-Can! offered a shortcut whereby the human spritzed themself liberally with perfume, using the faux-fresh smell to conceal older ones.

fr.title: BAIN EN CANETTE !
fr.description: Les vrais bains consistaient en des flaques d'eau chaudes dans lesquelles les humains se laissaient mariner, mijotant parfois pendant une heure (ou jusqu'à ce qu'ils se sentent « frais »). Bain en canette ! proposait un raccourci où l'humain se vaporisait généreusement de parfum, masquant ainsi les anciennes odeurs au profit d'autres supposément plus fraîches.

de.title: BAD IN DER DOSE!
de.description: Echte Bäder waren warme Pfützen, in denen sich Menschen marinierten und bis zu einer Stunde (oder bis sie „frisch“ rochen) leicht vor sich hin köchelten. Bad in der Dose! bot hierfür eine Abkürzung, indem Menschen sich großzügig mit Parfüm einsprühten und den künstlich-frischen Duft nutzten, um ältere Gerüche zu verbergen.

es.title: ¡BAÑO EN BOTE!
es.description: Los auténticos baños eran charcas cálidas en las que los humanos se marinaban, cociéndose a fuego lento durante hasta una hora (o hasta oler "a limpio"). El "¡Baño en bote!" ofrecía un atajo mediante el cual el humano se rociaba generosamente de perfume, usando el falso olor fresco para disimular los antiguos.

it.title: BAGNO SPRAY!
it.description: I bagni erano delle pozzanghere tiepide in cui gli umani si marinavano, ribollendo dolcemente fino a un'ora (o finché non profumavano "di pulito"). Il Bagno Spray! offriva una scorciatoia tramite la quale gli umani si spruzzavano abbondantemente di profumo, usando il finto odore di pulito per coprire i vecchi olezzi.

ja.title: 缶のお風呂！
ja.description: 本物のお風呂とは、人間が水たまりの中でマリネされ、最高で1時間ほどじっくりコトコト煮込まれることです(または、「フレッシュ」な匂いになるまで)。缶のお風呂！を使えば、人間が大量の香水を振り撒き、偽造の匂いを使って古いニオイを隠すことができるのです。

ko.title: 통조림 목욕!
ko.description: 인간들은 따뜻한 물 웅덩이에 몸을 한 시간 이상 절이며(또는 '좋은 냄새'가 날 때까지) 목욕을 했습니다. 인간들은 통조림 목욕!을 사용하여 신선한 냄새로 예전 냄새를 가리기 위한 향수를 쉽게 잔뜩 바를 수 있었습니다.

zh-Hans.title: 圆罐沐浴！
zh-Hans.description: 真正的浴缸是温暖的水池，人类在里面悠闲地泡上一个小时（或者直到感觉“清新”）。圆罐沐浴！提供了一条捷径，人类可以随意喷洒香水，用人造的清爽气味来掩盖原来的气味。

zh-Hant.title: 沐浴罐！
zh-Hant.description: 真正的浴缸是溫暖的水池，人類最久能在裡面悠閒地泡上一小時 (或直到聞起來有「清新味」)。沐浴罐！提供便捷的方式，讓人類可以在身上大量噴灑香水，使用人工香味掩蓋原本的味道。

ru.title: ВАННА ВО ФЛАКОНЕ!
ru.description: Настоящие ванны были горячими лужами, в которых люди медленно варились в течение часа (или пока не почуют «свежесть»). ВАННА ВО ФЛАКОНЕ! предлагала ускоренный способ, при котором люди щедро брызгали на себя душистым веществом, чтобы скрыть старые запахи под искусственно свежим.

pt-BR.title: BANHO ENLATADO!
pt-BR.description: As banheiras consistiam em poças d’água quente nas quais os humanos ficavam em banho-maria por até uma hora (ou até se sentirem limpos). O banho enlatado era uma alternativa na qual o humano pulverizava perfume sobre si deliberadamente, usando o cheiro falso de limpeza para ocultar os aromas antigos.

nl.title: BAD IN EEN BUS!
nl.description: Echte baden waren warme poelen waarin mensen zich marineerden en tot een uur lang zachtjes sudderden (of tot ze "vers" roken). Bad-in-een-bus! bood een eenvoudigere manier, waarbij de mens zich rijkelijk met parfum besprenkelde, waarbij de nep-verse geur werd gebruikt om de rijpere geuren te verbergen.

ar.title: ﺳﺎﺋﻞ اﺳﺘﺤﻤﺎم ﻓﻲ ﻋﻠﺒﺔ!
ar.description: ﻛﺎﻧﺖ ﺳﻮاﺋﻞ اﻻﺳﺘﺤﻤﺎم اﻟﺤﻘﻴﻘﻴﺔ ﺗﻜﻮن ﻓﻘﺎﻋﺎت داﻓﺌﺔ ﻳﻨﻐﻤﺲ ﻓﻴﻬﺎ اﻟﺒﺸﺮ، وﺗﻐﻠﻲ ﺑﺒﻂء ﻟﻄﻴﻒ ﻟﻤﺪة ﺗﺼﻞ إﻟﯽ ﺳﺎﻋﺔ )أو ﺣﺘﯽ ﺗﺼﺒﺢ راﺋﺤﺘﻬﺎ "ﻣﻨﻌﺸﺔ"(. أﻣﺎ ﺳﺎﺋﻞ اﻻﺳﺘﺤﻤﺎم اﻟﻤﻮﺟﻮد ﻓﻲ ﻋﻠﺒﺔ، ﻓﻘﺪ أﺗﺎح ﻟﻠﺒﺸﺮ ﻃﺮﻳﻘﺔ ﻣﺨﺘﺼﺮة ﻟﺮش أﻧﻔﺴﻬﻢ ﺑﺎﻟﻌﻄﺮ ﺑﺤﺮﻳﺔ، ﻣﺴﺘﺨﺪﻣﻴﻦ راﺋﺤﺔ اﻟﺰﻫﻮر اﻟﺼﻨﺎﻋﻴﺔ اﻟﻤﻨﻌﺸﺔ ﻹﺧﻔﺎء اﻟﺮواﺋﺢ اﻟﻘﺪﻳﻤﺔ.

tk.title: TENEKEDE DUŞ!
tk.description: Gerçek banyolar, insanların marine olup ve yaklaşık bir saat (veya "taze" kokana kadar) kaynadığı sıcak su birikintileriydi. Tenekede Duş!, insanların önceki kokuların üstünü örtmek için suni taze bir koku kullanarak kendilerine bol miktarda parfüm püskürttükleri bir kısa yol sundu.

fr-CA.title: BAIN EN CANETTE!
fr-CA.description: Les vrais bains consistaient en des flaques d'eau chaude dans lesquelles les humains se laissaient mariner, mijotant parfois pendant une heure (ou jusqu'à ce qu'ils sentent « frais »). Bain en canette! proposait un raccourci où l'humain se vaporisait généreusement de parfum, masquant ainsi les anciennes odeurs par de plus fraîches.

en-AU.title: BATH IN A CAN!
en-AU.description: True baths were warm puddles in which humans marinated, simmering gently for up to an hour (or until they smelt "fresh"). Bath-In-A-Can! offered a shortcut whereby the human spritzed themself liberally with perfume, using the faux-fresh smell to conceal older ones.

landmarks.title: BATH IN A CAN!
landmarks.description: True baths were warm puddles in which humans marinated, simmering gently for up to an hour (or until they smelt "fresh"). Bath-In-A-Can! offered a shortcut whereby the human spritzed themself liberally with perfume, using the faux-fresh smell to conceal older ones.

landmarks.name: LM_ShowerTemperatureDial

en.title: HOSTILE WASHER
en.description: While the dial of this washer suggests a full spectrum of heat settings, we have only been able to activate two. One is "hotter than the sun", and the other, when any other faucet is being used within a 5-mile radius, is "hypothermia". To protect themselves from harm, humans often kept the device in a glass cage.

en-GB.title: HOSTILE WASHER
en-GB.description: While the dial of this washer suggests a full spectrum of heat settings, we have only been able to activate two. One is "hotter than the sun", and the other, when any other tap is being used within a 5-mile radius, is "hypothermia". To protect themselves from harm, humans often kept the device in a glass cage.

fr.title: APPAREIL LAVANT HOSTILE
fr.description: Bien que le cadran de cet appareil suggère une gamme complète de réglages de chaleur, nous n'avons pu en activer que deux. Le premier réglage est « plus chaud que le soleil », et l'autre, lorsque n'importe quel autre robinet est utilisé dans un rayon de 5 kilomètres, est « hypothermie ». Pour se protéger de cet appareil, les humains le gardaient souvent dans une cage de verre.

de.title: FEINDSELIGE WASCHANLAGE
de.description: Obwohl das Mischpult dieser Waschanlage ein volles Spektrum an Wärmeeinstellungen angibt, konnten wir nur zwei verschiedene Einstellungen wählen. Die eine ist „heißer als die Sonne“ und die andere aktiviert sich nur, wenn innerhalb eines Umkreises von 5 Meilen irgendein anderer Wasserhahn benutzt wird, und wird „Unterkühlung“ genannt. Um sich vor Schaden zu schützen, haben Menschen dieses Gerät oft in Glaskäfigen gehalten.

es.title: LAVADOR HOSTIL
es.description: Aunque la esfera de este lavador muestra un amplio rango de modos de temperatura, solo hemos podido activar dos. Uno es "más caliente que el Sol" y el otro "hipotermia" (se activa cuando se abre cualquier otro grifo en un radio de 8 km). Para protegerse del calor, los humanos solían conservar este artilugio en una caja de cristal.

it.title: LAVATRICE OSTILE
it.description: Anche se il quadrante di questa lavatrice mette a disposizione un'intera gamma di impostazioni di calore, siamo riusciti ad attivarne solo due. Una è "più caldo del sole" e l'altra si chiama "ipotermia". Si attiva quando viene aperto un altro rubinetto entro un raggio di 8 km. Per proteggersi, spesso gli umani tenevano questo dispositivo in una gabbia di vetro.

ja.title: 敵対的な洗浄機
ja.description: この洗浄機のダイヤルには全域的な熱設定があるようですが、我々が起動することに成功しているのは2つの設定のみです。その1つは「太陽より熱い」で、もう1つは他の蛇口が5マイル範囲で使用されている場合の「低体温」です。人間たちはこの機械による危害を防ぐため、このデバイスをガラスのケージに収容していました。

ko.title: 적대적인 세척기
ko.description: 세척기 다이얼을 보면 다양한 온도 설정이 가능한 것 같지만, 지금까지 우리는 두 가지만 작동시킬 수 있었습니다. 하나는 '태양보다 뜨거움' 모드이고, 나머지 하나는 5킬로미터 이내 반경에서 사용할 경우 '저체온증'을 일으키는 모드입니다. 인간들은 피해를 방지하기 위해 이 장치를 유리 통에 보관해두었습니다.

zh-Hans.title: 有害清洗器
zh-Hans.description: 虽然这个清洗器的拨盘上有着许多的热度，我们目前只能启用其中的两种。其中一个是“比太阳还要热”；而另一个，只要在 5 英里半径内有另一个水龙头开着，那就会引发“低温症”。为了保护自己不收到伤害，人类常常把这件设备装在玻璃笼子里。

zh-Hant.title: 不友善洗滌機
zh-Hant.description: 雖然這台洗滌機的面板上顯示全方位的加熱設定，但是我們只能啟動兩個功能。一個是「比太陽熱」，另一個是當使用方圓5英里以外的任何一個水龍頭時，就會出現的「失溫」訊息。為了保護自己不受傷，人類往往把這種設備放在玻璃籠子裡。

ru.title: ЗЛОНАМЕРЕННЫЙ ПЕРЕКЛЮЧАТЕЛЬ
ru.description: Предполагается, что с помощью переключателя можно настроить температуру в душе по своему желанию, однако мы обнаружили лишь два параметра. Один — «обжигающий кипяток». А второй, который включался, когда в радиусе пяти километров кто-нибудь еще поворачивал кран, называется «переохлаждение». Чтобы защититься от зла, люди зачастую помещали устройство в стеклянную клетку.

pt-BR.title: Lavadora hostil
pt-BR.description: Embora o mostrador dessa lavadora apresente uma gama completa de ajustes de aquecimento, só conseguimos ativar dois. Um é “mais quente que o sol” e o outro, quando estão usando qualquer outra torneira num raio de dez quilômetros, é “hipotermia”. Para se protegerem, os humanos costumam manter o dispositivo numa gaiola de vidro.

nl.title: VIJANDIG WASAPPARAAT
nl.description: Hoewel de knop van dit apparaat een volledig spectrum aan warmte-instellingen suggereert, hebben we er maar twee kunnen activeren. De ene is 'heter dan de zon' en de andere, wanneer een andere kraan wordt gebruikt binnen een straal van 5 kilometer, is 'hypothermie'. Om zichzelf tegen schade te beschermen, bewaarden mensen het apparaat vaak in een glazen kooi.

ar.title: ﻏﺴﺎﻟﺔ اﻟﻨﺰل
ar.description: ﺑﻴﻨﻤﺎ ﻳﺸﻴﺮ ﻗﺮص ﻫﺬه اﻟﻐﺴﺎﻟﺔ إﻟﯽ ﻣﺠﻤﻮﻋﺔ ﻛﺎﻣﻠﺔ ﻣﻦ إﻋﺪادات اﻟﺤﺮارة، وﻗﺪ ﺗﻤﻜﻨﺎ ﻓﻘﻂ ﻣﻦ ﺗﻨﺸﻴﻂ اﺛﻨﻴﻦ. أﺣﺪﻫﻤﺎ "أﻛﺜﺮ ﺳﺨﻮﻧﺔ ﻣﻦ اﻟﺸﻤﺲ" واﻵﺧﺮ ﻳﻜﻮن "ﻣﻨﺨﻔﻀﺎ ﻋﻦ ﺣﺮارة اﻟﺠﺴﻢ" ﻋﻨﺪ اﺳﺘﺨﺪام أي ﺻﻨﺒﻮر آﺧﺮ داﺧﻞ داﺋﺮة ﻧﺼﻒ ﻗﻄﺮﻫﺎ 5 أﻣﻴﺎل. ﻟﺤﻤﺎﻳﺔ أﻧﻔﺴﻬﻢ ﻣﻦ اﻷذى، ﻏﺎﻟﺒﺎ ﻣﺎ ﻳﺤﺘﻔﻆ اﻟﺒﺸﺮ ﺑﺎﻟﺠﻬﺎز ﻓﻲ ﻗﻔﺺ زﺟﺎﺟﻲ.

tk.title: SALDIRGAN DUŞ
tk.description: Bu duşun kadranı, tam bir ısı ayarı yelpazesi gösterse de yalnızca ikisini etkinleştirebildik. Bunlardan biri "güneşten daha sıcak", diğeri ise 8 kilometrelik bir yarıçap içinde başka bir musluk kullanıldığında ortaya çıkan "hipotermi"dir. İnsanlar zarar görmemek için cihazı genellikle cam bir kafeste tuttular.

fr-CA.title: APPAREIL LAVANT HOSTILE
fr-CA.description: Bien que le cadran de cet appareil suggère une gamme complète de réglages de chaleur, nous n'avons pu en activer que deux. Le premier réglage est « plus chaud que le soleil », et l'autre, lorsque n'importe quel autre robinet est utilisé dans un rayon de 5 kilomètres, est « hypothermie ». Pour se protéger de cet appareil, les humains le gardaient souvent dans une cage de verre.

en-AU.title: HOSTILE WASHER
en-AU.description: While the dial of this washer suggests a full spectrum of heat settings, we have only been able to activate two. One is "hotter than the sun", and the other, when any other tap is being used within a 5-mile radius, is "hypothermia". To protect themselves from harm, humans often kept the device in a glass cage.

landmarks.title: HOSTILE WASHER
landmarks.description: While the dial of this washer suggests a full spectrum of heat settings, we have only been able to activate two. One is "hotter than the sun", and the other, when any other faucet is being used within a 5-mile radius, is "hypothermia". To protect themselves from harm, humans often kept the device in a glass cage.

landmarks.name: LM_SkirtingBoard

en.title: SHAKESPEARE'S SKIRTING BOARD
en.description:
Inspired by the worship and veneration of saintly relics, literary cults would preserve and display the ephemera of famous authors. This piece of Shakespeare's skirting board is one such relic. 
N.B. Relic also includes Shakespeare's mousehole and Shakespeare's mouse.

en-GB.title: SHAKESPEARE'S SKIRTING BOARD
en-GB.description:
Inspired by the worship and veneration of saintly relics, literary cults would preserve and display the ephemera of famous authors. This piece of Shakespeare's skirting board is one such relic. 
N.B. Relic also includes Shakespeare's mousehole and Shakespeare's mouse.

fr.title: PLINTHE DE SHAKESPEARE
fr.description:
Inspirées par le culte et la vénération des reliques saintes, les sectes littéraires préservaient et affichaient les éphémères d'auteurs célèbres. Ce morceau de plinthe de Shakespeare est l'une de ces reliques. 
N.B. La relique inclut également le trou de souris de Shakespeare et la souris de Shakespeare.

de.title: SHAKESPEARES BODENLEISTE
de.description:
Literaturkulte ließen sich von der Verehrung von Heiligenreliquien inspirieren und bewahrten persönliche Erinnerungsstücke berühmter Autoren auf und stellten sie zur Schau. Dieses Stück von Shakespeares Fußbodenleiste ist eines dieser Reliquien. 
Anmerkung: Die Bodenleiste enthält außerdem Shakespeares Mauseloch und Shakespeares Maus.

es.title: ZÓCALO DE SHAKESPEARE
es.description:
Inspirados por la veneración y adoración a las reliquias santas, los cultos literarios conservaban y exponían objetos de autores famosos. Este fragmento del zócalo de Shakespeare es una de dichas reliquias. 
N.B. La reliquia también incluye la ratonera de Shakespeare y el ratón de Shakespeare.

it.title: BATTISCOPA DI SHAKESPEARE
it.description:
Ispirati dal culto e dalla venerazione delle reliquie dei santi, gli appassionati di letteratura preservavano e mettevano in mostra gli effimeri oggetti degli autori famosi. Questo pezzo del battiscopa di Shakespeare è una di queste reliquie. 
N.B. Il battiscopa include inoltre la tana per topi di Shakespeare e il topo di Shakespeare.

ja.title: シェークスピアの幅木
ja.description: 聖遺物の崇拝と崇敬に触発された文学カルトは、有名な作家のグッズなら何でも保護し、展示しようとします。シェークスピアの作品であるこの幅木もまた、そのような遺物の一つなのでした。注記：遺物には、シェークスピアの狭苦しい住居と、そこに住んでいたシェークスピアのネズミも含まれています。

ko.title: 셰익스피어의 걸레받이
ko.description: 성인의 유물을 숭상하는 풍습에서 착안하여, 문학 사교에서는 유명한 작가들이 쓴 소모품을 보존하고 전시했습니다. 이 셰익스피어의 걸레받이도 그러한 유물 중 하나입니다. 참고: 유물 중에는 셰익스피어의 쥐구멍과 쥐도 있습니다.

zh-Hans.title: 莎士比亚的壁脚板
zh-Hans.description: 文学崇拜会以对神圣遗迹的崇拜和尊敬为灵感，保存并展示大文豪们的昙花一现之物。莎士比亚的壁脚板就是这样一件遗物。注意。遗物还包括莎士比亚的老鼠洞和莎士比亚的老鼠。

zh-Hant.title: 莎士比亞的踢腳板
zh-Hant.description: 受到對聖人遺物崇拜和敬重的啟發，文學崇拜者會保留並展示知名作家稍縱即逝的物品。這個踢腳板正是莎士比亞的一項遺物。注意：遺物也包含莎士比亞的鼠洞和老鼠。

ru.title: ПЛИНТУС ШЕКСПИРА
ru.description:
Вдохновившись поклонением и почитанием религиозных реликвий, литературные фанатики хранили и выставляли на обозрение «сувениры» от известных авторов. Именно таким сувениром и является этот кусок плинтуса Шекспира. 
Примечание. Сувенир также содержит мышиную нору Шекспира и мышь Шекспира.

pt-BR.title: RODAPÉ SHAKESPEARIANO
pt-BR.description:
Inspirados pela adoração e veneração de relíquias sacras, cultos literários preservavam e exibiam uma gama enorme de trabalhos de autores famosos. Este pedaço de um rodapé shakespeariano é uma destas relíquias. 
N.B. A relíquia também contém um esconderijo shakespeariano para um rato shakespeariano

nl.title: PLINT VAN SHAKESPEARE
nl.description:
Literaire sektes wilden de alledaagse voorwerpen van beroemde schrijvers verzamelen en tentoonstellen. Dit is vergelijkbaar met het vereren van heilige relikwieën. Ook dit stuk plint van Shakespeare werd als relikwie bewaard. 
P.S.: it relikwie bevat ook het muisgat en de muis van Shakespeare.

ar.title: ﻟﻮح اﻟﺘﺄزﻳﺮ اﻟﺨﺎص ﺑﺸﻜﺴﺒﻴﺮ
ar.description: اﻧﻄﻼﻗﺎ ﻣﻦ ﺗﻜﺮﻳﻢ اﻵﺛﺎر اﻟﺪﻳﻨﻴﺔ وﺗﺒﺠﻴﻠﻬﺎ، ﺳﺘﺤﺎﻓﻆ اﻟﻔﺮق اﻷدﺑﻴﺔ ﻋﻠﯽ اﻵﺛﺎر اﻟﻌﺎﺑﺮة ﻟﻠﻤﺆﻟﻔﻴﻦ اﻟﻤﺸﻬﻮرﻳﻦ وﺳﺘﻌﺮﺿﻬﺎ. وﻳﻌﺪ ﻟﻮح اﻟﺘﺄزﻳﺮ اﻟﺨﺎص ﺑﺸﻜﺴﺒﻴﺮ أﺣﺪ ﻫﺬه اﻵﺛﺎر. ﻣﻠﺤﻮﻇﺔ: ﻳﻀﻢ ﻫﺬا اﻷﺛﺮ ﺟﺤﺮ اﻟﻔﺄر واﻟﻔﺄر ﻧﻔﺴﻪ اﻟﺨﺎﺻﻴﻦ ﺑﺸﻜﺴﺒﻴﺮ.

tk.title: SHAKESPEARE'İN SÜPÜRGELİĞİ
tk.description:
Kutsal kalıntılara duyulan saygıdan ilham alan edebi kültler, ünlü yazarların eşyalarını korur ve sergilerdi. Shakespeare'in süpürgeliğinin bu parçası da bu kutsal kalıntılardan biri. 
Not: Kalıntıya Shakespeare'in fare deliği ve Shakespeare'in faresi de dâhildir.

fr-CA.title: PLINTHE DE SHAKESPEARE
fr-CA.description:
Inspirées par le culte et la vénération des reliques saintes, les sectes littéraires préservaient et affichaient les babioles d'auteurs célèbres. Ce morceau de plinthe de Shakespeare est l'une de ces reliques. 
N.B. La relique comprend également le trou de souris de Shakespeare et la souris de Shakespeare.

en-AU.title: SHAKESPEARE'S SKIRTING BOARD
en-AU.description:
Inspired by the worship and veneration of saintly relics, literary cults would preserve and display the ephemera of famous authors. This piece of Shakespeare's skirting board is one such relic. 
N.B. Relic also includes Shakespeare's mousehole and Shakespeare's mouse.

landmarks.title: SHAKESPEARE'S SKIRTING BOARD
landmarks.description:
Inspired by the worship and veneration of saintly relics, literary cults would preserve and display the ephemera of famous authors. This piece of Shakespeare's skirting board is one such relic. 
N.B. Relic also includes Shakespeare's mousehole and Shakespeare's mouse.

landmarks.name: LM_SleepingBag

en.title: HUMAN COCOON
en.description: These silken bags are thought to be abandoned cocoons, generated by the larval stage of an unknown subspecies of human. We surmise that, once the larvae had spun their cocoon, they would journey into woodland, gorging themselves on a final meal of burned marshmallows, before zipping themselves in and undergoing metamorphosis.

en-GB.title: HUMAN COCOON
en-GB.description: These silken bags are thought to be abandoned cocoons, generated by the larval stage of an unknown subspecies of human. We surmise that, once the larvae had spun their cocoon, they would journey into woodland, gorging themselves on a final meal of burned marshmallows, before zipping themselves in and undergoing metamorphosis.

fr.title: COCON HUMAIN
fr.description: Ces sacs de soie seraient des cocons abandonnés, générés lors du stade larvaire d'une sous-espèce d'homme inconnue. Nous supposons qu'une fois que les larves avaient tissé leur cocon, elles se rendaient dans les bois pour se repaître d'un dernier repas de guimauves brûlées, avant de s'enfermer et de commencer leur métamorphose.

de.title: MENSCHLICHER KOKON
de.description: Diese seidenen Beutel werden für verlassene Kokons gehalten, erzeugt vom Larvenstadium einer unbekannten menschlichen Subspezies. Wir vermuten, dass die Larven in den Wald gehen, sobald sie ihren Kokon gesponnen haben, und eine letzte Mahlzeit aus verbrannten Marshmallows einnehmen, bevor sie sich einschließen und die Metamorphose vollziehen.

es.title: CAPULLO HUMANO
es.description: Se cree que estas bolsas sedosas son capullos abandonados de la etapa larval de una subespecie humana desconocida. Presuponemos que, una vez que las larvas formaban el capullo, emprendían un viaje hacia el bosque, donde se atiborraban de una última comida consistente en nubes quemadas, antes de encerrarse en los capullos para llevar a cabo la metamorfosis.

it.title: BOZZOLO DI UOMO
it.description: Si pensa che queste sacche di seta siano bozzoli abbandonati, generati da una fase larvale di una sottospecie sconosciuta di umani. Supponiamo che, in seguito alla filatura del bozzolo, le larve si mettessero in viaggio verso i boschi abbuffandosi con un ultimo pasto di marshmallow bruciati, prima di chiudere la zip ed entrare in una fase di metamorfosi.

ja.title: 人間の繭
ja.description: この絹製の袋は放棄された繭であり、人間の未確認亜種の幼児段階に生成されるものだと考えられています。我々の推測では、幼児が繭を紡ぎ終わった後、幼児は繭に入り込んで変態活動を始める前に森林へ向かい、最後の晩餐として焼きマシュマロを食べまくるのです。

ko.title: 인간 번데기
ko.description: 이 실크 가방은 알려지지 않은 인간의 하위 종족이 애벌레일 때 만들고 버린 번데기로 추정됩니다. 이 애벌레들은 번데기를 만들면 숲으로 떠나는데, 그곳에서 타버린 마시멜로우로 마지막 만찬을 즐긴 뒤 번데기로 들어가 변태를 시작합니다.

zh-Hans.title: 人类茧房
zh-Hans.description: 这些丝质的袋子被认为是被抛弃的茧房，来自某种未知下属种类的人类的幼年阶段。我们推测，一旦这些幼虫结成茧房，他们便会前往林地之中，在用拉链将自己封进茧房进行变态之前，以烧焦的棉花糖作为最后的大餐。

zh-Hant.title: 人繭
zh-Hant.description: 這些絲質袋子被認為是遭遺棄的繭，是未知的人類亞種在幼體階段產生的。我們推測，當這些幼蟲吐絲作繭後，它們會進入林地，狼吞虎嚥地大吃燒烤蘑菇當作最後一餐，然後再自行拉上拉鍊，開始進行形態質變。

ru.title: ЧЕЛОВЕЧЕСКИЙ КОКОН
ru.description: Предполагается, что эти шелковистые сумки являются коконами, которые остались после личинок неизвестного подвида человека. Мы предполагаем, что личинки свивали кокон, затем отправлялись в лес и устраивали прощальный ужин: жарили шашлыки. Затем они возвращались, застегивали кокон и претерпевали метаморфозы.

pt-BR.title: CASULO HUMANO
pt-BR.description: Acredita-se que essas bolsas de seda sejam casulos abandonados, gerados pelo estágio larval de uma subespécie humana desconhecida. Em tese, depois de as larvas começarem a girar no casulo, saíam pela floresta e empanturravam-se de uma refeição final de marshmallows tostados antes de se fecharem até a metamorfose.

nl.title: MENSELIJKE COCON
nl.description: Men denkt dat deze zachte zakken verlaten cocons zijn, gegenereerd door het larvenstadium van een onbekende ondersoort van de mens. We vermoeden dat zodra de larven hun cocon hadden gesponnen, ze het bos in trokken en zich volpropten met een laatste maaltijd van verbrande marshmallows, voordat ze zichzelf erin ritsten en een metamorfose ondergingen.

ar.title: ﺷﺮﻧﻘﺔ ﺑﺸﺮﻳﺔ
ar.description: ﻳﻌﺘﻘﺪ أن ﻫﺬه اﻷﻛﻴﺎس اﻟﺤﺮﻳﺮﻳﺔ ﻫﻲ ﺷﺮاﻧﻖ ﻣﻬﺠﻮرة، ﻧﺘﺠﺖ ﻋﻦ ﻣﺮﺣﻠﺔ اﻟﻴﺮﻗﺎت ﻟﻨﻮع ﻓﺮﻋﻲ ﻏﻴﺮ ﻣﻌﺮوف ﻣﻦ اﻟﺒﺸﺮ. وﻧﻌﺘﻘﺪ أﻧﻪ ﺑﻤﺠﺮد أن ﺗﻐﺰل اﻟﻴﺮﻗﺎت ﺷﺮﻧﻘﺘﻬﺎ، ﻓﺈﻧﻬﺎ ﺗﺴﺎﻓﺮ إﻟﯽ اﻟﻐﺎﺑﺔ وﺗﻠﺘﻬﻢ وﺟﺒﺔ أﺧﻴﺮة ﻣﻦ ﺣﻠﻮى اﻟﺨﻄﻤﻲ اﻟﻤﺤﻤﺼﺔ، ﻗﺒﻞ أن ﺗﻨﻐﻤﺲ ﻓﻲ ﻧﻔﺴﻬﺎ وﺗﺨﻀﻊ ﻟﻌﻤﻠﻴﺔ اﻟﺘﺤﻮل اﻟﺸﻜﻠﻲ.

tk.title: İNSAN KOZASI
tk.description: Bu ipek torbaların, bilinmeyen bir insan alt türünün larva evresinde ortaya çıkan terk edilmiş kozalar olduğu düşünülmektedir. Kozalarını ördükten sonra larvaların kendilerini sıkıştırıp başkalaşım geçirmeden önce son bir yanmış şekerleme yemeğiyle kendilerini doyurarak ormanlık alana gideceklerini sanıyoruz.

fr-CA.title: COCON HUMAIN
fr-CA.description: Ces sacs de soie seraient des cocons abandonnés, générés lors du stade larvaire d'une sous-espèce d'homme inconnue. Nous supposons qu'après avoir tissé leur cocon, les larves avaient se rendaient dans les bois pour se repaître d'un dernier repas de guimauves brûlées, avant de s'enfermer et de commencer leur métamorphose.

en-AU.title: HUMAN COCOON
en-AU.description: These silken bags are thought to be abandoned cocoons, generated by the larval stage of an unknown subspecies of human. We surmise that, once the larvae had spun their cocoon, they would journey into woodland, gorging themselves on a final meal of burned marshmallows, before zipping themselves in and undergoing metamorphosis.

landmarks.title: HUMAN COCOON
landmarks.description: These silken bags are thought to be abandoned cocoons, generated by the larval stage of an unknown subspecies of human. We surmise that, once the larvae had spun their cocoon, they would journey into woodland, gorging themselves on a final meal of burned marshmallows, before zipping themselves in and undergoing metamorphosis.

landmarks.name: LM_Slippers

en.title: PAW PROTECTORS
en.description: While indoors, the humans of Englandland liked to store their paws in little fabric pouches like these. Monster scientists suspect this relates to young humans' belief that the lounge floor was made of lava, and should not be touched. By adding a layer between paw and floor, humans could walk around safely, rather than needing to leap between couches and tables.

en-GB.title: PAW PROTECTORS
en-GB.description: While indoors, the humans of Englandland liked to store their paws in little fabric pouches like these. Monster scientists suspect this relates to young humans' belief that the lounge floor was made of lava, and should not be touched. By adding a layer between paw and floor, humans could walk around safely, rather than needing to leap between couches and tables.

fr.title: PROTECTEURS DE PATTES
fr.description: Lorsqu'ils étaient à l'intérieur, les humains Angleterriens aimaient ranger leurs pattes dans des petites pochettes en tissu comme celles-ci. Les scientifiques monstres pensent que cela s'explique par la crainte des jeunes humains que le sol du salon était fait de lave et qu'il ne fallait pas y toucher. En ajoutant une couche entre leurs pattes et le sol, les humains pouvaient se déplacer en toute sécurité, plutôt que de devoir sauter entre les canapés et les tables.

de.title: PFOTENSCHÜTZER
de.description: Wenn sie drinnen waren, haben die Menschen in Englandland ihre Pfoten gerne in kleinen Stoffbeuteln wie diesen aufbewahrt. Monsterforscher vermuten, dass dies mit dem Glauben junger Menschen zusammenhängt, dass der Wohnzimmerboden aus Lava besteht und nicht berührt werden darf. Indem sie zwischen ihren Pfoten und dem Boden eine weitere Schicht hinzufügten, konnten die Menschen sicher herumlaufen und mussten nicht von Tisch zu Tisch hüpfen.

es.title: PROTECTORES DE GARRAS
es.description: Cuando estaban en interiores, a los humanos de Inglaterralandia les gustaba meter sus garras en pequeñas fundas de tela como estas. Los monstruos científicos sospechan que esto se debe a que los jóvenes humanos creían que el suelo era lava y, por tanto, era mejor evitar tocarlo. Al añadir una capa entre las garras y el suelo, los humanos podían andar de forma segura en lugar de tener que saltar entre los sofás y las mesas.

it.title: PROTEGGI-ZAMPE
it.description: Quando erano in casa, agli umani dell'Inghilterraterra piaceva riporre le zampe in piccole sacche di tessuto come queste. Gli scienziati mostri pensano che questa usanza sia collegata alla credenza degli umani che il pavimento del salone fosse fatto di lava e che non dovesse essere toccato. Aggiungendo uno strato tra le zampe e il pavimento, gli umani potevano andarsene in giro in sicurezza senza bisogno di saltare tra divani e tavoli.

ja.title: 手足プロテクター
ja.description: 屋内にいる場合、イングランドランドの人間たちはこのような小さくて布製の袋に手足を入れることを好んでいました。モンスター科学者たちは、これは若い人間がラウンジの床が溶岩で出来ており、それに触れてはならないと信じていたことに関連していたと考えています。足と床の間に一層を加えることにより、人間たちが安全に歩き回ることが可能となり、ソファーやテーブルの間で飛びつき続ける必要がなくなったのです。

ko.title: 뒷발 보호 장치
ko.description: 실내에 있을 때 영국나라의 인간들은 뒷발을 이런 작은 주머니에 넣어 보호했습니다. 몬스터 과학자들은 이것이 어린 인간들이 바닥은 용암으로 되어 있기 때문에 닿으면 안 된다는 믿음에서 기인했을 것으로 추정하고 있습니다. 발과 바닥 사이에 한 층을 추가하는 것으로 인간들은 테이블과 소파 위에서 펄쩍 펄쩍 뛰는 대신 그 사이를 안전하게 걸어 다닐 수 있었습니다.

zh-Hans.title: 脚掌保护器
zh-Hans.description: 在室内生活时，英格兰大地上的人类喜欢将自己的脚掌放置在这些小小的织物口袋里。怪兽科学家们怀疑，这一行为与年幼人类对“休息室的地板是用岩浆早就，不得触碰”这一传言的信仰有所关系。通过在脚掌和地板之间加上一层东西，人类就可以安全地四处走动，不需要在沙发和桌子之间跳来跃去。

zh-Hant.title: 護爪囊
zh-Hant.description: 在室內，英格蘭地的人類喜歡把他們的爪子放進這些小布囊裡。怪獸科學家懷疑這跟人類年輕人的信仰有關，他們相信休息室的地板是熔岩做的，不應該被碰觸。在爪子和地板之間加上一層保護，這樣人類就可以安全的四處走動，無需在沙發與桌子間跳來跳去。

ru.title: ЗАЩИТА ДЛЯ ЛАП
ru.description: В домах люди Англоземья любили погружать лапы в тканевые мешочки наподобие тех, что вы видите сейчас. Ученые монстры подозревают, что этот обычай связан с тем, что незрелые человеческие особи верили, будто пол — это лава, и его нельзя касаться. Добавив слой ткани между лапой и полом, люди могли спокойно ходить по дому, вместо того чтобы прыгать по диванам и столам.

pt-BR.title: PROTETORES DE PATA
pt-BR.description: Em ambientes fechados, os humanos da Terra da Inglaterra gostavam de proteger as patas em pequenos bolsões de tecido como estes. Os cientistas monstros suspeitam que isso se deve à crença dos jovens humanos de que o piso do recinto era feito de lava e, por isso, não se podia tocá-lo. Ao adicionar uma camada entre a pata e o piso, os humanos podiam caminhar em segurança e não precisavam saltar entre mesas e sofás.

nl.title: POOTBESCHERMERS
nl.description: Binnenshuis stopten de mensen van Engelandland hun poten graag in kleine stoffen zakjes zoals deze. Monsterwetenschappers vermoeden dat dit verband houdt met de overtuiging van jonge mensen dat de vloer lava was en niet mocht worden aangeraakt. Door een laag tussen poot en vloer toe te voegen, konden mensen veilig rondlopen in plaats van tussen banken en tafels te moeten springen.

ar.title: واﻗﻴﺎت اﻟﻤﺨﺎﻟﺐ
ar.description: أﺛﻨﺎء اﻟﺘﻮاﺟﺪ ﻓﻲ اﻟﺪاﺧﻞ، أﺣﺐ اﻟﺒﺸﺮ ﻓﻲ إﻧﺠﻠﺘﺮا اﻟﺤﻔﺎظ ﻋﻠﯽ ﻣﺨﺎﻟﺒﻬﻢ ﻓﻲ أﻛﻴﺎس ﻗﻤﺎش ﺻﻐﻴﺮة ﻣﺜﻞ ﻫﺬه. ﻳﻌﺘﻘﺪ ﻋﻠﻤﺎء retsnoM أن ﻫﺬا ﻳﺘﻌﻠﻖ ﺑﺎﻋﺘﻘﺎد اﻟﺸﺒﺎب أن أرﺿﻴﺔ اﻟﻘﺎﻋﺔ ﻣﺼﻨﻮﻋﺔ ﻣﻦ اﻟﺤﻤﻢ اﻟﺒﺮﻛﺎﻧﻴﺔ، وﻻ ﻳﻨﺒﻐﻲ ﻟﻤﺴﻬﺎ. وﻣﻦ ﺧﻼل إﺿﺎﻓﺔ ﻃﺒﻘﺔ ﺑﻴﻦ اﻟﻤﺨﻠﺐ واﻷرض، ﻳﻤﻜﻦ ﻟﻠﺒﺸﺮ أن ﻳﺘﺠﻮﻟﻮا ﺑﺄﻣﺎن، ﺑﺪﻻ ﻣﻦ اﻟﺤﺎﺟﺔ إﻟﯽ اﻟﻘﻔﺰ ﺑﻴﻦ اﻷراﺋﻚ واﻟﻄﺎوﻻت.

tk.title: PATİ KORUYUCULARI
tk.description: İngiltere insanları iç mekanlardayken patilerini bu gibi küçük kumaş keselerde saklamaktan hoşlanırdı. Canavar bilim insanları, bunun genç insanların salon zemininin lavdan yapıldığı ve dokunulmaması gerektiğine dair inançlarıyla ilgisi olduğundan şüpheleniyor. İnsanlar, pati ve zemin arasına bir katman ekleyerek kanepeler ve masalar arasında sıçramak yerine güvenli bir şekilde dolaşma imkanı bulabilirler.

fr-CA.title: PROTECTEURS DE PATTES
fr-CA.description: Lorsqu'ils étaient à l'intérieur, les humains angleterriens aimaient ranger leurs pattes dans des petites pochettes en tissu comme celles-ci. Les scientifiques monstres pensent que cela s'explique par la crainte des jeunes humains que le sol du salon était fait de lave et qu'il ne fallait pas y toucher. En ajoutant une couche entre leurs pattes et le sol, les humains pouvaient se déplacer en toute sécurité, plutôt que de devoir sauter entre le divan et les tables.

en-AU.title: PAW PROTECTORS
en-AU.description: While indoors, the humans of Englandland liked to store their paws in little fabric pouches like these. Monster scientists suspect this relates to young humans' belief that the lounge floor was made of lava, and should not be touched. By adding a layer between paw and floor, humans could walk around safely, rather than needing to leap between couches and tables.

landmarks.title: PAW PROTECTORS
landmarks.description: While indoors, the humans of Englandland liked to store their paws in little fabric pouches like these. Monster scientists suspect this relates to young humans' belief that the lounge floor was made of lava, and should not be touched. By adding a layer between paw and floor, humans could walk around safely, rather than needing to leap between couches and tables.

landmarks.name: LM_SmokeMachine

en.title: SMOKE MACHINE
en.description: Although the label "smoke machine" conjures up images of log fires, the name is misleading and the smoke machine should not be set on fire. More accurately, a "smoke machine" is a "fog machine", spitting out a liquid called "fog juice" which turns into thick, wet air. This may be a form of human bathing.

en-GB.title: SMOKE MACHINE
en-GB.description: Although the label "smoke machine" conjures up images of log fires, the name is misleading and the smoke machine should not be set on fire. More accurately, a "smoke machine" is a "fog machine", spitting out a liquid called "fog juice" which turns into thick, wet air. This may be a form of human bathing.

fr.title: MACHINE À FUMÉE
fr.description: Bien que l'étiquette « machine à fumée » puisse évoquer des feux de bois, le nom est trompeur et la machine à fumée ne doit pas être enflammée. Pour être précis, une « machine à fumée » se rapproche plus d'une « machine à brouillard » rejetant un liquide appelé « jus de brume », qui se transforme en air épais et humide. Il pourrait là s'agir d'une forme de baignade pratiquée par les humains.

de.title: NEBELMASCHINE
de.description: Der Nebel aus einer Nebelmaschine sieht zwar aus wie der Rauch eines Lagerfeuers – das Gerät sollte allerdings nicht angezündet werden. Statt Rauch versprühen Nebelmaschinen sogenannten „Nebelsaft“, der zu dicker, nasser Luft führt. Dies war möglicherweise eine Art menschlicher Bäder.

es.title: MÁQUINA DE HUMO
es.description: Aunque la etiqueta "máquina de humo" evoca imágenes de fuegos de leña, el nombre es engañoso y no se debería prender fuego a la máquina de humo. Más exactamente, una "máquina de humo" es una "máquina de niebla", que escupe un líquido llamado "zumo de niebla" que se convierte en aire húmedo y denso. Puede que este fuera un método de baño humano.

it.title: MACCHINA DEL FUMO
it.description: Anche se il nome "macchina del fumo" richiama l'idea del fuoco, è alquanto fuorviante. La macchina del fumo non deve essere incendiata. Più precisamente, è una "macchina della nebbia" che sputa fuori un liquido chiamato "succo di nebbia" che si converte in aria densa e umida. Potrebbe essere un modo usato dagli umani per farsi il bagno.

ja.title: 煙マシーン
ja.description: ラベルにある「煙マシーン」という名前は焚火を連想させるものなのですが、この名前は誤解を招くものであり、この煙マシーンに火を点けることがあってはなりません。より正確に表すとすれば、この「煙マシーン」は「霧マシーン」であり、重たく濡れた空気に変換する「霧ジュース」と呼ばれる液体を放出するのです。これはもしかすると、人間が水浴びをする形式なのかもしれません。

ko.title: 연기 기계
ko.description: 연기 기계'라고 하면 불에 태우는 모습을 떠올리기 마련이지만, 이 이름은 오해의 소지가 있으며 실제로 이 기계를 불에 태우면 안 됩니다. 이 기계는 연기 기계라기보다 '안개 기계'에 가까워서 '안개 주스'라는 액체를 뿜어내면 공기가 텁텁하고 축축해집니다. 인간들은 이것으로 목욕을 했을 수도 있습니다.

zh-Hans.title: 烟机
zh-Hans.description: 虽然“烟机”的标签让人联想到篝火，但其名称具有误导性，切勿点燃烟机。更准确地说，“烟机”是“雾机”，它会喷出一种称之为“雾汁”的液体，然后变成粘稠、潮湿的空气。这可能是人类洗澡的一种形式。

zh-Hant.title: 噴煙機
zh-Hant.description: 雖然「噴煙機」稱號會讓人聯想到柴火的畫面，但是這種名稱有誤導性，而且照理說噴煙機不應該著火。「噴煙機」更準確的說法是「噴霧機」，這種裝置會噴出「霧汁」的液體，然後變成黏稠潮濕的氣體。這可能是一種人類沐浴的方式。

ru.title: ДЫМОВАЯ МАШИНА
ru.description: Вызывая в воображении образы пожаров, название «дымовая машина» вводит в заблуждение, и ее не следует поджигать. Если быть точным, то «дымовая машина» — это «туманная машина», выплевывающая жидкость под названием «сочный туман», которая превращается в густой, влажный воздух. Возможно, люди так мылись.

pt-BR.title: MÁQUINA DE FUMAÇA
pt-BR.description: Apesar do nome, não se deve atear fogo à “máquina de fumaça”. Ela é, na verdade, um dispositivo de neblina que emana um líquido denominado “líquido de neblina”, que vira uma espécie de ar denso e molhado. Era possivelmente uma forma de os humanos tomarem banho.

nl.title: ROOKMACHINE
nl.description: Hoewel het label "rookmachine" beelden van houtvuren oproept, is de naam misleidend en moet de rookmachine niet in brand worden gestoken. Preciezer gezegd, is een "rookmachine" een "nevelmachine" die een vloeistof genaamd "nevelsap" uitspuwt die verandert in dikke, natte lucht. Dit is mogelijk een vorm van menselijk baden.

ar.title: آﻟﺔ اﻟﺪﺧﺎن
ar.description: ﻋﻠﯽ اﻟﺮﻏﻢ ﻣﻦ أن اﺳﻢ "آﻟﺔ اﻟﺪﺧﺎن" ﻳﺴﺘﺤﻀﺮ ﻓﻲ اﻟﺬﻫﻦ ﺻﻮر أﻛﻮام اﻟﺨﺸﺐ اﻟﻤﺸﺘﻌﻞ، ﻳﻌﺪ اﺳﻤﺎ ﺗﻀﻠﻴﻠﻴﺎ، وﻳﺠﺐ ﻋﺪمإﺷﻌﺎل آﻟﺔ اﻟﺪﺧﺎن. وﺑﺎﻷﺣﺮى إن "آﻟﺔ اﻟﺪﺧﺎن" ﻫﻲ "آﻟﺔ ﺿﺒﺎب" ﺗﺮش ﺳﺎﺋﻼ ﻳﺴﻤﯽ "ﻋﺼﻴﺮ اﻟﻀﺒﺎب" اﻟﺬي ﻳﺘﺤﻮل إﻟﯽ ﻫﻮاء ﻛﺜﻴﻒ ورﻃﺐ. وﻗﺪ ﻳﻜﻮن ﻫﺬا أﺣﺪ أﻧﻮاع اﻻﺳﺘﺤﻤﺎم ﻟﺪى اﻟﺒﺸﺮ.

tk.title: DUMAN MAKİNESİ
tk.description: "Duman makinesi" ismi akla şömineleri getirse de bu isim aslında yanıltıcıdır ve duman makinesi ateşe verilmemelidir. Daha doğru şekilde ifade edecek olursak bir "duman makinesi" aslında kalın ve ıslak havaya dönüşen "sis suyu" denen bir sıvı püskürten bir "sis makinesidir". Bu, insanların banyo yapma şekillerinden biri olabilir.

fr-CA.title: MACHINE À FUMÉE
fr-CA.description: Bien que l'étiquette « machine à fumée » puisse évoquer des feux de bois, le nom est trompeur et la machine à fumée ne doit pas être mise en feu. Pour être plus précis, une « machine à fumée » se rapproche plus d'une « machine à brouillard » rejetant un liquide appelé « jus de brume », qui se transforme en air épais et humide. Il pourrait là s'agir d'une forme de baignade pratiquée par les humains.

en-AU.title: SMOKE MACHINE
en-AU.description: Although the label "smoke machine" conjures up images of log fires, the name is misleading and the smoke machine should not be set on fire. More accurately, a "smoke machine" is a "fog machine", spitting out a liquid called "fog juice" which turns into thick, wet air. This may be a form of human bathing.

landmarks.title: SMOKE MACHINE
landmarks.description: Although the label "smoke machine" conjures up images of log fires, the name is misleading and the smoke machine should not be set on fire. More accurately, a "smoke machine" is a "fog machine", spitting out a liquid called "fog juice" which turns into thick, wet air. This may be a form of human bathing.

landmarks.name: LM_Snorkel

en.title: BUSINESS SNORKEL
en.description: Human transit during pre-work and post-work periods sometimes got so crowded that smaller businessfolk struggled for oxygen amidst ties and armpits. A business snorkel allowed users to suck in air from above the crowd and thus survive the commute.

en-GB.title: BUSINESS SNORKEL
en-GB.description: Human transit during pre-work and post-work periods sometimes got so crowded that smaller businessfolk struggled for oxygen amidst ties and armpits. A business snorkel allowed users to suck in air from above the crowd and thus survive the commute.

fr.title: TUBA PROFESSIONNEL
fr.description: Les transports humains avant et après le travail pouvaient être si encombrés que les petits subordonnés se disputaient l'oxygène au milieu des cravates et des aisselles. Un tuba professionnel permettait aux utilisateurs d'aspirer de l'air par-dessus la foule et ainsi de survivre au trajet.

de.title: GESCHÄFTSSCHNORCHEL
de.description: Menschliche Verkehrsmittel waren vor und nach den Arbeitszeiten manchmal so überfüllt, dass kleinere Geschäftsleute zwischen all den Krawatten und Achselhöhlen um Sauerstoff kämpfen mussten. Ein Geschäftsschnorchel erlaubte es dem Benutzer, die Luft über der Menschenmenge anzusaugen und so ihren Arbeitsweg zu überleben.

es.title: TUBO DE BUCEO DE NEGOCIOS
es.description: El tránsito humano durante los períodos de pretrabajo y postrabajo podía a veces ser tan multitudinario que la gente de negocios más pequeña tenía que luchar por conseguir oxígeno entre corbatas y sobacos. Un tubo de buceo de negocios permitía a los usuarios aspirar aire de la superficie por encima de la multitud y así poder sobrevivir al viaje.

it.title: RESPIRATORE DA VIAGGIO
it.description: Gli spostamenti degli umani prima e dopo il lavoro, a volte, erano così sovraffollati che i lavoratori più bassi talvolta faticavano a trovare ossigeno tra cravatte e ascelle. Un respiratore da viaggio permetteva a coloro che lo utilizzavano di aspirare l'ossigeno al di sopra della folla e di sopravvivere al tragitto.

ja.title: ビジネスシュノーケル
ja.description: 仕事前と仕事後の人間の行きかいは、あまりにも混雑してしまうため、小さなビジネス人たちはネクタイと脇に囲まれてしまい、酸素を摂取することに苦戦することがありました。ビジネスシュノーケルを使用することにより、この混雑エリア上から酸素を摂取することができたため、通勤地獄を生き延びられるようになりました。

ko.title: 회사원 스노클
ko.description: 업무 전후의 인간 교통 수단에는 인파가 너무 많이 몰리는 관계로 작은 회사원들은 넥타이와 겨드랑이 사이에 갇혀 숨쉬는 데 문제를 겪기도 했습니다. 이 회사원 스노클은 사람들 위의 공기를 마실 수 있게 해주어 교통수단에서의 생존을 도왔습니다.

zh-Hans.title: 商务通气管
zh-Hans.description: 人类上下班的交通有时会变得非常拥挤，以至于商务人士们要在领带和腋窝中为氧气而挣扎。商务通气管可供使用者从人群上方吸入空气，这样就可以在上下班的时候捡回一条命。

zh-Hant.title: 商務呼吸管
zh-Hant.description: 人類在工作前和工作後時段通勤時，有時候會非常擁擠，使身型較小的商務人士只能在領帶和腋下的夾縫下呼吸氧氣。商務呼吸管能讓使用者吸進人群上方的空氣，使他們順利熬過通勤時段。

ru.title: ВОЗДУШНАЯ ТРУБКА РАБОЧЕГО
ru.description: Во время перевозки людей в период перед и после работы иногда собирались такие толпы, что низкорослые работяги задыхались от нехватки кислорода посреди галстуков и подмышек. Воздушная трубка рабочего позволяла пользователям вдыхать воздух в толпе и таким образом выживать в дороге.

pt-BR.title: RESPIRADOR EMPRESARIAL
pt-BR.description: O trânsito humano durante os períodos pré e pós trabalho costumava ficar tão caótico que os trabalhadores mais baixos precisavam se esforçar por oxigênio nas camadas mais baixas, por entre gravatas e sovacos. O respirador empresarial permitia que os usuários puxassem o ar de cima da multidão para sobreviver à jornada.

nl.title: ZAKELIJKE SNORKEL
nl.description: Het mensenvervoer tijdens de perioden voor en na het werk werd soms zo druk dat kleinere zakenmensen moeite hadden om zuurstof te krijgen te midden van stropdassen en oksels. Met een zakelijke snorkel konden gebruikers lucht van boven de menigte aanzuigen en zo het woon-werkverkeer overleven.

ar.title: أﻧﺒﻮب اﻟﺘﻨﻔﺲ ﻓﻲ اﻟﻌﻤﻞ
ar.description: ﻳﺘﻨﻘﻞ اﻟﺒﺸﺮ ﻣﻦ ﻣﻜﺎن إﻟﯽ آﺧﺮ ﺧﻼل ﻓﺘﺮات اﻟﺬﻫﺎب إﻟﯽ اﻟﻌﻤﻞ واﻟﻌﻮدة ﻣﻨﻪ وأﺣﻴﺎﻧﺎ ﺗﺼﺒﺢ اﻷﻣﺎﻛﻦ ﻣﺰدﺣﻤﺔ ﺟﺪا ﻟﺪرﺟﺔ ﺗﺠﻌﻞ رﺟﺎل اﻷﻋﻤﺎل اﻟﺼﻐﺎر ﻳﻮاﺟﻬﻮن ﺻﻌﻮﺑﺔ ﻓﻲ ﺗﻨﻔﺲ اﻷﻛﺴﺠﻴﻦ ورﻗﺎﺑﻬﻢ ﻣﺤﺎﻃﺔ ﺑﺄرﺑﻄﺔ اﻟﻌﻨﻖ وﺗﺤﺖ إﺑﻂ اﻵﺧﺮﻳﻦ. ﻳﺘﻴﺢ أﻧﺒﻮب اﻟﺘﻨﻔﺲ ﻓﻲ اﻟﻌﻤﻞ ﻟﻠﻤﺴﺘﺨﺪﻣﻴﻦ اﺳﺘﻨﺸﺎق اﻟﻬﻮاء ﻣﻦ ﻓﻮق ﻣﺴﺘﻮى اﻻزدﺣﺎم وﺑﻬﺬا ﻳﺠﺘﺎزون ﻓﺘﺮات اﻟﺘﻨﻘﻞ ﻣﻦ ﻣﻜﺎن إﻟﯽ آﺧﺮ.

tk.title: İŞ ŞNORKELİ
tk.description: İşe gidiş ve işten çıkış saatlerinde insan ulaşım araçları o kadar kalabalık oluyordu ki kısa boylu çalışanlar, kravatların ve koltuk altlarının arasında oksijen sıkıntısı çekiyordu. İş şnorkeli, kullanan kişilerin kalabalığın üzerinden nefes almasını ve toplu taşımada hayatta kalmasını sağlıyordu.

fr-CA.title: TUBA PROFESSIONNEL
fr-CA.description: Les transports humains avant et après le travail pouvaient être si achalandés que les petits travailleurs se battaient pour l'oxygène au milieu des cravates et des aisselles. Un tuba professionnel permettait aux utilisateurs d'aspirer l'air au-dessus de la foule et ainsi de survivre au trajet.

en-AU.title: BUSINESS SNORKEL
en-AU.description: Human transit during pre-work and post-work periods sometimes got so crowded that smaller businessfolk struggled for oxygen amidst ties and armpits. A business snorkel allowed users to suck in air from above the crowd and thus survive the commute.

landmarks.title: BUSINESS SNORKEL
landmarks.description: Human transit during pre-work and post-work periods sometimes got so crowded that smaller businessfolk struggled for oxygen amidst ties and armpits. A business snorkel allowed users to suck in air from above the crowd and thus survive the commute.

landmarks.name: LM_SockPuppets

en.title: SOCK PEOPLE
en.description: When worn on a human's lower pair of legs, "socks" offered warmth and protection. When worn on the upper pair of legs, these garments took on personalities and could be made to talk to one another in silly voices.

en-GB.title: SOCK PEOPLE
en-GB.description: When worn on a human's lower pair of legs, "socks" offered warmth and protection. When worn on the upper pair of legs, these garments took on personalities and could be made to talk to one another in silly voices.

fr.title: CHAUSSETTIENS
fr.description: Portées sur les jambes humaines du bas, les « chaussettes » offraient chaleur et protection. Tandis que sur celles du haut, ces vêtements se voyaient dotés d'une personnalité propre et pouvaient être amenés à se parler d'une voix idiote.

de.title: SOCKENMENSCHEN
de.description: Sogenannte „Socken“ wurden am unteren menschlichen Beinpaar getragen und boten Wärme und Schutz. Am oberen Beinpaar getragen konnten diese Kleidungsstücke Persönlichkeiten annehmen und mit albernen Stimmen miteinander sprechen.

es.title: GENTE CALCETÍN
es.description: Si se llevaban en las piernas humanas inferiores, los "calcetines" ofrecían calidez y protección. Si se llevaban en las piernas superiores, estas prendas adoptaban personalidades y podían hablar la una con la otra poniendo voces ridículas.

it.title: PERSONE FATTE DI CALZINI
it.description: Quando indossati sulle gambe degli umani, i "calzini" offrivano calore e protezione. Se indossati sulla controparte superiore delle gambe, questi indumenti prendevano vita e potevano essere fatti parlare l'uno con l'altro con voci sciocche.

ja.title: 靴下人間
ja.description: 人間の体の下部にある脚に着用する「靴下」は、温かさと防護を提供します。体の上部にある腕にこれを着用すると、靴下に人格が発生し、他人に対して奇妙な声で話しかけるようになってしまいます。

ko.title: 양말 인간
ko.description: 양말'을 인간의 아래쪽 다리 두 개에 장착하면 체온과 피부를 보호할 수 있습니다. 그러나 위쪽 다리에 장착하면 이 의상은 인격을 가지고 이상한 목소리로 다른 사람에게 말을 걸 수 있게 됩니다.

zh-Hans.title: 袜子人
zh-Hans.description: “袜子”穿在人类的脚上，起到了暖身和保护的作用。而套在手上，它们就成了具有个性的袜子人，然后大家就可以用傻乎乎的声音互相逗趣了。

zh-Hant.title: 穿襪人
zh-Hant.description: 當「襪子」穿在人類下半身的雙腳上時，提供了溫暖和保護。當穿在上半身的雙腳上時，這種服飾會具有性格，並且能以愚蠢的聲音與彼此交談。

ru.title: ЛЮДИ ИЗ НОСКОВ
ru.description: «Носки» служили для тепла и защиты, когда их надевали на нижнюю пару человеческих ног. Когда их надевали на верхнюю пару ног, этот предмет гардероба обзаводился личностью и мог говорить с другими смешным голосом.

pt-BR.title: POVO-MEIA
pt-BR.description: As meias forneciam calor e proteção quando usadas no par de pernas inferior dos humanos. Quando usadas no par de pernas superior, estas vestes adquiriam personalidades e podiam falar umas com as outras com vozes bobas.

nl.title: SOKMENSEN
nl.description: Wanneer mensen 'sokken' dragen aan hun onderste benen, bieden ze warmte en bescherming. Wanneer ze deze aan hun bovenste benen dragen, hebben de sokken hun eigen persoonlijkheid en kunnen ze met elkaar praten met grappige stemmen.

ar.title: أﺷﺨﺎص اﻟﺠﻮارب
ar.description: وﻓﺮت "اﻟﺠﻮارب" اﻟﺪفء واﻟﺤﻤﺎﻳﺔ ﻋﻨﺪﻣﺎ ﻳﺮﺗﺪﻳﻬﺎ اﻟﺒﺸﺮ أﺳﻔﻞ اﻟﺴﺎﻗﻴﻦ. وﻟﻜﻦ ﻋﻨﺪ ارﺗﺪاﺋﻬﺎ أﻋﻠﯽ اﻟﺴﺎﻗﻴﻦ، ﻓﺈﻧﻬﺎ ﺗﺘﺤﻮل إﻟﯽ ﺷﺨﺼﻴﺎت ﻳﺘﻢ ﺗﺤﺮﻳﻜﻬﺎ وﺟﻌﻠﻬﺎ ﺗﺘﺤﺪث ﺑﺄﺻﻮات ﺳﺨﻴﻔﺔ واﺣﺪا ﻣﻊ اﻵﺧﺮ.

tk.title: ÇORAP İNSANLAR
tk.description: Çoraplar, bir insanın alt bacaklarına giyildiklerinde sıcaklık ve koruma sağlardı. Üst bacaklarına giyildiklerinde ise kişilik kazanarak birbirleriyle şapşal bir ses tonuyla konuşturulabiliyorlardı.

fr-CA.title: PERSONNAGES BAS
fr-CA.description: Portées sur les jambes humaines inférieures, les « bas » offraient chaleur et protection. Tandis que sur celles du haut, ces vêtements avaient une personnalité propre et pouvaient être amenés à se parler avec une voix idiote.

en-AU.title: SOCK PEOPLE
en-AU.description: When worn on a human's lower pair of legs, "socks" offered warmth and protection. When worn on the upper pair of legs, these garments took on personalities and could be made to talk to one another in silly voices.

landmarks.title: SOCK PEOPLE
landmarks.description: When worn on a human's lower pair of legs, "socks" offered warmth and protection. When worn on the upper pair of legs, these garments took on personalities and could be made to talk to one another in silly voices.

landmarks.name: LM_SpeedCamera

en.title: REVERSE SPEED CAMERA
en.description: After a slow-moving tourist caused a 50-person pile-up on Oxford Street, Englandland's pavements were divided into fast and slow lanes. Reverse speed cameras were brought in to identify and prosecute ditherers who dawdled in the brisk lane.

en-GB.title: REVERSE SPEED CAMERA
en-GB.description: After a slow-moving tourist caused a 50-person pile-up on Oxford Street, Englandland's pavements were divided into fast and slow lanes. Reverse speed cameras were brought in to identify and prosecute ditherers who dawdled in the brisk lane.

fr.title: RADAR DE VITESSE INVERSÉE
fr.description: Après qu'un touriste long à la détente a provoqué un empilement de 50 personnes sur Oxford Street, les trottoirs d'Angleterre ont été divisés en voies rapides d'un côté et lentes de l'autre. Des radars de vitesse inversée ont alors été installés pour identifier et poursuivre les mous du genou qui monopolisaient la partie rapide.

de.title: UMGEKEHRTE RADARFALLE
de.description: Nachdem ein langsam gehender Tourist einen Stau von 50 Personen auf der Oxford Street verursacht hatte, wurden die Gehwege in Englandland in schnelle und langsame Spuren unterteilt. Umgekehrte Radarfallen sorgten dafür, dass Trödler, die auf der Überholspur zu langsam gingen, identifiziert und strafrechtlich verfolgt werden konnten.

es.title: RADAR DE TRÁFICO INVERSO
es.description: Después de que un turista lento causara una colisión múltiple de 50 personas en Oxford Street, las aceras de Inglaterralandia se dividieron en carriles lentos y rápidos. Los radares de tráfico inversos se implementaron para identificar y perseguir a indecisos que holgazaneaban en la vía rápida.

it.title: AUTOVELOX AL CONTRARIO
it.description: Dopo che un turista piuttosto lento ha provocato un tamponamento di 50 macchine su Oxford Street, le strade dell'Inghilterraterra furono suddivise tra corsie veloci e lente. Gli autovelox al contrario furono inventati per identificare e perseguire i trasgressori che perdevano tempo nella corsia veloce.

ja.title: 逆転スピードカメラ
ja.description: オックスフォード通りで50人にも及ぶ玉突き事故を起こしたノロマな観光客が訪問した後、イングランドランドの道路は速い車線と遅い車線に分かれることになりました。逆転スピードカメラは、速い車線でモタモタしているノロマを見つけ、罰則を科すために用いられるようになったのです。

ko.title: 역 속도 감시 카메라
ko.description: 느리게 움직이는 여행객들로 인해 옥스포드 거리에 50명 이상이 쌓이기 시작하자 영국나라는 보도를 빠른 선로와 느린 선로로 나누었습니다. 역 속도 감시 카메라는 이렇게 정해진 선로에서 느릿느릿 뭉개는 사람들을 잡기 위해 설치되었습니다.

zh-Hans.title: 慢速监控摄像头
zh-Hans.description: 一名慢行的游客在牛津街造成了 50 人的连环车祸，英格兰大陆的人行道分为快车道和慢车道。慢速监控摄像头用来鉴定和起诉那些在快车道上磨蹭和犹豫不决的人。

zh-Hant.title: 慢速監控攝影機
zh-Hant.description: 由於一名行動緩慢的觀光客在牛津街上造成了 50 人的連環車禍，英格蘭大陸決定將人行道分成快走道和慢走道。慢速監控攝影機是要辨別並起訴在快走道上猶豫不決又拖拖拉拉的人。

ru.title: КАМЕРА ФИКСАЦИИ ПРОТИВОПОЛОЖНЫХ НАРУШЕНИЙ СКОРОСТНОГО РЕЖИМА
ru.description: После того, как медлительный турист создал на Оксфорд-стрит скопление из 50 человек, англоземские тротуары были поделены на полосы быстрого и медленного движения. Камеры фиксации противоположных нарушений скоростного режима разместили, чтобы опознавать и привлекать к ответственности недотеп, которые замешкались на оживленной полосе.

pt-BR.title: RADAR REVERSO
pt-BR.description: Depois de um turista vagaroso causar um engarrafamento de 50 pessoas na rua Oxford, as calçadas da Terra da Inglaterra foram separadas entre vias rápidas e lentas. Os radares reversos foram então instalados para identificar e processar os enrolados que atrapalhavam as pistas de alta velocidade.

nl.title: OMGEKEERDE SNELHEIDSCAMERA
nl.description: Nadat een trage toerist op Oxford Street een kettingbotsing van 50 personen had veroorzaakt, werden de trottoirs van Engelandland verdeeld in snelle en langzame stroken. Omgekeerde snelheidscamera's werden ingezet om treuzelaars op de snelle strook te identificeren en vervolgen.

ar.title: ﻛﺎﻣﻴﺮا ﻣﺮاﻗﺒﺔ اﻟﺒﻂء
ar.description: ﺑﻌﺪ أن ﺗﺴﺒﺐ ﺳﺎﺋﺢ ﺑﻄﻲء اﻟﺤﺮﻛﺔ ﻓﻲ ﺗﻜﺪس 05 ﺷﺨﺼﺎ ﻓﻲ ﺷﺎرع أوﻛﺴﻔﻮرد، ﻗﺴﻤﺖ أرﺻﻔﺔ إﻧﺠﻠﺘﺮا إﻟﯽ ﻣﻤﺮ ﺳﺮﻳﻊ وﻣﻤﺮ ﺑﻄﻲء. وﺗﻢ اﺳﺘﻘﺪام ﻛﺎﻣﻴﺮات ﻣﺮاﻗﺒﺔ اﻟﺒﻂء ﻟﺘﺤﺪﻳﺪ اﻷﺷﺨﺎص اﻟﻤﺘﺮددﻳﻦ اﻟﺬﻳﻦ ﻳﺘﺒﺎﻃﺆون ﻓﻲ اﻟﻤﻤﺮ اﻟﺴﺮﻳﻊ وﻣﻼﺣﻘﺘﻬﻢ.

tk.title: TERSİNE HIZ KAMERASI
tk.description: Yavaş yürüyen bir turist, Oxford caddesinde 50 kişilik bir insan yığılmasına neden olduktan sonra İngiltere'nin kaldırımları hızlı ve yavaş şeritlere ayrıldı. Hareketli şeritte ağır ağır yürüyenleri tespit etmek ve cezalandırmak için ters hız kameraları takıldı.

fr-CA.title: RADAR DE VITESSE INVERSÉE
fr-CA.description: Après qu'un touriste lent ait causé un empilement de 50 personnes sur Oxford Street, les trottoirs d'Angleterre ont été divisés en voies rapides d'un côté et lentes de l'autre. Des radars de vitesse inversée ont alors été installés pour identifier et poursuivre en justice les mous du genou qui encombraient la voie rapide.

en-AU.title: REVERSE SPEED CAMERA
en-AU.description: After a slow-moving tourist caused a 50-person pile-up on Oxford Street, Englandland's pavements were divided into fast and slow lanes. Reverse speed cameras were brought in to identify and prosecute ditherers who dawdled in the brisk lane.

landmarks.title: REVERSE SPEED CAMERA
landmarks.description: After a slow-moving tourist caused a 50-person pile-up on Oxford Street, Englandland's pavements were divided into fast and slow lanes. Reverse speed cameras were brought in to identify and prosecute ditherers who dawdled in the brisk lane.

landmarks.name: LM_StingingNettles

en.title: STINGING NETTLES
en.description: Please do not be tricked by the fuzzy-looking leaves. This plant does not react well to hugs.
